name: Allison
about: I am a peaceful, gentle person who enjoys meeting other people and traveling to just about any place in the world for the experience of it.  I have worked as a Hospice RN for many years and am reminded to carpe diem on a regular basis.  I also have a Massage Therapy practice (for 30years) in the home.  De-stress from your travels with a relaxing, deep tissue massage.  You will enjoy your stay here at Chez Nowicki because the apartment is adorable, quiet and private.  You will likely smell something yummy baking in our kitchen to enjoy with your morning coffee or tea.  I'm very much looking forward to meeting you!

name: Tiffany
about: Im a passionate, fun loving, creative, person who enjoys hosting.  I have traveled the world and love to share stories about travel.  I love permaculture and am actually a teacher about permaculture and the environment.  I love cooking, playing games, travel, and learning!  I live with my boyfriend and we have a very small and friendly cat and dog.

name: Kendra
about: My husband and I, along with our three dogs, live next door in the main house. If you need anything during your stay, whether it be restaurant or bar suggestions or where to see some great live music, just let us know!

name: Lauren
about: I am a teacher for kiddos with autism.  From Tampa, FL. currently living in Denver.  Love to hike and explore the city.

name: Mike
about: The Wildest of Cherries!

name: Allison
about: These units are owned by our company. Allison has recently taken over managing these properties for Alyssa. Both of us still work for the same company, and we will continue to provide the same level of customer service.

name: Dean
about: I'm a marketing and supply chain professional. I've started two companies and worked in retail, electronics distribution, mining, cable, and consumer packaged goods. I'm finishing up my second Masters at DU currently, so that keeps me busy and I am working on growing my outdoor apparel line called Tamagear. I also have an 11 month old Bernese Mountain Dog who is fantastic. I like to travel when possible. My favorite places are San Diego, Denver, Cancun and Europe. I've lived in Denver since 2005 and it has to be the best place I've ever lived since being in seven other states. Nothing else really compares to the Denver active lifestyle and mild seasonal weather patterns.

name: Blvd Suites Corporate Housing
about:
Whether you're on a business trip or between residences, Blvd Suites Corporate Housing is the premier choice when you're going to be away for a month or longer and don't relish the thought of living out of a suitcase. Our furnished suites are more spacious, open and accessorized than most hotel rooms. You'll find them enjoyable and with a "welcome home" feeling you can't find with a standard boxy hotel room. Blvd Suites offers significantly more comfort for less cost. Our team puts every suite through a rigorous quality inspection and makes sure you're prepared with all the information you need to seamlessly integrate yourself into your new community and your new home. Have a problem? If there's a solution we can provide, we'll find it!

Contact us today: (URL HIDDEN)

(URL HIDDEN)

name: Shawn
about: Family

name: Nikki
about:
Hello guests! My name is Nikki, and I'm relatively new to Colorado. I was born in Canada but grew up in Florida which means I love hockey, poutine, cheap beer and the beach. Like most people in Colorado I like hiking, snowboarding, and most of all... tacos. 

This year I'm excited to keep exploring this great state of mine, as well as a Paris/Greece/Turkey trip planned this summer.

When I'm not traveling you can find me teaching kindergarten at a great school in downtown Denver!

I hope you all enjoy your stay! Please let me know if there's anything I can do to accommodate you.

name: Erica
about: I am athletic Colorado girl! Simple and easy going.

name: Brenton
about: I am a colorado native who loves dancing, writing and connecting with fellow travelers. I've been to nearly 50 countries, and truly cherish the stories I've collected along the way. I believe that taking a journey expands our understanding of the world and ourselves, and I love to be part of anyone's journey! I really don't take life too seriously, so I'll be joking around and having a great time if you meet me and my friends. And if you don't like good food...we probably can't be friends.

name: KayJay
about: French speaking guy. A music fanatic .

name: Stephanie
about: Hi, my name is Stephanie.  I recently quit my job as a lawyer (doing Civil Rights work), and decided that now that I have time in my life, I would start renting the apartment in our back yard.  I enjoy everything outdoors that Colorado has to offer - skiing, biking, running, hiking, backpacking.  Last summer I hiked the Colorado Trail - from Denver to Durango (480 miles).  I am an active volunteer, currently serving on the Board of Directors of the Rocky Mountain Road Runners, as a mentor with Colorado Youth at Risk, as a garden specialist with MetroCaring, and as a first grade tutor at the local elementary school.

name: Cassandra
about: Hey everyone!!! Truthfully I never know what to say. I guess the obvious, I LOVE TRAVELING!!! For the last 10 years ive had my share of adventures, in and outside of the country. Colorado is one of my favorite states because of what it has to offer outside. I've climbed for the last 8 years, love hiking and recently got into ice climbing which of course is a ball!  When it comes to food I love it all!! Mainly chips, sushi and vodka. Might as well put that in a food group. (: Well when it comes to work I've been blessed to be self employed. I sell vintage clothing and antiques. Everyday is different and I never know what I'll find. I like to think I would of been a good pirate, you should see my bartering skills!!! (: well hopefully we meet son and happy travels!!

name: Cheryl
about: Being avid travelers and frequent VRBO users, our family knows what travelers expect when it comes to vacation home rentals. We hope you find our home comfortable, well-furnished, clean and welcoming! Living outside of Denver, we searched for a condo that would allow us to enjoy Denver's growing list of amazing restaurants! The Little Raven Loft was the perfect choice for us because of its great location and its quiet, secure building. Being huge Denver Bronco fans, the loft reflects our love of the team and allows us to park and either walk to the stadium or ride the Platte Valley Trolley on game day!

name: Lainey
about:
I have raised 4 incredible daughters and my life is full and fun.  I have been a mortgage originator since 1998.  In my free time, I have the honor of volunteering for our Sheriff's office.  In 2008, I founded an organization for our men and women serving in harm's way and we send care packages overseas each month.  It's a wonderful way for me to give back.  Freedom is not free.   I have hosted  many international students over the years and my goal in the near future is to also become one.  

I have a very special place in the southeast area of town.  I am near I 25/225 and so it makes it easy to get everywhere.

name: Linda
about:
Honest, code of ethics, fair.
I like water sports, biking, ballroom dance.
I love to travel in RV
My life motto is the Golden Rule including
treat every one with kindness, understanding, and fairly

name: Heidi
about: I'm a 20-year resident of our fabulous city, originally from the Midwest. I'd be glad to point you in the right direction especially regarding history, food, travel and nearby adventures but otherwise I'm happy to let you be and enjoy your stay.

name: Brian
about: I'm chill you'll love me ;)

name: Bethany
about: Denver, CO - mountain girl at heart

name: Gwin
about: I own a graphic design business in Denver, CO and have lived here for about 10 yrs.

name: Michael
about: Colorado real estate developer who has lived and loved this exclusive neighborhood for over a decade now offering 3 fine homes.

name: David
about: We love Colorado and all it has to offer!  Can't beat the amazing restaurants, culture....and of course, the MOUNTAINS!!!

name: Eliza Jane
about: Adventurer, entrepreneur, small business owner. Happily married to Hesh Hipp.  Lover of music, art and the wilderness.

name: Ben
about: From Denver, 2 kids (one in college), travel, chess.

name: Emily
about: I enjoy traveling for adventure, work, and education, and I'm always pleased to find a strong community of others participating in the Share Economy through AirBnB. This service makes my experiences both richer and more affordable. I'm happy to be a host as well as a traveler, and the opportunity to help you discover the best of Colorado.

name: Cory
about: 30 years old.  Born in Nashville, TN and now reside in Denver, CO.  I live with my girlfriend, Laura, and our dog Bettie.  I love sports and CrossFit regularly.  I travel for friends, food, and new life experiences.  My goal is to travel to a new place/city/town/state/country once a year, preferably internationally.  I try to be very transparent as a host as possible while getting you as much information about the city and helping you out in any way I can.

name: Matthew And Katie
about: We are two young professionals, Katie works as a museum educator and Matt works on political campaigns. We enjoy good restaurants, bars and all the nightlife that downtown Denver has to offer. We would love for you to stay with us and are happy to give our recommendations as to the best things to do during your stay.

name: Carolyn
about: Hi everyone! I love to travel and be outdoors. I spent a number of years after college doing seasonal work in National Parks and ski resorts. I have lived all over the US and did some volunteer work in the Philippines for a few months. Between seasons I would spend about a month driving around the US visiting friends and checking out new places. I have slept on a lot of couches and in my car in a lot of parking lots! I moved to Denver with the intent on staying somewhere longer than a few months and I'm very happy to be here :) So now that I have an apartment, a bed and a couch, I've decided to list my place on Airbnb. I want to give other travelers the opportunity to stay in a comfortable, conveniently located place, but without the cost of traditional hotels. I have stayed in a number of Airbnb places and I think this is a great way to see new places, meet new people and stay comfortably, particularly on a budget. Enjoy and have fun!

name: Jack
about: I work in entertainment, love splitting my time between Denver and Las Vegas, and love meeting and hosting new people.

name: Caitlin
about:
I recently graduated from law and grad school. I took the bar exam in February. Most people won't know this, but in order to get your law license, you have to pass a Character and Fitness test, which I have meaning that I passed my FBI background check. (SEE ABOVE IF CONCERNED ABOUT SAFETY).

I myself love to travel. I've been across most of Europe and to Morocco. Feel free to share your travel tips and little known  locations with me, I would totally appreciate it. It may be a while before I have to funds to get out again, but I'm always adding to my location or experience wish list.

At home, I like to rock climb, go rafting, and pretty much any adventure Colorado has to offer. So anyone who needs another body for an adventure, count me in! I'm also a bit of a nerd who likes puzzles, reading, playing board games with friends. I'm currently learning to knit. My friends and I also like to try out local breweries on occasion. 

When I'm not traveling or working a ton, I can be a bit of a homebody. My current roommate is moving out and since my last 3 roommates have taken the isolation approach, I thought it might be nice to have various people coming through so that on occasion, I might have guests who want to chat or go on an adventure. Of course, I completely understand the need and desire for privacy so just let me know ahead of time what kind of trip/experience you're looking for.

Additionally, I am currently job hunting, therefore I have more time to dedicate to my guests if they would like me to take them out or just provide transportation. Or join them on a crazy rafting trip, sky diving, etc. (hint, hint). :-)

name: Paul
about: I split my time between Denver and Avon (Vail) and travel often for both business and pleasure.  I have been doing Airbnb at both locations for two years and have had nothing but wonderful experiences.  I hope to continue to host great guests at my two very cool properties.

name: Ian
about: Antique dealer from Denver, Colorado.

name: Keith
about: Just moved to Denver from Austin. I work for the Airlines and travel a far amount. Just had my first child though so trying to stay home as much as possible.

name: Kenneth
about: Sucessful salon owner - kenha(URL HIDDEN) - website -

name: Sarah
about: I was born and raised in Denver, Colorado.  I lived in Honduras for a year, and now I teach 4th grade in Spanish in a Denver elementary school.  I love to fish, ski, hike, eat, box, play violin and viola, and play board games/trivia with friends.

name: Craig
about: I live to produce cinema, develop software, drink craft beer, and eat inventive foods!

name: Joe
about: I enjoy live music, writing code and bikes (motorized + non-motorized). Grew up in Oregon.

name: Kyle
about:
I'm in sales, so I'm always on the go.
Hope you enjoy my treehouse loft!

name: Linhdan
about: Lived in Colorado most of my life and love it here. I studied neuroscience at Regis University. I am easy going, friendly, and I like to eat.

name: Eli
about: My interests: rhythm, perception, best practices, principled negotiation, deliberate practice, self-discipline, cloud technology, astronomy, dancing, joy. Have lived and loved all over the world

name: Joseph & Ashley
about:
We are a fun, easy-going couple who love to meet and spend time with new people and travel off the beaten path (i.e. stay with actual people or at least not in hotels!). 

We are returned Peace Corps volunteers enjoying life in Denver with our puppy, our somewhat older kitty, and our seven chickens.  Ash works for a nonprofit fighting the literacy gap (Reading Partners) and Jos works for a nonprofit he co-founded in 2007 (Revision).

We enjoy gardening, listening to music, cooking, biking, hiking, all things outdoors, and generally being goofy!

We look forward to meeting new people through our adventures with AirBnB!

name: Tony
about: My partner and I are both 36 year old active professionals who live in an artistic and thriving neighborhood in Denver very close to downtown.  We LOVE living in Denver and in Colorado.  We love having everything the city has to offer, but also the proximity to pristine nature and mountain activities.

name: Eliza
about: I love Colorado and the Mile High city. I'm always enthusiastic to have great people stay in my home so that they, too, can enjoy my city and all the wonderful activities and sunshine that Colorado has to offer.

name: Jeff And JP
about:
We are both avid lifestyle enthusiasts who enjoy a really good Americano,  food and wine, music, christmas lights year round, and a fabulous sunset. And the great outdoors. 

Originally from Canada, we love Denver and how close it is to nature and beauty.

name: Adele
about: I love traveling and have lived all over the U.S., but need to make more of an effort to travel abroad in the near future! I like going out to live music shows, and I always stop at used bookstores and record shops wherever I go. I can give great recommendations on what to see in New Orleans, New York City, and Denver, and love hearing about lesser known gems off of the tourist path.

name: Holly
about: Avid traveler who knows just how important it is to have a good meal in your belly and a nice place to rest your head at night. I love the color white, the smell of freshly bleached linens, dinner parties, warm weather, and all things modern.

name: Claire And Bryant
about:
ABOUT US (excerpts from our Couchsurfing profile)

We love the Colorado lifestyle and find Denver pretty perfect for doing what we like to do. It's always a pleasure to meet new people who have things to say or things to teach, and we always feel honored to make new friends. We are constantly learning and challenging each other to grow. Art is a passion for Claire and music is a part-time job for Bryant and, as a result, we have created a very beautiful and creative environment that we live in. All this being said, when time and circumstance permit, we definitely like a good dance party with some live or electronic music and have been known to have some epically hedonistic party-time.

Interests

Hiking, Camping, Film, Yoga, Hot Springs, Entheogens and Amazonian Plant Medicine, Music!!!(live and recorded), meditation, The Golden Dawn, Hermetic Inner and Laboratory Alchemy, Shamanism, plants (especially air plants), making terrariums, sustainable living, healthy cooking and organic food, dance parties. Making arts, crafts and music. Other human beings. Strange books. General subversion.

Music, Movies & Books

Too many to mention, really.

Directors (a few): Werner Herzog, The Coen Brothers, Harmony Korine, Alejandro Jodorowsky, Terry Gilliam, Mike Judge, Darren Aronofsky, Kenneth Anger, Lars Von Trier, Jean-Luc Godard, David Cronenburg, Andrei Tarkovsky, Akira Kurosawa

Music(a smidgen): Caribou, Beck, Ween, Poolside, Tame Impala, Unknown Mortal Orchestra, LCD Soundsystem, Foxygen, Black Moth Super Rainbow, Tobacco, Radiohead, The Black Angels, Jamiroquai, Neutral Milk Hotel, Beirut, Boombox, The Velvet Underground, The Grateful Dead, Yacht, Jimmy Smith, Critters Buggin, Shostakovich, Bach, Beethoven, and probably about ten-thousand others (seriously).

Books(just a few authors): Robert Anton Wilson, William S Burroughs, Frank Herbert, Terrence McKenna, David Foster Wallace, Carl Jung, Aleister Crowley, Robert Heinlein, Timothy Leary, Fyodor Dostoyevsky, Hermann Hesse, Joseph Campbell, Charles Bukowski, William Blake, William Butler Yeats, Tom Robins, Kurt Vonnegut, H.P. Lovecraft, Chuck Palahniuk,

One Amazing Thing I've Done

Fended of a bear attack using the Mars Volta.


Countries I've Visited

Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cayman Islands, Costa Rica, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Mexico, Netherlands, Peru, Spain, United Kingdom

Countries I've Lived In

United States

name: Jack
about: I am an active Coloradoan that indulges in nearly all outdoor activities. On my rest days I find myself brewing beer or enjoying a peaceful patio.

name: Stephen
about: My name is Stephen and I currently reside in Denver.  My partner and I run a local craft/art/food market called Denver Handmade Homemade (HAHO) Market my and career path has taken me from education to urban agriculture and community development.

name: Alejandro
about: Denver-native / hospitality nerd / business up front / fun every day

name: Carol
about: My husband Tom and I just returned to Denver after 3.5 years in South Carolina supporting a family member. We are so happy to be home! Tom is into music and exploring his creativity with stone art. He's a semi-retired stone mason (he abhors the word 'retired') I'm a fan of NIA and yoga and enjoy practicing at Dancing the Soul studio. I'm a self-employed life coach and communication skills trainer. We both like to walk the neighborhood, bike and gather with friends.

name: Andrew And Siobhan
about:
Denver is our favorite city. The Rockies, the people, the climate, and our many friends all combine to make the Mile High City a special place for us.   We bought this home because it is a beautiful, welcoming, and private oasis, yet so close to downtown Denver.  We love that we can walk to nearly any place we might want to go.

The location is peaceful and secure. A pretty, classic, and private home that is the perfect combination of being just far away enough from the hustle and bustle to have a quiet neighborhood feel, yet close enough to be in a fun vibrant area. 

The private garden is a little sanctuary in the city, secure, relaxing, and pleasant. 

And having a garage is very convenient, it makes parking a breeze.

Please let us know if we can help with any questions or special needs.
Thank you

name: Jessica
about: We love living in our apartment. It is in a great neighborhood. Just a short walk or bike ride to many restaurants, shops and things to do. (There is a hourly bike rental right around the corner.) We love to travel ourselves and are excited about enabling others to do the same. Our favorite destination so far has been Costa Rica. It is one of the most beautiful places I've ever been. I would highly recommend it. They had a great saying there...Pura Vita. Meaning "Pure Life," and it is something I've taken with me ever since.

name: Robbie
about:
I am a 33 year-old professional who travels all the time. I spend most of my time in LA, NY, and Central/Eastern Europe.  I was raised in Southern California.

Id guess Im like most 30 something year-old americans: I like sports, poker, running/gym, golf nut, ski bum, afternoon coffee with a friend, etc

Life Motto: follow your passions, work hard and don't forget to have fun.

I went 4 months living in NY without playing golf and it was brutal!

Avid AirBnB user
Favorite foreign destinations: Odessa, Budapest, Thessaloniki

name: Sam
about: I recently moved back to Colorado from New York... after I lived out of a backpack for a year. I've stayed in many places, from hotels, Airbnbs, and hostels; many people have taken me into their homes with open arms, and now that I have an apartment, once again, I'd like to do the same. Whether you're renting my spare room, or my whole loft, I'll do what I can to make sure you have what you need and are comfortable :)

name: Angie
about: Hi! I'm Angie. During the day (and many nights and weekends), I'm busy running a small digital marketing agency in Denver. When I find some free time, I fill it with reading, sewing, knitting, gardening and biking my way around the streets of Denver.

name: Stephanie
about:
Wife / New Mom / Writer / Pleasure-Seeker 

Favorite places I've had the pleasure to explore: 
- Antarctica (worked in McMurdo for 2 years with my husband)
- The Togean Islands in Indonesia (nearly impossible to get to, just as hard to leave)
- Evergreen, CO (my hometown)
- Iceland (the whole country is amazing)
- Cartagena, Colombia (one of our honeymoon spots) 

Really, anywhere in the world is an amazing place to be if you go there with an open mind and a warm heart.

name: Ashley
about: Denver, owner of Cowork Unite, the freelancer's coworking network.  I also am a freelance web designer and own Shaping Art. I'm 32 and love travelling, comedy, and adventures.

name: Tami
about: Always excited to meet new guests.

name: Mickey
about: I am a Denver born and raised Colorado girl with an inherant love for the outdoors and a passion for travel, art, music and design.  My profession is designing clothing and when I'm not doing that you can find me on the mountain strapped into my snowboard, drinking coffee or cocktails at the any one of the amazing establishments  in my neighborhood or traveling to some exotic location in search of my next adventure.  I would love to share my home and knowledge of the place I call home with like minded individuals and I hope you enjoy it as much as I do!

name: Kevin
about:
I am from NY but have lived many places.  I loved to Colorado 5 years ago and this is my favorite place so far.  

I love being outdoors, hiking, climbing, biking, yoga, working out, music festivals.  I enjoy having a few beers with friends and being around fun people

name: Meg
about:
More of an explorist, that a tourist. 

Lived in LA, KC and now Denver. I like vintage shopping, running, writing and avocado toast. Work in social media, write for Eater (check out their website for the latest and greatest restaurants and bars in Denver and nationally). Big advocate of puns, carbs and Leslie Knope. 

IG: @Leftoversfromfriday

name: Paul
about: I am a fairly easy going person who likes to keep his apartment clean and his life up in the air. Enjoy my place!

name: Radhika
about: I would describe my personality as very outgoing and social. I am easy to talk to and a good listener. I understand people and I make friends very easily.

name: Nick
about:
I was born and raised in Denver, and have lived the majority of my life here, so I know it well and am happy to give suggestions on restaurants, breweries, hikes, concerts, transport, whatever! Like most Coloradans, I love my outdoors, and try to ski and mountain bike as much as I can. 

I've also traveled quite a bit internationally and lived in the UK (London) and the Netherlands (Maastricht), so I know how having a great place to stay and a helpful host can really shape a visit. I want you to have an amazing time in Denver, a trip you remember for a lifetime!

name: Asfaw
about: My name is Asfaw Kuture. I am blessed with gorgeous wife and three beautiful children and live in Denver Colorado. I drive a Taxi in the Greater Denver Metro Area full time and also run a small part time online business.

name: Carly
about: I am a singer/songwriter/actor who is interested in astrology, psychology, and theatre.  I just relocated to Denver from NYC where I lived for the last 9 years.  I teach theatre to kids and also produce performance art with my theatre company in Denver and Brooklyn.

name: Jenna
about:
Hello!
I am a single mom of a sweet 4 year old little boy who is my travel buddy! I want to show him the world and I am glad to have found Airbnb as it seems like a great way to meet life long friends and visit amazing places. I am a French teacher at an international school in Denver (My son attends the same school.) So that goes without saying that I only speak French with my son! ;-)
5 things I can't live without?
Travelling and learning about other cultures
Swimming
Watching movies
Mexican food
Spending time with my family
And music! (OK, 6 things.)
I have used Airbnb twice- once hosting and once travelling in Belgium. Both were not the greatest experiences but I am ready to give it another try this summer. I am extremely tidy (maybe a little OCD) so you can be sure that we will leave your place as we found it. :-)
One of the quotes I really like is, " Ne laisse jamais quelqu'un devenir une priorité dans ta vie alors que tu n'es pas qu'une option dans la sienne."
(Don't let someone become a priority in your life when you are just an option in theirs.)
We look forward to meeting you soon!
Jenna and Q.

name: Jared
about: Father to two beautiful girls ages 6 and 4 . Business oriented. Love active and healthy lifestyle.

name: Tim
about: My name is Tim. I live with my wife Alice and our English bulldog Moses. We love our place for easy access to games, skiing in the winter, concerts in the summer, chilled walks down the river, the MCA for culture, endless new restaurants and the lively hustle and bustle of Lodo living. Our couch is also pretty spectacular for lounging around on and recovering from all of the above!!

name: Susan
about: Recovering Artist, proficient in oil painting and etching, I love managing the old family office and home that has been in the family for almost a century.  I love animals, travel and communicating with people.

name: Jason
about: I'm a vegetarian (almost vegan, cheese...yum) Buddhist. I fell in love with travel while touring as Damian Marley's guitarist. I speak Spanish well enough to get by and I'm working on Portuguese (love Portugal). Unfortunately, I forgot the Japanese and Mandarin I learned in school. I like to travel with a good book, usually classic literature, and some tea.

name: Katy And Ralph
about: My partner Ralph and I have been traveling since August 2009. I'm from Denver and he is from Liverpool. We divide our time in Australia, Europe, UK and North America. We don't own any property so we need to find a place to live in each city we visit. AIRBNB suits us perfectly!

name: Charles
about: My nickname is Carlie, a German derivative of Charles. I'm a gregarious, active person with a love of sports, travel and the outdoors. I've traveled to many other countries and always favor the more personal experience of getting to know the locals versus hotel experiences. On any given day I may be playing Ultimate Frisbee, running at the nearby park in Stapleton or having a drink at one of the many local restaurants. I like meeting new people and sharing insights on my favorite, unique spots in my town of Denver.

name: Barbara
about:
Hey new friend!  To kick things off... I'm fun, spend a lot of time socializing due to being a new business owner of a marketing and communications agency, have loads of really amazing people in my life and enjoy a good meal with my girlfriends.  Oh, and my mother.  I get fa-clumped thinking about her.  She's EVERYTHING to me and I love her so.

I love charity work and my favorite is St. Jude where I've chaired a few events.  Weekends can be spent catching up on reality TV  (yup I admitted it), running errands, going to the movies, and to what seems to be an endless supply of events from BBQ's to birthday celebrations.

name: Heather
about: Relatively new to the Denver Area and first time homeowners, we love good food, good beer, good friends, good music, and as much travel as life allows.  Working with children as social workers, we try to keep our personal lives as care-free and cheerful as possible to balance out the intensity of our work lives.  We love hiking, biking, camping, and pretty much anything Colorado's outdoors have to offer.

name: John
about: My family and I have lived in Denver for four years now after moving from Orlando, FL. We love the colorado lifestyle and all of the outdoor adventures. We have a 5 year old son, William and a 1 year old daughter, Jacque.  We love riding bikes, playing and watching sports, gardening, and getting away to the mountains.

name: Layla
about: Colorado/ Denver native can let you know about all the great free concerts, live music and events happening in Denver. Enjoy traveling and hosting for travelers..  Welcome....traveling female(s) on short notice or for long stays.

name: Shane
about:
Loves travel and stories of travel.  Looking forward to meeting people who want to interact.  (...and perfectly happy to leave alone those who don't, I get that way too.)  A fan of American and international history, economics both financial and behavioral, and takes pride in having perfectly calm disagreement when talking.

AirBnB is proving to be fun, and I look forward to welcoming you to the house!

name: Andrea
about: I am a Colorado native, born here in Denver and I have lived in several areas of our beautiful state.  I worked 11 years for the USDA in eastern Colorado and learned a love for the land and its beauty and resources.   Currently, I am a part-time property manager  and home-schooling mom of twins.  My husband, Michael, is also a Colorado native.  Together, we love visiting local attractions (Denver has a world-class zoo, natural history and art  museums) and hanging out with our family.  As a host, I can provide information on what you can find in the neighborhood and, since I'm local, you can count on me to be available if any problems arise.

name: Larry
about:
Born and raised in the great state of Illinois I relocated permanently to Denver about 15 years ago, and fell in love with all that this great city has to offer. From the mountains to the sports teams, you name it you can probably find it here. My wife is from is from the enchanted Island of Puerto Rico and we decided recently that it was time for us to relocate but we still want keep a base here in Denver.  I currently spilt my time between the two locations and we are so happy to be able to share the home that we have come to love with others. My wife son and I love to travel and share our adventures whenever we have the opportunity to do so and we'd love to hear all about yours too so please do share.

 We have come to adore this  area due to the close proximity to so many things.. The house is close to DIA, close to the main highway that leads to the mountains and down town and is very close to the Northfield shopping and entertainment complex. Feel free to ask me about everything this neighborhood has to offer. Everyone is friendly and there is oh so much to do. 

Thank you so much for your interest in our home and please share your stories, experiences, comments etc w/ us.

name: John
about: Nationally recognized interior designer, was published in numerous publications as well as voted one of the Top 25 Designers in the Nation.  Owner and Lead Designer of Thorn and French Interior Design Firm based in Denver, Co.

name: Jorgen
about:
Originally from Des Moines, Iowa. I'm a real estate developer and broker living downtown Denver. I know the city well and am happy to have a dialogue with guests about how to best spend their time while in Denver and Colorado 

Traveling the world and connecting with people requires a great deal of trust and natural regard for others, including their City, personal spaces and places. Airbnb is built on this idea, and it's the very reason I love to host!

name: Valerie
about:
I have just spent the last several months traveling and volunteering around the world and I want people who stay at LolaPlace to have a great experience during their travels. 

I grew up in the Midwest, lived in Chicago for several years, and now love the mountains as much as I love all my favorite cities -- San Francisco, Chicago, London, and Aspen, Mt. Kilimanjaro, Conundrum Hot Springs.  

I believe that travel is the key to understanding different people and different cultures.   And I"ve learned that people are fabulous all over the world!

name: Kerrie & Eric
about: We are both Ohio natives, but have been living in Colorado collectively for quite some time! We love to ski and snowboard, cook random Pinterest recipes for dinner, see shows at red rocks, hike, play a good game of catch phrase, and check out the local breweries.  We have a 15 month old puppy named Grayson who loves to cuddle :)

name: Beth
about:
Hi there. We are a family from Ohio and Sweden. We have lived in Denver for the past 4 years. We love skiing, traveling, play music-instruments and hanging out with family and friends. We also love Denver, its history and walkable streets. It reminds us of many cities in Europe. 
We enjoy walking down to the movies on 16th Street Mall or drinking a cappuccino in nearby coffee-shop. If the day ends with a dinner in a nearby Indian restaurant, it is complete.
Other then that we take pride in working with and maintaining our house, one of Denver's most famous historical houses. The Cody House.

name: Dawn
about:
I'm a life coach and there's nothing I enjoy more than being in inspiring conversations about potential and possibilities. I love finding healthy recipes and spending the afternoon preparing and cooking while watching tennis (Go Federer!).  I also love reading good books, working out (kickboxing, jiu jitstu, walking, tennis, yoga), watching documentaries, traveling, road trips, breathing in mountain air and connecting with people on a deeper level.

Welcome to my home! I will do my best to provide you with the things I would want during my travels.

name: John
about: Avid runner (done the Boston Marathon 4 times), Colorado Native, love the outdoors and can definitely recommend local activities. Happy to share my loft with visitors looking to enjoy this awesome city and state!

name: Allen
about: I am 22, single, and live downtown denver doing freelance graphic design and apparel manufacturing. Been in CO almost 5 years, great place to be! I love art, fashion, and skateboarding. Recently opened a streetwear store here in Denver.

name: Anh
about: Super chill.  Clean and meticulous.  What you see is what you get.  However, if you have any questions or issues, I'm very responsive.

name: Jennifer
about:
Yoga and tennis now surpass my love for chocolate and martinis, even though I haven't neglected the latter altogether. I thrive on enjoying life and savoring each moment. Known for my laughter and good energy, people enjoy being near me and strangers often become friends for this reason. 

As a host, I ensure cleanliness, comfort, and privacy in a welcoming space. 

Located in the heart of the desirable Cherry Creek neighborhood, my location is a block from Gates Tennis Center and the famous Cherry Creek Mall. A few blocks to the north is the exclusive Cherry Creek North neighborhood which is home to exclusive boutiques, art galleries, and the foodie's delight with scrumptious dining options abounding---all within walking distance.

I may or may not be present during your stay.

name: Monika
about:
Monika and Terry 
Welcome to Denver! Today Denver, Colorado is one of the fastest growing cities with so much to offer. Congress park is where I have invested in a triplex unit located in one of the most desirable neighborhoods. Currently I have a vacancy in one of my apartments and I thought what a great opportunity to allow visitors to come stay here and really get to experience the best of Denver

name: Leigh Ann
about: My husband and I are avid animal lovers with a love for people, adventure, travel, and the outdoors!  I am a pediatric nurse, and my husband owns his own business, and works at The Great Divide Brewery in his spare time (who likes free and delicious craft brew?!) We met in the sunny state of Colorado back in 2012 and were married a year and a half later in the mountains near Vail.  We bought our lovely 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom condo around that same time, and we have absolutely loved our home in the Park Hill Neighborhood!  Our neighbors are wonderful and we couldn't ask for a better spot, so close to downtown and City Park.  It's always quiet after 9pm, and yet it's just a quick drive or $5-$10 uber to get to all the best spots in town!  Our neighborhood offers some great restaurants and coffee shops within walking distance, and one of our favorite local craft breweries is just a few blocks away!  Please come and enjoy all that Denver has to offer in this pet-friendly abode in the city, yet away from the crowds!

name: Kathleen
about: I've been in Denver for almost 8 years by way of Chicago. I love life out here- the weather is always gorgeous, and I stay busy by enjoying all that Colorado has to offer, from mountain biking to hiking to snowboarding!

name: Kate
about: I am an Airbnb regular, and we live in Denver, Colorado. My husband and I are both teachers and love to travel.

name: Guy
about: I enjoy being active and love the Denver area! This is a great place to find fun active things to do or just find a cool spot to hang out downtown. Coors Field is always a great time. I like my place to be well kept up and hope you find it relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Holly
about: I was born in South Africa and have lived in the US since 1991. My passions are traveling, creating gardens, amateur photography and participating in local community events. I am easily coerced into eating delicious homemade food, and engaging in meaningful conversation. This is my first venture into being a host and it's really important for me to create an experience for you that will keep you coming back.

name: Mimi
about: My husband John and I moved to Colorado in 2014 and have been loving all of the skiing, hiking, biking, camping etc etc that it has to offer! We are very clean and conscientious guests when we stay with others, and are happy to provide a place in Denver for Colorado visitors to stay.

name: Kyle
about: My wife and I are newly weds who recently moved to Denver to start our life together. We are passionate about traveling the world, meeting new people and finding adventures wherever we go.

name: Marian
about: I am a Mom of two who are off on their own now. After they went to college, we moved from Evergreen, CO in the mountains to the city. I wanted a neighborhood where I could walk to everything and found a lovely townhome in the heart of the LoHi area. I love skiing, traveling and am always up for an adventure!

name: Tiffany
about:
I LOVE to travel, spend time with my family & friends, workout (occasionally, trying to do better with that), and have a great time.

I love happy hours, relaxing at the beach, going to the Park, and dancing.  

My theme song is "Living off the wall..." by Michael Jackson.

My tag line is "Zoom Zoom Zoooom..." You may catch me in a city near you ☺

name: Arthur & Shannon
about: Shan and I moved to Denver after spending seven years in Dubai, UAE.  We are passionate about traveling, education, live music, and enjoying all that life has to offer.  We are grateful to Airbnb for giving us opportunities to share our home, trade stories, listen to music and enjoy sunset cocktails on the rooftop with 150+ truly remarkable people.

name: Alex
about: Passionate about: time outside, preferably in the backcountry hiking, fly fishing, climbing, or just rambling around; reading, mostly fiction but anything written well; great food and drink. I'm a full-time PhD student and part-time NOLS instructor.

name: Cody & Katie
about:
We like everyone to feel welcomed and relaxed when staying at our AirBnB. We want you to feel at home. We believe that regardless of whether you are with us for vacation or business, our listings are a place where you can have fun, use the spaces freely, and still have necessary quiet time and privacy.

We like to go hiking in the mountains, socialization, and general fun times. We have a very relaxed  and nonjudgmental persona in this house, but also expect everyone have a high level of personal responsibility. Cody cooks often and enjoys sharing his creations.

name: Jenny
about: I am a public health nurse in the city and LOVE traveling and the great outdoors.  Originally from Park City, UT, I grew up skiing and am currently here in the city working and gaining experience.  I love all that Chicago has to offer in the way of music, theatre, social justice groups, and cultural diversity!

name: Boombox
about: Engaging and outgoing female.

name: Adam
about: I spend most of my time rooting for the Kansas City Royals, riding my bicycle and running in the mountains.

name: Sara And Josh
about: We both work as ski instructors at Winter Park Resort and split our time between Denver and the mountain. We are avid travelers and have had the opportunity to stay with great people around the world. We love AirBnB for the great service it provides travelers and because it helps us save up for our next world adventures!

name: Lena
about: I'm from the Phoenix metro valley although I've lived other places and like to travel locally and in Eastern and Western Europe and North America.  I'm an artist and am interested in community development and sustainability.  For fun, I go tango dancing and to see bands and sit around in coffeeshops.  I like hiking and camping too to get out and see the stars.  Art politics, museums, books! Not much into sports but like watching basketball.

name: Georgina
about:
I'm starting to do a lot more traveling and it is so nice to be able to set things up beforehand and feel safe as well as sure I'll have a place to lay my head! Locals always know the best places to go so I'd love some insight to your hometown when I book. I am also hosting now so I'd love to help you explore Colorado and let you know where the locals go!
I am a respectful traveler who is just looking for somewhere I can have a cocktail and put my feet up with a good book after exploring during the day. My favorite parts of traveling are good food, live music, and people watching.
I am currently a massage therapist as well as full-time student (learning how to be a broke teacher) in Denver, CO.
Please check me out on Instagram to get an idea of who I am! My username is ginapost.

name: Diana Rae
about:
Call me Rae.
I like to create beautiful spaces for people.  I'm a traveler, mostly Latin America of late, but was privileged to attend electronic music festivals in Europe last summer.  I know what makes me comfortable when I'm traveling and try to provide that for my guests.  I'm a gardener who grows some of my own food and lives sustainably.  I like to eat super healthy.  I love sailing and swimming in the warm ocean.  I love my friends and love to dance.  I speak some Spanish and am starting to learn French.

name: James
about:
I am a twenty-something fast-paced traveler. I travel weekly for work and when I am not working I tend to be travelling for pleasure. My day job is for a healthcare consulting firm. I thoroughly enjoy my work.

I am very laid back and enjoy meeting all kinds of new people. If you are hosting me I am considerate and thoughtful. If I am hosting you I am accommodating and provide privacy.

name: Monica
about: Originally from Austin,TX, I've lived in Denver for over 8 years. I live here with my husband, Kieran, and our two Australian cattle dogs, Eli and Addison. I love animals, live music, running, hiking, photography, traveling, and socializing. One of my favorite activities is exploring one of the many hiking trails Colorado has to offer with my dogs.

name: Susan
about: I'm an interior designer, am married to a wonderful guy, have girl/boy twins who are the light of my life, and we love to travel. Our neighborhood is historic, funky, full of great restaurants and bars, close to all sporting venues, and I love to share it with visitors. I am always happy to share recommendations for my favorite spots!

name: Jeff
about:
Former river rafting/outdoor guide, ski patroller - knows Colorado and region - great insights on what to see and do.  Friendly, loves people, most people  - enjoys sharing a beer or a glass of wine, but find at leaving you alone.
Teacher, writer, nonprofit consultant.  
Motto:  Live life on purpose

name: Kim
about:
I have been a real estate entrepreneur for twenty years - and I love airbnb!    In 2011 I stumbled on this building in RiNo by chance and have loved watching the neighborhood rapidly unfold in the short time since then.  I lived in this studio unit during most of the building renovation.

In 2014 we welcomed twin girls, who often take us adventuring in the mountains where we found the off-grid cabin in Fairplay.    When they were 6 months old we started spending weekends there  - snowshoeing in with pack n plays and high chairs.   Maybe this year they can sled in!

name: John
about: Internet Entrepreneur.

name: Amberly
about:
My husband and I love traveling! We've been to a few places across Europe and a few major cities in the United States. We hope to go wherever we can before we have kids, but plan to travel and teach them about the world around them.
Likes: My beautiful dogs, soccer (football), US football, trying new foods, pubs and breweries, and makeup.

name: Jennifer
about: Jennifer is a massage therapist (over 20 years).  Husband Brian works for the City of Denver.  Love hiking, outdoors, travel, road trips, gardening, good books and music, science, meeting new people, exploring microbrews.  Avid gardeners, we are also beekeepers.  Chickens may be next.  We enjoy intelligent and/or entertaining movies, foreign films, philosophy.  Easy going, relatively laid back, generous, quirky. "Ask for what you need."

name: Mark
about: I'm a high school teacher in Denver. I teach media and pop culture.

name: Tania
about:
My husband and I have lived in Denver for over 3 years, and bought a home in the wonderful neighborhood of City Park West. We moved from Berkeley, CA to pursue academic and employment opportunities. 
Things we enjoy:
Reading, traveling, live music, beer, new culinary experiences, dancing, hiking, camping. 
We truly love our city and want to share it with Airbnb'ers!  I also speak Spanish and French and can fumble through Russian and a bit of German.

name: Paul
about:
A Nurse for the last five years worked at Denver health, Children Hospital and Nursing homes for the elderly 
Car sales man part time Sunset AUTO best car sales man in my area 
I am  finishing my degree at th(URL HIDDEN)
University Of Colorado as a Finance Major & ( RMI)Risk Management Insurance 
I earned a Honor's  Degree here in Denver for Business management  
I was part of the PHI Theta Kappa Honor society in my academic year
Same year I was on the DEANS list for academic performance 
Come home and enjoy Denver

name: Daphne
about: We are an active family who has lived in Denver for over 20 years.  We love Colorado and enjoy sharing it with visitors.

name: Todd
about: I'd be happy to host your time in Denver. I'm interested in the whole variety of outdoor activities associated with Colorado; if you are looking for places to hike, bike, ski or ride, then I can give you some tips. I'm also a big fan of the art and performance scene here.  Some of my favorite restaurants and breweries, many within walking distance.  I'm a mechanical design engineer with a big interest in industrial and system design.

name: Kayla
about:
I am a professional in my 30s and recent Denver transplant by way of New Mexico. Born and raised in Texas, I pride myself on my Southern hospitality. 

I love my space, and am happy to share it with you and provide you with everything you need to know about having an awesome time in Denver. The ideal guest is low maintenance, and respectful of my belongings and my neighbors.

Things I love about living in Colorado: the friendly folks, good vibes, beautiful landscapes, and breathtaking mountaintops

name: Savinay
about: Recent convert to Denver and I gotta say I love it.

name: Ryan
about: I'm Ryan and I live in Denver.

name: Logan
about:
Hello all!  

My name is Logan and my girlfriend Hannah and I share our beautiful Capital Hill home.  I am a CU mechanical engineer with a passion for soccer and tech, and would love to show off our city of Denver to you!

name: Betsy
about: I was born in Colorado, and have lived in suburbs of Denver all my life.  6 years ago I moved into Denver proper and fell in love with city life!

name: Ann
about:
Retired photography teacher, lover of Boston Terriers and Paris.  

I have been hosting since January 2014 and am finding the experience very enjoyable. During February 2014 a  beautiful, young couple from New York, N. Y. became engaged on their stay here at The Cottage, and I am over the moon about it.  Things are really developing a "flow" now.  My guests have been respectful to my property and any questions that have arisen have been addressed fully.  All in all, I don't believe you will find a better, more convenient way to explore the city of Denver and the adjacent foothills and mountains.

name: Lois
about: I am an outgoing, fun loving lady - always on the go - biking, hiking,skiing, playing tennis and golf.  I love to read a well written book or watch an interesting movie.  I recently made the move to Colorado and am exploring this part of the country as much as possible.  I personally have used Airbnb and love the whole concept so I know what it feels like to be a guest in someone's home.  This has enabled me to utilize my experience to help make my guests feel right at home.

name: Chiara
about:
I am open minded,fun, spontaneous and active. I work a professional job in the day and teach dance classes a couple times a week. 
I opened up my home because why not? I love meeting new people.
I have always had a travel itch and used to go out of town on the weekends or whenever possible. Lately I have slowed down my wild lifestyle and haven't been traveling as much. But I love people and new experiences so I figured this would be a great idea.

If you are looking for a place with people to show you around and hang out with while visiting I would be happy to do so. If you are looking for a comfortable, cozy place to enjoy your time here and not be bothered that is also an option here.

I am open to couples, singles, girls, and guys, 420 & gay friendly. If you have a cat or dog I would love to house them too!!

name: David
about:
I'm an acupuncturist, massage practitioner and personal trainer. 
When I'm not at work, I'm on my bike, composing music, or hosting the Boost Collective, a group that helps people fulfill their creative and professional goals.

name: Camille
about: I bought Casa Coco after numerous vacations with my sons to Sayulita. We fell in love with the town and this property.  It is owner managed, lovingly cared for, with great attention to detail. My assistant and I are there for our guests 24/7 as needed. I can offer lots of advice on what to do and where to eat, and other tips for an enjoyable vacation.

name: Tim
about: 33 year old healthcare professional, native to Colorado, and enjoy every bit of our beautiful state.  I love to travel and do it a lot for work and for pleasure with my beautiful wife.  We book vacations almost once a month and understand the little things that make for a great, memorable stay.  As new hosts, we hope to learn and improve quickly by our guests candid feedback and hope to incorporate what we learn from our own Airbnb vacations.  We love hiking, camping, and snowboarding in CO, and we love checking out new cities around the world.  We have favorites in many continents (Europe, Asia, Africa, and South America).  In Denver, we're so thrilled to try new restaurants as the food scene continues to thrive and so many great restaurants are in Uptown or right around the corner.

name: Shane
about: Professional, creative type who travels often for work and pleasure.  Originally from the Midwest and have been in Colorado for 6 years now. Hiker, photographer, weaver and untrained wanna be chef.

name: Gail
about:
I love Denver and Colorado! Moved to Aspen initially in 1992 (yes, to be a ski bunny) but, deep down, I'm a city girl. Denver is a vibrant, fun, and growing town. There's something for everyone - Welcome! Stay a while.

I also love to travel and use AirBnB, too. I've learned what I've needed and have tried to provide those things for folks... that's why I've even got hair bands available.

name: Jaime
about:
I'm originally from Florida, but moved to Colorado because of all the amazing things this state has to offer! I love to be outside, whether it's trail running, camping, hiking, going to concerts at Red Rocks and most recently mountain biking! 

Traveling is one of my favorite things to do! There is so much to see and do in the world, it feels silly to stay in one place :) My favorite companion is my dog, Aspen! She is a great travel buddy and always has a smile on her face!

Feel free to ask me any questions about Denver or myself!

name: Lacey
about: I'm a mountain enthusiast and avid traveler. Love meeting people and swapping stories. I think walking and biking is the best way to see a city and enjoy getting lost in cities to find "hidden" local spots. Hope you can do the same in Denver!

name: Lawrence
about:
Originally from NYC, I have also lived in Atlanta, and Oakland.  When i travel I am most often in Vegas, NYC, the CO mountains, or the  SF/Oakland/Tahoe area. 
In winter I'm out snowboarding  and smiling. In summer its flip flops and bikes. Hiking, camping, yoga, wine, movies  and music are my biggest interests. I just got scuba certified so i hope to start heading to places with warm water and clean beaches, the only thing Colorado doesn't have!!
I work as a chef  and I own a liquor store, too.
My home is  decorated with screen prints from Rock bands.
Thanks for taking a look and enjoy my home while you are in Colorado!!
Im happy to give you some travel or dinning tips when you are here, but tend to stay out of your way and let you set your own pace. 

my spanish skills are  beginner

name: Brendan
about:
I live in Denver, have my own business doing tech consulting mostly with Atlassian products, 

I like to snowboard, kite surf, play soccer....trying to get into running..running is hard! :)

What are 5 things you can't live without:
- my mac (cliche right?)
- my Spotify account 
....working on the rest. 

I'm a very low maintenance guest and very much appreciate the aims of this site. I'm super appreciative that you're generously offering to share your space and will treat both the space and your schedule with the utmost respect.

My favorite places to have travelled is probably Fremantle Australia. Also enjoyed Dehli India, London, Venice (both Italy and Cali), San Diego, Cabo, Baja, Tasmania.

My favorite movie is "Army of Darkness" 

Music I enjoy is modern alt and I'm a sucker for the 80s and 90s bands I grew up with.

name: Linda
about: I am a single woman (divorced many years ago).  Business owner for 24 years as a conference manager in the environmental, social change community.  I work out of my Denver Capitol Hill historic mansion.  I enjoy outdoor activities such as hiking and snow-shoeing.  My faithful companion is Lucy, a 9 year old golden retriever who enjoys daily runs to Cheesman Park.  I am a voracious reader, have few but very close friends, walk downtown to participate in the rich arts community that is in walking distance of my home.  I run the HOA where I live which is a small community of 14 units/owners in a most unique building.

name: Alex
about: I am a student living downtown! I love to exercise, read, write and play music. I moved here from the midwest, and love the variety of people I have met here.

name: Rachel
about:
I'm a dentist working in the metro Denver area. I moved to Colorado in 2013 and love all the state has to offer. I spend most of my weekends hiking, camping, backpacking, doing yoga, or downhill or cross country skiing.  When I'm not outside, I enjoy exploring my neighborhood with my dog, Lucca, checking out new restaurants, going to concerts, or reading a good book. 

I love to travel and am a very organized, clean person. I'm respectful of other tenants or guests that may be sharing walls, and I try to leave a place in as nice a condition as I found it in.

name: Matt
about: I caught you a delicious bass.

name: Susan
about: Writer, Journalist, gardener, dancer, harp player. Lover of Uptown Denver for 10 years. Interior Decorator and Owner of "Bye Bye Disarray" and "Staged to Sell."

name: Sarah And Lindsay
about: My name is Sarah and I manage Lindsay's apartment while she finishes a project overseas.  I love Denver and hosting travelers and guests.  Happy to provide recommendations on great places to eat and fun things to do!

name: Rachel
about: I have lived in Colorado going on 8 years and enjoyed every minute of it. So much so, that I recently bought a home in 2014 and would love to share it with you.

name: Una
about: Yoga teacher

name: Jen & Stephen
about: We are a fun young professional couple and boxer lab Tux.  We love all things Colorado and have both grown up in this great state.  We love hosting and sharing our favorite local spots.  We own our own businesses and work from our home - we love weekday skiing, beer & wine, hiking, camping and all things Colorado.

name: Allard
about: Just call me Aly!

name: Jaime
about:
Hi! I'm Jaime, a Colorado native originally from Salida (small mtn. town). I have a bachelor's degree in marketing and a master's in instructional design, both from CU. I love to ski, hike, camp, travel, compete in the occasional triathlon, and explore the wold around me. Home projects take up much of my time, and I may be a bit obsessed with all things photography. I spend much of my time in Kailua, Hawaii (work and play) and am thankful - even for the crazy schedule it creates. Surfing will get easier for me any day now, I'm sure.

Platt Park became my home summer of 2015, so I'm still settling in, and I absolutely love it! Local Favs: Sushi Den (dinner), Stellas (coffee), The Colorado Store (souvenirs), Kindness (yoga), Pajama Baking Co. (ice cream & baguettes), Platt Park Brewery (dog/kid friendly and sample flights are fun), and Kaos Pizza (pizza & happy hour).

When I'm not doing that...I enjoy curling up by the fire, blogging, relaxing with a swing project, watching the snow fall, sun rise, or spying the birds fluttering by. 

It's a good life.

“Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -Mark Twain

name: Janna
about: Our family loves to travel when we are not working as teachers. And we usually stay in a vacation home as well. I especially LOVE to host people in one of our properties. I truly enjoy accommodating guests, and making their stay very memorable. We also have fun staying in our homes and continuously making improvements to them. We keep busy with our toddler daughter, 2 dogs, 2 cats and 3 goldfish!

name: Maria
about: Architect. Married and mother of a baby girl. Lives in Dallas, TX. Has lived in Miami and Boulder, CO in the past. Athletic, art enthusiast, and loves to travel.

name: Brad And Jenny
about: Friendly and curious, we love to travel, read and get to know new people.  We share our house with an elderly poodle and a high school sophomore.  Both bikers and runners, we can't live without excellent coffee or good conversation.  Recovery and LGBTQ allies.  We love the Airbnb ethic of making the world more welcoming, and you will see that in the care and detail of our hosting style.

name: Austin
about:
Hi! I'm Austin, and I share hosting responsibilities with Maggie. We're a 20-something couple, living the life in Denver. With craft beer, great dining, the Rocky Mountains, and beautiful parks and trails for running, biking, and hiking all within minutes of the house, it's a wonder we can get any work done at all!

We're very laid back, and love meeting new people. We don't have to be best friends if that's what you want. But we could be! We're always bouncing around the city and our neighborhood, so we're happy to recommend things to do on a short stay, and would love to show you some of our favorite spots if you'd like a guide.

We look forward to meeting you and helping you enjoy your time in Denver! Please don't hesitate to let us know if you have any questions.

name: Aaron
about: I grew up in Denver and just returned home after living in Chicago for many years. I have a crazy (but sweet) dog, two young children, and a vintage camper that is in constant repair.   I enjoy travel, music, and spending time in the mountains.

name: Lauren
about:
I am a teacher in Denver. I recently bought my first condo, and I am looking to rent out the second bedroom to help out with my new mortgage :) I absolutely love my neighborhood and I am happy to provide advice and recommendations for your stay here in Denver. 

In my spare time I enjoy running, cooking, hiking, skiing, camping, Crossfit, reading, and sewing. I love all that Denver has to offer and I feel guilty if I spend a weekend doing nothing. 

As your host I want to ensure that you have the best stay possible. You are welcome to use all of the common areas of the condo as you please, but I ask that you are respectful of the HOA "quiet" hours (10PM-8AM). If I am headed out and about with friends you are welcome to join, and I am also happy to provide recommendations!

name: Ann
about:
My husband and I are educators, I am a retired teacher who also spent ten years working as a researcher/writer at both Penn State and The Colorado School of Mines Foundations. I am the published author of my award-winning memoir, Out Of Focus...Again, the story of my life with bipolar disorder. My husband and I speak to groups and at conferences about our journey together living and coping with mental illness.

Five things I can't do without? My husband/kids/grandchildren, coffee, our dog, good friends and a good laugh. 

Gary is a professor at the University of Colorado, Denver where he does research in the area of  business analytics, a mathematical approach to business problems. 

We are youthful, love to be with family and friends amid lots of laughter and love to travel. We have six grandchildren who live in our town so see them frequently.

name: Nicky
about: We have a beautiful, bright and clean home around 15-20 minutes from the airport, Cherry Creek and downtown. The new light rail is 2.5 miles away and connects right to downtown, as well as DIA. You will have the entire basement (3 story home) with a private bedroom and bath.  Entrance is on the main level.  We have a two year old and a sweet cat.  The basement has a huge TV with access to free Hulu (no cable), YouTube and Netflix (if you have your own account).  You will have access (and privacy) to the entire 1200 sq. ft basement.  There is a comfy couch, HUGE tv, toddler toys, comfortable private bedroom and bath, kitchen table that can be used as a desk etc.  We are within walking distance to 4-5 parks as well as a longer walk to a pool. We are a short drive to many museums etc. The basement is very private.  We are relatively quiet people but we do have a toddler :) Denver is an amazing city to explore! I wish you a comfortable and enjoyable stay!

name: Kendra
about: Active stay at home mom in Denver. We took the comforts in mind that we would appreciate when visiting somewhere else. We hope you'll enjoy our space!

name: James
about: I love travel, great food, adventures and meeting new people.

name: Caitlin
about:
when my passport application asked me to provide my occupation, I wrote "artist".
i am of the opinion (thanks in part to kevin mooney) that there is no such thing as a bad photo.
i am a traveler, an observer, (definitely) a talker, a lover of everything unique.
i am a firm believer that if you say yes to everything, it's hard to miss anything.
i squish as much as humanly possible into every single day.
i am a workaholic, both for myself and for others.

my parents are proud of me, my dog adores me, and i have the most loyal friends and partner that anyone could ever ask for. 
i've found that i really have got it all.

name: Sierra
about: I'm an ensign in the US Navy and a medical student at UC Denver School of Medicine. I love the outdoors, reading, skiing, and hanging out with my friends!

name: Brad
about: well-rounded, well-traveled, fun-loving guy.  always down to make new friends and share a laugh.  english and spanish speaking. love food and drink, the arts, sports and learning new things.  opposed to capitalization, evidently.

name: Alysen
about: I am a Denver native who loves to travel - especially with my husband, Tommy. I travel frequently for work, and airbnb is like supporting small businesses! I'm all about it!

name: Jessica
about: Denverite/dog lover/foodie/outdoorswoman

name: Darja
about:
I was born & raised in Ohio, and moved to Denver in 2011 to be surrounded by mountains and sunshine. I have two jobs (I'm a real estate agent and home care dietitian), and when I'm not working I can be found hiking, biking, running, skiing or rock climbing. 

I'm easy going and love meeting new people, so whether traveling or hosting, Airbnb feels like home to me. 

I've hosted for over 3 years, and it's been one of the best experiences of my life. I absolutely love meeting new people and helping my guests get the most out of their visit to this great city! I'm always happy to give you recommendations for cool places to eat, drink, hike, or visit. If you want I'll show you around, as long as I'm free!

name: Justin
about: 34, Beverage Industry Professional.  I travel frequently for business throughout the West and Central US.

name: Lynn
about: Lynn and my husband David are new to AirB&B hosting. We are both creative people with good sense of humor, we value honesty, and good conversation. We do not smoke or drink, but enjoy all the joys life brings.

name: Jorge
about: I'm a person who loves Colorado's mountains and all the things you can do.

name: Nick And Marisa
about: My Fiancé Marisa and I are avid mountain bikers, rock climbers, and hikers.  We are both research scientist at Anschutz Medical Campus.  We are very relaxed people, we crave adventure, love our pups, beer, coffee and smiling :)

name: Tina
about: i am a traveling artist, constantly on the move and making work wherever i go... which has been mostly brooklyn, nyc and austin tx lately ;)

name: Lee
about:
I am an architect by training and calling.  I have done a lot of development, mostly urban revitalization and historic rehab, which I truly love.  One thing I really like about AirBnB is seeing older homes.  You always find something new.  

These days, I am focused on advocating for renewable energy and helping others understand the challenges we face with climate change.  I promise not to bend your ear; but if you are interested I can tell you about my journey into advocacy. 

As a traveler I tend to book up my days pretty solid, so I may be a bit of a ghost; but catch me and I love to get know people.  I am a great listener, and not such a bad story teller.  Hey, I grew up in the American South: comes with the legacy.  I am really low maintenance, and really open to working with my AirBnB hosts and guests.  

Look forward to meeting everyone!  

Lee

name: Benny
about: I moved to Denver 8 years ago and don't plan on leaving anytime soon!!!  I know my way around the city and can tailor your visit to your interests...I live right across the hall from the listing, so feel free to use me as a resource.

name: Kyle
about:
I am a teacher who enjoys watching sports, playing sports, camping, hiking, snowboarding, my dog, 420, pizza, and beer.

I'm generous with what is mine as long as it is respected.

name: Carrie
about: I am active and love the beautiful state of Colorado!  I enjoy yoga, cooking gluten free, traveling, gardening, drinking wine, entertaining, and time with good people.  I work in the nonprofit industry, which I thoroughly enjoy.  I would love to have you as my guest in the amazing city of Denver!

name: Amy
about: I am an Illinois native and have lived in Denver since 2001. My husband, Eric, and I got married in 2005. I'm a business owner in tech consulting, and Eric is an artist and works in the beer industry. We like to travel when it is possible to do on a small budget, and love meeting people who enjoy being creative, the arts, craft beer, cocktails, old movies, and the outdoors. We also started hosting Airbnb guests in 2016, and it's been a great experience meeting everyone.

name: John
about: I am a registered nurse that travels quite a bit. Very clean and friendly. I have utilized airbnb many times and have loved it every time.

name: Jim
about:
A Colorado native of 38 years - 33 years in the Denver area and 5 fabulous years living in Chicago. I LOVE this city and this state - it has so much to offer visitors and residents. The culture, diversity, performing arts and culinary scene are just a few of the things that make me smile here every day. 
I am lucky to live in a building built in 1931 and have a genuine appreciation for the scope of architectural styles in my neighborhood and across the city. Downtown and the surrounding areas, Capitol Hill, City Park, Midtown, Uptown, RiNo, LoDo and LoHi all have surprises for you to discover on your visit. 
I truly enjoy helping people connect to the best of the best local gems, whether it's one of our hidden comedy venues to the newest and most innovative restaurants. Our food truck scene is out of this world, we have the most amazing bands locally and headliners that come from across the country and around the world to perform here. 
I am an expert who can give you private craft brewery tours, tailored to your specific tastes and wishlists. I know budtenders who can be booked for an informative, fun and unique dispensary tour, to discover the truth behind the cannabis lifestyle in Denver. My friend GG having lived in the Rocky Mountains for 12 years, would be happy to make recommendations for day trips or adjunct trips to the mountains for any seasons. 
With seven professional sports teams, Denver has a lot to offer. The Denver Center for the Performing Arts has incredibly well presented plays throughout the year, as well as hosting long runs of national productions, like Wicked and Book of Mormon, just to name a few. 
I'm blessed to enjoy a great rapport with my guests and respect their privacy. Please communicate any special needs or concerns about your trip. It's my pleasure to be of service. 
My friend GG is an occasional Lyft driver, and frequently arranges to pick up and drop off guests at the airport to make their stay a little easier and a seamless transition, when possible. Feel free to contact me for this added service. GG and I do personally check in each guest, no matter the time of day or night. 
Please check out my other listings if your dates don't coincide with what you see available on the calendar. And feel free to contact me if you don't find availability when you need it, I might be able to help you find another Airbnb listing that works for your needs.

name: Whitney
about:
I'm a young professional that likes to travel for play and often travels for work (international development). I've had some amazing experiences seeing the tucked away spots that only locals recommend and am excited that I can now return the hospitality by opening up my own space (since Nov 2015) in Denver.  

I've rented through Airbnb in Austin, Lisbon, Medellin, San Francisco, and DC and have had great experiences in each. I hope I have the chance to connect by either being a guest or hosting you!

name: Brad
about: Fitness studio owner and trainer, thrill and adventure seeker, world traveler and music lover.  Love to mountain bike, hike, snowboard, camp, explore and sweat!

name: Rachel And Greg
about: We love traveling, yoga, hiking, camping, and seeing movies.  We love Denver because it has lots of great restaurants, bars, theaters, and we are close to world-class outdoor adventures.  If you need any tips on hiking, biking, shopping, or eating, we are happy to share what we know.

name: Conner
about: Film student at the University of Denver.

name: Michelle
about: Hello! My name is Michelle, and I'm looking forward to getting to know all of the fun travelers Airbnb brings my way.  I enjoy traveling, as well, but it's great to come home to Denver.  While you're staying here in Cap Hill, you may see me out walking through the neighborhoods on my way to meet friends or play games in the parks.  Please let me know if there's anything I can do to make your stay even more comfortable.  Cheers!

name: Alice
about:
I'm a freelance journalist living in Denver who loves the outdoors. Moved here in Summer 2012 and am loving it. My partner and I bought a home that's about 15 minutes from downtown and have a basement unit that's ALMOST finished for rent (just missing little touches like trim, paint etc). It's not available all the time, so please message me and I'll let you know! I'm down-to-earth, friendly, love people from all walks of life, and enjoy food!

All I ask is that you be clean and respectful to my home. And courteous/quiet as we have a baby upstairs who may be napping at any given time. I only accept NON-SMOKING GUESTS. Can't stand the smell, nor how it clings onto things with which it comes in contact. Plus, it's a health issue.

Basic kitchen items (except a toaster, I'm searching for a toaster. See photos.)
Parking for one car on driveway, or on street (free).
If you have other questions, just ask :)

Thanks for reading, hope to meet you soon!

name: Cassie
about: I'm a big foodie and explorer. I love checking out all the local best food spots for artisan dishes and the most lively and unique bars, as well as exploring and see the sights. I recently moved to Colorado from Texas and bought this beautiful home. The bedroom I'm renting out is typically my bedroom so I can only rent it for short periods of time, and hope you can love and respect the other tenants including my babies (my animals) that live there. :) I like to live very relaxed and easy going, and hope I can share some insight on the beauty the city of Denver and Colorado has to offer!

name: Joelle
about: I am an easy going lady herbalist, I teach people how to use plants for food and medicine. I am also a yoga instructor and musician. I love all things occult, cooking, and being outside. I have traveled the world and have met so many incredibly hospitable people- I hope to share some of the same kindness to the guests in my home.

name: Kimmy
about: I'm a Colorado native who scrambles, hikes, rides, climbs, runs, backpacks and stays outside as much as possible. I love music and Denver has a very wide scene to concerts at Red Rocks, Filmore, Ogden Bluebird. I also love eating.

name: Linda
about: From Boulder, I'm very friendly, independent and considerate! I'm only in my place on weekends and I usually bring my two wonderful dogs, a Bernise Mountain Dog and an English Cocker.  Both are very loving and friendly, they love people!

name: Gretchen
about:
Hey all! My name is Gretchen. My husband, Michael, and I think Denver is the promised land!

We love backpacking, skiing, hiking, cycling, kayaking, and all things Colorado! We'll be sure to be courteous and respectful of guests.

name: Shawn
about: Laid-back individual living in beautiful Denver. I'm a great host and would love to have you stay at my condo while you're spending time here. It's fully furnished and in a great location. Go ahead and contact me so we can arrange for you to have a great place to crash at while you're in town.

name: Mark
about: Outgoing bicycle-riding urban dweller who's happy to share Denver with you, as long as you don't let the secret out.

name: Max
about: Hi! I am a 27-year-old female who likes fashion ,beer wine, and other stuff!

name: Matt
about:
Hi All-
I'm a 28 year old native to Colorado. I completed my undergrad degree at the University of Colorado and am pursuing an MBA at the University of Denver in the evenings. I work full time at the investment firm Merrill Lynch and try to spend as much time in the mountains as possible. I ski and fly fish every chance I get. I have lived in Buenos Aires, Argentina and on a small sailboat from southern Georgia to Key West.
My travel style is one of respect. Being a host, I understand how it feels to have someone in your home. 
My hosting style is generous and accommodates the guest. I can be hands-off or actively engaged, but either way the welcome will be warm.

name: Evan
about: I am happily married and have four small children.  I have spent the last fifteen years running my own business.  I love Denver and all the wonderful things it has to offer.

name: Jennifer
about: Hello! I'm Jennifer, & I'm also an AirBnB host! I work in the IT field in healthcare, & my travel buddy is my boyfriend Henry. We love to meet new people & explore new places (including our own backyard of Colorado).

name: Thaddeus
about: I'm a filmmaker in Denver. Traveling, great food, sports, outdoors, good conversation, and people who are easy to get along with are a few of my favorite things. I've been all around the world and love experiencing how other people live. I love the idea behind AirBnB and how it connects people.

name: Sean
about:
Sean and Sarah Caffrey
