Heath Care Administrators
Denver, CO

name: Todd
about: I'm a civil engineer working in the construction industry, married with two kids.  We moved to Denver from Hoboken, NJ in 2010 after the birth of our son.  We love to ski, bike and hike and really enjoy living in Denver.

name: Ruth & Erv
about:
Retired educator, interested in sports, food,cultures, books, jazz, & travel.  Always plan own travels doing  research.  Life has many unexpected turns...always ready to try new ideas. (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
(EMAIL HIDDEN)

name: Kate
about:
I am an opera singer, voice pathologist and professional adventurer who has a passion for music, food, cooking, health/fitness, travel and sailing.  My husband and I are sailing our boat Pangaea around the world one wave at a time.  

I love reading the classics but am enjoying just having the time to read.  

Because I travel all the time, I am very laid-back and easy going and also very organized and tidy.

Carpe diem!

name: Alyssa
about:
I love meeting new people and am really looking forward to connecting with people through AirBnb. I love Denver and our neighborhood, and am excited to help our guests get the most out of their stay at our home.

I enjoy trying new places in Denver, and have many recommendations! We have so many great bars, restaurants, breweries and events, in a wide array of neighborhoods. I love exploring Denver on my bike in one of the most bike-friendly places in the country, and have some bikes guests can borrow upon request. I enjoy live music at any of Denver's venues, and I also love to cook.

If exploring outside the city is your goal, I am an avid hiker, biker, climber and snowboarder, and have many great recommendations for escaping to the mountains. Our home is conveniently located west of the city, close to the highway that takes you to some of the most acclaimed national and state parks in the country.

I also love to travel, both in the US and abroad, and am always looking for recommendations for my next adventure as well!

name: Diana
about: I am a young professional living in Denver, CO. I love the outdoors and adventure. Discovering new places and experiences excites me!

name: Joey
about:
Hi, I'm Joey.

I spent years in the hospitality industry primarily running the food and beverage operations.  After about a decade I moved on to entrepreneurial work.

I'm a native to Colorado and my hobbies reflect that.  I love to ski, snowboard, hike, camp, go out dancing, play volleyball, and I'm down for pretty much anything because fun can be had anywhere.

I love to travel and have been to Central America, South America, a number of Caribbean locations, Africa, Europe, Australia, and New Zealand.

If I'm ever staying at your place you can count on me to be chill and easy going.  I love adventure so if you have ideas of places for me to check out, or events for me to participate in my ears are wide open.  I dig five star resorts and crowded hostels alike.  But what's most important to me is to be with locals and learn what they do, what they like, and how they live.

If you're ever staying at my place you can generally just shoot me a text and I'm never too far away to answer questions.  Also, if you're looking for any fun in the area just let me know and I'm happy to recommend cool places to check out, great restaurants and bars, and various seasonal events going on. 

Being in the hospitality industry for so long makes me kind of obsessed with service and ensuring you have what you need.  I'm happy to provide arrival amenities for you as well - in case it's a special occasion such as a birthday or anniversary - just let me know and we can chat about what you're looking for and if there is an additional price for it.

name: Lisa
about:
30 something 
Denver CO Native 
Operations/Events Manager
❤️er of traveling, mtns volleyball, & #myaussieniece

name: Tyler
about: My wife and I live in Denver (she was born here, I am a midwest transplant).  We are foodies, love the outdoors, enjoy people, and always look forward to exploring new cities.

name: LizBeth
about: I am an explorer of my inner and outer worlds.  I love to travel to far away places and meet others who share the desire for new horizons and new experiences.   I love to explore my inner worlds through mediation and other practices which bring me deeper into the human experience.  I am an Outlaw Yoga instructor and Higher Brain Living Facilitator.

name: Laura
about: I refuse to grow up and am on a mission to make the most of life!  I'm physically active and intellectually curious and love to meet new people, see new places, have new experiences, and laugh as much as possible.  I appreciate the simple, real things in life and people who are humble and sincere.  I love my life part time in Denver and part time in the beautiful Rocky Mountains; hiking, skiing, playing and watching soccer, cooking, dining out, movies, museums, history, hanging out with my awesome dog.

name: Jessie
about: I am a Campaign Organizer for a non-profit which takes up a majority of my time. I'm working on getting big money out of politics and overturning Citizens United, so as you can imagine, I care a lot about social justice issues and politics. However, I also love to hike in the mountains, find sweet swimming holes, and read epic fantasy novels. Denver also has a great nightlife and I love to go dancing, concerts, and play arcade games at the 1up.

name: Kate & Joel
about:
Kate's a Denver Realtor and Fitness & Wellness Coach, she has a weakness for all things wine & cheese and is OCD - Organized & Clean, Duh!

Joel's a mad scientist and adventure nerd, he craves new experiences and chocolate on top of chocolate, topped with more chocolate.

name: Helene
about: I am a originally from NYC and have lived in several places before finding my home in Denver about 1.5 years ago.   I love Colorado and don't intend to live anywhere else. Denver is great and Cap Hill is my favorite hood. My dog and I enjoy all the parks and breweries around town. I love the Denver live music scene and am known to dance many a night away.  I've been dancing since I was two and greatly enjoy Blues, Salsa, Ballet, ... every style I have ever tried. My apartment is all hardwood floors so I can spin across the floors.  I moved to Denver for a fantastic teaching job.  I  enjoy teaching biology, and I also enjoy the long weekends and many breaks that the teacher life style offers.  I am a world traveler and long to see more wondrous places.  If you are going to be staying in my apartment, odds are I am off traveling somewhere so we probably won't physically cross paths.  I greatly enjoy the mentality of me exploring somewhere while you explore here. You will have my entire apartment to yourself and be right in the center of Cap Hill.

name: Katherine
about: I am one of the last original hippies. I still go to live rock'n'roll regularly and my home is my hangout. I live alone, not by choice, with a large male cat that I am waiting to turn into Prince Charming. I'm the heart of my neighborhood, sing in a choral group, workout every morning, and love to have company. I work part time and am based at home. I've enjoyed 95% of my guests and managed to survive the others! I'm happy to help you find good food, entertainment, etc in the community that I live in and love.

name: Daniel
about: Hi there.  I am a medical student, living a starving college students life in downtown Denver.  Well...not starving, pardon the phrase.  I am looking to make a few extra bucks for rent, while provide an awesome location for people that are visiting DT Denver to stay in.  Denver has everything I love, the city/urban life is phenomenal and the wilderness is you playground when it is 10 miles away.

name: Christopher
about: A chef from Denver trying to grow my own food. I like to eat my way around this Country.

name: Mic
about: Graduates of nearby Regis University, we have lived in the Highlands since the late 90's. We currently live in Berkeley close by, own two businesses in the Highlands and love absolutely everything about our neighborhood and state. We love trying all the new restaurants in the hood and are more than happy to provide recommendations for our favorite spots.

name: Jaime And Ryan
about: Hi - we are a family with a young child that enjoys hiking, mountain biking, skiing, gardening, fishing...basically all Colorado has to offer!

name: Mark
about: I am an avid reader with a thirst for physical activity.  I like to go for runs and explore the world as I meander around Capitol Hill neighborhood frequently.  Really inviting gentleman that is excited to meet more people through this awesome forum.

name: Scott & Sarah
about: Scott and I live in Denver, CO. I'm from London and Scott is a Colorado (Boulder) native.  We've lived in Denver for 5 years so we know the city well.  We are both in our 30's, we have jobs that keep us very busy so we don't currently have any kids. Scott works on environmental policy for state legislatures in the U.S and I run a nonprofit. We love everything Colorado has to offer, particularly all the outdoor activities (snowboarding, camping, running, cycling).  We love Denver because of the great restaurants and fun things to do. We also love cooking, hanging out with friends and regular trips back to England.  We keep our home neat, clean and tidy and have created a relaxing, comfortable and cozy home (we think!). Cheers,  Scott and Sarah

name: Jason
about: Super laid back younger professional. I enjoy everything Colorado has to offer. I bike and play on a men's league soccer team to stay active. I've been hosting on Airbnb for almost a year now and hope to accommodate anyone and everyone.  Very open minded and down to earth. Come visit Denver!

name: Colleen
about: We moved back to Denver after a decade living in London - the UK was great - but Denver feels like home!  I am the co-founder of a non-profit working in developing communities.  My husband Paul is a quantified-self enthusiast who consults during the day to pay for all of his hobbies!  We both love to run in the local parks, take long walks along the creek and ski whenever we can!  The head of our household is actually our new pup - Beanz!

name: Mayli
about:
Currently a manufacturing/export business manager, investor, yoga instructor, dancer, and soul searcher.   

Mid-2014, I retired from the fast-paced, results-driven Third Place known as Starbucks, where I managed a million dollar business with a team of talented and diverse people moonlighting as baristas.   After 10 years, I decided it was time hang up the green apron, dust off my cowboy boots and try something new.

My home is intentionally neat and simple.  After the spilled milk and coffee grounds from the corporate "grind", my space is easy to keep clean, beautiful, and organized.  It is my haven for studying, rehearsing Samba and Bollywood, practicing yoga, meditating, reading, cooking and relaxing.  You don't have to triple step to enjoy the hardwood floors and vintage flair just as much as I do. 

Denver has been my home as long as Starbucks was.  Before both, I lived and traveled extensively on the West and East coasts, and overseas in Bolivia, Mexico, Puerto Rico, Cuba, the Dominican Republic, and West Africa.  My heart goes out to other travelers, and that is what has drawn me to Airbnb.

name: Colleen
about: Cosmic social worker, seeker of fun. Learning to embrace and express my best self is my calling. I'm a bit of a gypsy, with a bit of hobbit on my mothers side.

name: Morgane
about: I'm 24, love to travel, go to concerts and eat all different sorts of food - my favorite being Vietnamese. I currently do freelance film and photography.

name: Greg
about: Good coffee, great beer, and a good Tom Robbins book, rounded out by a fondness for finding the next great travel destination with my family.

name: Patrick
about:
I am attending the University of Colorado - Boulder MBA Program

I enjoy traveling, skiing and climbing.

name: Matt & Vicki
about:
As an active couple from different parts of the country (Alaska and Illinois), we each enjoy what Colorado has to offer regarding an engaging outdoor lifestyle in the vicinity of a vital metro hub like Denver.  Whether you're interested in hiking, cycling, kayaking, climbing, snow sports, local sporting events, or theater downtown we may have experience with or insight into an activity.

As professionals we are each involved with community resources for proactive health, enjoying positions in separate but complementary organizations while encouraging a nonprofit community outreach program that we have founded together.

name: Matthew
about: I'm a young professional the moved to Denver for the amazing lifestyle and to start my a coworking company. I love the Uptown and City Park West neighborhoods with coffee shops, neighborhood pubs, and a B-cycle station nearby. On the weekends I often do the normal Denver things and head out to the mountains for a quick camping trip or play kickball with friends on Sunday afternoon.

name: Cash
about: Cash and Annie have lived in this home since the summer of 2013. They love the neighborhood and they love living in Denver.

name: Mark
about: very active and like to get out of town.. you come and stay at my place and I travel. that simple!

name: Sarah
about: Born and raised in Michigan, I moved to Denver about two years ago. I currently am a server at a downtown restaurant. For fun, I love doing anything outdoors, and attending music events in town. I love the local music, art, and beer scene, as Denver has everything to offer!

name: Devin
about: I am a traveling salesman with a very  flexible schedule.  I look forward to sharing my place with other like minded travelers!

name: Kari
about: I am a Midwestern girl enjoying the exciting and adventurous life in Colorado!  I love to travel and am looking forward to using this site both to rent out our spare room in Denver and also to find great places elsewhere :)

name: Sally
about: I am British, but moved to the US 12 years ago. I moved to Denver 6 years ago and love all that it has to offer!  Biking and hiking in the summer, skiing and snowshoeing in the winter.

name: Pamela
about:
Brad and I love Colorado, and have lived here for years!  Brad is a sommelier, and has seriously ruined my ability to drink boxed wine. He specializes in Italian, so Italy and California are places we've visited often.  He also loves to ski and golf and can tell you where to do that.  I love my bike, gardening, and good food.  We both are foodies.  And in general, if we can be outside in the midst of any place that's green and lovely - with special points if there are small, wild creatures about - we are happiest.  

We are sociable types, love to have friends over, and guests tell us they love the house and outdoor space. But we also will give you privacy and space.   Our personal style is relaxed and flexible.  We like to laugh.

name: Ann
about: My husband and I are from Michigan but have been living in Colorado for 13 years. We enjoy the city life of Denver as well as camping and hiking with our kids.

name: Steven
about: I am a 31 year old professional who loves to travel. Always looking to connect with interesting people be it when I travel for work or fun. I have had a few positive experiences using Airbnb and look forward to many more!

name: Holly
about: I have lived in the Denver Metro area for 19 years and in CO for 31 years.  I can share some local hotspots and restaurants.  I enjoy spending time with my two small dogs.  Colorado has a lot of local micro breweries to try out and I am always looking for a new one to try.  I enjoy traveling and seeing different places and cultures around the world.  My bucket list continues to grow!  I hope you love your visit to CO as much as I love living here.

name: Carey
about: I love the great outdoors so living in Colorado makes it easy to participate in outdoor activities - biking, hiking, and enjoying the great scenery Colorado has to offer.  Thanks to owning a Kindle I read several books each week.  I like to knit and enjoy food at the great restaruants around Denver especially when dinning with friends.

name: Lindsey
about: I'm a super fun, athletic outdoorsy Denverite that loves meeting new people and getting my dance on.  I love sharing how amazing Colorado is after I moved here 4 years ago.  I spend my time out running or biking around town, grilling on my patio or on a house project.

name: Erica & Brianna
about:
Erica is an Outdoor Education Teacher here in Denver. I love being outside, skiing, hiking, canoeing, gardening, laughing, and eating. Occasionally I binge on Netflix. Often I brew beer, and go visit places where beer is brewed. I love thrift stores. 

Brianna came to Colorado by way of Austin TX. I am a musician and am in a few bands here in town: Tomahawk Fox and Bison Bone. I love checking out all the amazing things this state has to offer. If you are looking to hear some great local music hit me up and I will point you in the right direction any day of the week. 

We love hosting folks on Airbnb because we love Denver, Colorado, and the Southwest and this is a great opportunity to share the things we love about this place with others.

name: Jillian
about: A few words that would describe me is loyal, honest, fun, and friendly.  I enjoy being around others but also enjoy my alone time.  I am in the real estate and financial industry so when I travel, I just want to let go a little bit and enjoy the city!  In my free time, I like to travel, hike, and take my dogs to the river.  I am thankful for this site and the help it brings!

name: Reza
about: I'm 44 and drive for uber!!!

name: Megan
about: While from Buffalo originally, I now call Denver home!  I love to travel, eat and spend time outside. I look forward to seeing new places and trying new things through Airbnb.

name: Jeremiah
about:
Hello! My name is Jeremiah and I'm a recent native who just returned to Colorado! I can say that I've traveled all around the country but am really happy to call Denver home again. 

As an Airbnb host, I'm here if you need me, invisible if you don't. I love sharing recommendations for restaurants or help with anything you might need; I'm an expert on what to do/ where to go. If you prefer privacy, I'll make sure you feel like you're in your home-away-from-home, free of intrusion. I take my Airbnb hosting responsibilities seriously, and aim to make your visit as lovely, comfortable, and memorable as possible! I adore my city, and I look forward to sharing it with you!

name: Funk
about: Positive open mind. . .fun is good : ]

name: Shawna
about: I am 27 years old and work with my father and sister in a family business in cycling apparel. We have locations in Denver, Seoul, London and China so we travel quite a bit. My dad lives half time in Brooklyn and half time in Denver so we spend a lot of time in NYC as well. Most travel we do is with the family whether it is business or fun. We are very active and love to experience new places and create new memories. We prefer to stay different places in the same city to get a feel for different neighborhoods. We love renting from owners because it gives us much more of a local feel when travelling. We love to have fun and meet new people everywhere we go :)

name: Adam
about: I live and work in Denver, Co. I moved to Denver about 3 years ago and have owned my place for about a year. I like to stay active and enjoy everything Colorado offers.  I am slowly remodeling my house and rebuilding an old Toyota LandCruiser so I have a habit of collecting tools in and filling my garage with them.

name: Daniel
about:
Denver native that loves to show off his home town and all of Colorado.  Im a hip urban dweller that knows what there is to do in Denver and where to find the scene that you are looking for.  I am happy to recommend any of the many things there are to do in Denver that appeal to your interests or to suggest something completely new to you.   I am a resident expert in the neighborhood and can be your guild as you discover Denver.

I love to explore the many restaurants in the area that range from dive bar to high end budget buster.  For gay travelers, I can let you know where to find your crowd on any particular night of the week.  If  you like museums as much as I do, we have many within walking distance of the studio flat.

I have traveled a good chunk of the world myself and hosted travelers in my home for up to 6 months at one time.  I truly enjoy meeting new people from all parts of the world.  I was an exchange student abroad for  another 6 months and have utilizes Airbnb and Hostels, so I know what travelers seek while they are away from home.

name: Juliet
about: originally from Jamestown, NY; yoga instructor, ESL adjunct professor (reading, writing, conversation for advanced foreign students), play the cello, mother of four fabulous human beings, grandmother of six glorious granddaughters. I live in Denver, Colorado close to the cultural center; I've lived in Berlin, Germany; Kathmandu, Nepal; Marseille, France; Los Angeles, CA; Driggs, Idaho; Boulder, CO. I have a BA in French from the University of North Carolina in Chapel Hill, and a master's degree in journalism from the University of Colorado at Bouler. I love meeting new people of all ages.

name: Jessi
about: I grew up in Denver and love the outdoors.  I am gone a lot for work etc... and would love to have you make my home your home away from home.

name: Laura
about:
I've been living in CO for- wow- 8 years now and I absolutely love my city. Summertime is actually my favorite season here. With endless music and festivals and art and culture, there is something beautiful happening always- and if not, just look at our skies. 
I'm a local actor/director (mostly theatre) so I know the art scene thoroughly. This also means I frequently have rehearsal in the evenings and do not work traditional hours.
I have roots in Houston, TX and Washington, DC, and I went to school at the College of Charleston. So if you're familiar with any of these- feel free to chat me up.

name: Julie
about: I am an associate professor in the creative writing program at the University of Colorado. I'm a poet with six books of poetry and one critical study published. I have three kids, 16, 12, and 6. The oldest, Ben, is a cellist. The middle one, Alice, loves to sing, and the  little one, Lucy, is little! My husband, Tim, is also a poet and runs a small press called Counterpath: c(URL HIDDEN) Counterpath is also an independent gallery/performance space/bookstore in Denver. We have various kinds of arts events there all year around. I travel mostly to give readings, usually by myself. I'm from Cambridge Mass and have lived a lot of years in NYC and in Oakland.

name: Darren
about: I am chemist and work in renewable energy.  I am a runner and love sports.  Pretty much, I am just super laid back and like meeting new people.

name: Ali
about: I live in Colorado for all of the outdoor activities and laid back lifestyle it provides.  If I am not relaxing in my adorable carriage house, I am out skiing, hiking, biking or traveling to Airbnb's in other cities and countries.

name: Will
about: Colorado Native. Love the tranquility of outdoors and the energy of the city.

name: Royel
about: I am an engineer working for a Cable company. I love hiking (like anyone in Colorado), dancing, working out etc. I am trying to learn how to play drums. I am an avid Salsa/Swing dancer.

name: Lyndsay
about: I am a mother of three young wonderful kids, married, and live in Denver. Our family has lots of fun and we are looking to start traveling with the kids! As a Canadian, I speak both French and English.

name: Milena
about: Hello! Brazilian girl living in the US who likes to meet new people around the world. :) I've traveled and hosted before. Quiet, clean, non-smoker. This site has been great!

name: John
about: I love Denver but travel a ton, so having others use my house while I'm away made sense to me.  I love music (piano and a couple guitars always around the house)... sport (water and snow skiing, basketball, biking, hiking & climbing)... books, movies and good conversation.  I travel most for work but enjoy exploring Asia, Europe, S America etc.  Italy is a must if you have not been.

name: Andrea
about: I am a photographer, writer, performer, and producer. I love to travel, and the more remote the location the better. I am passionate about working within marginalized communities and populations. In particular, I love working with the special needs community, teaching under-resourced teens and youth, and volunteering for Uganda Project -- an organization that serves a group of students living in Uganda who have been orphaned by the AIDS epidemic. I use my art to help build understanding and trust across cultural and social lines. I appreciate good company, good food, and good laughs!

name: Karen
about: Chris and I have been Colorado residents for years.  This area is perfect for Rockies, Broncos, Avalanche or Nuggets Games.  $8-10 Uber ride to city.  Super active in these parts with Denver's largest lake 2 blocks from our home where we run, bike, long-board, and paddle board.  We have 1 wonderful old dog and love to cook out on the rooftop.  We'd love to give you recommendations for the whole city!

name: Andrea
about: Hello!   My name is Andrea and my family and I love Denver. We love to ski, hike, and bike. We feel really fortunate to be able to work and play in Denver and we hope you will enjoy staying at our little piece of downtown!!

name: Terra
about: I absolutely love living in Denver and I love my neighborhood! I am relatively new to airbnb, and I am looking forward to having you as my guest in my newly remodeled apartment! Whenever the weather is nice, you'll see me walking around the neighborhood with my pooches enjoying all Denver has to offer. I enjoy the outdoors and I love to garden. I love being surrounded by some of the biggest and best parks in Denver. I also enjoy trying many of the craft breweries that are popping up all over Denver.

name: Billy
about: Father of two. Originally from Iowa, lived in NYC for 16 years, now in Denver.

name: Jon
about: Hello I'm Jon!

name: Kenneth
about:
We are an active, fun-loving, 30-something couple with a dog. We love to host people and we value our hospitality dearly. We embrace the Colorado life-style by staying active. Rock climbing, snowboarding, biking, running, hiking, camping, we enjoy doing it all in this incredible state we live in.

We love our dog, and so will you. She has a great yard to play in here at the house, but we try to take her to the dog parks a few times a week. She is friendly and always likes to meet new people and flaunt her eyes to get them to pet her.

We are happy to share our home with you and maybe make a friend in the process.

name: Adam & Dasha
about: My wife and I love exploring new cities and hosting international travelers. We recently moved to a new location in Denver and are excited to offer up our extra space to guests.

name: Ashlee
about: From Denver, Colorado

name: Robert
about:
My wife, Dana and I live in Park Hill which is a historic neighborhood in Denver and love it. We enjoy so many aspects about Denver-- from restaurants, breweries, or golf courses, we are always out and about. 

We love hosting and have been lucky enough to host for the past several years.

We also travel every chance we get - from weekend getaways to longer vacations, we'll take it!

name: Ginger
about:
"Be yourself. Everybody else is taken." I moved to Denver 11 years ago from the Chicago area. I like to play in the mountains year 'round, frequent the art galleries in the city, see lots of foreign/indie films, surf the net in a cozy coffee shop, peruse the countless local artisan's markets, indulge my dog in long walks in our beautiful city parks, and try every new restaurant I can get to! (There are so many!)
Popcorn and chocolate cake are my favorite foods. What I love most about meeting new people is how wonderful and weird and diverse we all are!

name: Ashley
about:
Hello!

My name is Ashley and I grew up and went to college in Missouri. I've lived in Denver for about a year now working as a nurse's aide and am currently applying to medical school. 

I love all things nature and travel. I studied abroad in England and went on a Euro trip last summer. My favorite destination had to be Greece, especially the greek islands. My next future destination is Pairs with my boyfriend in a year or two from now.

Living in Colorado, I've been able to explore camping in the mountains, to concerts at red rocks. Denver really is the perfect place to explore the city and see nature!

name: Tony
about: I'm from denver, where I work in nonprofit media and technology. In my personal time, I make music and movies.

name: Doug
about:
I'm a young professional living in downtown Denver.

I love the active lifestyle and the endless things to do that Denver has to offer.

I have used AirBnB a few times myself and am excited to share our place and amazing city with guests

name: Anastasia
about:
I am from St. Louis and very proud to represent my hometown in Denver, but I love to travel and love to explore new places. I can't go a day without my dog, music, humor, exercise, and conversation. 

As an Airbnb host, I strive to provide a comfortable experience for my guests while incorporating a homey touch. I have used Airbnb before and enjoy the differences between the accommodations offered through this service and hotels.

name: Roger
about: I am a quiet, laid back guy who loves living in Denver.  Hope you enjoy your stay!

name: Lyric
about: Living in a historic neighborhood (Highlands) in Denver, CO with my husband and 3 crazy kiddos, I enjoy all that Colorado and Denver have to offer but love checking out new places and am a frequent traveler to DC as I have three businesses there that keep me on my toes.  I love meeting new people but also don't mind time to myself --people usually consider me to be pretty laid-back, easy-going and easy to talk to. Outside of my work life as a business owner (which I love), I also love to read, cook, tool around on bikes with my family, try out new restaurants, play cards with my kids among lots of other things.  I am a bit of a foodie and a  health-nut but am somewhat lazy when it comes to exercise despite living in an exercise-obsessed city. I love my job and what I do and derive a lot of pleasure from the many hats I wear in life-- wife, mother, business-owner, traveler, friend.

name: Dave
about: I am a 34 yr old male from Denver Colorado USA. I love traveling and seeing new places. Being from Colorado I love doing outdoor activities. When visiting other places I spend majority of my time out seeing what the cities have to offer. I also love getting out and trying great restaurants. Music is my life so I find myself traveling a lot to see acts that I love. I'm a really clean person so I never leave a mess when I stay somewhere.

name: Tom & Vivian
about: I am a professional portrait and landscape painter and Vivian is a Brazilian- born actress and Portuguese medical interpreter. For many years I was a guide in the desert Southwest, Rockies, Swiss alps and the Pamir mountains of Tajikistan. Vivian has lived and traveled extensively throughout North and South America and Europe and is fluent in Portuguese, Spanish and English. We both enjoy playing the guitar, x-c skiing, canoeing, photography, reading books and adventures.  Vivian grew up in Sao Paulo, Brazil and is a vivacious yet easy-going, endlessly curious person -- and a joy to live and travel with.

name: Angela
about:
Hello!  I'm Angela, and my fiancé, Tom, and I live in downtown Denver, CO and love to explore and meet new people. We have an awesome house located North of Capitol Hill in the Uptown Neighborhood.  I work as Environmental Graphic Designer in Boulder and Tom is a Landscape Architect and Planner in Denver. There are many good places to eat, drink, and enjoy right next to us and even more within walking distance.  So bring your appetite.  We are more than happy to recommend places to go and explore.

One of the reasons we decided to do Airbnb is to save up money to go see more parts of the world.

name: Drew & Noelle
about:
We have both lived abroad & traveled to over 50 countries collectively and believe the most valuable part of traveling are the people who you meet along the way.  We have a passion for Colorado and for sharing it with visitors.  Five things that we can't live without would be our ski equipment, bikes, paddle boards/kayaks, Netflix and our house.  We are usually on the go between work, family, sports and friends but when we are home we enjoy a quiet night in the home we love.  The house is pretty well set up for guests that want to be social or not.  There is a community living room on the main floor and we have our own downstairs.  In fact when you stay here, it usually feels like you have the entire floor at night.  Our guests have really liked the fact that we are very laid back and have felt right at home.  We look forward to your visit! 

We are both professionals (engineering & speech therapy), and spend our free time hiking, biking, kayaking, paddle boarding, and enjoying Denver.  Noelle is originally from New York City & Drew is from Nebraska.

name: Rick
about:
UK born Designer, Design educator, parent. Business owner and commissioner of public art and culture in the City and County of Denver.

Nice guy, dislikes hotels and has two kids.

name: Brian
about: Living in Denver for the mountains, the culture, and the skiing!

name: Julia
about: Hello! I am so happy to finally own a home and be a airbnb host! I have travelled extensively using airbnb, so I've been awaiting this moment :) After living in tiny expensive apartments in NYC for 16 years, I have returned to my hometown of Denver and am loving the great outdoors, my new career as a co-founder of a Fashion School for kids and spending time with my family. Denver has changed a lot since I've been gone, it's a truly fun and beautiful city and I am loving getting re-acquainted. Our house if fully equipped for your stay, we want you to have a blast! We will include a list of all our favorite local businesses.

name: Matt
about: Matt Peres holds a Bachelors Degree from the University of Richmond Robins School of Business. In 2003, he participated in a semester course with the National Outdoor Leadership School learning professional skills in communication, leadership, group dynamics, and a passion for the outdoors. Inspired by the energy found in helping youth find confidence and passion in their interests, Matt decided to dedicate the next 3 years of his life to guiding teenagers in a similar fashion. As a certified Emergency Medical Technician, climbing guide, and teacher he worked for numerous Outdoor Experiential Education companies across the Western US. Then, interested in the Technology Sector and eager to use his skills in business, Matt joined the Cisco Systems' Sales Associate Program in 2008. From 2009 to 2013 Matt managed a $6-8M annual business for the Cisco Public Sector Organization, working closely with school administrators to define the next generation's learning environment, and government officials to create new services for their constituents. Having developed a passion for the growing Cloud Computing Industry, Matt decided to leave Cisco and join VMware, where he now manages a $15M business for their Mid-Market Sales Organization.

name: Diana Khoi
about: Poet, artist, human.

name: Susy
about: Brian is from New York, Susy is from California, and we met and got married in Europe. We lived in Europe for 20 years before moving to Denver 10 years ago.

name: Kristofer
about:
I'm a young professional that's passionate about life and love meeting new people.  As a travel enthusiast myself, I understand the sense of adventure that comes with exploring new places. For me, one of the best parts of traveling is getting to meet the locals and getting recommendations from people who know the area. I'd love to return the favor and show travelers all that Denver has to offer!

Besides traveling, I live a very active and "sports-minded" lifestyle. I enjoy concerts, festivals, snowboarding, hiking and everything else in between. I am a Colorado native so I am more than capable of helping you navigate your way through Denver and make suggestions for things to do, places to see and great restaurants. 

Fun Facts:

I'm in the process of learning Spanish (very novice) and would love to practice with Spanish speakers. I enjoy hearing the stories of people I meet and hope to host international travelers to learn about their culture. I accept people who want to experience 4/20 but not looking for people that just want to party. I'm very much looking forward to meeting you!

name: Alan
about: I am an avid traveler and enjoy the outdoors. I always try to makes things right and believe in integrity. I can be involved in your stay and can suggest local sights and restaurants/bars, or can be in the background if you have plans or just need a place for the night.

name: Thomasa
about: Originally from the "Mighty Midwest" (Cleveland, OH) I moved to the beautiful mountains of Colorado over 13 years ago and haven't looked back.  Had a 3.5 year stint in gorgeous Ketchum, Idaho then moved to happening Denver, Colorado with my husband.  We love it and would love to share it with you!

name: Sandy
about:
Easy going, friendly, tech entrepreneur.

I travel to San Francisco a lot. I LOVE DENVER. I also love music, Netflix, dj dance nights and karaoke. I know all the best karaoke bars, BTW. I love meeting people from different walks of life. Especially learning about places I haven't been to.

As a host, I can engage with you as much as you'd like. I am happy to share points of interest or leave you be :) In general I am on the go, so you likely won't see me too much.

name: Chris
about: Hi! I love being an Airbnb host and guest. I am the father of two sons, 22 and 20, now in college. I split time between Denver and Vienna where my fiancee lives with her son daughter and son who are 17 and 14. I lead a learning company based in Denver (and soon Vienna) that teaches coding to elementary schoolers. Our students learn to code by creating their own video games and animations. I love cooking, writing, yoga, and biking.

name: Jennifer
about: My petite, welcoming and fun home describes me as well!

name: Jordan
about: I have lived in Denver for 10 years now and am in the music and art business. I manage a company called Forest Room 5.

name: Nate
about: Active 25 year old male working in a research laboratory

name: Gary
about: I am a sociable middle-aged professional who loves the outdoors and loves Denver. I am originally from Texas (Dallas and Austin), and have lived near San Francisco and in the Washington DC area, in Vancouver Canada, and I spent 2 years teaching English in China. I have biked across Tibet, camped and backpacked throughout the Rockies, and skied at many of Colorado's resorts. Articulate and well read, I enjoy stimulating discussions, especially over a bottle of wine, and I love all kinds of cuisine, especially Thai, Asian fusion, Mexican, and am trying to learn to cook more. I enjoy most kinds of music, especially when live -- but can't sing worth a lick or play an instrument. I have the best dog on the planet, Buster, an Aussie Shepherd mix I got from a rescue group. He loves to great people, finagle belly rubs, chew on bones, chase rabbits, and sleep.

name: Josh
about:
Hi, my name is Josh.  I'm a Denver native, and I love this city!!

I am a working professional and have a Master's Degree from the University of Colorado.  I enjoy meeting people, exploring new places, and being outdoors, as well as hiking the beautiful Rocky Mountains, riding my motorcycle and observing the arts and different cultures. 

My favorite travel destinations in the U.S. are Chicago, Washington DC, New York City, Boston and San Francisco.

My favorite travel destinations overseas are Rome, Florence, London and Berlin.

Between 2010 and 2012, I got the chance to visit some of the greatest cities in the U.S., including New York City, Washington D.C., San Francisco and Boston.

During Summer 2013, I had the amazing opportunity to be able to take a 2 month trip to Europe, where I visited 13 countries and traveled over 3,000 miles by train.

During the Summer of 2014 I had a chance to visit Chicago for the first time, and it quickly became one of my favorite cities in the U.S, right up there with the other big cities already mentioned above!

In July 2015 I got married to my sweet wife Anna in beautiful Vail, Colorado, and in January 2016 we got to visit sunny Florida, including Naples, Orlando, Cocoa Beach, Miami and Fort Myers.

name: Reese
about:
Our household consists of two work-from-home adults, one college kid, and two rescue cats. By day, we drink coffee and work as hard as folks can behind a desk. By night, you can find us swing dancing, at a trivia night, checking out a new brewery or restaurant, or something else innately Denver. On weekends, we spend as much time outdoors as the weather will allow.

As hosts, we make ourselves very scarce, but are as available as you want us to be. If we are going out to something social, we'll welcome you along, and not be offended if you have plans. We know how much awesome there is to explore in Colorado. We will pop into the kitchen for some coffee and do the dishes, but really want you to feel comfortable using the main floor as your own private suite. You will probably see more of our cats than us.

name: Tarah
about: Chill,young Denver native couple with 2 babies, a dog named Johnny Cash, and a cat named Dodge Plymouth :-)

name: Adam
about: Originally from Michigan I moved to Colorado to work with outdoor brand Topo Designs. I've recently spun off to do my own photography and want to open up my home while I'm on the road. Hope you like it!

name: Aaron
about:
Hello! I'm a Denver-based technology entrepreneur. I sold my last company in 2014 and now I'm working on building a new company.

Since I can work from anywhere that has wifi, I rent my own house out to offset the cost of travels. If you want to stay in Denver, I'll use that as an excuse to go see a friend in another city! I have a property manager and house keeper who takes care of the house and my guests while I'm out of town.

I love tea, good design, my dog Jasper, movies and exploring Denver.

name: Jc
about:
I am pretty laid back, love to hike with my pup, mountain bike, paddleboard, and really just be outdoors enjoying everything Colorado has to offer!  I have a passion in life to make this world a better place.  I have a very "pay it forward" mentality and love just trying to make a positive impact on someone's life.  

I volunteer and run a non-profit that rescues shelter animals and trains them for Veterans suffering from PTSD, TBI'S, Anxiety, Depression, and more.  So this, on top of working full time, as well as enjoying the great outdoors, and my love of traveling keeps me pretty busy!

name: Luke
about: Living in my hometown of Denver, CO!

name: Margie
about: I am very outdoorsy! I love skiiing,hiking,and mountain climbing. I come to Denver to work and to frequent the excellent eateries!

name: Adrienna & Ryan & Corey
about:
Adrienna: Working for a non-profit wellness organization I travel frequently for both business and pleasure.  

Ryan: Professional Landscape Architect, designs parks, trails and urban spaces. 

Corey: Full time student that enjoys meeting new people.

name: Sonja
about: Five things I can't happily live without: music, water, solitude, friends/family, and traveling!

name: Mourad
about: Live and Work in Colorado

name: Alex
about:
My name is Alex and I work a 8-5er at a tech company near Boulder. I am often at a show or happy hour in the evenings and in the mountains or riding my snowboard/bike on the weekends.
With that in mind, I get home pretty late and leave early so I may or may not see you.
Either way, there is a coded lock box and I encourage folks to make themselves at home!

name: Greg
about: Transplant from Louisiana and am loving life in Denver. Big into the outdoors, the near-constant sunny weather, and of course, cooking.

name: Nikki & James
about: Hi I'm Nikki, I am an Artist and Professor in the arts. I am active, frequently out of town, and always working away on an exhibition, project, or event. I am deeply interested in community, the nature of humanity, and how we relate to each other. I create sculptures and social art works that you are more than welcome to see and make inquiry should I be in the studio during your visit! I love people and believe strongly in finding ways to strengthen our community - for example investing in airbnb hosts and not major corporate hotels! James is my partner and he works downtown as a Geologist. After hours he plays in a rock band and distills whiskey with his pals. We have a pooch, Ozone. AND! We just welcomed into the world our first child July 12th.  Samantha is our newest member to the family and you will surely meet her as you come through!

name: Aj
about: I'm a professional who loves traveling, meeting people and making an adventure out of life. I am split between two awesome cities: Toronto and Denver and love going back and forth between them. I take pride in creating a great atmosphere for people to land in when traveling. I've lived in 12 cities across 8 countries, so I understand the value of a great furnished place!!

name: Ryan
about: My wife, Maggie, and I are enjoying everything CO has to offer -- hiking, snowboarding, climbing, backpacking, and of course beer.  We'd love to have you as a guest in our recently renovated carriage house.

name: Megan
about: I enjoy taking full advantage of Washinton Park, play tennis, ride horses, and head up to the mountains with my dog. I am a Denver realtor so it's likely that I'll be able to answer many of your questions and I am always exploring the city and happy to share my recommendations.

name: Brooke
about: I am a teacher in a public school here in Denver. I have lived all over the world and love to travel and explore.

name: Matt
about: Fun, happy, long haired hippy type.

name: Portia
about:
We love living in Denver, especially in our neighborhood. 
We have an Aussie Shepherd mix who will greet you at the door, but won't be in your space.

name: Peter
about:
Jazz Pianist and Educator
(URL HIDDEN)

name: Jeremy
about:
Hi! My name is Jeremy.  I enjoy meeting new people from all around the world. I have been successfully renting out my home and have met some wonderful people from Europe, Africa, the Middle East and all over the United States.

I love to travel and enjoy experiencing both the places I visit and the city I live in.  The love for my home city has allowed me to develop a list of suggestions and recommendations for places to eat, shop, visit and relax in Denver and surrounding area.

While I do enjoy being involved with my guests it is only much as they would like me to be.  You will find that I am quite respectful of my guests privacy and desire to enjoy their stay without the intrusion of hosts.  At the same time, if schedules allow and there is the inclination, I do like to accommodate guests who would like to mutually get to know each other better.  

I look forward to opening my home to you and know that whatever your trip needs or desires, trust that you will enjoy your stay.

name: Bill
about: I'm a Denver native and I LOVE LIFE!!  I'm appreciate for each day I get to enjoy it!  I have a passion for travel, fitness and family.  And I love the opportunity to have new experiences and meet different people.  Everyone has something positive to offer!  I will do my best to make your experience in my home town as fantastic as possible.  Cheers!

name: Lee
about: Hi, I'm Lee. I am a cutie patootie in Cap Hill in Denver. You gotta stay in my hood cause it da best. I can assure you if you hang with me you will never be bored. I love to have fun like dance the jiggy in the moonshine, sing kareoke to tunes like It's the End of the World and you know it, steal piglets from the tree farm and shoot off brat rockets in my backyard. If all this sounds good, come stay here!

name: Kaiser
about: Happy and content in life. My passions are my work, food, travel, learn from and meet people from all around the world. I am gay, athletic, curious about life and its fruits, especially the foods and travels. I love to cook and have no boundaries in experimenting. I keep my place clean and tidy with a modern rustic style, love sports cars, swimming, hikes, bicycling, white water rafting, wine making and home-brews. I wish to volunteer more time in healthcare be able to trade knowledge and skills. I do not follow any religion but that of love, kindness, peace and respect.

name: Mckinley
about: I've always used air bnb to stay whenever i travel, & I'm excited to host a well now! I travel a lot & love movies & going out w friends!

name: Jim
about: Lived in Denver for a dozen years.  Local small business owner who loves soccer, travel, and local craft beer.

name: Kc
about:
I grew up in Indiana, USA, went to Purdue University for undergrad, then moved to Denver, Colorado, then moved to Chicago, IL, for law school at DePaul, moved to Madrid to study a Master in Law, and now live in Denver, Colorado, United States as a practicing litigation attorney. 

I love skiing, surfing, hiking, soccer, reading, music, and I play the drums.

name: Rob
about:
I'm a self-employed, work-at-home Colorado native that loves to travel locally, domestically, and abroad.  I'm a great host, with a gorgeous home in a fun and lively neighborhood.  I'll take pride in making your stay as comfortable and memorable as possible.  I've spent most of my life in Colorado, so I'm a great resource for trip planning, directions, and recommendations on everything from restaurants to cultural attractions to bar-hopping to music venues to camping to skiing/snowboarding.

When traveling to your neck of the woods, I'm a great guest as well!  I even have all of my shots!  : - )  When traveling, I love to eat, drink, and explore.  Actually, those are my favorite activities at home too.

My style of traveling is off-the-beaten-track and leave-no-trace.  When staying in cities, I insist on staying as centrally as possible, usually in historic centers.  I'm proud to offer the same for my guests.

I host friends, family, business associates, and people I meet traveling on a regular basis and all agree that my home is comfortable, inviting, and beautiful.  If you pay me a visit, you'll enjoy all of the nick-knacks that I've collected in my travels and from my generous gift-giving friends.

I also love languages and speak Spanish fairly well.  I understand quite a bit of spoken French and Italian, and able to read those languages as well as Portuguese a bit.  But feel free to practice your English when contacting me too (even if you're British) : - )

name: Kristi
about:
I've been living in Denver for almost 20 years. I love the active lifestyle here...great for biking, hiking, volleyball and picnics in the park, snowshoeing, and the list goes on.  I enjoying reading, taking my greyhound for walks, great microbrews and trying new local restaurants.  

Fave travel spots have been Paris, Thailand and Ethiopia.  I love to meet locals and get to know the out of the way mom and pop places that make a city or village or area unique.

name: Chris
about: I'm a lawyer for the Federal Judiciary. My wife is a Physician Assistant who works in internal medicine. We have a three-year-old daughter and five-year-old daughter. In 2014, we sold our home in Oakland, and moved to Denver to be closer to family, friends, the mountains...and to lower our cost of living and simplify the logistics of daily life. We also own a home in New Mexico, which we rent to tenants; we know how it is to be a landlord and we will treat your place like it is our own.

name: Tom
about: Hello! I'm an easy going professional with a real passion for life! Originally from Minnesota, I love to share my home with travelers and guests.  While I have lost my upper midwest accent I always welcome guests with warm and genuine hospitality.  In the summer months, I stay active by running, biking, camping and hiking.  In the winter, I'm active with down hill skiing, snowshoeing and ice skating.  I keep life simple yet meaningful by making a difference every day in my work and in the lives of others.  I really enjoy big, bold red wines, strong coffee, grilled foods and ice cream!   My style of hosting guests is personable, casual, respectful, informative and fun.  I'm from a family of 11, yes I have 10 siblings - 6 brothers and 4 sisters.  Some of my favorite travel destinations are the Pacific Northwest, Northern California, Australia, and the Upper Midwest.  I tread lightly on the environment and surroundings, mindful of my carbon footprint(URL HIDDEN)

name: Ai-Lien
about: Hi! I'm an architect and city planner currently residing in Denver, Colorado, USA. I absolutely love to travel, study the design of cities, understand different cultures, try unusual foods and drinks (craft beers are my heart), embark on spontaneous adventures, and meeting new people from around the globe. I love museums, food markets, gritty urban centers, libraries, galleries, public plazas, old theaters, and historic buildings. I am incredibly laid back, friendly, considerate, neat, outgoing, and above all, genuine.

name: Josh
about: I'm a freelance writer, so I write a lot about freedom. And lances.

name: Alice
about: Knowledgeable about Colorado tourist information.

name: Leanne
about: I live here in Denver with my husband Dave.  We moved to Denver in 2008 and love it!  The kids are gone and we have too much room.  We love to travel as well

name: Kellen
about: Im 30 years old and work in real estate investment in Colorado in the United States. Colorado offers lots of outdoor activities so I love to get out as much as possible to ski, golf, play volleyball and hike. Ive lived in multiple cities in the US and traveled to some incredible cities internationally. I love meeting new people, trying new restaurants and food and going out for a night on the town. Looking forward to meeting you and Ill do everything I can do be a great guest! Thanks, Kellen

name: Jon
about:
Ended up in Denver after coming here on vacation and never leaving. Video producer during the week, outdoor nut on the weekends. Rock climber, Skier, Hiker... 
Originally from upstate NY, lived in SoCal before making my way to Denver.

name: MahtingErika
about: We are a young professional couple. Erika is originally from Connecticut while Mahting is from Michigan. We really enjoy the lifestyle Colorado offers. We ski all winter and run the rest of the year. You can usually find us with our dog on the trails. We travel a lot and generally stick to Air B&B. We like to do one or two big trips a year to far off places and will travel to races in the USA.

name: Angela
about: This was our family home for five years before we outgrew it. The house is very close to our heart, and therefore we take tremendous pride in keeping it beautiful. The city has literally grown up right around the house, so from the front steps you can grab coffee, any variety of workout, walk to sporting events, walk to hundreds of restaurants and shops, and get to the trail system/parks. The house will exceed your expectations and hopefully so will I.

name: Nina
about:
I currently reside in Denver Colorado and take every opportunity to explore the world and enjoy the outdoors. I can never get enough Asian food of any kind. I live for music and the arts. 

I have traveled frequently my entire life and am without a doubt an exceptional guest.

name: Bud
about:
Hey there, I'm Sarah! I work for the Bud and Breakfast in beautiful Colorado. We were the first marijuana-friendly lodging company in the state, and in our opinion, and in the opinion of our guests, we are the finest! Though we model ourselves after traditional Bed and Breakfasts, we have expanded our hospitality to embrace our passion for cannabis.

I know the city well, and I'm happy to answer any questions you have, as well as make recommendations on where to go/what to do.

name: Dan And Meg
about:
We love to travel, cook, drink wine, listen to good music, go camping, hiking, rock climbing and dabble in photography!  We are passionate about being happy and working for ourselves to create the perfect balance between work and play. 

We welcome you to stay in our quaint apartment and will do what we can to ensure you are comfortable during your stay. We appreciate positive feedback and constructive suggestions and of course thank you for taking the time to leave a review! 

If you are relocating to Denver and would like to work with an native Coloradan and licensed Realtor, contact Meg via email or phone. 

We look forward to meeting you,

Dan and Meg

"There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living"
-Nelson Mandela

name: David
about: I (David) am a gardener, bee-keeper, cat-guardian and I thoroughly enjoy cooking. Erin, my loving wife, might challenge you to a pull-up competition if you aren't careful.

name: Bryan
about: I am a Denver local who lives, works and plays in this exciting and growing city.

name: Abbra
about: I am a wedding photographer based out of Denver CO. I love good food and impromptu adventures.

name: Lynne
about: I was born and raised in Colorado.  I have 2 dogs, a girl corgi, and a boy maltese.  I try to be a conscientious person, and hope for the same in others.  I love experiencing new things and meeting new people, but am also very private.

name: Wendy
about:
After many years working for the airlines, schools, and architecture firms I am happy to enjoy my hobbies.  You will see several of my painting/collage pieces in our home.  Photography, interior design and gardening keep me happy, plus continuing to travel whenever possible.  We recently moved back to Denver after 20 years and are enjoying feeling like tourists again – my, how this city has grown, with so much more to do and see!
Having traveled the world, we enjoy meeting new people.   Life is grand, Carpe Diem!!

name: Gabor
about: I'm from Denver Colorado and I like to spend time with my wife and three year old.

name: Nick
about: History of working in Film and Music Production for a number of years.  Tend to spend most of my time trading the Forex markets these days.  I love traveling outside the country and have lived in Prague, Budapest, Rome, Barcelona, and Granada.

name: Elizabeth
about: I love to explore and travel. When I'm not doing that, I like to play soccer. When I'm not playing soccer, I like to watch soccer. If I'm not watching soccer, I'm most likely drinking beer and thinking about soccer. Writing, photography, design and art are super important to me. Friends and family are even more important.

name: Sara
about: Hi! My name is Sara, I'm a Denver native but just moved back from Austin, TX. I have a master's degree in social work and am currently working in a high school. I am an active foodie, wino, runner, yogi, and hiker and can point you in the right direction!  I love to travel and am excited to join the Airbnb community. Thanks for visiting!

name: Andrew
about: 48yr old Professional Engineer - respectful, business traveler, quiet, limited time at home - at work, at gym, at dinner and only home to sleep.  Will respond quickly with any questions or concerns you may have before and during your stay...

name: Jason
about: I live in Denver and travel frequently for work and for play. I love spending time outside and always welcome an opportunity to explore new places and meet fun people.

name: Thomas & Ashlae
about: Thom loves talking about the fall of the Soviet Union and putting together 1,000+ piece puzzles; Ashlae makes a mean boozy chocolate cake and usually wakes up at 5AM to go running. They got married in Ireland this summer and, together, they plan on traveling the world.

name: Lia
about: Hello!  We are Lia and Tillmann--a fun couple who love exploring, traveling, and hosting guests.  We've had several experiences as guests in AirBnB properties throughout the world, and now that we've settled down together in Denver, we thought it would be fun to host travelers!  We continue to travel both in and out of the country, and really enjoy exploring.  We love having visitors to show off this great state and have been known to plan some great adventures!  We love Colorado for mountains, the weather, and the people.  I love experiencing new things in my city, and also redoing the favorites.  Between Rockies games, biking tours, hiking, snowshoeing, snowboarding, brewery tours--there is so much fun to have in Denver!  We look forward to having you!

name: Joe
about: Coffee slinger, beer snob, tinkerer.

name: Eric
about:
I've been called a lot of things:
1) Jersey Boy
2) New Englander
3) Sydneysider
4) Seafarer (Pacific Ocean)
5) Brooklynite
6) Desert Denizen (Tempe, AZ)
7) Coloradan
8) and now... husband and father

Throughout my travels I've learned a great deal about people and places. When done right, hospitality, I do believe, has the ability to make anyplace a home.

My wife, daughter, and I are good people, live in a beautiful city, and are happy to share our home.

Come play!

name: Christopher
about: Non smoker. Enjoy hiking, camping, most sports. Most my travel will involve work trips. US/Canada sales manager for Traeger Wood Fired Grills.

name: Julia
about: I grew up in the foothills of Colorado. After living in other places for many years I decided to come back and make Denver my home.

name: Annie
about: I am a puppeteer owning and operating the Denver Puppet Theater, performing marionette shows year round.

name: Cody
about: Laid back attorney who loves living in Denver. Excited to welcome you to our Cap Hill home!

name: Kevin
about:
My Interests: traveling (if you haven't already, you should go to Croatia asap); sports (big baseball, football, and college basketball fan); skiing (doesn't get much better than Colorado); hiking (try one of Colorado's majestic 14ers); current events.

As a host, I want my guests to have a relaxing, comfortable, and stress-free stay. The house is wonderful, and nice accommodations go a long way in making a trip great, but what really makes a trip special is the experience beyond the accommodations. The house is located near lots of fun activities, and I am happy to discuss restaurants, bars, breweries, and any number of activities and places in and around Denver that will make your experience in the Mile High City special. Bottom line, I want your experience in Denver to be great.

name: Cecilia
about: I am a Jewelry Designer born and raised in Colorado. Love to travel every chance I get, but there is nothing like coming back to my home state.

name: Erika
about:
Airbnb has been one of the best adventures ever.
I love my Denver bungalow in the middle of the city.  You can easily walk to so many great places from here and quickly bike to even more. I'm happy to tell you the best places to go in the neighborhood (and there are a lot of great places to go in this area!). I'd love to have a cup of tea or glass of wine with you (time and schedules permitting). 

I'm a writer and artist, as well as a sustainable interior designer.
People are awesome, so are cities, animals, hot springs and nature. Can't live without great stories. I love NYC (lived there for a decade), Kathmandu, Seagrove Beach, Bangkok, and even LA --actually Santa Monica-- where I lived for a while as a kid. I've lived all over US and a few places in Europe and the East incl. Nepal for a semester where I studied religion.

Favorite books? Pride and Prejudice, Manchurian Candidate, almost anything by Carl Hiaasen (my most favorite character ever is Skink), Harry Potter and various juvie books. I usually only read authors with a great sense of humor anymore (this includes the ones above).

I haven't traveled out of country lately: trips to Southern California and to local hot springs this summer saved my soul.

I love all sorts of movies, incl. juvie movies. I make wine, drink a couple times a week, sometimes eat gluten free, sugar free and so on, but love food and sometimes eat anything. I'm an omnivore for now at least.
I enjoy a respectful, relaxed, friendly home situation.

Please note the following:
Although my preference and pleasure is to check you in myself and give you the grand tour, there are naturally times when I'm not not able to be here. If I cannot be here, I will make other arrangements for your check in. Please be sure to provide me with your ETA as soon as you book so that I can arrange my schedule ahead of time and be here for you when you arrive if at all possible.

name: Eirin, Lucas, And Tyler
about: We love to travel and we want to share the experience with others!

name: Ryan
about:
I enjoy watching all types of sports, hanging out with friends, beer tasting, and snowboarding.

Always looking to have a good time!:)

name: Sarah Mae
about:
Hello!

My name is Sarah and I am a Texas native but, love living in these Colorado vibes! I love to travel and meet new people, see new places! It makes me feel alive! I first traveled abroad in college to Central America and the bug has been biting ever since!! 


Thank you for allowing me to share my home with you.

Cheers!!

name: Serena
about: I am a very mellow, good spirited individual. I love laughing, good food and good company. I also love to travel.

name: Helen
about: Hi my name is Helen and I am listing a lovely room located in the United Kingdom.

name: Stephen
about: My name is Stephen and I live in Denver with my girlfriend, Laura, and our dog, Cody. I am a cycling instructor and Laura is a microbiologist and technical writer.  Cody, a Chesapeake Bay Retriever, is a professional snuggler once he gets to know you, and professional protector before he gets to know you... ;) I would consider both Laura and I to be laid back and friendly people. We enjoy the outdoors as much as we can, usually on our bikes but we also like to hike and camp. We both spend quite a bit of time at the gym too. Cooking, and watching cooking shows for that matter, is one of our favorite pastimes. If you come stay with us, we'd be glad to offer advice on things to do and how to get around, or can just stay out of your hair if that's what you'd like. Laura drives part-time for Uber and Lyft so is a pretty good resource for these matters.  We can make your stay in Denver comfortable, fun, and relaxing!

name: Chelsea
about: I am a Denver local and real estate agent, artist and server at a Cuban restaurant her in town.  I love traveling and love hosting people while they visit a city that I love!

name: Brittany
about: My husband and I enjoy sightseeing and going on adventures. We love to travel and can't wait to meet amazing people, learn about their culture and way of life! :)

name: Sarah
about: Iowa girl at heart.  This is my home in Denver, where I work as a Clinical Neuropsychologist.  I enjoy traveling, camping, skiing, backpacking, good food, traveling (more), and great conversation.

name: Terry
about: I'm run long distances, mostly on trails; I love the outdoors, I love books. I don't drink or use any drugs; so I guess I'm pretty boring ;-) I've been a remodeling contractor for 15+ yrs.

name: Michael
about: My wife and I have lived in Denver for 8 years and have three children. We are often found in the mountains when we are away from home.

name: Jason
about:
I love to travel, just like you! Whether I am traveling for fun or work, I enjoy meeting locals. My favorite places to visit are New Orleans, San Francisco and anyplace in New Mexico. When I travel I look for local music, neighborhood bars, community events and of course, where the locals like to eat. 

I have lived in Denver off an on for 16 years. I am familiar with most things Colorado-music, trends, statewide issues, etc. I would be more than happy to share state history and up-to-date local news with you. 

When I travel, I love to be off the beaten path, so I thought renting my home to travelers would be a way to give back to the unique people I've met along my journeys. 

I hope you enjoy my home and the wonderful City of Denver!

name: Jeremy
about: I live by the mountains, so naturally all I dream about is the ocean. I travel for work a good bit, my company is based in Atlanta. I have a small dog that I love too much probably, and we trail run all the time. I'm a baseball fanatic, love good IPAs, and finding my self in a small venue seeing a band I've only heard of.

name: Keegan
about: I'm Keegan, an adventure loving entrepreneur living in Denver, CO. I love to meet new people and have new experiences which is why Airbnb is such a perfect fit. In addition to running my Airbnb, I also am working to launch an aviation focused software company. Outside of business I love to ski, fly, and of course travel. My favorite destination is hard to determine however my top two are Costa Rica and Puerto Rico. I guess there's just something about the tropics.

name: Aaron
about:
Hello, my name is Aaron Johnson. I am an extravagantly extroverted, positive, cheerful, well-mannered, and supportive person by nature. Being so social, I am also well-connected to Denver's arts and music communities. I enjoy introducing people. I am in my mid-thirties, single, and straight. However, my home and my community are safe spaces for members of the GLBTQ community. I am a feminist, a progressive, and a social justice activist.

I work as an on-air DJ in public radio, playing local, independent, and underground music. Prior to that, I taught 7th grade language arts and drama. I have also worked as an entertainer, using the name Ukulele Loki. I emceed professionally for a circus sideshow, and fronted my own band which combined elements of cirque, burlesque, and vaudeville. 

My favorite things are food, people, and life. 

When you stay in my home, I will respect your privacy and give you your space. But I am not opposed to sharing stories, or giving information about fun things to do in Denver. My home is filled with books which you are welcome to peruse. My library is filled with poetry, drama, philosophy, as well as books on art and music. 

I do not subscribe to cable, nor do I watch TV in the main rooms of the house. But your room comes with a large, flat screen TV and a WiFi DVD player, to let you connect to Netflix.

My favorite movies are: Babe (yes, the talking pig); Hedwig and the Angry Inch; Harold and Maude; Amelie; and all old musicals.

name: Rick & Deana
about:
We are in our mid 50's and very active.  We spend much of our time in the mountains either staying at our condo in Silverthorne (ask us) or camping in our small RV.  Traveling the world is a passion and goal though we both still work.  Telemark skiing is how we spend our winters especially since Rick serves on the ski patrol at Arapahoe Basin.  While hiking and biking is where you will find us in the summer... though Rick can also be found rock climbing the many local crags.  

Having traveled many places in the world we truly enjoy meeting other travelers and showing off our city and state.  We are truly blessed to be living on one of the best blocks in one of the most popular neighborhoods in one of the great cities and states in the world.  Come visit us and let us show you how to really enjoy Denver, Colorado.

We have been fortunate enough to have lived in Colorado our entire lives with Deana a rare fifth generation Coloradan.  Two of our kids live close by while one of our daughters has recently move to NYC.  We both have big extended families almost all of which live in the state.

Having raised three children in our home and having more than a year of being empty nesters we have discovered that we are comfortable with and even enjoy having "activity" in our home.

name: Katie Lynn
about: I'm an adventurous and fun-loving girl from Colorado Springs. I love vegetarian food, culture, and stories. I am a dancer, natural healing practitioner and Airbnb host!

name: Travis
about:
Originally from Massachusetts, I moved to Colorado to work as a paramedic/firefighter (Still on the job!).  That was 17 years ago,  and I definitely consider Colorado my home. 

I enjoy the diverse music scene here in Denver, and the natural beauty of Red Rocks never ceases to amaze me.   I also have a love for the beautiful outdoors and the outrageous skiing that is nestled up in the mountains outside of Denver.

Burning man is an important part of my life (15 years out to the desert!) and members of my family here and world wide are Burners, contributing a wonderfully eclectic vibe to my world.

In fact, I met my flatmate, Katie, there in 2006.  We live on the second and third floor.  We LOVE our neighborhood and are excited to host you for your stay here in lovely Denver.

Welcome home!

name: James
about: I am a 46 year old pilot from Colorado.  Love working out (crossfit) and a good glass of wine.  Please enjoy my very modern home complete with elevator!

name: Mary
about:
Hi there!
I feel fortunate to have lived in the mile high city since 2000.  I love Denver!  The city is full of active fun loving people.  I am a working professional and enjoy playing tennis, walking, practcing yoga and most of all entertaining and visiting with friends.

name: Krystal
about: Hi! I'm so glad your checking out our beautiful home.  I love Airbnb, because it completely speaks to my belief that it shouldn't cost a lot of money to travel and experience amazing spaces.  I hope that you will book with us and enjoy our amazing space soon.  Take care!

name: Linda
about:
the 5 things I CAN'T live without are 1. coffee, 2. humor, 3. great design, 4. travel, 5. good weather, fresh air & sunshine. ok, I cheated a little with that last one. :) 

I'm a Creative Director, vegetarian and occasional runner. I love dogs, the mountains and good food. I'm an explorer—I'm always looking for the secret little spots only the local folks know about. I've traveled around the country and around the world, and never get tired of seeing new people and places.

name: Greg
about:
Hi there,
I am Greg your host and I am here to help you enjoy your stay. I choose to always "live deliberately"  My motto is to enjoy every moment, experience and cherish all of the people I meet everyday.  The sun shines over 300 days a year here in Colorado which coming from Boston is a very welcomed change.  Soak up the atmosphere and see this town from a local perspective.   I have been living in Denver for over 20 years and know the area very well. Let me be your guide if you desire or venture out on your own to enjoy all this city has to offer.  The mountains are a short distance away or catch a concert at Red Rocks.  The great part about Denver there is a lot to do.  There always seems to be an event,concert, or sports game to attend every weekend. It is a very easy town to navigate and you can bike almost anywhere.   I also enjoy dining out so let me help you find great new restaurant or whatever advice you may need.  There is always a lot going on so have a great time and enjoy your stay.  I live only 10 Min from the property if you need any help.  
Have a great time and I hope to see you soon,

name: Alex
about: I was born in England, but grew up in the mountains of Colorado in the USA. I love to ski, travel and watch soccer games.

name: MartaClaire
about: I am a curious person who loves traveling and values connecting with people. I enjoy art, yoga, hiking and animals. I am always looking toward my next travel experience. I invite you to stay in my home and look forward to showing you all the amazing aspects of Denver.

name: Shannon
about: Jeremy and I run an international cancer foundation and travel globally for most of the year. We have an awesome Great Dane/Lab name Brutus the Beefcake who will be living next door during our absence. We adore our bungalow in Park Hill and rarely leave our street when we are home. We walk to the corner pubs for dinner, then to Nuggs for ice cream and the gourmet market Marzyck's for burgers for the grill and great wine! We are new to Airbnb as we head to Tanzania for work for a few months. We have friends who have raved about it and look forward to sharing our little corner of the world with you!

name: Jennifer
about: Denver

name: Kelly
about:
Hello,

I am a mother of 2 children, 23 year old girl and 18 year old boy. I have been married for 24 years. I went to school in Europe where home sharing is very common. It is such a pleasure to meet different people from around the world and welcome them into our home!
I love to cook, garden, and I ballroom and latin dance regularly. I also have been practicing yoga for 21 years!!! 
Life in the Rocky Mountains is superb. The gorgeous mountains and spectacular weather make living outdoors easy.  We bike ride and hike a lot. Hope you enjoy your stay in Denver and I Look forward to meeting you!

name: Cynthia
about: I'm a outgoing person who loves to swim, travel, be outdoors enjoying nature, loves kids, animals, and music.  I enjoy an occasional cold cider beer with good friends, good food, and good conversation.  I like to read and my favorite travel destinations are Costa Rica and anywhere in Europe.

name: Dianne
about: I was born in Milwaukee, moved to southern California when I was 20, then to upstate NY, and came to Denver in 1972.  I love it here!  I have a wonderful daughter, a great son-in-law, and 2 beautiful granddaughters who live in Seattle.  I wished they lived closer, but they enjoy the young, family-oriented lifestyle there and have great careers in Seattle's tech industry.  During my 25 year career in healthcare, I was a patient advocate in hospitals, and spent the last 10 of those years as a program rep and volunteer coordinator for hospices.  It was very rewarding work and have recently retired.  For the past 20 years, I have also hosted more than 200 international executives from throughout the world who have lived with me in my home while they attended English classes in Denver.  I helped them with their English during our fun evening dinners, and took them on tours around the city and state.  Due to economic problems around the world now, the executive program at the school has been canceled, so friends have suggested offering my basement rooms as a B&B on Airbnb.  I certainly have loads of experience with travelers' needs, and I'd love to share my beautiful home with YOU!

name: Milena
about: I've been soaking up the Colorado sunshine for 11 years! I moved here for the weather and stayed for the people.

name: Danielle Nicole
about:
I'm a HS Spanish teacher who loves the outdoors.  I am very busy as a teacher, always grading and preparing lessons.  

I am respectful of your space but I don't mind chatting if you would like to.
