I am very active, however I do enjoy my downtime at home just to relax.

name: Tippy & Chris
about: We both are super outgoing and love meeting new people! We recently moved out of the downtown Denver area and just live on the other side of town. We can't wait to share our home with you guys! We hope you love it.

name: Jenelle
about: I'm a working professional living in downtown Denver.  I love spending time with my great dane, Roscoe, going to new restaurants, working out and spending time with my friends.  I can't live without coffee, my dog, a good book, Game of Thrones, and my friends.  I enjoy traveling to San Diego, which is where I grew up and where my family still lives.  I miss the beach living here in Denver, but you just can't beat this city!  I love living here!

name: Brian
about: An entrepreneur who should play less golf and read more. I've lived in Denver for over eleven years and love the people, the town and maybe above all, the weather.

name: Winton
about: Southerner relocated to the Rocky Mountains 7 years ago.  Moved out for the great outdoors, wonderful sunshine, and deep powdery snow in the winter.  Denver is a wonderful collection of great neighborhoods, breweries, and people from all over.  Welcome to Colorado!

name: Sam
about:
Nice to meet you!     

Being a few blocks from some of the City's best sites, there's not much reason to leave the neighborhood.  It's a bad habit, but we and our friends tend to eat out a lot.  There are so many options it's like a mission to explore them all.  In the time since we've lived here we've familiarized ourselves with some of the best of the best, and of course we're open to sharing our secrets!  The bars are also tough to stay away from, they show the local sports and generally offer good happy hour.  All in all, East Village keeps you close.  New York has treated us well and we look forward to paying forward the experience to others.

name: Jenny
about: I teach Early Childhood for Denver Public Schools. I love the opportunities it provides me to learn, play and travel!

name: Carl
about: Hi, my name is Carl and I live in Denver with my girlfriend, Katie. I'm a transplant from New England and love snowboarding and hiking.

name: Heather
about: My family consists of me, my husband, and our three amazing girls! Our family loves to ski, yoga, hike, camp, and enjoy the outdoors! We spend half of our time in Vail, CO and the other half in Denver, CO.  We love to walk or bike wherever we are going! Dinner dates are spent hopping from one place to the next so we can get as much variety into our evening as possible. My daily mantra is to be present! Enjoy the moment!

name: Maggie
about: Mike and Maggie in Denver, Colorado. I bartend at a local music venue and make custom silver jewelry. We have a home in Denver (with cats Yoda and Dummy) and a huge vinyl record collection. We love to travel the world and look forward to reciprocating the generosity we have previously received from others on Air B & B!

name: John
about:
I work in radio and also travel a lot as a touring deejay. My job is great, and I am able to work with people from all over the world, and fortunate enough to play music for a living. When I am not working in music and radio I like to be outside. I moved to Colorado in 2003 to take advantage of the mountains, and skiing, backpacking and hiking are my main outdoor interests. Colorado is a wonderful state to visit if you enjoy the outdoors, and is part of the reason I have lived here over the last decade. 

Denver is a great city, and really starting to come into it's own. When I first moved to the city, I felt it had pretty weak restaurants and food in general, but that has changed dramatically in the last few years. There are now a plethora of restaurants and little food shops, and while the craft breweries have always been in Denver, there are now over 100 in the Denver metro area. I've always been kind of a beer nerd, and that is a nice plus to living here. The governor, in fact, is a former brewery owner. 

As a host, I try to make my condo feel like a place in which I would want to stay. It will always be nice and clean with plenty of space. You should feel more than comfortable when staying in my home. 

As a guest, I like to travel, so when I am on the road, it is mostly to be out and about. I like to experience life outside, not inside an apartment or house.

name: Zorab
about: I'm a videographer I travel allot and always looking for a unique place to stay and new people to meet!

name: Carl
about: I was born in San Antonio, Texas. I came to Denver from Corpus Christi, Texas, gulf coast area, where I graduated from Corpus Christi State University with a degree in Business. I owned and operated a resort and had a successful tax and accounting practice in Corpus Christi and Port Aransas, Texas. On December 4, 2001, I purchased the Capitol Hill Mansion Bed and Breakfast Inn. I felt that Denver area offered me an exciting opportunity to provide superior guest service in a unique and special historical 1891 mansion located on the corner of Pennsylvania and 12th Street. This Victorian mansion has earned a spot on national and state registers of historic places, and it has earned the highest award given by the American Bed & Breakfast Association.

name: Nicci
about: I am a Denver transplant who enjoys any activity outdoors; hiking, skiing, a good bike ride. I travel quite a bit and always love experiencing something new. I enjoy meeting travelers and I look forward to meeting the people with whom I can share my space with.

name: Carlos
about: I'm renting a beautiful brand new home

name: Glenna
about: Denver.  Travel.  Scrabble.  Movies.  Yoga.  Eating. Community.

name: Maire
about: Hi there. I'm originally from Tacoma, WA and have lived on and off in Denver for the past six years. My husband and I enjoy skiing, traveling and hanging out with our two year old. I love exploring new cities and love any trip where I can combine sight seeing with some solid lounging near the water. I have an unhealthy obsession with sweets, spaghetti cabonara and finding the perfect bloody mary.

name: Megan
about: Mom of two, business owner and lover of the outdoors!  We have lived in Denver since 2005 and love it!  The food scene is amazing, the weather cannot be beat and the access to everything outdoors is awesome.

name: Carlyn
about: Born in Boston, grew up in Greenville, SC-  Indiana University- Dallas, TX then San Diego, CA then Wilmington, NC and now Denver CO :) Life is one big opportunity; it is what we choose to do with those opportunities that sets us all apart. (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) "Strangers To Friends" - hope our paths get to cross!

name: Max
about: Bluegrass musician for the last 15 years, sometimes professional, other times I have to get a dumb job like now. 30 years old, born in Lawrence, KS but have lived in New York, Colorado, New Mexico, Spain, and Ecuador.

name: Anne
about: Working artist living in Denver Colorado, originally from Mississippi. I love to travel and collect and paint maps.  I work from home and am so excited to be hosting guests in my beautiful home studio.

name: Dave
about: I enjoy traveling and wanted to share my city loft with others. I am a native of Colorado yet like to escape once in a while - so I try and offer you accommodations like I would appreciate. Whether you are coming to Denver on your first trip or your fiftieth - on business or pleasure - Id be glad to share my knowledge and home and hope to have you as a guest!

name: Veronika
about: I am a Colorado native who loves to travel and explore the great outdoors. My passions include supporting local shops and restaurants, exploring art galleries, catching live music shows, visiting museums and botanical gardens. During the summer you will find me out with the dogs hiking the Rocky Mountains, gardening outdoors or bicycling around town. I have enjoyed exploring foreign cities and countries and the best part of traveling is hands down the people you meet and the friendships created. I hope you feel comfortable in my home and it can be a springboard for you to create great adventures in Denver.

name: Ian
about: Hello. I have been living and working in Denver for the past 15 years. I enjoy traveling and try to leave the country every year for a bit. As hosts, Scarlett and I know a lot about Denver and are happy to help out and give direction to anyone visiting!

name: Sarah And Fred
about: I enjoy being outside in the mountains skiing, hiking and fly fishing. I also like eating at many of Denver's great restaurants, cooking, seeing live music and hanging out with friends and family.

name: Georgia
about: Single.  Love my historic neighborhood and home.  I like people and ideas and would like to get to know my guests.

name: Melissa
about: My husband John, our mini golden doodle Teddy, and I are excited to meet you. John and I are young professionals who are well connected with the global and entrepreneurial sphere in Colorado. With our roots in Denver, we know the best bits of local knowledge.  We are well traveled, love meeting new people, and enjoy hosting guests in our lovely home. In our spare time, we love to go on long walks around the city, try local restaurants and breweries, and cook. I can often be found in the kitchen baking brownies or cupcakes, and John is often working on his next home improvement project. One of our favorite weekend activities is sitting on our front porch and enjoying a cup of coffee in our quiet neighborhood. We are experienced global travelers who have been fortunate to stay in homes around the world. In return we want to offer a comfortable stay and local knowledge to travelers from across the globe.

name: Mitchell
about: I am an early 30's professional looking to rent out a room in the condo that I own in City Park.  I enjoy soccer, cooking, cycling, beer brewing and gardening.  I have loved living in City Park West, I know the neighborhood well, so don't be afraid to ask how to get around or where the best places to eat are at.

name: Juan
about: Denver native, work in Finance IT, love cycling, competing in triathlons, century rides and snowboarding in the winter. Have traveled a lot, have lived in Buenos Aires and Madrid.

name: Ashley
about: I am from Denver, CO and I love to travel!

name: Madera Elena
about:
I am a work in progress. Moved to Brooklyn, New York from Denver to live with my husband. I embrace a home that shows my practice of living an eco, organic, natural and conscious life style.  It's simple. As an eco-conscious fashion and textile designer, renovations and home stager, my company Madera E. Rogers Designs, LLC and lifestyle brand, (URL HIDDEN) The goal is to incorporate recycling to zero waste practices at 80%. My collection of unusual artwork, and solid teak furniture compliment my name, Madeira in Spanish means "wood." There's great energy in the space that allows the student, professional student of life to be at peace while at home. 

Five things I can't live without:
1. Food!! I love cooking ad much as eating 
 2.Water  3. Humor at self 4. Great attitude 5. Belief in peace

My hope is that who ever stays at my home will be relaxed, and appreciate life!
Peace to you,

name: Gia
about: Hello I'm Gia Valverde, a Denver native and a multimedia designer. I've lived in the Sunnyside neighborhood my whole life and have a deep love for area. I believe that the Sunnyside neighborhood has the best of everything Denver has to offer, food, nightlife, distance to downtown,a vibrant restaurant scene, and of course the urban charm.

name: Lydia
about: I'm a local Realtor in Denver.  I love people.  I love travel.  I have used Airbnb all over the world as a guest for several years (gave me a good perspective as to what guest are looking for).  Now a host in Denver and I love it.  I have checked out almost every restaurant in Denver and know about what's going on :)  The guest I've had so far have been amazing.

name: Brad
about:
My Wife and I love to travel. We moved to Denver from Atlanta in 2013 on a whim and have loved everything Colorado has to offer. We love trying new restaurants, going to outdoor concerts at Red Rocks, hiking and walking to our family friendly neighborhood hot spots with the baby and dogs. 
We love hosting family and friends when they come to visit. That is what lead us to Airbnb. We are happy to help guest make the most of their stay. We tried to make our space feel like comfortable hotel.

name: Laci
about:
I love living in Denver and have called it home since I moved here from Minneapolis, MN in 2001. My family and I love to explore our amazing city and love traveling to new cities. 

The 5 things I can't live without are: the people I love, good music, pod-casts, almond butter, and skinny sharpie markers.

name: Nicole
about: Colorado Native I was raised in Golden but currently live about 15 minutes away from this home and I am a Realtor with Sotheby's.  I purchased this home to use for downtown adventures when it is not rented and I love the proximity to all things awesome in Denver.  I am your Colorado expert so if you need any advice on things to here or in the Mountains let me know I'm here to help and make sure you have a most excellent vacation!   When not in Denver I enjoy two of our vacation homes in Crested Butte Colorado which is one of my favorite places in this State.   I'm very easy going, easy to communicate with and will respond quickly , so if this is last minute travel I'm your gal!  I hope you choose us for your Denver adventure.

name: Helen
about:
Welcome to Denver! Im originally from Denver and moved away 4 times and just kept coming back. This time I'm committed! :) I love my house and I equally love improving it. I've also rented out multiple listings over the years so am comfortable with guests and knowledgable about what makes for a good stay. 

I'm a big traveler and as such I am a huge proponent of Airbnb and the flexibility the service provides to travelers and home owners. I can also talk to pretty much anyone, so please don't be shy. Come and have a chat!

name: Jess
about:
Hello!  I am in my 30's, married, and mom to two young boys. For ten months of the year I work as a high school teacher of biology and genetics.  For the other two months (summer break!) I am a full-time mom.  When I have some free time, I enjoy reading magazines like Time and People, baking sweets, papercrafting, working out, hosting dinner parties, and traveling. Socially, I would rather have a glass or two of wine with a few close friends than attend a big party.  I prefer the arts over athletics, liberal/progressive views over conservative ones, and down-to-earth honest folks over high-maintenance people.

As a guest, I am very respectful of others' property and space.  I am moderately interactive with hosts, making conversation when suitable or needed, but also relaxing in the privacy of my room.  I am friendly, calm, and   low-maintenance.

I look forward to meeting you!

name: Kate
about: My husband and I live in the LoHi area of downtown Denver.  We are passionate travelers and use Airbnb every chance we get.  Being passionate travelers we know what we like in a rental home, so we have provided you with everything we expect in an Airbnb rental.

name: Renae
about:
Hi, 
Thanks for checking out my listing. I moved to Colorado from Orange County when I was 12. I love my neighborhood, it is fun, vibrant, diverse, friendly.
I enjoy gardening, cooking, biking, travel, creativity. 
Airbnb is a great way to get around!

name: Jessica
about: I'm an avid traveler and work  in international travel sending students on trips abroad. I love meeting people, trying new food, understanding the local culture wherever I go, and am working towards hitting 30 countries by my 30th birthday. Hope to meet you soon!

name: Lucas
about: I'm a pretty mellow guy. I enjoy traveling, fine dining, and traveling. I live in Denver, and currently work as an independent contractor. I really enjoy meeting different people and trying new experiences. I love spending time with my family and friends, and really enjoy staying with airbnb hosts when I travel. I am friendly, optimistic, and live my life to the fullest extent!

name: James
about: I am a professional performing musician, and professor of flute at the University of Northern Colorado.

name: Alex
about: Just your average mid-30's Denver livin' couple.

name: Amy
about:
Hi :-)

I'm new to Denver and Airbnb. I'm trying out hosting as a way to meet good people and offer a great place in one of the best, most central locations in all of Denver.

I love to travel, meet new people and experience fun, new things. My favorite food? That's easy: Tacos!

Once you book, feel free to reach out to me any time if you have any questions. I'm happy to help!

Cheers,
Amy

name: Nestar
about:
Hello! 
Thanks for checking out my place! I'm from Colorado, born and raised. I love this city! I graduated from the University of Colorado, Denver. I work for myself and waitress part-time. I use AirBnB because I travel a ton, about once a month. I would love to welcome you to my home and see my city the way a native Coloradan does! :)

name: Jennifer
about: My husband, Brian, and I are both from Colorado. We love Denver, especially our neighborhood (Sunnyside). We're close to everything and are happy to give you suggestions on where to eat, drink, what to see and how to get there!

name: Mardi
about: Real Estate Sales

name: Paige
about: I am a proud Coloradan.  Originally from Philadelphia, then onto the San Francisco Bay Area, I chose to come out here to attend CU Boulder and never really left.  Why would you?  The weather is perfect.  The outdoors are full of beauty, adventure and sport.  Denver is a friendly town with many cultural surprises and easy access to all that Colorado has to offer. I own my own Graphic Design business which I run out of my home office.  I am married to a wonderful man who is also creative.  He plays music, writes and is a respected cultural community leader.  We have a creative, bright and clever son who inspires and makes us proud every day.  And we have a gorgeous, lovable dog named Radio.  We live in a friendly neighborhood close to many parks and cultural destinations -- the Denver Botanic Gardens is 1/2 block away, City Park with the Zoo and Museum of Nature and Science is 5 blocks, Cherry Creek is within walking distance.   We will be a great resource for any interested guest to make the most of their stay here in Denver.

name: Greg
about: We are young professionals who enjoy spending time in Colorado's mountains and traveling the country. When we travel, we love to get a taste of what it's like to be a local--we skip most of the tourist traps. When we host, we want our guests to feel the same way.

name: Jon
about: Love to explore to see and learn new things!

name: Jonathan
about: Hello! I work in both commercial and residential real estate. When I'm not working, I am volunteering for local organizations, skiing and hiking in the mountains, trying new restaurants and enjoying all of the cultural happenings that Denver has to offer. There is so much to do in this city and I wish I had more time to experience it all. I recently moved into the Five Points neighborhood and I have been pleasantly surprised with all of the community activities this area has to offer.

name: Richard
about: Hi there! My name is Richard. 33 years young. Employed, military veteran, athlete, traveler, and proud parent. I've traveled to all 7 continents and enjoy learning about the world we live in.

name: Sarah
about:
I own and manage several yoga industry businesses and love the entrepreneurial lifestyle. I'm an animal lover and single mama of an incredible gift of a child. I live the typical active Colorado lifestyle, and travel a lot for work and play! 

I've stayed in places under my ex-partner's name so decided I should get my own profile up and running. I'm also listing my home on here now and excited to meet you when visiting Denver!

name: Kinga
about: I am hardworking polish girl that made her dreams come true .  I have been in USA for 10 years and I absolutely love it ! I feel complete here and I am proud mom of 2 girls . I love to travel and  meet new nice , extraordinary people . Love to cook as I own restaurant and I like to impress my family with new culinary ideas . I would love to make everyone stay at my place an incredible experience  and I do believe people travel to only enjoy it ....:)

name: Tyler
about:
I am a 26 year-old professional who travels all the time. I spend most of my time in LA, NY, and San Francisco.  I was raised in the Bay Area.

I'd guess I'm like most 20 something year-old americans: I like football, lifting weights/gym, health, DJing, reading, afternoon coffee with a friend, etc. I used to be a therapist and now I work in tech.

Life Motto: follow your passions, work hard and don't forget to have fun.

Avid AirBnB user
Favorite foreign destinations: Odessa, Budapest, Rio de Janeiro

name: Katie
about: Hello guests! My name is Katie. I am a small business owner here in Denver Colorado doing eyelash extensions. I love the mountains here in Colorado as much as we like going out to try new restaurants, so this is a perfect place to be:) While it is a great place to come home to, I love to travel and have found airbnb to be a wonderful tool, not only for accommodation needs but to fill the ever widening gap we encounter as fellow humans. Having a host that can offer advice and be helpful one on one means the world of difference with travel and cutting out the corporate space means we are able to bridge together relationships with others :)

name: Danielle
about: Frequent traveler, lover of life. Happy to call Denver home!

name: Matthew
about:
I am a local software developer, who likes all sorts of activities...
Outdoor includes running, racing (favorite these days are the Spartan Race series) hiking, snowboarding, etc.
Indoor includes such things as happy hours, social dance, Dance Central ;-) and many others.
My friends call me one of the more outgoing, social engineers that they know - I'm fun and friendly, and generally up for just about anything.
I'm also a fan of Doctor Who and Archer.

name: Steve
about: Vicki and I both moved to Denver in the early 1980's (she from Iowa, myself from West Texas). We love anything outdoors - particularly mountain biking, camping, and canoeing. We are foodies - we love all good food (Asian, sushi, great pizza, Mexican in particular), are accomplished cooks who enjoy entertaining, love great coffee (we make espresso.cappuccino daily and roast our own coffee beans), and appreciate good wine. We also enjoy and appreciate good music - we love live music and are regulars at the Telluride Bluegrass Festival.

name: Todd
about:
I'm from Charleston, SC with a couple years spent in Pittsburgh, PA. I decided to move from the East Coast out West to Colorado for a change of pace and scenery. I picked Boulder at first because I was moving here at the beginning of Summer and thought it would be perfect to enjoy those months and figure out the area. The few months I spent in Boulder were enjoyable, but I ultimately decided to make the move to Denver because Denver is much more diverse.

Graduate from The College of Charleston, studied History and Religious Studies.

I enjoy hiking and have recently found a love for doing 14ers. I enjoy cooking, especially Thai, Southern, and smoked BBQ - definitely charcoal over gas. If I had to pick a favorite musician or musical group it would be Phish.

name: Crystal
about:
I am in my mid 30's, world traveler, and work in the hospitality industry. I love food and beverage (great at recommendations), scuba diving, riding my beach cruiser, dancing, and staying on Air BnB myself! 

I'm spontaneous, adventurous and will be a great host as I work for Premier Hotel brand.

name: Mary
about: San Franciscan native traveling and living as many places as possible. Professional actor with a great love of my dog, food and nature.

name: Ricardo
about:
I am an NLP master trainer who speaks English, Spanish and Portuguese. 
I like to travel to Portugal, Brazil, Peru, and Mexico.
When I travel I use Airbnb to find great places to stay.
I have had many careers such as property management, residential contracting, teaching Spanish, training and psychotherapy. 
I love to learn and experience new things, as well as, meeting new people.

name: Brandon
about: We are a fun loving native Colorado couple! We love to travel, the outdoors, live music, dancing, dogs, beer, and meeting new people. We both work 9-5 jobs during the week and spend our evenings and weekends working on remodeling projects, hanging with friends, or planning our next adventure! We travel internationally as often as possible and thrive off of learning from people and places. Come stay with us!

name: Amanda
about: I'm in my 30s, own my place but am often away. I'm in the service industry which affords me a pretty flexible schedule and plenty of time to travel. I love my city, especially my neighborhood, and like to share it with others.

name: Gabrielle
about:
I am very fortunate to not have to work a day in my life because I absolutely love what I do! As a Developer, Designer, and Real Estate Broker in booming Denver I am always busy with fun new projects! I built and designed the unit that I have available to stay in and I am oh so proud of it and am ecstatic to share with guests!

Traveling and exploring is one of my true passions. When I am not working I love going to the mountains, on road trips, venturing to a beach or just exploring my own city!

I plan on traveling the world some day!

I CAN'T WAIT TO MEET YOU WHETHER IT IS AT MY HOUSE OR YOURS!

name: Paul
about: Laid back, keep to myself, like the arts, traveling a lot for work and vacation this year.  Im clean and respectful to people.

name: Jessica
about:
My husband Jake and I love Denver. We enjoy the restaurants and beer, parks, arts and activities this city offers. 

I am living in Kearney, Nebraska for the next 2 years for graduate school. Jake splits his time between Denver, Loveland (with his parents) and with me in Nebraska. 

We are both excited to be newly pursuing our lifelong passions.  I just left my accounting career to attend graduate school for speech-language pathology.  Jake recently left his career as a liquor licensing consultant to become a music teacher. We both love learning and laughing and enjoying life!

name: Denver Luxury
about: Hands down the best way to experience the Smile High City, Denver Luxury Lodging was founded with the mission to connect travelers eager for an authentic, cannabis-friendly luxury vacation with premium lodging offerings in the most desirable locations in the City. Whether it's bar-hopping in LoDo, cultured inebriation in RiNo or an unforgettable weekend in LoHi, Denver Luxury Lodging has got you covered!

name: Kevin
about: I live in downtown Denver, enjoy the outdoors and have a great sense of humor. I enjoy visiting new destinations and making new friends on the way. I look forward to hosting or visiting your place.

name: Jackie
about: I'm a professional that owns this place in Lohi / Denver.  I have two extra bedrooms so I thought it would make sense to rent them out to people through airbnb :)  If I'm around, it would be great to hang out with guests a little bit, but I'm also perfectly happy leaving you alone to do your own thing.  I am often very busy and may not be here when you stay, but am happy to answer any questions I can.

name: Matthew
about: I am an outdoorsy type that enjoys traveling as much as the opportunity presents itself.  Originating from the rockbound coast of Maine, I have lived in several places over the course of my life indicating that environmental variety is important to my well being.  My hobbies are cooking, biking and skiing amongst a multitude  of other fun stuff.  I am in a long term relationship with an amazing woman and the both of us like experiencing our version of the simple life.  :)

name: Gabriel + Vanessa
about: We are a couple (36 and 33) and we love traveling!  She is a PhD student and he owns a student travel company. We met in Costa Rica.  We love to explore new places, get lost, try local cuisine and meet new people.

name: Dee
about: We are a US Foreign Service family traveling the world with our twins. While it's exciting to live abroad, we always love coming back to our wonderful home every once in a while. We invite you to enjoy all that our home, the great city of Denver, and the wonderful nearby mountains have to offer!

name: Mark
about:
I am a native son of colorful Colorado, home of the Super bowl champion Denver Broncos and the best defense on the planet!  I have been married to my wife for 33 years and our proudest achievement is our lovely daughter Samantha.  Our heart though belongs to Biyanka, our sweet and adorable Shi-tsu puppy.  We like to travel and spend time with our extended family throughout New Mexico, Texas and Arizona.  
I am the senior Pastor of Westside Christian Fellowship, a church my wife and I planted 25 years ago.  We love our church family and spending quality time with them.  I love to hike and conquer the 14er scene.  I also like to workout at Planet fitness and stay as active as possible.  I drive part time for both Uber and Lyft and really enjoy meeting people from around the world who come to Denver.  If you will be flying into Denver I can provide transportation to and from the airport for a minimal fee of just $30.00

name: Marissa
about: I am a native of WI, but have been in Denver seven years.  I enjoy city living, fitness, and working out.  Other interests include film, live music, biking, ski-ing, hiking, summer festivals, reading, writing, & volunteering.  I enjoy sharing my knowledge of the city with my guests.  I love Denver!

name: Annette
about: I love people of all ages and types, dogs, long walks, great music and books. For years we have enjoyed hosting students from all over the world and now that most of our children are grown, we have lovely spaces to welcome travelers and visitors to Denver. I'll be delighted to facilitate your stay in Denver with information or other support; if you need something, just ask. I look forward to meeting you!

name: Jacque And Paul
about:
My fiancé and I love to travel! Our relationship actually started with a big trip to Eastern Europe...until then, we were just friends. In May 2014, we both quit our jobs to travel the world for almost a year, a journey that took us to Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Malaysia, Japan, China, India, South Africa, Tanzania, Argentina, Chile, and Ecuador!  Airbnb has been a fantastic way to experience different places off the beaten path. 

We also love eating - if you ever ask "do you like..." or "do you eat...", our answer will always be yes! 

And, of course, to allow us to eat whatever we want, we enjoy hiking and other physical activities, too :)

name: A.J.
about:
In the Summer months I hike and Mnt. Bike as much as I can. In the Winter, it's all about the skiing! If the snow is falling, I'm heading to the slopes.
I work for myself as a real estate agent. I enjoy fixing up properties and I always have some type of project going on.

name: Charles
about:
I love to travel, volunteer, ski and scuba. I love to help others explore Colorado and am committed to ensuring you're thrilled with your accomodation.

"Your pleasure is my business"  :)

name: Scott
about:
Software startup company guy from Denver. Enjoy skiing and being in the sun, good coffee and oxford commas.

Most recently working on meditating and yoga.

name: Michelle
about:
I'm crazy about my dog, love to cook and enjoy wine on sunny summer days. I love making people comfortable in my space, and welcome guests into my home all the time - whether I'm here or not!  I want you to love Denver as much as I do, and will try to make your visit as fantastic as I can! 

I also recently stumbled across Fabio on a walk around LA. Hilarious.

name: Erin
about: Hi, I'm Erin. I recently moved to this amazing house in the Denver University (DU) area & would love to share my home with interesting people from all over the world. I love music & you will see that reflected in my home. I'm close (3 miles) to South Broadway & its wide array of music venues. Other interests include volleyball, running, my dogs (Dugan & Chapman), camping, hiking, rock climbing, skiing, wine tasting, pretty much anything that is fun.

name: Jerry
about: San Francisco transplant, and loving the Colorado Lifestyle.

name: Aimee
about: Denver native. Digital designer at a fashion tech startup. My partner and I are traveling creatives and yogis, sharing our home with many visitors!

name: Tyler & Randi
about: We are two teachers (HS Spanish and 1st grade) who love world travel, music, and a healthy balance of city life and the great outdoors. Our schedule allows us ample time to travel so we hope that others can enjoy our home while we're out!

name: Kerry
about:
I have been living in Denver for the past ten years. After growing up outside of Philadelphia, spending 8 years in Maine and living all over the west (MT, AK, ID), Denver has become a great place to call home. The Stapleton community is a great balance between city and suburbs. We have great restaurants and trails for biking, walking and running are everywhere. The sand creek trail is right across the street from my house and you can run, walk, bike all the way downtown to REI and beyond on it. 
I love the outdoors and Denver is very conducive to an outdoor focused lifestyle. I spend half of my time in a tiny town of 450 people in Creede, Colorado. I enjoy running and mountain biking the trails around Creede as well as floating on the Rio Grande River.

name: Meg
about: Colorado State Manager for Serralles USA (Death's Door Spirits & Don Q Rum)

name: Pete
about:
I'm new to AirBnB and am excited to show off my Denver townhouse!  I've been in Denver for 8 years, and beforehand I bounced around the world as a US Army Finance officer and West Point graduate.  I golfed at a collegiate division 1 level and also enjoy all of the outdoors that Colorado has to offer (skiing, hiking, running).  I'm very active in supporting the community and have led veteran and children focused nonprofits in the Denver / Boulder area.

What you should know about me: I love pizza and can tell you the unofficial rankings for the very best of Denver!  I've also worked the Great American Beer Festival multiple years and will steer you in the right direction in regards to Denver's best craft breweries.

name: Paul
about: Fun, personable and knowledgable about Denver since i've lived here since 1994.  Enjoy the outdoors and am a Health and Fitness Doctor.  I am an optimist and typically enjoy the same.   My home is shared with a close friend that is a holistic veterinarian.  Guest room has it's own private hall and bathroom.

name: Delia
about: I'm originally from DC and have enjoyed airbnb hospitality around the world. I'm happy to join the hosting bunch and will promise to treat your stay with all the warmth of an old friend returning home.

name: Heather
about: I love the mountains- skiing, hiking, climbing!  Denver is an amazing place to call home!!  You will love my apartment.  It is close to everything, with easy access to the mountains.  Large kitchen if you want to stay home and cook, kind size bed, televisions in main room and bedroom, a large deck with great sunrise views.  Walk to several award winning restaurants, or spend some time visiting the local breweries.  You will find plenty to do here in Downtown Denver!

name: Michael
about: I've lived in and loved every bit of Denver for about 8 years now. I work at a successful ecommerce startup downtown. In my free time I like to record music, play in bands, play/watch soccer, run and practice yoga. I love entertaining, so I'm happy to offer suggestions for things to do in Denver or just leave you to your own devices if that's what you prefer. I've always had great experiences with Airbnb and so hope to provide you with the same from a neighborhood I love, and house with good creative vibes as this was beat poet Neal Cassady's childhood home!

name: Suraya
about: Welcome to Denver! I am a local and I love to share my city with visitors! I work in the real estate business as a broker and an investor, as well as manage a small non-profit foundation. I live in Cherry Creek, and I am always happy to provide recommendations, directions, etc. for my guests. I hope you will book with me and enjoy all that Denver has to offer!

name: David
about: Loves to travel and enjoy new cuisine! Military guy and Uber driver, loving Denver, loving life and enjoy meeting people! Lgbt friendly. You have to be too. :-)

name: Tobie
about:
I'm a salon owner, love vintage furnishings ( except couch, bed and TV), yoga, hiking and more... 
I love Denver and living in the great state of Colorado. I'm very laid back and open minded. If you need recommendations, I can help as I am a third generation Denverite.
city: Central to the entire city yet quieter!

name: Steve
about: I'm a full-time college student (going for Hospitality) living in SE Denver.  I love anything Sci-Fi or action-packed.  My favorite travel destinations are to any water locales.  I've done Airbnb since March, 2016, and I'm loving it.  I look forward to making your stay pleasant, and am happy to interact as much or as little with you and anyone else traveling with you.

name: Victoria
about:
Hi there, I'm Victoria- a soulful, intuitive creative  photographer, better than average writer, professional image consultant and Branding Strategist. My life is about details, personal observations, tangible details, overall perceptions.
Lucky You! That means I tend to every last detail, I consider every aspect as a guest and a host. I enjoy and appreciate luxury and simplicity and have found a formula that allows for both! My passion is for my business, or should I say my business is my passion- #livetoinspire. Live to inspire is exactly what it implies, I live my life with the purpose of inspiring others to fully live theirs. I don't believe in; "No's, Can'ts, or "Impossible". I live in shades of grey and think totally outside the box. I love the airbnb concept, as it allows people to do just that! I have no doubt any guest will leave with a smile!!

name: Ben
about:
I am a businessman living in Denver who likes to get out and explore when time allows.  I like to ski, run, go to shows, and just generally stay active and engaged with my surroundings.  

I love farm fresh food options and prefer to use public transportation when available and feasible.  I also like getting to know people in different parts of the world, and hope that travel can become more of a mainstay in my life as time goes on.

name: Laura
about: I have been in real estate for over 30 years.  I am licensed in Colorado and New Mexico.  I enjoy the mountains and the ocean.  I have lived in many parts of Colorado since moving here in 1976.  Cherry Creek is a favorite neighborhood to experience a piece of Denver.

name: Yong
about: I have been enjoying with my guests in the past.  All my guests would like to make themselves home in my appartment.

name: Alana
about:
I'm a nutritionist! I use food and essential oils to help coach people to better wellness, and I coach people in integrating essential oils into their business model.  Ask me about your health and wellness concerns!

I simply can't live without good food, good chocolate, and good outdoor time!

name: Jordan
about:
Stay Alfred was created based on the idea of offering short term rentals at an unbelievable price while making the booking process easy and problem free. Stay Alfred acquires properties in high-end buildings and condominiums in the best locations to ensure your stay is satisfying and you want to come back. Since we value your return business, we always offer discounts to those who stay in any of our units time after time. We want you to feel at home when you stay with us and that's why you will always be greeted with a professionally cleaned unit and quality furnishings. We welcome feedback in any kind of way to ensure we are meeting the needs of everyone!

We cater to:

Urban Vacations
Family Travel
Corporate Housing
Extended stay In Denver, Seattle, and Portland
Insurance and Job Relocation
Events and Weddings 
Military Training and PCS
Government Workers
Pet Friendly Vacationers

name: Mallory
about: I live and work in two cities-Oklahoma City and Denver. Being from Oklahoma but having lived in Alaska for 3 years, I was missing the mountains. I decided it was time to get back to them and made a way to work in both cities and enjoy what each has to offer. Family in one, mountains in the other. I'd love to share my Denver place with you whether for your work or play. Cheers and safe travels!

name: Laurel And Paul
about:
Laurel & Paul enjoy hiking, biking, gardening, music & travel.  Recent trips have included Costa Rica, France & Alaska.  

Paul is a professional harmonica player & owns a construction remodel business.  Laurel works in downtown Denver as a human resources professional.

name: Shawn
about: I'm a part-time college student and I work full-time at a bar. I'm going to school for animation and media art. I love to paint, skateboard, play billiards, and go to concerts. I'm pretty laid back and friendly.

name: Jess
about: We live in Colorado and travel and often as we can. We love to laugh, play, sleep, and eat -- all on a budget if possible! We are happy to share our mother-in-law apartment with people who enjoy our comfy, eclectic space.

name: Nicole
about:
•  I love cross country skiing at night to a cabin that needs to be heated up with a wood fire.
•  I started drinking coffee in my 40s.
•  Grew up in Toronto, Undergrad in Vancouver, Masters in Halifax, six years in San Francisco, ended up in (URL HIDDEN) far.
•  I love Denver!  The only thing I knew about Denver before moving here was John Denver's Greatest Hits that I loved singing along to with my sisters when I was a kid.

name: Michael
about: From Denver, Professional photographer, loves Nutella.

name: Molly
about: Hi, I'm Molly! Originally from Ann Arbor, Michigan, I've been in Denver for the past five years. I love yoga, hiking, and binge watching Netflix.

name: Brendan
about:
Welcome to the Mile High City where the sun shines 300+ days of the year! Julie and I live in the Lincoln Park neighborhood, a block off the Santa Fe Arts District and walking distance to about 5, soon to be 7 breweries. 
We're laid back and enjoy brewing, reading, traveling, cooking, lawn games, poker, bike riding, ice cream eating, Food Truck supporting, trivia playing, soccer watching, beer drinking... you get the jist. It'd be great to host you and share with you the many reasons why we love Denver.

name: Jennifer & Giovanni
about:
We are a community of artists and tinkerers.
 
We enjoy many activities here in Denver -  cooking, growing fruits and vegetables are some that we get to do here at the cottages along with mixed media projects and furniture building. 

We are always up to some new outdoor project when the Colorado weather permits and hunker down inside by the fire in the winter keeping our hands busy with knitting, card making or some other project we can dream up.   

Giovanni and I have grown in our collaborations and embrace our age and abilities  for self governance in employment - Giovanni had moved into documentaries and I have been spending more time in the commercial film community. 

We have been in the lower highlands for over a decade now and have marveled in the changing landscape and exciting times for new restaurants, breweries and galleries.  We still love to take advantage of the great walks thru the neighborhood and down by the river as often as we can.

name: Kim
about: I came to Colorado for 6 months...15 years ago and have been in LOVE ever since.  The people, the activities and sights.  Recently, I have had too many examples of how life is short... so I'm doing my best to really enjoy everyday.

name: Rebecca
about: We're a busy family of four, so y'know, always on the go...There's me, Rebecca, working in public policy, and at home I'm cooking, gardening, building block towers and marble runs with our two 5 year old boys.  There's Charlie, handy energy efficiency guy, awesome vertical garden and rain capture system builder.  And then there are those boys I mentioned...let's just say there's a lot of climbing on the furniture, drawing, puzzles, books, fort-building, dirt-digging, and marble-rolling in our house.  But don't worry, our two guest rooms are located far, far from the mayhem in our fully renovated basement, otherwise known as "the fortress of solitude".

name: Eric
about:
Uncle Van: When we bought Uncle Van in 2012 the intent was to tour the country without having to worry about hotels.  We completed a 2 month tour, but sadly Uncle Van's engine died and now he makes a great guest bedroom.  Our goal is to raise enough money renting him on AirBnB to buy him a shiny new engine!  

Eric:  Originally from MD, then Nashville, now Denver. I live in the house where Uncle Van is parked, keeping him clean and out of trouble!  Drummer / songwriter / performer / music businessman / dog lover / food lover / etc.  When I'm not on the road, I work from home making coffee and writing music, and I practice the drums. When I'm done working, I read stuff, watch stuff, and play videogames with my basset hound. Her name is Navi. My upstairs roommate's name is Ken, and his cat is named Meatloaf.

If there's anything else you'd like to know send a message!

name: Marie
about: Single, Hispanic, outgoing female. Like art galleries, reading, swimming and golf. Exploring new areas. Love to travel and meet new people.

name: Othman
about:
Hello!

If you are reading this, then you already know....  my apartment is available for rent!

I enjoy traveling and have had wonderful experiences staying in other people's homes using AirBnb (some not as great).  I try to learn from each stay to try and better the experience for those who will be staying in my apartment.  

On a personal note, I enjoy spending my time with my wife and four year old son and exploring all that Denver has to offer together.   I work downtown as a geologist in the oil field.  On my downtime, I get a kick out of impractical jokers!

Thanks!
Othman

name: Katie
about:
I've had the good fortune to travel all over using Airbnb as a guest, and now that I have my own place in Denver, I'm really excited to open up my home to visitors!  

I spend most of my free time outside.  Hiking, Skiing, Trail running with my husky puppy (Dolores) & traveling as much as my time off allows!

name: Dmitriy
about: I'm a young working professional, originally from Russia but lived in Denver/Boulder since I was 12 years old. I love living in Denver and experiencing everything the city has to offer. I enjoy spending time outdoors playing tennis, soccer etc. as well as meeting new people.

name: Jeff
about:
I'm a professional living in Denver and I've lived in my house for about 2 years. I rent out my house when I'm out of town so I can do some more traveling of my own and I try hard to make my place as welcoming for guests as possible.

Since it is my primary residence, I really appreciate respectful guests who take good care of it.

name: Carolyn
about:
My husband and I are new empty nesters!  With 4 empty bedrooms in the house, it seems a shame to not share them with others.  We have always had people living in the house whether as students or part time nannies.  I enjoy meeting people from around the world and sharing experiences.

I am passionate about travel, (Europe, Africa, Down Under; (you name it I love going there!) music (all kinds and love to see live music), going to the movies, enjoying Denver's marvelous array of  restaurants, cooking, crosswords and reading.   Outside of these passions, I am a partner in a small business and work with high school kids on the college application process.  I have done and do, many different things!

When I travel, I like to look for a small inn or bed and breakfast where a connection is made and a relationship built.  That's what life if all about!  I like the homeyness and warmth of staying in a small, non commercial environment. 

I am happy to have you in my home and help you navigate our great city!   I love Denver for its warm and sunny days which is reflected in the population as a whole.   We have world class restaurants, theater, opera, shopping and art.  There is so much to see and do, I am happy to help you on your way!

I do ask that applicants have a profile picture, a short bio and a reason for staying with us.  I also request that any "420" vacationers please inquire elsewhere.  While I have no problem with it, it doesn't fit the culture and vibe of my home!   For those of you checking in after 10pm, there will be an extra charge of $25.  Thanks!

name: Mary
about: I'm originally from Louisiana, so I offer hospitality with a Southern twist. I'm a Denverite by choice and I edited a travelers' guide to the city in a prior life, so it's my pleasure to introduce the city to travelers. I collect folk art -- both at home and when I travel -- so my home is decorated with carved animals and Spanish Colonial-style images of the saints, as well as textiles from faraway places and books on related topics.

name: Raelina
about:
I work as a graphic designer in Denver. And I am a stereotypical Coloradan. 
I like skiing, beer, hiking and biking, and I'm a big foodie. 
I like to write and do crafts other times, and of course travel.  

One amazing thing that I've done is a 1500km solo hitchhiking trip through Europe. And I've eaten a fermented chicken egg. (Don't worry, there are 11 more in the fridge for you if you'd like :)

name: Alan
about:
As a pilot I have a great appreciation for exploration and travel. I am also an avid outdoor adventurer and enjoy skiing, mountain biking, scuba diving, hiking and kayaking. 
Travel to me is an essential part of living a full life and I hope to do many more trips in the future. 
I enjoy the opportunity to meet other like minded travelers and to share my small but cozy part of Denver through AirBnB with them.

name: Meme
about: Professional woman who lives and works in Denver and enjoys the outdoors. Do not personally partake of Colorado's great new legal hobby, 4:20, however, it is okay in the home for guests.

name: Matt
about: My wife and I love to cook, travel, play tennis, ski, kayak, and play volleyball.  We love hosting family, friends, and new friends at our home.  We would be glad to show and share with you our favorite dinner spots, thrift shops, and parks in the area.    We have traveled a fair amount around the world and Airbnb has been a great opportunity to be able to connect with really great people in really great locations.  We think you'll love the home, the neighborhood, and Denver!

name: Taylor
about: I'm a writer and a dancer originally from the east coast. I love the mountains and have a passion for art and for music. Denver has become home, though I'm still adventurous by nature and love to explore new methods of travel.

name: Jerry
about: Hey I'm Jerry! I'm an east coast transplant but I've been in Colorado over 20 years now. Feels like home. Denver is a great town. I love my neighborhood and I hope will too!

name: Pat
about: My husband John and I are empty nesters in a beautiful neighborhood of Denver proper called Observatory Park.  Our 100 year old home is up to date with modern features, so is classic without sacrifice.    We enjoy company and are in and out days and evenings.    John works in renewable energy and Pat is an office administrator.

name: Tony
about: 29 yo bond trader trying to figure out the keys of life.

name: Adrienne
about: I love Colorado, and I love sharing it with others.

name: Kimberly
about:
A very upbeat person, independent and progressive thinker, gardener, artist (contemporary painting and sculpture) and healer (psychotherapist and nutritional counselor). Have traveled quite a bit myself both in the USA and overseas (South and Central America, Japan, Germany, UK, Italy, Czech Republic, Canada). I also enjoy a BnB type experience when I travel, or very small locally owned pensions, hotels. What's the point of traveling if you are not going to get to know the people who live there?

My dual careers keep me quite busy, so altho I will definitely want to meet you and have some conversation, I also respect personal space. I like to cook and would be happy to share some meals based in our mutual availability. I'm new to Air BnB but for the past 3 years I have rented my extra bedrooms on a month-month basis mostly to folks who were in the relocation process or here in Denver for temporary work, so I am very used to sharing my space and really enjoy doing so. I have a small non shedding dander free dog, Isabella who is a total Mommie's girl, but friendly once she knows you.

I absolutely love this neighborhood and can recommend the best places to eat, grab coffee, shop, get your nails done, etc... I love the Art Gallery scene, have lots of friends here who are professional artists and can show you around spots that the guides won't tell you about where it comes to Visual Arts (even some private studio visits with some of my art making friends if you like).

I love foreign and indie films and we've got a great little theatre right up the street (The Esquire) and the Mayan is also very close. 

Kind of a health nut, I am not much of a drinker anymore but an occasional glass of wine is fine. 420 friendly here, altho I no longer indulge myself. I enjoy meeting folks of all ages but will mention that I need quiet after 10:00 pm weeknights. I have a 30+ year Buddhist practice so I meditate every morning and a bit in the evening too, but you don't need to tiptoe around me or anything... I have a private space in my own room for chanting and meditation. 

I guess if I have a life motto its "live live live". See the world, meet its people, be kind to others and smile and they will be kind to you.

name: Robert
about: Kim and I are rather easy going professionals.  We very much enjoy meeting our guests.  We are proud of our city, and have loads of recommendations if you need any!  We enjoy traveling as much as we can as well.  We look forward to meeting you!

name: Ian
about: Stand up comedian from Omaha, currently living in Denver.  I'm old and boring and just read a lot of books now.

name: Allison
about:
I've lived in Denver since 1999, minus a year abroad and other shenanigans. I own a small do-good business and do a lot of nonprofit work. I love dogs, which is good since I have two of them! I am a climber, I do yoga, I love to read, watch indie films, and see live music when I have spare time. Oh, and Ted Talks. I like those. 

As a host, I try to be as accommodating as possible. I work a lot, but I tend to be pretty responsive to questions, help make suggestions for things you may like, and I'm happy to help drive guests when I can.

name: Bridget
about:
I spend my time mountain biking and enjoying Colorado's beautiful open spaces. I'm also an avid reader of nonfiction. I grew up in California, went to school in NY, and have made a home for myself in Denver.

The first thing I do when travelling to new places is figure out where the best food can be found. In between meals I like to be very active- I think exploring a new place by foot or bike are the best ways.

I live in Denver with my boyfriend Josh and our two rescue dogs Phoebe and Ollie. Justina Blakeney is my biggest interior design inspiration and you'll see her influence in many places in our home.

name: Christine
about: I am one of the founders of (URL HIDDEN)  I live in Denver with my husband and two kids.  We love Colorado!

name: Darrel
about: Hello, I'm Darrel Hoffman owner of B and B 420. I built this company for one reason, to offer marijuana friendly housing. This is a gorgeous property that is safe and secure with sweeping views of the front range. I am looking forward to being your host and Colorado concierge. Thank you in advance.

name: Eric
about:
I'm a Colorado native who enjoys a diverse mix of people, music, culture, the city, and the outdoors. I love hosting guests who enjoy live and electronic music, skiing, sporting events, working professionals, conference and event guests or anyone who is passing through. I am welcoming and accommodating to any age group, race, sex, religion, political and social views (as long as you're a decent person), sexual orientation, etc., All are welcome in my house. My girlfriend and I have two medium size Shiba Inu's that are very well behaved. 420 friendly but we ask that you smoke tobacco outside. Jam band, Colfax Concerts, Red Rocks, Night Clubers, Burners )*( , Electronic, EDM, Art District and creative enthusiasts and standup comedy fans are welcome and encouraged. Sporting events guests in and out of state are always welcome. 

Private room with full furnishings. Shared space includes: kitchen and dining areas, living room with cable TV, and laundry room with large washer and dryer. Plenty of free street parking directly in front of the residence.

Located 20 miles from Denver International Airport, 30 seconds from bus routes (seriously), 6 miles from I-70, 1.5 miles from City Park and the Denver Museum of Nature and Science & IMAX Theater. The average Uber or Lyft rate to downtown Denver ranges from $8.00 - $12.00. Other close attractions and venues in a ten mile radius include: Denver Botanic Gardens, Cherry Creek shopping and art district, Sports Authority Field at Mile High, The Pepsi Center, Coors Field, RINO District, Santa Fe Art District, LoDo, The Buell Theatre, Bellco Theatre, The Denver Center for the Performing Arts, National Western Stock Show Complex, 16th Street Mall, Comedy Works (Downtown at Larimer Square), Fillmore Auditorium, Bluebird Theater, The Ogden Theatre, Paramount Theater, Beta Night Club, The Church, Club Vinyl, The Milk Bar, The 1up - Colfax, Lion's Lair., Heritage Square Music Hall, Swallow Hill Music, The Grizzly Rose, Meadowlark Bar, Dazzle Jazz, Jazz at Jacks, Larimer Lounge, Hi-Dive, Cervantes Masterpiece Ballroom, Mercury Cafe, Westword Music Showcase, Lannie's Clocktower Cabaret, Oriental Theater, The Soiled Dove Underground, Quixote's and many, many more. (The Gothic Theatre is 1.5 miles away and is one of my top 5 venues in the city).

name: Jacob
about: Just a regular guy that loves to travel.  I'm a Colorado native and I don't see myself moving out of state anytime soon.  However, I also love warm weather and the beach so I have to get out of town fairly often.

name: Dan
about: I live and work in the area as a Denver Fireman. I love this location as it is near downtown but much quieter. I chose to buy this unit as it is near everything but also close to the mountains.

name: Katharine
about:
Good day, travelers!  Welcome to my home!  I hope you enjoy it as much as I do. There are two upstairs bedrooms and a detached bathroom available.  We look forward to meeting you, and happy travels!

Look forward to meeting you!

Happy Travels,

Katharine

name: Lane
about:
I LOVE DENVER!  I've lived in this great city since 2000 and have chosen to raise my family here.  The lifestyle, being outdoors, the people, the beauty are all what make me appreciate this city and what I do so much.  

I can tell you where to eat, where to shop, where to drink, where to hang out, where to get outside...anything you need, just ask!

When I'm not hosting, selling real estate in Denver or having fun with my family, I am also traveling.  It's a passion that I'm sure we all share and I love getting to know new places and people.  I use Airbnb exclusively when I travel and have never been disappointed!

My life motto is:  Forget about your ego, forget about your pride and you will never have to compromise.

name: Dennis
about: fun funny always ready for a good laugh!!!

name: Josh
about: Filmmaker, Father, and now an Air BNB host too!  Looking forward to hosting your stay in my favorite city.

name: Kevin
about:
I work in real estate in Denver and have lived here for many years. I love showing people great neighborhood spots and am always happy to recommend a great restaurant or day trip. 

I love being outside, great food, travel, and live music.

name: Shaz
about:
I'm a very tame 30yr old advertising/creative guy.  

I travel a lot for work and leisure.  

I like making stuff.  All sortsa stuff.  With my hands, and with code.

I love a nicely designed clean minimal place, and people that enjoy the same.

Ideal guest would be similar to myself.  If it's two people, a nice calm couple would be best.  Not looking to host crazy partiers.

name: Pamela
about: My husband (educator and high school principal) and I (clinical social worker)  retired last year. After a life time in Iowa and 33 years in our home, we packed up and moved to Denver.  We rented a home for a few months and then bought this charming bungalow in NW Denver. One of our daughters and her family moved at the same time we did as she took a position with Visit Estes in Estes Park, CO.  We now have 4 grand children in the vicinity, two only two blocks away.  Our house is therefore kid proof and comes with a play room.  We have stayed in airbnb homes and apartments many times and found it our preferred way to vacation.  It always gives us a change to experience what it would be like to live in different places and spaces.  We would like to offer our home for others who are looking for a more affordable way to travel. Our home will easily accommodate families or several couples who are traveling together.  It would be spacious enough for family get togethers.   We like the personal experience and the connection with neighborhoods.  We love the local restaurants and bars, the little shops, and the people we have experienced here. We like good literature, art, learning, hiking, and all the out of doors we can fit into one day (especially my husband) . We also spend a lot of time in NYC and San Diego the cities where our other two children live and would love to trade homes with you if you are in those cities. We will be happy to help you in anyway to make your travel smooth and enjoyable.  See you soon.

name: Eryn And John
about:
Hi!
We're Eryn and John! We're renting our home as we travel around the world for work and play. John is a big wig in HR for a global cable company and Eryn is a freelance writer specializing in health, nutrition and sex. We both love music (playing and listening), travel (obviously), yoga and independent movies. John's addicted to Game of Thrones and Eryn watches 30 Rock reruns at any opportunity. 

We're avid sailors and have a 50ft catamaran available for charter in the Virgin Islands (hint, hint) we always spend our holidays on boats and love to explore the globe that way. You may notice the many sailing books lining our bookshelf next to intellectually accessible physics, travel guidebooks and classic fiction.

We're usually eating sushi. Or garlic anything - with hot sauce.

name: Matt And Mandy
about:
We are a typical Colorado couple.  We love all outdoor activities, namely snowboarding in the winter and hiking in the summer!  We have 2 gorgeous kids, Max and Chloe. 

Since we've started a family, our traveling has slowed down a bit but we are looking forward to our next trip to Bali in June!  We don't give Christmas presents to each other, rather we go somewhere cool and new to us every summer.

As hosts, we hope to create an environment that we would want to travel to.  Warm and cozy, but also functional.  We tend to choose a place that represents the area we are visiting.  We like to be within walking distance to the action but in a location that we can retreat to a quiet night alone too.

name: Nathan
about: I'm a real estate developer in Denver focusing on historic renovations and modern new builds of both residential and commercial properties in the downtown neighborhoods.

name: Susan
about: I was born and raised in Southern California and now live in Colorado.  My husband and I travel frequently between our home in Colorado and our vacation properties in Long Beach and Seattle.  We love both places immensely and hope you will too!

name: Colleen
about: My names Colleen, I've lived in Denver for four years now, originally from Iowa. I am currently applying to nursing schools, I work in a nursing home as a nurse aid and do work at Denver Health Hospital on the SICU floor.

name: Stacy
about: My husband and I live in Denver, CO with our dog. We enjoy traveling, hiking, anything outdoors, and checking out a new brewery or two!

name: Debra
about: I'm a kitchen and bath designer from Denver, Colorado and recently franchised a business model for the kitchen and bath remodel industry.   I have three grown children, two grand children and two very loyal, aging Vizslas.  This is my personal home (when I am not off sailing!) so you'll find everything you need for a comfortable, quality stay.

name: Robin
about: A Denver native, I love the outdoor activities Colorado has to offer. I enjoy running and cycling (albeit slowly). I'm in love with my two greyhounds, and sometimes foster newly retired racing greyhounds.  My husband Charles and I enjoy hosting dinner parties a few times a year and grilling in the back yard. We also enjoy visiting local museums, scrapbooking, and reading. I travel every chance I get, even for a weekend. We're non-smokers and enjoy a couple drinks occasionally. We generally keep to ourselves, but enjoy meeting people from around the world.

name: Minda
about: I am a student in my last year of graduate school for Physical Therapy. When I'm not busy studying I am skiing, hiking, biking, or running in the mountains. I love my family, friends, and Denver! I love to go out and go crazy some nights, while other nights I'd rather curl up on the couch and watch a movie! I have a cute terrier-poodle dog named Truffle and she is my child! I am usually happy and usually making plans to do something.

name: Lyndell
about: Elementary school teacher, education writer, and Cuddle Party facilitator, full of wit, charm, and warm hugs.

name: Lola
about:
Hello, And thank you for viewing my space. I live in Denver and have a  great Condo overlooking Bear Creek reserve. Your Home away from Home! Tastefully decorated, it is like a hotel suite  Guests have loved my  space and you will too. If you have a need for temporary housing or for a vacation, let's talk.. 

When I travel, I use Airbnb and love it. I treat others space as I want mine to be treated, with respect.

I look forward to meeting you as a guest in my home or a host. 

Regards,
Lola

name: Victoria
about: Hi! We are Victoria and Mike.  Victoria hails from all over and Mike from Kansas.  We are married with 2 small children.  We both moved to Denver after college and have loved living here.  It's an incredible town with so much to offer.  We love to travel and have family scattered all over the world.  Our favorite places, other than Denver,  include South Africa, Europe, New Zealand, Hawaii, and really anyplace there is good company to visit with :)

name: Barry
about: Easy going young professional, always on the move and ready to have fun.  Living in Colorado, we have access to some of the best camping, skiing, snowboarding and food in the country, and I love to take advantage of all of them!  Staying in our place you will always feel welcome and fully accommodated.  Welcome!

name: Taylor
about: My name is Taylor, I grew up in Southern California and now live in Denver. I live with my boyfriend of 3 years, our 6 month old golden retriever Kennedy and our 2 cats. We both like to snowboard on the weekends and fix up vintage mopeds!

name: Ben
about: I am just your basic millennial, trying to see the world and all of its beauty. I am a Wisconsin graduate and now in graduate school at the University of Denver. I suppose the motto I have sort of lived by for a while now is do unto others and you would want done unto you, and my treatment of another's home is an extension of this. I use Airbnb for both hosting and staying at others' places; I don't think I'll use hotels again!

name: Allie
about:
Marketing gal living in Denver's Historic Baker neighborhood, just 10 minutes from downtown. I love my baby boy, my husband, my puggle and traveling. I'm on a quest to start living more simply so that my family and I can experience more, see more, do more. I also work as a Social Media Specialist and love being able to work from wherever I can. 

We also host our charming home on AirBnb! We're excited to open our entire home to people who want to explore Denver or need a place to stay during a conference or wedding that won't break the budget. We're pretty hands-off hosts and will make sure you have everything you need before you arrive so we can leave the place to you. Our neighborhood is wonderful - truly a great place to be to meet the Denver locals.

name: Evin And Barry
about: I am a holistic nutritionist, yogi, and fitness trainer living in Denver, CO.

name: Nanci
about: I am a mother of three children. Our family lives in Denver, Colorado. We are very active and love to ski. One daughter attends Carleton College, another daughter attends Harvard, and our son is still in high school. My husband is an architect. I am a volleyball coach for middle school and high school girls. I also still play volleyball. We use to live in Jackson but decided to move back to Colorado. We have 4 exchange students live in our home. They were from Hong Kong, Germany, Brazil and Saudi Arabia. We love traveling, sailing and people. Another one of our favorite place is Nantucket! We also have a place on Nantucket too, if you are interested in renting there!

name: Sara
about:
Born and raised in beautiful Colorado. Footloose and fancy around the world.

I enjoy travel, festivals, second hand shopping, outdoor adventures, food, camping, stylish places and spaces, music, art, supporting local businesses, third world countries and more. 

Having traveled to over 40 countries and living on 5 continents, I have experienced hospitality in many forms and I'm thrilled to be able to share my home and reciprocate the experience in the place I call my home.

name: Claytonious
about:
Hey all,

My name's Clayton.  I'm a life coach, entrepreneur and love living in Downtown Denver.  It's my favorite city so far!  

I'm into yoga, gymnastics, and wine. :)

name: Dennis
about: I have traveled the world and consider myself a renaissance man. I love to travel and get to know new people. I am very clean and considerate of others time. I am also a born entrepreneur.

name: Rita
about: It's all in the details!  I am an artist at heart and love spending my time decorating, gardening and creating relaxing and peaceful spaces around my home.  I work from home several days a week so if you are visiting there is a good chance we will cross paths!  I love to travel both in the US and abroad and am quite comfortable finding my way around new places.

name: Maggie
about:
Hi all!  I'm a teacher and during my summers I like to adventure around this beautiful world of ours!  I'll be heading to Turkey and Greece this summer as well as a few other destinations state-side!  I love good food, a strong margarita, and friends to play with!  

My life motto is work hard, be kind, and savor this amazing life you're given!

name: Jen
about:
"Not all those who wander are lost" 
I am a professional, who works to live!  I love to travel, music (played violin, piano & a bit of guitar), photography, garden & cook.  I especially love spending time by the ocean, hence my beach-themed bedroom, and travel as much as possible.

name: Ivan
about:
Economics graduate from the University of Colorado at Boulder, currently living and working from home in Denver CO. Avid traveler,  spent the summer of 2013 traveling through south and central america (Costa Rica, Nicaragua, Ecuador and Panama). Also traveled in Europe for 6 months during 2014, using Barcelona as my base. I am very respectful and caring person, non-smoker, eager to learn about others and enjoy life. 

I enjoy mountain biking, motorcycle riding, watching movies, spending time with friends and Mexican food. My favorite place in the world so far is Maui, Hawaii. Favorite movies are Vanilla Sky and Motorcycle Diaries. I enjoy music by Paolo Nutini, John Mayer, Alejandro Sanz, Zoe, Alicia Keys, Damien Rice, Romeo Santos, The Fray, Snow Patrol and Jason Mraz to name a few. 

I like to remind myself that I will never experience a moment in the exact time and way twice so it's best to fully live every moment and think positive.

name: Ryan
about:
Melissa and I are business owners who recently moved from NYC to be closer to family and the mountains.

We love to travel. Over the years and during our travels we have enjoyed the hospitality of kind and generous people all over the world. Now that we have a home, we'd like to contribute to the tradition.

name: Matt
about: I'm a pro handshaker and host of the Handshakin Video Series.  See my (EMAIL HIDDEN) if you're interested in entrepreneurship!  Also, #hiking #microbrews #guitar

name: Troyann
about:
I am a young professional with an active lifestyle. I am a University Professor of Counseling . I love teaching and training young counselors. In my free-time I travel the world, eat good food, drink good wine, hang out with great people and enjoy the outdoor paradise Colorado has to offer.

Throughout my travels around the world, I have met many people who have opened up their homes to me and I would like to do the same. I know first hand how the comfort of 'home' contributes to a much better travel experience. My house is your house, I want for you to feel comfortable and I will do my best to ensure you feel like family.

name: Colette
about: Joe and I are usually outdoors when we are not working. Sitting on the front  porch, riding our bikes or up in the mountains.  If you hear music it's usually Soul or Old Rock-n-roll. We are both very social, but also respectful of people's privacy too.  You want recommendations for restaurants, we have a lot of suggestions.  You want a micro-beer there is a ton of pubs in Denver.

name: Charlie
about: I've done some pretty extensive traveling of the globe in my time, and have always enjoyed meeting people of all types.  Today I find myself in my house with too much space, and thought it would be nice to host some others now that I have the opportunity to do so.  I'm personable and outgoing, enjoy the outdoors and everything Denver and Colroado have to offer, and have some great insight on our amazing city if you need a recommendation or two.  Looking forward to meeting some quality people...

name: Stephen
about: I'm a data consultant, love everything outdoors, have a super cute chocolate lab and i love showing off the awesome city of Denver

name: Gretchen
about: I'm helping my 96 year old grandmother, Charlotte, rent her home to help pay for her assisted living costs. She lived in this house for 85 years and it was really hard for her to leave but we're all relieved that her home can serve her even when she can't live there anymore. Charlotte loved to ski, hike, camp and be outdoors. She is a woman ahead of her time and old fashioned at the same time. She's kind and sweet and loving and we hope that you'll enjoy staying in her home, I know she is glad to host you.

name: Chris
about: I live in Denver, Co and started using Airbnb while traveling around the world for 6 months. I will never forget the people I met and the places I stayed while discovering the world and myself in it.  So why stop just because I'm home?  I'm still curious and love connecting with people who come into my life.  Feeling healthy is very important to me- and yes, sometimes indulgance is the healthy choice.

name: Devin
about:
I am a graduate of University of Colorado in Business Administration emphasis in MGMT and MKTG. Denver is my home but I spent lots of time living and traveling abroad.  Mostly in Western Europe (french minor), Australia, and throughout the  Caribbean.  I am a mother of two boys. The simple things in life are what matter most. I spend my days with my children, partner, and pets (2 dogs and 1 cat). I am an avid reader of paranormal romance, healthy living books, and the classics. 

I can't live without my herbs (culinary), vegetable garden, yoga, and daily run. 

As a host I am pretty laid back. I welcome you to feel comfortable and make this your home. I ask you clean up behind yourself, wash dishes, and help yourself to the toiletries. 

If you would like to know anything else feel free to ask. 

My life motto is to live well, be kind, and love often!

name: Jamie
about: I love gardening, and spending time with my family and dog, and am a certified sommelier.  I love Denver, and my neighborhood in particular, and love to see others enjoy it.

name: Elizabeth
about:
I love Denver and everything it has to offer, and I am excited to share it with you. I am often busy and like to leave my guests with privacy, but I am always open to chat. I work as a personal chef and like to spend my time outside or out on the town. 

I love hosting guests and want to make you as comfortable as possible.

name: Corie
about: I (Jason) am a Colorado Native from Sedalia and have enjoyed living in Wash Park for 15 years.  I own a bar about a mile away, Dive Inn and a Restaurant in the Golden Triangle neighborhood, Dulce Vida.  Corie, my girlfriend, is from Mississippi and moved to Denver in 2009.  We absolutely love this neighborhood and all of the charm that it brings.  We stay pretty busy with the businesses but love traveling when we are able and we enjoy spending time in the park playing a good game of volleyball with friends.

name: Ev
about: I'm a kind & generous person. I have a good sense of humor, & love to laugh & have fun! I'm a pretty good cook; we have a big organic garden with lots of herbs, veggies, & 3 fruit trees! My specialty? Orange, yellow, & green heirloom tomato pasta sauce with roasted garlic, pine nuts, basil out of my garden! Way yummy! 5 things I can't live without are: my Honey Bunny of a Husband, our 2 kitties,  fishing at our cabin in the mountains, & our famous "shrimp on the bar-b" annual summer shindig! I really enjoy hosting for Airbnb! I really take care of my guests. They are greeted with a basket of goodies:  2 or 3 kinds of organic fruit, non GMO popcorn, Lindor truffles, gourmet coffee & teas, & organic half& half in the fridge! Please join us in our home, you'll always be welcome!

name: Sally
about:
Denver native, recently back after 2.5 years in Alaska. Attended CU-Boulder. Graduated with a double major in geography and environmental science. 

I enjoy skiing, live music, gardening, baking and cooking. I attend the Great American Beer Festival as a volunteer annually and I am a veteran Red Rocks concert attendee.
