I have a 12 year old loving black lab, Ricky Martin, and twin 4.5 year old niece and nephew that I love to spend time with. I am a passionate recycler. I take a lot of pride in creating a comfortable home and look forward to sharing it with you!

name: Will
about:
I'm a well traveled Colorado native, and I appreciate a hot shower and a warm bed while I'm traveling as much as the next wanderluster. I work in Denver full time as a software engineer, and when I'm not hard at work coding, I like to spend as much time as possible in the CO sunshine.

If you don't already know how you'd like to spend your time in CO, please feel free to hit me up for advice. Denver is a very happening town, and there is no shortage of things to do, on any kind of budget.

I am a strong proponent of our progressive marijuana laws here in Colorado, so if you're looking for any guidance while you're here, I'm happy to help you out with that as well.

name: Shannon
about: Hi! Thanks for booking with me. I'm a Denver native- outgoing and laid back. If you need anything, let me know!

name: Cynthia
about: I'm from the Black Hills of South Dakota so I love all outdoor activities.  Love travel, good food and good friends.

name: Erin
about: Howdy!  I'm a flexible traveler and host with a focus on enjoying whatever experience comes my way.  My parents live in the upstairs apartment of this listing and are my partner hosts.  My step dad can't wait to make you muffins and help with directions around town.  He is especially astute in providing recommendations on bike rides and my mom can fill you in on the latest exhibit at the Denver Art Museum.  I live four blocks away with my husband and our three young kids.  Our favorite way to travel is by ski in the winter and by camper in the summer.  We look forward to meeting you!

name: Nicole
about: Owner of BookBar and BookBed, long time resident of Denver. Excited to share my neighborhood and my store with authors and book lovers.

name: Christiaan
about:
Hey, I am a self employed photographer and web designer.  I am very happy to meet new people because everyone has a story.  Musically I am into pretty much everything except for bluegrass and country.  I love all different types of food.

My roommate, Graci is 21 years old, and is a medical student.

As a host, I am gracious and welcoming you into my life for a day or a couple of days or even weeks.  I always have fresh towels for you.  I have HD Cable with HBO and Encore, that you are welcome to, as well as being centrally located.  Downtown Denver (where the skyscrapers are) is a 30 minute walk, as is Cherry Creek.

I love paranormal shows, spirituality is very important to me.  If I can do anything to make your stay more enjoyable, please don't hesitate to ask.  If you are unsure about something, please let me know.  If you have special needs for the room, again, please let me know.  Good communication makes for a great adventure!

name: Mark
about: I am a musician and a chef, which has me traveling a fair amount. My fiancé Sascha and I also love to host people at our house in Denver, CO.

name: Sky
about: Musician, Entrepreneur, Workaholic. Lover of life. Born and raised in WA, VA, MD, UT, CA and CO.

name: Jenna
about: I am a registered nurse. I love to explore new places, run, hike, and meet new people. I am a former travel nurse, and fell in love with the culture and mountains of Colorado!

name: Ashley
about:
Lived in the city of Denver for many years and have been contributing, volunteering, and helping our city. I love the freedoms we share in Denver and enjoy the outdoors. I enjoy spending time with my family taking them to events throughout Colorado. We enjoy the Denver aquarium, Elitch Gardens, the Denver Zoo and Botanic gardens just to name a few. Love Postmates, Uber and enjoy technology.

We have traveled around the world England, France, Bahrain, Saudia Arabia, Malaysia, Thailand and Singapore to name some. I enjoyed the experiences of food and culture. I believe in good karma and believe with good energy it can be passed to good people. That is my life Motto. We love to have have you as our guests and welcome you to the great city of Denver. If you have any needs I will be more than happy to make accommodations. Rest assured and thank you again.

name: Andy
about: Hi, I'm Andy and I live with my dog Sheena.  I'm an early thirties professional who works at various stadiums in Denver.  I tend to be very busy between work and fun (lots of snowboarding, hiking, biking, camping, that kind of stuff).  Sheena is a 7 year old Australian cattle dog mix that is blind, and lazy.

name: Wendy
about: As Denver natives, we are excited for you to make our loft your home base to enjoy all that Denver and the surrounding area has to offer!

name: Marcie
about: I've lived in Denver for most of my life and Damon came to attend college 20+ years ago and never left. Clearly we both love this city! We especially love living in such a hip, urban neighborhood like Lohi. We are foodies who enjoy the local restaurants and bars and we love that we can walk just about anywhere we need to go. We absolutely love our house and our guesthouse. It's often referred to as our "private little Garden of Eden" by our guests and we agree. We love hosting people in our guesthouse, and look forward to meeting travelers and helping them feel as comfortable and at home as possible while in Denver. We're a great resource for where to eat, who has the best happy hour, or what to do and see in Denver. We also love traveling and getting to know the people from all over the world. We're heavily involved in the ever-changing real estate market in Denver, both buying and selling and as home builders. If you're coming to Denver with hopes of moving here we'll be happy to show you around!

name: Laura
about:
A few of my favorite things... coffee and a good book, snowboarding, hiking, running in the rain, teaching, traveling and finding hidden places. 

I am relaxed and easy going. My favorite type of travel is when there are no set plans or agenda but so many possibilities. My life motto is "Let it Be."

I am excited to become a host and share all of the wonderful things that my city and neighborhood have to offer. I love meeting new people and helping them to explore new places. I hope that you enjoy my space!

name: Beth
about: Hello and welcome  to Denver!   I run a local non-profit.   Travel is one of my greatest passions and I have visited 28 countries.  I enjoy yoga and tennis.  I have two children that are well behaved and sometimes they may be here or not.   We also have a kitty cat.  I am pretty easy going and have flexible work hours  so sometimes I am available to have a cup of tea with my guests -- We have hosted many people from the states and from around the world and enjoy hearing their stories and about their cities Life Motto: Live in the Present Moment

name: Marina
about: I'm a part- time teacher and part- time student.  Love being outside and love living in Denver.  My favorite part about traveling is meeting new people and practicing new languages.

name: Eliza
about: It's such a gift to explore new places. I take advantage of any opportunity to travel and have met such great people along the way.

name: Carly
about: Colorado State University graduate. Travel for work often and happy to share my condo with other travelers!

name: Maekala
about: I love plants and the great outdoors. I love to cook and love to host! I can't live without... Good Food, Good (live) Music, Hiking, Good Wine and Chapstick! I'm currently all about traveling "locally". I'm from Oklahoma and live in CO so I'm all about exploring Colorado and all it has to offer. I'm doing a lot of camping...

name: Patrick & I Am Michele (Brother/Sister)
about:
Brother Sister Team, Patrick and Michele, are both Colorado natives. Patrick and Michele are extroverts that love to experience new people and places. We both love outdoor recreation, sports, global affairs, film, and conversation. 

Since neither of our jobs allows us to travel right now, we're excited to welcome other travelers into our family home.

name: Justin
about: Born and Raised in Hawaii, I moved to Denver for college and didn't want to leave.  Now I work in design/purchasing for hotels.  I'm probably traveling for work if you're staying at my place. Enjoy!

name: Kirsten
about: I am a Physician Assistant student from Kansas City, MO. I currently live in Denver, CO with my boyfriend, David, who works in health IT. We love to travel, and always looking forward to the next adventure.

name: Kristen
about: I am a Nebraska native that grew up on a cattle ranch, but I love living here in the big city of Denver! I love traveling the world, experiencing new cultures (especially through food and music), and horses and the sport of rodeo are my passion. (If you are interested in riding lessons during your stay, don't hesitate to ask! I offer a discount to renters :) )

name: Jenna
about:
We are a married couple in our mid-30's, Jenna from Chicago and Ben from Iowa, but have lived in Denver, CO for the last 10 years.  We got married in 2013 and do not have kids yet, but do have a lovable Labrador named Zengo.  

We love to travel all over the world, explore new places, and get to know the people who are from those places so we can get an inside look instead of just a tourists view.  While traveling, we do like to make the most of our time and tend to be on the go quite a bit, so our resting place usually is just used for sleep, showers/getting ready, and to hold our things.  We would like to welcome you into our home in Denver as well so we can share travel stories, and give you tips on what to do in our amazing city and state!    

Favorite travel destinations: Australia, Greece, Spain, Vancouver & Whistler, Seattle, California
Other favorites:  Photography is my hobby, snowboarding is my passion, and food and wine are the highlights of many trips

name: Eric
about: I'm a young professional living in the Denver area. I work in the banking industry as a Branch Manager in the Broomfield market. Other than work, I enjoy hiking, camping, snowboarding, the social scene, and spending time with the wonderful people I surround myself with!

name: Eric
about: I always wanted to live in Colorado and have been here for 10 years. You can't beat the weather, friendly people, and easy access to the mountains. I enjoy skiing, playing soccer, riding bikes, and good microbreweries.

name: Dani
about:
Avid world traveler and photographer. 

Love to explore new places!

name: Julia
about:
I'm a midwestern transplant who has landed in Denver and doesn't intend to leave! I work in international development, so have traveled a lot for school, work and pleasure. I listen to a lot of music and a lot of NPR. I sing in a bluegrass "band" that plays funny covers and never intends to play in public. I love riding my bike and can't live without good coffee! I am a cook and a baker, a yogi and a camper. I appreciate the work hard, play hard attitude of Coloradoans and embrace it fully! I haven't gotten into downhill skiing (yet?) but love other forms of winter adventuring. I'm a sister to two siblings and a first-time aunt to a fabulous little nephew. My family is super important to me, as is my Denver community. I'm excited to meet you and to help you love Denver as much as I do–whether for one day or as you settle in for the long haul here!

Oh, I also recently adopted a sweet pup! She's a 2.5 year old husky/malamute/mutt mix, and she will give you lots of love if you let her!

name: Mark
about:
I am a stay-at-home dad, or "chief home officer" as my wife likes to joke.  She travels a ton for work, which is why we came to love AirBnB!  We have 2 young children and love living in Colorado.  We love to ski, bike, travel, and generally be outside as much as humanly possible.  

We love our little home in Denver! It's close enough to everything to be just perfect.

name: Ana
about: A Colorado native who loves to travel. I enjoy time with my family, fine dining, and fashion.

name: Desiree
about: I tour the city of Denver that I love. Secondly, i work hard and enjoy meeting new people. I love hosting others and sharing new interests. I'm all for a good movie or checking out the art scene.

name: The Clark Family-Southern Hospitality
about: WE ARE OFFERING comfortable  rooms in a warm home minutes from the DIA, LoDo, Colorado Health Center, and the Denver Tech Center.

name: Jason
about: I enjoy traveling and exploration; mountain climbing and the outdoors. I work in the medical field as a Medical Physicist in Radiation Oncology. I have been living in Denver for about 16 years. I like mountaineering quite a bit and have climbed the highest mountain on 3 continents. I love to see and experience different cultures and beautiful landscapes. In 2012, I married Vibeke, and we are happily living in central Denver and enjoy cooking and the outdoors together.

name: John
about:
I appreciate people and all the experiences they share. 
While I am relatively new to Airbnb I am a seasoned traveller. My favorite area of the world is East Asia, and as such I have developed a taste for the food. 
Please let me know if you have questions about the local cuisine in downtown Denver, everything is in walking distance and I have plenty of recommendations.

name: Debbie
about:
Active Colorado native and urban farmer.  Knows where to get great eats and good exercise.

No pets.  But lots of garden.  : )

name: Thomas
about: Running in the mornings, Sushi happy hours, Marathons on all 7 continents, Reading business biography's, Business and capitalism, Traveling with no itinerary, Canoe camping.

name: Bell'SKeeper
about:
Bell's Keeper is the newest thing in vacation rental property management. Serving the Mile High city of Denver, our management team transforms your property into a successful vacation rental hot spot.

Our team will remove all obstacles owners faces managing their property while providing them with peace of mind.  

About the Owner Bell:
I am French Canadian native and I have been living in Denver since 1999. Needless to say I love the weather and the great skiing that Colorado has to offer.

I love unique designs and buildings and started loving sharing my places on Airbnb and decided to help other owners be successful. I started (URL HIDDEN) in 2015.

I am passoniate about traveling and Airbnb helped me do just that and now I am sharing my success with others.

Bell -

name: Emma
about: We (Dan and Emma) simply LOVE living in sunny Denver, Colorado! We capitalize on our location close to the city every single day by biking or walking to festivals, concerts, ball games, and much more, but on the weekends, the mountains often call us away for snow boarding, hiking, and camping. During the week, Dan is a software engineer for Denver Public Schools and Emma works in disability policy advocacy and as a yoga teacher. Though we love living in Denver, our wanderlust has taken us all over the world. We love to travel and host other travelers. Some of our favorite spots include Costa Rica (where we got married), Nicaragua, Thailand, and Indonesia (where we honeymooned), among many other great places. I think most of our friends would describe us as fun, outgoing, and always looking for a new adventure, good food, and interesting conversation!

name: Maureen
about: Carlos and I have both lived in Denver for over 10 years and we love this city. We have 3 dogs and you will often find us at a local restaurant/bar, the park or even just in the backyard spending time with the pups. We enjoy the outdoors and we love the easy access to skiing and hiking that Denver provides as well as the young, active, friendly vibe of the people here. We look forward to meeting travelers and helping them feel as comfortable and at home as possible here in Denver. We also love traveling and really getting to know the areas that we visit including the people and culture of new cities. Airbnb provides a way to immediately immerse yourself in a new place and we love that.

name: Chris
about: Born in Washington DC, grew up in Virginia, studied at Trinity College, Dublin, and now living in Denver, Colorado. I play music and am trying to become better at cooking. I like dogs.

name: Sally
about: Oregon native, current Coloradoan, elementary school principal, nature lover, avid traveler.

name: Victoria
about: Colorado-loving east coast transplant. I love the awesome food, wine, beer, music and arts scene we have in Denver now (wasn't the case 12 years ago when I moved here). This is a spectacular place to live and visit. Welcome!

name: Jessica
about: I am originally from upstate NY but moved to CO to enjoy the blue, sunny skies.   My job is great in that I get to do what I went to school for.  Living in the city, I want to be part of the community and enjoy working in the yard.  My husband and I are working on cultivating a haven in the house and yard, BUT both are a work in progress.  Weekends are when we recharge.

name: Jamesson & Gillian
about:
Jamesson and I have been married for 3 years- Jamesson is originally from Trujillo, Peru and I am a true Denver native.  Our dog Moche is the official watchdog of the house, but truthfully, the only watching he does is out the front window and for treats.  He likes to snuggle, so if you're feeling glum and just need some cuddle time with a furry friend, he's your man.

We feel travel is made richer through relationships so we love opening up our home to people, learning about people and their stories, but will give you as much space as you need to enjoy your stay and feel comfortable.

name: Lindsey
about: I'm a born-and-raised Chicago girl, who feels so lucky to live in the heart of such an amazing city.  I'm a mechanical-engineer-turned-interior-designer by trade, but love almost all things athletic/outdoorsy outside of work.  I regularly lead cooking programs at local youth shelters in the city, I'm an avid volunteer for the American Cancer Society, and you can always find me training for some type of running race.  I have an abnormal obsession with mac&cheese, I think it's unnatural that spiders have so many legs, and my favorite color is pink.

name: Lauren
about:
I love exploring the great outdoors, watching and playing sports, and cooking and eating all types food. I love traveling whenever I get the chance, and learning about cultures and language. Some things I can't live without would be my family, my journal, music, and books. 

“Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us, or we find it not."

name: Liz
about: Liz

name: Shauna
about: I love to travel and explore.  Backpacking, hiking, and yoga are my favorite pass times.  I enjoy good food and cooking.  I have experience using Airbnb far longer than I have had an account of my own from traveling with friends.  I enjoy the Airbnb community, both traveling and hosting!

name: Jordan
about: My fiancée  and I are 27 years old, and into traveling, music, art, outdoor sports, and having fun. We are both easygoing people who enjoy meeting new people and seeing new places. We are great hosts, quiet, clean, and friendly. I have lived in Denver all of my life, and I know a lot about the city, as well as great spots to go. I am happy to help with directions, restaurants, night life suggestions, etc. We look forward to your stay with us.

name: Christopher
about: From LA, livin in Denver for the past 2 years.

name: Emeline
about: I am originally from France but I am currently living in beautiful Colorado. I love the outdoors, and I enjoy even better a day climbing outside with good friends! I try to catch any opportunity I have to travel, experience different cultures and different horizons.

name: Jonathan
about: I'm a professional in my mid-30's.  I'm a cyclist and a fan of the many craft breweries around Denver.  I'm knowledgeable on the area and my goal is to make your stay at my place as pleasant as possible.  I DON'T HAVE ANY CHILDREN, although I do have friends over occasionally who do have them. I'm enjoy sitting around and chatting, but I'm not looking for a new best friend from AirBNB….generally you do your thing and I do my thing.

name: Jesse
about: I'd describe myself as friendly, respectful, fun, adventurous, and adaptable. An veteran mountain biker, snowboarder, and an avid concert/music buff. As a Colorado native, being in the outdoors is what I love. I am a professional in the technology industry and work to play.. I love to travel as much as possible, which my job fortunately allows me to do more than usual.

name: Tony
about: From Boulder, CO. Nurse Practitioner living and working in Colorado. Clean, tidy, personable, non-smoker. Loves cats and dogs. Hablo Español.

name: Jeanne
about:
We live in Colorado and enjoy the outdoors.  We love to hike, ski, swim, garden, camp, and cook.  We travel as much as possible and usually end up in the Yucatan or the Colorado mountains.  Denver and the Rockies are spectacular and keeps getting better year after year. 
 
Our house has been in our family for two generations, and will someday be passed down to our children.  In the mean time we are enjoying sharing it with our guests and hope that you decide to give it a try.  It really is in the perfect location, close to everything and easily accessible to the mountains.  Se Habla Espanol.

Live, Laugh, Love!

name: Jessica
about: I'm a 26 year old female who enjoys concerts, snowboarding and anything outdoors.  My roommate and I are super laid back and are always down to meet new people or help people out with a convenient place to stay.

name: Will
about:
My wife and I are Colorado Natives with a love for all things outdoors.  We enjoy hiking, biking, snow skiing in the winter, water skiing in the summer and taking advantage of all this wonderful city has to offer.    We also enjoy traveling... a lot... which is why our house is available for others to enjoy so frequently. We see traveling as a way to understand and explore cultures and people different from your own, and try to expose ourselves to as many places as possible.

We've lived in the Highlands area of Denver for the last 6 years and have seen the neighborhood be transformed into a thriving, alive and hip part of the city.  We feel incredibly fortunate to have found such a rare property that combines the characer of an old colonial house with a lot that makes you feel like you're living in the middle of a park, all so close to downtown.  We can't wait to share Chateau Tejon with you!

name: Matthew
about: Recently married Denverite.  My wife and I love travel, good food, good music, and good friends.

name: Amy
about: Climber. Yogi. Diver. Lover of music, sea and the great outdoors.

name: Collin
about: I'm a 20 something graphic designer working, living and loving in the city. Like many Coloradans I take my craft beer seriously, and good weather gratefully.  I started hosting on Airbnb so I could work a bit less and live a bit more. My place is quite reflective of me; eclectic, artistic, friendly, and vibrant.

name: Mike
about:
I love Colorado and everything it has to offer. My girlfriend (Rachel) and I have been together for 5 years and enjoy the outdoors very much. I love to mountain bike and ski and Rachel is an ultra runner. I have owned the house since 1997 and have remodeled the entire house and love to projects to make the place even better. 

We love to travel, and try to get away for long weekends when we don't have time for for the "big" vacations. Sometimes there's just too much fun right here in Denver with friends!

We are new to Airbnb, but have always had renters downstairs. We thought this would be a great way to meet new people and still have the flexibility for extra room when family and friends are in town.

name: Ryan
about: I recently finished my master's degree in international relations. I'm currently doing short term contract work for an NGO in Thailand while trying to start a business in Denver, Colorado. I've lived in Thailand, Australia, and Chile and have traveled extensively on six continents. I enjoy being active outdoors, exploring new breweries, and sharing experiences with people whether old friends or new travel friends.

name: Chad
about: Hi! We're Chad and Amy, the owners of Live Love Lash in Denver, Colorado. The location of our space is too amazing not to share, so come visit us in the heart of Cherry Creek and experience Denver's finest.

name: Carolyn
about: I'm a globetrotter, skier, yogi, nature lover, rock climber and over all "typical Denverite." There can also never be too much music and dancing for me.  I am excited to try Airbnb and to meet fellow travelers.

name: Krista
about:
Hello! My name is Krista and I am a native Coloradan. They still exist! I grew up near Denver and attended college in Boulder, and then lived in Sweden, Sydney and San Francisco before coming back to the place I will always call home!

I am an entrepreneur and own a start-up in Denver. I love the challenge of creating new things and working with people who are inspired to do the same. 

I love to stay fit and healthy and am currently training for a marathon. I also adore hiking 14ers, yoga, lifting weights, snowboarding and mountain biking.

I am social and tend to be out and about a lot, but I try to give my guests all the advice they need on what to do and see in Colorado. When you are here, my home is your home. Feel free to use laundry, the kitchen, the gym, the relaxing outdoor living room in the backyard, or just enjoy a cup of coffee or tea in the garden out front. I serve coffee, tea and a DIY breakfast bar in the mornings so you can get your days off to a great start without having to leave home! 

Looking forward to meeting you and helping you have a wonderful time in Denver.

name: Kathryn
about: I love to travel to new places and experience all they have to offer.  By the end of the year I will have visited at least 9 of our amazing National Parks.  You could say visiting the parks is my new obsession.  Hiking, skiing, reading, movies, and football (both college and NFL) are some of my favorite hobbies. I can talk about the Arkansas Razorbacks and Denver Broncos all day!  I love to try new breweries whenever I can.  Most people find me pretty fun loving and laid back.  Most importantly I'm always up for a new adventure!

name: Jeremiah
about: East coast transplant, lived in Colorado about 8 years, 3 in the mountains and 5 in Denver.  I love all things mountains have to offer and never want to be to far away from them.

name: Mike
about:
I love to travel, mostly internationally. I'm a constant explorer. I'm most happy when I'm in the mountains or reading a book. or reading a book on top of a mountain;)

Love the connection of airbnb.

name: Marie
about: We (my husband and I) are clean friendly and are willing to accommodate your needs. Denver can be expensive and we are right near the heart of the city and right next to the sports authority stadium and 5 minutes to downtown. Private room and private bathroom with a queen size bed and futon to accommodate up to 4 people, there are separate rooms in the apartment that people can book for .  We would love to have you as our guest any and all welcome. We are pet friendly with cats and dogs under 10lbs ,please no big dog's no matter how well behaved they are the apartment complex won't allow them, If you have any questions feel free to ask , also there is a pool on the property and gym see you soon.

name: Jacqueline
about: I'm a professional, originally from the New York City area.  I moved to Colorado last year and I'm loving it so far. I enjoy hiking, swimming, skiing, good food, and all things french.  I love traveling and wish I had time to do more of it. I've been very lucky in life and have gotten to take a few long trips (France/Spain/Italy, Australia/New Zealand, SE Asia (principally Thailand and Laos).

name: Cathy
about: I love Colorado and all that this great state has to offer. I moved here in 2007 being drawn by the mountains and my passion for skiing and outdoor activities. Denver is a great base by which to explore and has something for everyone. Right away I chose the Highlands neighborhood to live for its access to great restaurants and nightlife, downtown, and all major highways to easily get to the mountains or the airport.

name: Andrea
about: A Denver native, I enjoy cooking and conversation, a good movie and a good book. I love spending time outdoors, meeting new people and drinking good coffee and good wine!

name: Aubrey
about:
I am a born and raised Midwesterner residing in the beautiful state of Colorado.  I am an ambitious entrepreneur, happy city dweller and wandering spirit.  Some of my favorite things include hiking, white water rafting, dancing, dinner out with friends, Sunday morning brunch, road trips, patio happy hours, lazy weekend afternoons spent on the couch with my cat and a glass of chardonnay, and world travels.  
My current top 5 travel wish list is: #1) Istanbul #2) Vietnam #3)Spain  #4) Portugal  #5) London
My two, all time favorite, travel destinations are: Paris and Kaui.

I look forward to sharing my love of Denver with any and all visitors who are looking for a travel adventure of their very own! Welcome to my humble abode!

name: Ariel
about: Hello! I am originally from Pennsylvania, and moved here in 2004 to join AmeriCorps where I was a public health doula in the local hospitals. Denver quickly felt like home and here I am 12 years later. When I'm not working, I pack my days/nights with gardening, concocting meals, playing with my backyard chickens and working on whatever random project comes my way.

name: Mark
about: Single male. Easy going.  Three adult kids. Not living with me. Happy to educate you about Denver, restaurants, bars and getting around.

name: Corey
about: Hello! I'm Corey, a young professional born and raised in Denver. I'm a pilot for the airlines and always enjoy meeting new people and going new places. Love the outdoors and enjoy staying active.

name: Sheila
about: Active, I travel a lot for business and pleasure, thus having my house available for bookings.  I enjoy all that Colorado has to offer for year-round outdoor activities.  Come and stay and also enjoy this great state!

name: Kevin
about:
We live in Denver and enjoy the many things the area has to offer - the outdoors, the beer, skiing, meeting new people. 

We also love to travel and while experiencing new cities, we've learned how important it is to have a great and affordable place to stay.

name: Joel
about: We invite you to join us as soon as this weekend here at the Lumber Baron.

name: Andi
about:
I'm a Tasmanian woman who has been living and working in Colorado for the past seven years, running my own business which I do from home or (luckily) from anywhere in the world with an internet connection.  

I had a five year stint living in London in my early 20s and have a great network of mates around the world who I visit and host as often as possible.  I kind of feel like I've been unofficially AirBnB'ing since before this service existed :)  

I love travel more than anything else really, and do a lot of it for work and pleasure, which leaves my homes in Colorado and Tasmania open for guests.  I think that AirBnB might just be the best invention ever as it encourages and enables more people to get out and about in the crazy beautiful world!  

I hope visitors who stay in my wee houses in Denver and Launceston enjoy the homes as much as I do because I love them equally...

name: Matt
about:
Hi I am  29 year old Network Engineer and former Personal Trainer originally from Chicago.  I live with my fantastic girlfriend Brittany and work downtown Monday through Friday 8am to 5pm.   Brittany is a NICU Nurse and originally from Cleveland. I have been Downtown Denver for about 1.5 years now.  I work out 4 days a week after work. I have a modern and clean place, and we are always considerate when hosting guests. We aim for comfort and convenience! On the weekends, we like to go out and explore during the warm season and snowboard in the winter. We really enjoy hosting with airbnb and meeting new people. 
We like new experiences, and we are still exploring Denver! There is so much to do! It is going to take years to try everything! I will recommend some places I have already been if you need any ideas :) We look forward to meeting you!

name: Christopher
about: Outgoing, friendly, clean.

name: Stephanie
about: I'm a scientist, paleo Crossfitter, dancer, and wanna-be-writer.  I've lived in Colorado since 2003 and I love it here.  I hope you enjoy your time in this beautiful state!  I thoroughly enjoy it myself, and life in general.

name: Nancy
about:
Hello! I'm an avid volleyball player and play year-round. I moved to Denver from Redondo Beach, CA where I played beach doubles every weekend for 8 yrs. I guess you could say I traded the beach for the mountains. You wouldn't think there would be much volleyball in the Mile HIgh State but there is! The mountains are so close that it was also easy to pick up snowboarding again. 

Denver is the first place I ever lived in which I truly felt home. I hope you feel the same when you step into my humble abode.

My other favorite thing to do - travel. I enjoy exploring new cultures and immersing myself in them. Best thing I've seen so far - Northern Lights in Iceland! I'll send you some pics of them if you like :)

name: Troy
about:
My second time enjoying airbnb 

Just back to my home town, after five years sailing, I spent one year in australia sailing from sydney to darwin, two years in south east asia, indo, sing, thailand, borneo, philipines another year crossing the south indian ocean to south africa, then up to namibia to brazail, suriname... another year in caribean and to willimsburg south carolina. i have sailed a total of 27,000 nm on eleven different yachts and commercial underwater salvage, been to over 50 countries in 6 years traveling abroad.

came back for friends, family and snowflakes. exicted about the season, local epic, summer rafting... grand canyon twice, salmon river in idaho, most of the rivers in colo and utah. 

Please enjoy your stay.

name: Daniel
about:
Hello Future Guests!

I'm just your typical fun loving guy that really appreciates anything amazing. I've lived in Denver since 2005 (from North Carolina, GO WOLFPACK) and I adore this city! My number one passion is being a dad to two amazing little ones. Tucker and Pepper are my world! I am a big skier, beer nerd, outdoorsy guy, adventurer & traveler. I am a foodie who loves to entertain and spend time with friends.

In my professional career I have owned restaurants, lounges, I created a nationally syndicated TV show about spirits, and started design companies then I did 5 years in corporate america for an amazing company, called Ferrari Color. Check them out.... we did Large Format Digital Print for major retailers and events. In the beginning of 2015 I knew it was time to go back to entrepreneurship.  By day I am a new-business/customer experience consultant. By night I have been working on this Airbnb, driving for Lyft (Download the Lyft app and use code "GETMORE" for free rides), creating new smaller business and dreaming up new ideas.   I love my work life because everyday is so darn different. 

Pick my brain about Denver... I love to help coordinate amazing adventures!

Your Host,
Daniel

name: Elise
about: Fun loving gypsy soul.

name: Christiano
about: Currently work in the nonprofit sector, a deep passion in my life. I live in a fantastic community and wish to share it with you!

name: Alana And Brittney
about: I'm a San Diego native, and just moved to Denver after living on the east coast (New York, Philly, Massachusetts) for the last decade. I love to ride my bike, explore city parks, and search for the best nachos in the city. I do policy work for a local non-profit and enjoy discussing current events.

name: Lorena
about: I'm also a new transplant to Denver from NJ/NY. I recently arrived to this great city for a teaching position at DU. I'm excited to explore this city, the mountains, and meet new friends. As a long time Airbnb host, I can tell you definitively that I enjoy hosting people in my home. I'm a people person and I also respect people's privacy so you tell me how little or how much you want to interact. :)

name: Arash
about: I am a former Denver University professor and also Denver University Engineering Alumni. I like working , socializing and going to the gym. I love the DU neighborhood and it's surroundings. I am looking forward to making your stay in Denver an enjoyable and memorable one. Please don't hesitate to contact me for more info.

name: Ryan
about: Love to travel, cook, drink wine and beer, listen to good music, try new restaurants, entertain friends, go camping, hiking, and explore Colorado!  Moved to Denver 4 years ago from Milwaukee and have never looked back!  I hope you love the home and neighborhood as much as I do!

name: Jasen And Caroline
about:
Hi!
We are Jasen and Caroline. We used AirBnB on a 6 month backpacking trip and loved the experience so much, we've excitedly become hosts ourselves! 
We are both happy, laid-back people with a deep love for travel.  We drive out to the mountains and adventure as much as possible... If we aren't adventuring we're cooking or creating something.
 Denver has proven to be an excellent place to stay. There's so much here to see and do. We can't wait to welcome you into our home!!!

name: April
about:
I am a residential real estate broker, yoga instructor, mom and an easy going Colorado native. I enjoy all that our beautiful state has to offer during all of our four seasons. Whether it's taking in a show at Red Rocks, hiking in the high country, practicing yoga in the park, skiing or traveling throughout the state that is where you will most likely find me...outside! My motto is
"Enjoy the journey". I look forward to meeting you and sharing this beautiful place I call home in Colorado~

name: Danny & Christy
about: Denver natives!

name: Michael
about: Hi! I love to travel. Some of my favorite places are Maui (which I try to visit at least once a year) and Disneyland (same). I have done some international traveling as well. I always prefer beach vacations :) I am currently trying to learn Spanish in order to make a trip to Colombia. I love trying new foods and especially desserts! I am a vegetarian and certified crazy cat lady. I have a soft spot in my heart for all animals.

name: Lilya&Luis
about: Hello there! We are a multiracial and culturally diverse family of 5 with a mixture of Latin-American, African and European origins. Four members of this family speak three languages. Lilya is a nursing student, Luis is a labor union organizer, and together we have two human daughters and one cat babygirl. We are LGBTQ-friendly, progressive and love our homestead.

name: Brenna
about: I am from Denver Colorado and am planning on visiting my dad in Paris with my 2 sons.

name: Blair
about:
pronouns: they/them/theirs

I design/communicate to the public through a Colorado-based (nonpartisan) nonprofit that focuses on young voter engagement. I find the work quite meaningful as Colorado is the definition of a purple state.

Previous work includes a stint with Americorps in rural Alabama, a tech startup in SF, and a branding agency in Boulder.

I also recently traveled America in a camper. I feel most alive on a road trip and I travel as frequently as I possibly can. Hence, airBNB!

Hobbies include, but are not limited to: binding books, screen printing, ceramics, camping, dancing, swimming, road trips, collecting data, making things, going on long scooter rides.

name: Patric & Lisa
about:
Patric moved to Denver in August of 2000 for work and expected to stay for two or maybe three years. 14 years later, he got a job offer from Microsoft in Seattle that he couldn't refuse and recently moved to Seattle while frequently visiting Denver. His interests are Argentine tango and cooking. If you like cooking, you'll love staying in the house as he completely redesigned the kitchen when he bought the house 10 years ago making it a dream kitchen for cooking large and small dinners. On his visits, you'll often see him making crepes in the morning and you are more than welcome to join and enjoy. 

Lisa was born in Denver, however spent much time oversees in Poland on a small farm throughout her childhood.  She often jokes that she has a foot in each country just due to the blend of her childhood's culture.  Her interests are art, classic cars and working with kids. Besides throwing a dinner party when Patric visits or eating his crepes (they are addictive), she tends to love traveling, relaxing or enjoying social events with friends.

name: Or
about:
Eclectic artist condo that is clean, cozy and welcoming . Location is superb, across from famous Chessman Park ,Botanic Garden, Coffee places Restaurants, Music venues . 1.1 mile from Denver Museums and convention center .  I offer you coffee or tea in the morning also your stay will include shampoo, conditioner, toothpaste  hair dryer, iron and friendly airbnb Host :).  About me: 
Fun, cool, eclectic artist, friendly and welcoming. I was born overseas and live in the US for about 25 years, 3 years in Denver and love it. Well traveled, animal lover and I am all about live and let live, my place is gay friendly  (I am straight, just saying:)) I also enjoy yoga, glass of red wine  creating beautiful Jewelry and so much more  . I speak fluent English but my writing is another story :).  clean is important to me and I know you  See yea soon .

name: Sarah
about: I have traveled a ton in my 26 years and have lived overseas.  I am a substitute teacher and do alcohol promotions and air bnb :) I like going to live music, hiking, making new friends, going out, traveling, running, bike riding, snowboarding, skydiving and more (and if I'm doing any of that while you are here, you're welcome to get in on it too!).

name: Joey
about:
Currently working at a small niche law firm specializing in resource & energy law, I write title opinions and advise on regulatory and all other manner of issues relating to oil & gas exploration & development. Also COO and Counsel to a startup gold operations and mining company.

(website hidden)

name: Liz
about: I'm from New York but have lived in Colorado for about 12 years and love it here! I enjoy hanging out with my family & friends, riding bikes, camping, hiking, gardening, seeing live music, and teaching English. I'm a mom to two little boys & am married to a pretty awesome guy who shares my affinity for traveling. We love to get out and explore everything from remote wilderness areas to huge urban centers and enjoy meeting new people from all over the world. My favorite things to do when exploring are experience the food, the outdoors, and the culture. We started as Airbnb guests and always had great experiences. We're enjoying this new phase of having enough space to be hosts!

name: Louie
about: I am a new father of 2 beautiful kids, super excited about being a dad. I have a 2.5 years old boy and a 6 months old girl. I originally grew up in west Africa, did my high school in England at a boarding school and finally ended up in beautiful Denver Colorado for college and never left. It is absolutely beautiful here and can never see myself living anywhere else.

name: Laura
about: Hi, how are you? I'm Laura and I've lived in Denver for 10 years.  We have a ton of fun exploring and living in Denver.I am very outgoing and friendly.  Originally from California and spent 3 years in Chicago in Lincoln Park.  I've traveled a bit but am looking forward to doing more.  I love to cook, do yoga, meditate, decorate, hike and spend time with friends and family.

name: Justin
about:
I grew up in Boulder so I love all things in the mountains and outdoors. I moved close to downtown Denver to enjoy the benefits of the city. I love my house and my Neighborhood. There is so many places within walking distance that I find myself not leaving the area too much. 

I have an almost 10 year old son who's a brown belt in Karate and loves to climb everything in site. I love kids, animals, traveling and just enjoying life. 

Much of my career I was a tech entrepreneur, building, buying and selling web sites. After years of working from home alone and in coffee shops I needed a rest from the computer screen. Now I run a local business called the Highland Massage Company. We have about 19 therapists and it's been established for just over 3 years now.  Now a big past time for me is getting massage.

name: Amanda
about:
I travel all over for work and fun. I'm a personal assistant.  I have been to over 20 countries :D  My place sits empty a lot, so why not share the LOVE!! My condo is small, but charming.  My condo is famous among my friends for having the best location.  It's the first thing people say when I tell them where I live.  

I am super flexible, as long as you respect me and my stuff, we're all in.  Cheers!

name: Shannon
about: I'm a Denver native who has recently returned home after spending years in Paris, the South of France and New York City. I moved back to Denver because I believe it's one of the greatest places on Earth and I want you to enjoy it in my charming South Denver bungalow.

name: Andrew
about: From Massachusetts, but living in Denver Colorado now. I am a Latin teacher at Regis Jesuit High School.

name: Rose
about: Devon and I are Colorado Natives who love being outside.  Our hobbies include traveling, skiing, biking, climbing, painting, snowshoeing, camping, gardening, hiking and cooking.   Rose is an enthusiastic elementary teacher and Devon is in grad school at CU Denver.   We enjoy a good laugh and good company. :)

name: Peter
about: My wife Delinda and I are entrepreneurs that love to travel the world! We're from Denver, Colorado and just love our state, but we also love seeing other places and getting to really know how people in other great places live. We've traveled extensively and have amazing travel experiences. We're relatively new to Airbnb and decided to list our beloved downtown Denver condo (our little pied-à-terre that we don't use as much as we'd like to because of our schedules) and some of our Cancun properties to see how things go with this platform - and we've loved it! The most meaningful things in life are family, friends, good food and wine, and unique life experiences - not material things.

name: Corey
about: Hi I'm Corey. Originally a New Yorker, I came out to Colorado 5 years ago. I love Denver and everything Colorado has to offer. I live in this neighborhood because I like being within walking/biking distance to all the great things in this city!

name: Megan & Jack
about:
We love to travel and experience new locations with as much of a local perspective as possible. Food and good beer are a must on every trip! The more hole in the wall the place, the better! 

From a hosting perspective we aim to give people the same experience we would hope to have while in a new city. We are flexible with the space and truly enjoy meeting new people! 

We have a dog named Thunder who is 10 years old and loves the outdoors as much as we do, and another dog named Boomer who is 7 years old and wags his tail all the time! If you come to visit and we are around they will greet you with much excitement!

name: Rachel Pearl
about: I live in downtown Denver with my family and 2 dogs.  I love being in the city and all the varied events that are offered.  I also love being in the mountains of Colorado or enjoying a travel experience with my family. I love hosting people in my home city and do my best to make everyone's experience amazing.

name: Kate
about:
I work in Public Accounting as an IT Security and Controls consultant. This means I travel a lot to visit clients to help them evaluate and design controls to secure their financial systems.

When I'm not traveling for work I like to take trips with my girlfriends to new cities.

name: Rico
about: We are very laid back here (Cheryl, Al and Rico) most of the time one of us are here. House is kept very clean we totaly understand that there are guest in the house so no worries. Full use of the house including back yard.

name: Katie And Brad
about: Love Denver and the mountains, both from the Northeast originally, and would like to share our space with friendly travelers. We love to ski, bike, hike, run, and enjoy everything that Colorado has to offer. We are looking forward to meeting you!

name: Kate
about:
Hi!  I live here in this amazing condo part-time, so some of my personal effects will be in the condo, make yourself at home!  I'm a resort marketing consultant, so I travel a lot.  I love going out, being social, live music, the mountains, skiing, and spend a lot of time in my 2nd home, Telluride.  Don't hesitate to text/call with questions about Denver or the mountains.  I've been in Colorado for a long time and I know it well.  I can help you with suggestions on where to go/what to do/what to eat/ live music venues, etc etc etc.   Just ask!!  

It is truly the perfect location for any downtown event or city stay.  It is a 2-min walk  to the light rail and mall shuttle station.  

I love to socialize, hit the town, eat out, and see live music!

name: Tricia
about:
My husband and I are both teachers in Denver Public Schools. . (David has recently retired from full-time teaching - but still substitutes.) We have lived in our neighborhood for 30 years.  David, with his community organizing skills, has been key in making the neighborhood the attractive and welcoming place it is today.  We feel lucky to live where we do - close to restaurants, theatres, parks, not to mention great neighbors right on the block. We love to share our bounty with visitors.  
We usually take a park walk every day, and would welcome you to come along.  We dance salsa on Wednesday nights at a great venue-only six blocks away, and everyone is welcome there, too. (Other dance styles available throughout the week.)

name: Matt
about: I am a professional mechanical engineer and enjoy traveling.

name: Ugo
about: I am from Denver.  I am a real estate investor that loves to travel and try new things.

name: Rachel
about:
Making Denver, CO my home after years of moving around. Originally from Southern California, lived in Reno, NV for a while, then spent an amazing two years living and working in Amsterdam. During that time I traveled much of Europe.

Love traveling, being outside, practicing my tourist Spanish and very basic Dutch as opportunities arise.

name: Jb
about: My daughter and I have been living in the Park Hill neighborhood since 2001 and LOVE our community.  We spend weekends walking to Cake Crumbs bakery and riding our bikes to the farmers market.  We also love to golf and ski in the winters.  We are always up to something!

name: Terry
about: I've been lucky enough to live in some very beautiful places over the years.  I love the outdoors and the all of the  opportunities to share sports and activities with friends and family. I have recently moved home to Metro-Detroit  but I hope that you'll enjoy this beautiful place as much as I do!

name: Teshome
about: I am very freindly  and I am married have three chilren. I like working with people. In fact I am working full time at Hertz car rental. Also managing properties, and I have part time transportation bussnes. I am very responsible person. I have very good customer service experiance. I am also happy hosting my house.

name: Joe
about:
Hello!  My name is Joe.  

I like to ride bikes..  eat delicious food..  yoga..  outside..  I travel almost every week for work and just like to chill out and relax on the weekends..   

Cheers!

name: Garett
about: Best neighborhood in Denver! Bike, walk, run, or skip to all events & downtown fun.  Willing to answer any questions about the hood, house, or city!  Renting to offset travel and furnishings- negotiate with me!

name: Tom
about: My wife Lynn and I moved to Denver in 1991, fell in love with the city, and never looked back. Our neighborhood suites our lifestyle perfectly as it is just minutes from downtown (I'm a city boy at heart) providing us with all this beautiful place has to offer, and we are just a short drive from hiking & skiing in these fabulous Rocky Mountains. We are " do it yourself" kinds of people who enjoy tackling new things and seeking out new experiences. We have stayed in many AirBnB's and thought this would be a great way to help others have the kinds of experiences we enjoy, while bringing in a little extra to help pay the bills. I design & build custom furniture, and have a shop in Denver's RiNo neighborhood, and Lynn is an RN at Denver's Children's Hospital. We have put together a beautiful and comfortable Airbnb space here, and provide our guests with a book filled with helpful suggestions, maps, & places of interest, as well as access to bicycles for getting around town.

name: Andrew & Sarah
about: We're proud parents of our first baby and enjoying putting roots down here in Denver.  We like to get out for hikes in the nice weather, check out new spots around Denver, weekend trips to the mountains and relax in our great home.  After being hosted by a number of wonderful folks on Airbnb, we took the plunge and began renting our place while we travel.  The experience on both sides has been great!

name: Aki
about:
USPS Retiree  
Love travel, listening music,Karaoke, playing ukulele

name: Mike
about: Graphic designer / music freaker / beer and coffee consumer / CO nativer - now living in Los Angeles, CA

name: Hilary
about: Colorado native, dog mama, yoga lover, coffee connoisseur, part time traveler

name: Leigh
about: I am orginally from Oklahoma but moved to Denver after attending college at the University of Colorado at Boulder.  I love traveling the world and exploring the beautiful state I live in.   I have made Denver my home but love to go into the mountains as often as possible.  I enjoy skiing, biking, hiking, and being outdoors.  I also love exploring Denver's great restaurants and bookstores.  I am a total animal lover and always try to help an animal in need.  I like to volunteer when I travel if time and resources allow.

name: Matina
about: I share my time between Denver, Co. and Newport Beach, Ca.  I travel all over the world for fun.  I enjoy getting to know other cultures, scenery and I am a foody at heart.

name: Steven
about:
Hi, I'm Steven.  I love to travel and I am looking to seeing new sights and new experiences in the upcoming years. I hope to share my home with new friends and help them to explore Denver. I have lived in Colorado for twelve years and hope to share the suggestions I have with others.

I love modern fiction, Don DeLillo 's White Noise, listen to mainly ska and jazz, and love good food that is well priced!

name: Kirbee
about: Hello!  I'm offering my home on AirBNB while I go out of town to visit my family during the holidays.  I love my home, and I think you will too.  I've used this space to host a 20-person bridal shower with a complete dinner, so it will fit most holiday needs.

name: Corey
about:
I am a 30 something professional and bar tend nights.  I love travel, my favorite last two vacations were to a surf camp in Mal Pais Costa Rica and last summer to Mykonos Greece.  I am a spontaneous traveler and like to get the real vibe of a place.  That is one of the main benefits of airbnb is that it allows you to get an authentic vibe of how a place really is.  I am hands off as a host.  I do not like an overly involved host when I am staying somewhere and due to how much I work I am not around much.  I really do live by the work hard, play hard motto.  I snowboard, kayak, surf, ski, and go out to eat a lot.  I was born in D.C and I am an east coast guy at heart.  I love Colorado.  My favorite band is adventure club, the book I am reading right now is Cloud Atlas, favorite TV is Mad Men or Million Dollar Listing.  

When hosting I make sure the sheets are super comfortable and clean, there are multiple bath sheets, and trail size toiletries.  I usually have good craft beer in the fridge and wine you can help yourself to.  I also have Apple TV Netflix and tons of dvd's for chilling at night, there are bikes you can rent a block from the house, and I have a folder with info on all the points of interest and good neighborhood spots.  If you like to exercise while traveling running trails are a block and half from the house.  Anything else just ask.

name: Mariya
about: Fun female living in the middle of downtown Denver looking to show guests all Colorado has to offer!

name: Masami & Chris
about: We are both Nutritional Therapists.  Masami is a Yoga Therapist as well and Chris is a teacher, builder and a handyman.  We are also writers, artists, and gardeners.  Masami is originally from Kumamoto, Japan.  Chris is from Colorado and Toronto, Canada.  We now live in beautiful Wheat Ridge, Colorado (just outside of Denver).  We are well traveled and we love meeting people from everywhere!!

name: Morgan
about: I'm a very peaceful, down to earth person with a craving for all things thrilling. Huge foodie, outdoors enthusiast, art junkie and animal lover. Opening my home so that others have one away from their own has become one of my favorite hobbies.

name: Brad
about:
Hi, Im Brad. I am a sales professional with a specialization in medical/healthcare. I spend most of my time in the city getting involved in charity organizations, networking, and enjoying all the exciting things Denver has to offer with friends. On the weekends, I am constantly in the mountains skiing, climbing, hiking, biking, and camping with my dog, Sonoma. 
I really enjoy hosting on airbnb. It has allowed me to meet a lot of really cool travelers. When you stay at my house, you will experience a sincere effort to make your adventure to Denver a little more enjoyable. I look forward to hearing from you soon!!
all the best, 
Brad & Sonoma

name: Michael
about: I'm a Colorado native.  When I'm not working, I ski in the winter.  In the summer I enjoy road biking, rafting, and hiking.  Denver is a fantastic place to live.  We have four seasons, the benefits of a big city with easy access to the mountains.

name: Ann
about: Adventurous, outdoorsy. Love to meet new people, have new experiences, travel, art, music, good food & wine.

name: Billy
about: Outgoing business owner, enjoy all the great things that Colorado has to offer.  I travel internationally and in the states when I can.  I had such a great experience and met some incredible people using airbnb in Brazil that I decided to start renting my place in Denver with the service.

name: Mario
about: I have been in the hospitality business my entire life and currently own a restaurant in down town Denver. I love the outdoors and my dog.

name: Katie
about: I'm a caring and sweet person who loves to travel and meet new people. I'm originally from Cleveland and now live and work in marketing in Denver. I'm clean, quiet and respectable and work a full time job.

name: Jane
about:
I lived in Asia for a couple years and love traveling and travelers. I live with an adorable, loving cat named Jasper.I am a Licensed Massage Therapist and Reiki Master Teacher. If you are interested in receiving therapeutic bodywork over your stay that can be arranged (depending on both our schedules).

Things I like: camping, tarot, astrology, epsom salt baths, painting, acro yoga, hiking, winter sports, friends, adventures, traveling the world, meditating

name: Brian
about: I am an intellectual artistic musician that likes to help others.  I believe in karma and doing things that will benefit myself and my community in the long run. I am a patron of the arts and sciences and like the outdoors. I travel a lot by public transportation and when I am traveling elsewhere I am usually giving others rides. I couch surf a lot as well.  I am pretty modest when it comes to living but I do like good food, good drink, and good conversation.

name: Greta
about: I am an NYU grad from New York City.  I live in Denver and love to ski in Winter Park in the winter and spend time at Grand Lake and Rocky Mountain National Park in the summer.

name: Mary, Tony And Peter
about:
I am originally from Wyoming. My husband and I have a fairly large house for just us and our son. When we bought the house our 3 daughters lived with us. Our oldest daughter is a linguist for the Navy, our second daughter is in Los Angeles  working, she graduated from Ithaca College and our youngest daughter passed away when she was 15. We love sports and activities around Denver. We have dogs and pretty much love all animals, except birds.

We have two dogs at the house, our Maggie who is a medium sized black lab mix/mutt and Mac, our daughters dog. Mac is a bigger dog that is also a mix with American Boxer. We are watching him while our daughter is deployed. Both are sweet dogs, Maggie barks but doesn't bite. Mac is super friendly, keep in mind he is a bigger dog.

name: Gw
about:
I have been making masquerade masks for about 10 years and sell my craft at galleries and cafe's around Denver. I have a small art studio in my apartment that is very entertaining.

I like music and being outdoors, cooking, finding and doing all the very cool free things in Denver.  Plus I love turning people on to the cool local spots that are not on the tourist maps.

As your host I promise to have everything clean and fresh for you. I want you to feel at home so if you want to relax in the living room or chill out at the dining room table, no worries.  I am very laid back.

name: Nicole
about: I live and work in Denver. I love to travel, volunteer, read, and spend time with family and friends! I practice yoga and meditation regularly. I also attend boot camp classes and play co-ed softball.

name: Madeline
about: Hello my name is Maddie and I'm living here in Denver. I was born and raised in upstate New York, I came to Denver to explore and find new opportunities. I've always loved meeting new people which is the main reason I decided to start putting up listings on airbnb! I know what it's like to travel and need a nice, safe yet affordable place to stay. I'm a full time photographer but also do modeling on the side.

name: Olivia
about: I am an outdoor enthusiast that loves to travel. Colorado is a perfect place to call home base and enjoy everything from snowboarding to fishing.

name: Evolve Vacation Rental
about: Evolve Vacation Rental Network is redefining vacation rental management by eliminating hassle, guesswork and frustration for homeowners and travelers. Our team is available 7 days a week and we look forward to providing you with exceptional customer service during every interaction. Please tell us how we can help with your upcoming trip.

name: Dale
about: Besides being a writer and the author of THE INTELLIGENT WOMAN'S GUIDE TO ONLINE DATING: And She Lived Happily Ever After(available on Amazon), I am a frequent Airbnb vacation renter (no hotels for me), and I know what I look for in a vacation rental. So, when I decided to become a vacation rental owner, I paid close attention to details, like the amenities I offered, the decorating I did, the overall comfort and ambiance I try to provide.

name: Jen
about: I live in and love Denver! When not working, I play outside, cook, yoga, see live music, and travel.

name: Gustavo
about:
I am a 33 y/o single business professional and work in Higher Ed. 
I love this state mostly because there is always something to do and you cannot beat our beautiful backyard called the Rockies. During winter time, skiing is my passion but during the warm months it's time for hiking and camping. I speak Spanish, French and English, that means international guests welcomed!

I lived in Paris for a year and since then I am in love with French culture. What do I do when I am on vacation? Travel to countries or cities I've never visited. 

My favorite food is plain and simple, pizza & beer in the US but if in Mexico City...Tacos al Pastor (drooling). I am up for what the host needs, if time allows me I can show you this city or give you advise on how to get around. 

My motto is: Adventures Charlie!

name: Ed
about:
RETIRED TV ENGINEER...I DO HOME REPAIRS...SPORTS FAN 

HAPPY FUN RESPECTFUL

name: Karl
about:
I love to talk to people, I also really enjoy hearing other peoples stories and perspectives. I've found everybody has something interesting or cool to share. I'm big into music and listen to the spectrum and have a stereo system to help back that up :) I like to travel (literally anywhere) and eat new things on menus. I'm also into cars, philanthropy, business, art, wine/beer/scotch, real estate and just all around investing.

So i'm sure we will have something to share and chat about :-)

name: Becky
about:
I'm an active mom living in the city with my daughter and my husband. I'm an avid traveller myself, and I love getting to know new cities and I set my place up to be as comfortable as possible for you while you are visiting Denver. You feeling at home is important to me.

Here's a quote that describes my outlook and philosophy:

"One of the best ways to make yourself happy is to make other people happy; one of the best ways to make other people happy is to be happy yourself."

name: Hayne
about: Hi there and thanks for taking the time to check my place out. Any questions I can answer, please don't hesitate to ask. I work your typical 9-5 job (although some days it becomes the typical 7-4 job or, well, you get the idea) and am around some weekends but gone frequently throughout the summer. If I'm around, I'm happy to as gracious a host as possible or simply stay out of your way. Regardless, I want your stay to be as enjoyable and comfortable as possible.

name: Hannah
about: From US

name: Kate
about: Laid back and responsible!

name: Michael
about: I am pretty simple. 29 year-old young Real Estate professional living in Denver, Colorado. I enjoy working, traveling, snowboarding and great food and drink! I am a very easy going, minimal person that doesn't require much. I do not smoke but I do like to drink beer and wine socially. I would rather ride a bike than drive and if it involves the beach, mountains, lake, music or a boat, I am probably into it. I also have a tenant that lives in my basement full time so you could say I know what its like to be a good roomie.

name: Rachel
about: Author, Food Photographer and Food Stylist for Reckless Abandon Cook. Denver Food Photographer. Online Fishmonger at Chefs Fresh Fish - where you can order fresh, sustainable seafood online that will be delivered to your door.

name: Jill
about: I am friendly and I love meeting people from all over the world.   I have had guests from 29 different countries so far.    I'm easy going and easy to get along with.  I can be like staying with a friend of a friend, in that I am glad to take care of your needs, and give you pointers about Denver, (or pick you up from the bus) or also happy to leave you alone and grant you all the privacy you want (tell me.)  My dog died and now I have no pets (boo hoo).  I speak French well, some German and Spanish.

name: Dawn
about:
We have lived in Denver 17+ years.  When home, we enjoy good music, food and happy hour on the porch.

We want you to have an excellent stay in either our Denver home or our Mountain getaway and will do our best as hosts to make that happen.  We provide a detailed home manual prior to your arrival, which includes hot spots, local attractions, transportation guidelines etc.  We are helpful, responsive and happy to host new families.

name: Claude
about: Originally from the east coast..I love the winters in Colorado so much better! Love to mountain bike and ski....

name: Dana
about: My fiancé and I are currently just enjoying our time living in Colorado and enjoying the wonderful things this state has to offer.  We enjoy getting out to the mountains for some hiking, white water rafting, relaxing, biking, and beer tasting.  We love to travel when given the chance and look forward to using Airbnb in our future travels as we have just recently became aware of Airbnb.

name: EmiLion
about: I am a lover, a healer, a helper. I love traveling as much as possible, getting my feet muddy, lying in the grass and singing at the top of my lungs. Laughing is what I do best. I am currently loving my job as an occupational therapist and work with the elderly population and give therapy in the home. I am creative and a designer at heart - you will notice when you check out my artsy apartment.

name: Adam
about:
Hi!

My name is Adam. 

As an Airbnb host, I'm here if you need me, invisible if you don't. I love sharing recommendations for restaurants or help with anything you might need; I'm an expert on what to do/ where to go. If you prefer privacy, I'll make sure you feel like you're in your home-away-from-home, free of intrusion. I take my Airbnb hosting responsibilities seriously, and aim to make your visit as lovely, comfortable, and memorable as possible! I adore my city, and look forward to sharing with you all it has to offer!

name: Cameron
about: I am a 28 year old out going guy. I've lived in Europe for the last 3 years teaching english. I love traveling, meeting new people, and spicy food.

name: Meghan & Preston
about:
Hello! We're Meghan and Preston, your happy hosts. We enjoy all of Colorado's amazing outdoor offerings, as well as soccer, travel and drinking local beers at our favorite neighborhood spot, City o' City. 

We love living in Capitol Hill, as we are blocks from some of the best music venues and restaurants in the city. We look forward to sharing our home and neighborhood with you!

name: Colby
about: I am from Kansas City, MO.  Have traveled extensively in Europe, North Africa, and Central and South America.  I love cycling, hiking, and reading good books.  I am a 2nd year Anesthesiology resident at the University of Colorado.  My wife and I love hosting new people from all around the United States and the world.  We are the proud owners of a lovable and friendly 12 year old yellow Labrador Retriever.  Our home is very centrally located with excellent local shops and restaurants within walking distance and access to a Light Rail stop about 0.5 mile from our home.  It would be our pleasure to have you as our guests for however long you can stay.  We hope to meet you soon!

name: Nicholas
about: Originally from UK, love Colorado, hiking mtn biking and Skiing.

name: Kevin
about: I am a professor at a medical school.  I teach biomedical informatics.  I split my time between Denver, CO, and Paris, France.

name: Danielle And Shane
about: We love Denver, and we love to travel!  Shane has built all of our rentals, with attention to detail, design, and eco-friendly features that make our homes unique and comfortable.  Danielle is busy as a nurse, acupuncturist, and having a baby!  We love sharing our properties, and helping our guests enjoy the neighborhood and support the local businesses that abound in the Lower Highlands.  In the winters we spend most our free time skiing and snowboarding, and our summers traveling as much as possible, all while raising 3 kiddos!

name: Michael
about: Hello.   My name is Michael.   I'm a thirty-something real estate developer and sustainability advocate, living in amazing Denver, Colorado.   While I'm settled down now, over the past 10 years I've traveled to and lived in China, India, Japan, Hawai'i, Costa Rica, Puerto Rico, Argentina, and other countries.   I'm a big advocate of AirBNB for meeting locals in the cities, states and countries I travel to while still having a near hotel quality experience.

name: Jamie And Maia
about: I am from Boston, love the outdoors and spending time with my wife, my two kids, and two dogs.  I love skiing, biking, hiking, running, and spending time throughout the city.  My wife Maia runs a nonprofit and takes care of the kids, while helping to provide a fabulous experience for our guests.

name: Jeremy
about: Home owner and Host. Traveler. Cook. Academic. Clean and easygoing.

name: Eugene & Brooke
about: We are a married couple, both 26 years old. Brooke is a Denver native and Eugene is from Australia. We like to explore new cultures, meet people and have fun!

name: Cheryl
about: I am a real estate broker based in Boulder, CO who loves to travel, eat well and see music :-)

name: Rhea
about: Hi there, I'm Rhea! I live with my parter Stevie and our three Kitts. I enjoy cooking, yoga, netflix and a glass of wine. I work as an esthetician specializing in green beauty. I am a business owner and aim to enhance the beauty we were born with. I have been a musician all my life and sing and write songs in a local band. I'm looking forward to new connections!

name: Monica
about: I'm pretty laid back, open to meeting a lot of different people, swapping stories, and going out for a beer or two.  Currently, I live in Denver working for Planned Parenthood, and love to hike, bike, and travel around Colorado.  I'm a huge movie buff and love learning about new bands out there.  My friends and I try to seek out live shows and events city wide when we can.  If you're ever interested in finding out more about me, I'm down to host you or, if I'm unavailable, I might be down to meet up for a drink.  Also, if I'm traveling, I promise I'm really clean and flexible!

name: Brandy
about: I love living in Denver, Colorado!  I am a very motivated owner of a small business in the music industry, so I love shows, going out, and networking with people.  I have traveled to several foreign countries, so I know what it's like to stay with others.  I strive to be a welcoming hostess!

name: Ania
about: Ania (on the right) - a professional in the Energy industry. I am originally from Poland, but have lived for a time in Germany, Netherlands, and Middle East. I am very well traveled and continue to travel overseas a lot. Today I enjoy finer things in life, and this apartment reflects my style. My home base in Colorado is Louisville/Boulder, and this plush Denver pied-à-terre I use as a convenience when working or going out in Denver. My friend Lars (on the left) lives just a few blocks away and is helping me to market and manage the property applying her many talents and fantastic people skills. Lars is very knowledgable about the surrounding attractions and accessibility in Denver and I am more familiar with Boulder. I am a hiker, golfer, and a a major foodie. We are happy to make suggestions if you would like help with planning your free time.

name: German
about:
Shortly after college I packed a backpack and departed for Europe - on my own, without an itinerary. I've enjoyed traveling ever since - for the people you meet, the sites and the adventures, and because it keeps every sense sharp. 

I've now been to over 40 countries: from Europe to Asia to Australia, Central and South America, to Africa and parts of the Middle East. And I've been all over the U.S.

I'm also a sports fan, having attended hundreds of events across the USA and the world, including the last six World Cups.

I grew up in Akron, Ohio but have lived and worked in New York City; Jacksonville, Florida; Dallas, Texas; and Denver, Colorado, where I've been able to take advantage of the beauty of the Rocky Mountains - hiking, snowboarding, and otherwise exploring the west as much as possible.

When my house is available it's because I've fortunately found contract work out of state - usually with some sports entity.

name: Sarah
about: Married couple who love to meet and host new people!

name: Kristin
about:
I landed in Denver after living in NYC, Seattle, Portland, Park City and Vail!  Love this city and the people who call it home. 

I'm an entrepreneur. Travel for work and fun. :)

name: Britton
about:
Hi there, 
I love to travel, meet new people, and do anything that involves mountains. I  love living in Colorado.

name: Tj
about: We are very relaxed and personable. We love meeting new people and learning something new everyday. Outdoor, music and art enthusiasts! We also run a non profit called Wealth In Community Knowledge (The WICK) which focuses on creative arts education, spreading the knowledge of sustainability, and community outreach. (URL HIDDEN)

name: O. Rod
about:
Hello! I have been living in Denver for fourteen years now and have been enjoying it a lot! I am an architectural and graphic designer who loves the mountains.  
I´m looking forward to be a great host on Airbnb, and only happy when my guests are happy. I love to share my knowledge and appreciation and love for Denver with my guests. 
I will always do everything I can to make your stay as perfect and as comfortable as possible. 
I am flexible time wise, so I will make the effort to meet you in person when you arrive and welcome you and share local knowledge with you. 
I´m own this beautiful house and I carefully equipped it  to make your stay a memorable one. 
I am looking forward to seeing you in Denver soon!

name: Kym
about: From Denver,but lives in Southern California. Frequently visits Denver to see family & check on the bungalow. Enjoys traveling, yoga, hiking, the beach and spending time w/ her family.

name: Maggie
about: I am an active member of one of the largest meetup groups in the nation: the Boulder/Denver Grey Wolves. I hike in summer and ski in winter and the Colorado climate is great for both. Growing up in the cold damp winters of Wisconsin, I have never regretted moving west. A perfect day is 10 inches of new in the back bowls of Vail.

name: Chris
about:
36 year old from Denver Colorado.  Work nights tending bar and during the day I'm self employed.  Graduated from the university of colorado at boulder in 2003.  

Denver is home but I have spent lots of time living and traveling abroad.  Mostly in Germany (German major) and western Europe. 

Anything else you'd like to know, please ask.

name: Maura
about: Small business owner of a unique company that celebrates the spirit of travel & picnicking called RedCamper. Love food, walking my dogs, hikes in the foothills at dusk and a well made cocktail. I've been in Denver since 1999 so I know a few things to see and do.

name: Kendal
about:
Hi! I'm Kendal

I currently spend my days working a 9 to 5 non-profit job, hanging with my pup and boyfriend (Max), enjoying all the outdoorsy goodness CO has to offer, sewing, seeing live music, and cooking. I grew up moving around a lot and because of that love to travel and meet new people. Next up on my list is South America! 

Denver is a rad town and I'm happy to be a part of it. I can't wait to meet you!

name: Adrienne
about:
Hi
I am originally from Denver, grew up in Wisconsin, and moved back.  I love hiking, traveling, reading and nything that is fun. I am currently in school and working full time.  I love to take long vacations when I have time to.  I love budget traveling amd couchsurfing. I feel that travel through locals is the best way to travel!

name: Dana
