about: I am a 7th grade school teacher who can't live without my English Bulldog, my passport, books, great restaurants and spending time with the people who are closest to me.  I absolutely enjoy traveling and have been fortunate enough to travel (mostly international) the last four summers. I enjoy seeking new restaurants to try out and seeing what local events are taking place in the area in which I am.

name: William
about:
Hi, Im Bill! 
I am a Denver native, and I love everything Colorado has to offer :). Snowboarding in the winter, hiking and camping in the summer, there's no better place for me. I have been playing music all over the country for the last ten years, but Colorado is where I have kept my home. I restore old VWs, and I have a French Bulldog, name of Oatmeal.
I would love to share my knowledge of the city and its restaurants, or the slopes and places to eat or stay up in the hills. Also I can point you to some great outdoor summer recreation spots near town(or not so near town), and bars and live music I can also make some great recommendations, and many are walking distance or a quick uber ride away from my spot!
We are 420 friendly and fully equipped with kitchenware, towels and sheets, and necessaries, and we would love to provide a comfortable space for you to have a great time while your here in Colorado!
I am happy to accommodate special requests!

name: Jayme
about: Hello and Welcome! I am very excited to be joining the Air BnB community. I love to host and be hosted. I have a traveling soul and love any opportunity to visit new places whether it's nationally or abroad. I am originally from Las Vegas, NV where I worked as a night auditor, conceirege and bartender while going to college. After graduation, I moved to Austin, TX to get my first big girl job, eat as much BBQ as possible and play roller derby. During my six years down south I made a lot of wonderful friends. I have since moved to Denver and love the cool weather and hospitality. Denver has beautiful mountains, a booming city and a warm community. I have always been a firm believer that the connections you make while traveling to new places can make or break a trip. I look forward to meeting some new faces, exchanging stories and hosting in the lovely Denver, CO.

name: Ellen
about:
I am a gardener and landscape designer, originating from Chicago, the city of big shoulders, and arriving in Denver 20 yrs ago, taken by the open skies, the frontier vibe, the endless sunshine and the opportunity to grow and invent. I bought a house on the still raw edge of the downtown area, began renovating and restoring, and the following year I started my gardening business...
After hours I play piano, paint, train my pup, tend to my own garden.
I love spring, beginning again, anew. In the summertime, its watermelon, fruit, the sun-swept garden. In winter, I am drawn to the ocean and the seashore and the spanish speaking world...
My favorite movies:
Baghdad Cafe
Like Water for Chocolate
Avatar
My favorite books:
Love in the Time of Cholera
Grapes of Wrath
#1 Ladies Detective Agency
Love Medicine

My favorite music:
Taj Mahal
Kate Mann
Mamuse

name: Mary
about: I migrated to America from Egypt when I was 18 on hope and a prayer it would bring the life I wanted for myself.  I am fun, energetic, down to earth, ambitious, and a  lover of different food and  cultures.

name: Meghan
about: My husband and I are both Colorado natives who would rather be up in the mountains than anywhere else!

name: David And Virginia
about:
I taught for over 30 years both in the US and internationally, and I am interested in architecture, art, music, discovering new places, and people. My wife also enjoys travelling, art, cooking (great cook), and talking with people from around the world.   We have traveled extensively in South America and Europe, and enjoy sharing our travel experiences and adventures. 

We are in Peru until March 20, 2016 and will be ready for guests at that time. Welcome!

name: Logan
about: Young Denver professional, married to a beautiful wife and have an awesome Dog, Brantley. Love the outdoors and good people!

name: Elissa
about: I'm a social worker and a lover of the outdoors. I have lived in Denver for almost 11 years and have enjoyed watching it change and grow. I love to travel and while I'm away I like to offer my home for others to enjoy.

name: Tricia
about:
It is a basement suite of about 600 Sq Ft with a bedroom area, a family room with cable TV and an open area with a table.  The egress window makes it light and the ceilings are not low.  We love the area.  It has a fabulous bathroom with a large soaker tub, a walk-in shower and the laundry is on your floor as well.  A lovely self contained area. If you are allergic to cats or don't like them, our home is not for you.  They have the run of the house and we love them dearly.  Photos to come as soon as I can get AirBnB to come take some.

Denver is an incredible place to live and I adore it.  I have been here, in this house for 27 years.  Wash Park is one of Denver's premier parks with walking/biking paths, tennis courts, a lake and much more.  It is about 8 blocks long and 4 blocks wide and I am 1/2 block away from it. 

I am a social person who loves to be with my friends playing tennis, eating out or just entertaining.  I have a 19 year old daughter who is a freshman in college.  I have great friends and am really close to my family immediate and extended.  I love to travel and have participated in many home exchanges around the world.  I am self-employed as a CPA.  We have 3 cats which we love dearly who are friendly and fun.  I love tennis, music, cooking, eating out and travel.  I love to garden and if we are not travelling extensively during the summer, I usually have a kitchen garden going in the back yard.  We have a lovely patio in the back with a table, a seating area and a grill.  The space is covered for the rare rain we get and to keep the space cool in the summer.

You can walk to either S. Gaylord or S. Pearl and there are retail stores, bars and restaurants.  Lite Rail will get you from the airport to within walking distance of our house.  It then can take you downtown, to all of the sports and entertainment arenas, Park Meadows Mall and other places.   You could do without a car from our house and do just fine unless you want to head to the mountain towns.

I am an active person who is constantly curious.  I am an amateur photographer.  I travel quite a bit.  Because we are new to this and I have a young daughter, I would prefer couples and women guests.

name: Mik
about:
I am fairly low-key.  I have a dog.  I like the outdoors.  I do like a no shoes in the house in general policy as much as possible. I am also non smoking, do no drugs, and lead a fairly healthy life-style.  My interests include travel, learning, arts, health, and culture, to name a few.  Well, that is a start..
lol ; )

name: Jennine
about: I'm in marketing and my husband Andrew is a Realtor. We both love Denver and own a couple properties here. We currently live in the Baker neighborhood. We enjoy spending time with friends, trying new restaurants, going to concerts, Bronco games, and traveling when we can. Andrew loves people and I love wine!

name: Maureen
about:
I'm a grad student at DU and a bartender. I've lived in Denver for a few years, and I love it here. I also love to SUP (stand up paddleboard) although most people don't think it's a very Colorado activity, it totally is!
My motto is from Emerson: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air's solubrity!

name: Bence
about: Hi, I am originally from Budapest, Hungary and living in Denver for almost 20 years now. I am the head designer/owner of a small furniture/cabinet design/build company. I love what I do for work but any chance I get I go on climbing trips as it is my favorite hobby. I also travel to Europe 1-3 times a year to visit my family and friends.

name: Tina
about:
Hello fellow travelers!

Originally from upstate NY and Italian... I am proud to say my friends say I make a mean meatball!  I love my cozy bungalow here in Denver and thought it was finally time to share it with Airbnb.  I work from home for a global non profit so I'm primarily in my home most of the time because of this. I am also an avid cook who enjoys live acoustic music, hiking, camping, entertaining family and friends and food blogging. (I would be happy to cook u p a homemade meal for my guests for an additional fee if interested in sitting at my table over looking a historic residential street of Denver.) I can make great recommendations for park walks, hikes, restaurants and local gems in the hood and for a small fee I can drive and drop in the neighborhood in my Jeep.  I look forward to meeting you! Cheers!

name: Eric
about: We're both Denverites but we greatly enjoy traveling and meeting and staying with locals.  We've couch surfed, hosteled and camped across mexico and central america and we've made it to 49 out of 50 states.  You can read more about us at our blog: (URL HIDDEN)

name: Seiler
about: I was born and grew up in Maine.  Got my undergraduate degree at Clemson University in South Carolina and my graduate degree from Ohio State University.  Lived and worked in Atlanta, Florida, and Denver before moving back east with my fiancé to be closer to family.  We love all sports and outdoor activities.  We both miss Colorado a ton!

name: Gillian
about:
I love to explore, visit new places, and meet new people!
Five things I can't live without:
My cats
The ability to redecorate my house
Adventure
Movies
Nooch

I love visiting Chicago, and would love to visit the west coast/more of the eat coast.

name: Sarah And Justin
about: We are transplants to Colorado I am from the deep south Savannah, GA and my husband from Michigan.  We love the outdoors, camping, skiing, hiking, cycling and our fat cat Earl and blue heeler Petunia!  We enjoy spontaneous bike brewery tours and hanging out in our neighborhood. We love to travel domestically and internationally and would love to provide a pleasant affordable place for people to stay.

name: Pavlo
about: ...a working and traveling gent! Currently around the world with Doctors Without Borders.

name: Jack
about:
Besides loving to travel and meet people around the world, I have a solid  track-record as an Airbnb guest and host, always earning a 5-star rating showcasing my top-notch hospitality as a host and customer experience expert! 

Big into the outdoors, great food and meeting awesome people.  I enjoy a 5-star experience for myself and my guests and hope everyone will enjoy their experiences at the PH.

name: Amber Bartlett
about:
We love hot wings and karaoke and we do not enjoy pants (well, this is Amber writing, so... that's mostly me). My go-to song is the classic choice: Wanna Dance with Somebody, by Whitney Houston.  We ski, we bike (super casually), we eat (not as casually), we hang, we sometimes hibernate, we do hikes and camp occasionally, mostly... we eat.

Sloan and I think it's weird when people call it ColoRADical, but find Denver to be pretty great. Sloan was born and raised (while touring with his band, Single File, for many years, and making home and career [Video Game Design] in NC and Los Angeles-- eventually settling back in Denver). Sloan now works in engineering design and dabbles in contracting, he's a telecommuter for a company in LA. I'm from Huntsville, Alabama and totally lost my accent (so people say), but still support use of the word y'all. I moved to Denver for a job in 2013; I work at a college as the liaison to our high school population, so I'm kind of the college-mom to 700 teenagers at any time; so I enjoy my PTO and use it wisely.  I really enjoy Colorado; the skiing is amazing, the views are kinda silly how awesome, and there's always a reason to eat (my number one). 

I (Amber) love roller-coasters and am constantly bugging Sloan to vacation to anywhere that has them. We think Airbnb is way cooler than hotels, unless the hotels have free happy hour… then... #sorry

Anyways, as far as hosting goes… we bought our house in April 2015; Sloan immediately started tearing down walls (lit-er-ally), he's kind of amazing at design (ifIdosaysomyself) and we've ended up with a house that (IMO) stands out from the rest. We adore -I don't use super fancy words lightly- our home. We really wanted to stay away from the modern, sleek, new-age feel that is popping up everywhere, so we kept all the old features and did lots of re-purposing! Most of our decor has a story and/or we found it at a estate sale. The guest nook is actually one of our favorite aspects of the home and we're so excited to show it off and give the newbies and frequenters a taste of OUR Denver. 

Did I do that bio thing correctly? Let me know if you have other questions. I'm way better at answering questions, than writing bios!

name: Stacy
about: We are a local family that loves our beautiful city of Denver! We are real estate agents at Kentwood City Properties and focus on buying and selling around the Downtown area. The reason we work is because traveling is our passion! We have been all over the world and have experienced numerous trips through VRBO and (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). We thought we might open up our home here in Denver for travelers wanting to experience our beautiful weather, lifestyle and world class skiing! Having been all over the world, we can attest that Denver is an amazing place to live and visit. Our passion for outdoor activities like biking and camping and skiing makes Denver the perfect place for our home. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

name: Marcus
about: My name is Marcus and I am originally from Colorado!  I love to snowboard in the winter and travel as much as I can.

name: Lauren & Will
about: We are a loving couple in our 20s with a beautiful home that we would be happy to share with you. We have a lot of experience hosting guests.

name: Ken
about:
I'm a business owner, married with 3 grown children. 21, 25 and 29. I am a singer song writer, musician and recording artist. I like yoga, meditation and working out. I also enjoy making beer. I love cooking traditional french food. 

My wife and I are avid skiers, hikers and campers and take full advantage of Colorado year round. 

I am working on my first book and intend to incorporate sales, sales training and personal development into a series of public speaking engagements while traveling in Europe.

name: Alan
about: I am a retired lawyer, part time summer Rancher.  Bird watch, Grandfather. Divorced, active hiker and exerciser. 6 grandchildren live 3 in KC MO, 3 near SF CA. Recently stayed in a great Airbnb in La Paz Bolivia.   y son has used them in about 15 countries in Europe and SA.

name: Tim And Cindy
about: We love living in the heart of Denver. We are active city folk who love to get into the mountains. We are parents, gardeners, readers and enjoy entertaining friends on the patio.

name: Matt
about:
I like learning, I like traveling, and I enjoy the work I do.  It took me a long time to find a way to live my dream life --I worked as an EMT, as a wildland firefighter, finished a degree in English, and went on to law school, before finally finding my calling as a magazine and commercial photographer.  Over the last seven years I've shot photographs and video for clients ranging in scope from National Geographic to the U.S. Federal Government.  The work is creative, engaging, keeps me in a position where I can constantly learn new things and meet new people, and affords me the kind of in-depth experiences that I thrive on. 

If you're staying at my house it means that I am probably away working on something that I love.  It's unlikely that I'm staying at chain hotel and probably not eating at the mall --I prefer to travel for the sake of finding new things to enrich my experience.  I tend to travel light which means that I've left most of the accouterments of my existence for you at the house.  Feel free to play the piano in the living room; it's (mostly) in-tune.  It's a place where I enjoy living and one that, I hope, will offer you the same quality of stay.  I'm a regular guest in other's homes and I try to bring that experience to offering a home and amenities that will suit your own choice to find something a little more personal than beige hotel life.

name: Andy
about:
Filled with love for adventure, I moved out to Colorado for the active lifestyle.  Every weekend is a mini vacation with endless options of outdoor activities and culture.  

Airbnb has allowed me to experience cultures all across the world from a hometown point of view.  I'm pleasured to be able to do the same for you.

name: Adam & Elizabeth
about: We bought our house in Berkley just over 2 years ago, and we still marvel sometimes at just how much we LOVE our house!  But, as much as we love our home, we also love to explore new places, which is exactly why we are listing our home here. We figured, why not let others have their own adventure in our home!  Adam just started his own company, and Elizabeth is a teacher, so whenever there is a school break, we love to get out of dodge and explore. We love to share about our neighborhood and city that we call home so feel free to ask us about our favorite spots or recommendations based on what you're into. We are especially into craft beer, local hikes, good restaurants and making a break for the mountains whenever we can.

name: Alison
about: I grew up in Boston and moved to Denver in 2011 and absolutely love it here. I used to come visit a lot before I moved here and was always looking for affordable housing options so I'm excited to open my home to folks that love CO as much as I do!

name: William
about: Self employed computer consultant.

name: Laura
about: Hi Im laura. My partner and I love to travel. We are currently excited to be visiting Mexico city. Ben my partner is a musician and I am a Grad student at the University of Colorado Boulder.

name: Phannie
about:
I'm a dancer and dance teacher. I love hanging out with my dog River and my boyfriend Wes who lives with me.  I enjoy live music and performances and do some performing myself. I often attend the shows my boyfriend plays, as he's a trumpet player in about 5 different Denver bands as well as having his own 13-piece soul band. 
I like making arts and crafts and the house we live in is in a constant state of flux.

name: Brian And Tarryn
about: Our names are Brian and Tarryn. We are both originally from New York and met in Denver after moving here after college. We love our city and feel like we have grown up with Denver. We've watched it grow from a sleepy cow town to the vibrant and beautiful place it is today. Our family includes 2 young children and 2 old dogs. We love to travel but having children has slowed us down a bit- hopefully we can live vicariously off your travel adventures! As a family we try to spend as much time enjoying the outdoors as possible- hiking, camping and skiing are our faves. We love cooking, sharing meals with friends and exploring all that Colorado has to offer. We look forward to sharing our home and city with you!

name: Cory
about: I grew up in Florida, but moved to Colorado to be closer to the mountains.  I enjoy gardening, cooking, and adventuring in the mountains. My wife is from California and loves to run, hike, and travel. We both enjoy meeting new people and exchanging stories with new friends.

name: Amber
about: I love to hike and eat! Please let me know if I can help you with activities and local restaurants. Denver has so many options!

name: Rahul
about:
I'm an independent consultant that works with clean energy startups in developing countries. 

I was born in Ireland, grew up in the US, and have lived and worked in various parts of Europe, Eastern Africa, and India throughout my 20s. I've been lucky to combine my love for travel with work, and am grateful for the opportunity make new friends all over the world. 

As a host:
I'm new to airbnb hosting. My girlfriend and I welcome you to our corner of Denver, which sits right on the edge of Cheesman Park. We moved in during December 2015, and are slowly making the space ours. 

The space is a 2-bedroom condo which we rent out while we are out of town. We rent it out as a 1-bedroom, with our guest bedroom being the main sleeping area for our airbnb guests. There's a balcony,  a pool and sauna in the building, and our neighborhood is pretty great: we are steps from artisan coffee, Chicago deep dish, a neighborhood wine shop, and Denver's beautiful Cheeseman Park.

As a guest: 
I'm a pretty quiet and low key guest, especially if I am traveling for work. I try to be very low impact, but sincerely enjoy getting to know my hosts when possible. I am happy to trade travel stories, career stories, love stories, adventure stories, and foodie tips. I am always ready to catch up over a local brew or check out the local music and foodie scenes.

name: Mark
about: From Denver Colorado .... interests: Triathlons, Back Country Snow Sports, Computer Programming, Concerts

name: Brian
about: Software Developer in to Cars, Music, enjoying good times with good people.  I love to travel, which mostly happens when I'm visiting friends or racing although I'm always working to expand that.

name: Meghann
about: Hi!  This is Rob and Meghann, and we absolutely love living in Denver, and we especially love the wonderfully vibrant Capitol Hill neighborhood.  Let us know when you're in town and we'd love to welcome you to our charming, well-appointed condo for your trip to Denver.

name: Emily
about:
Hi! I'm Emily. My hubby and I live in Denver with our two young girls. We own a coffee house, restaurant, and a cocktail bar. As such, most of our trips revolve around good food and places that inspire community. We love to explore Colorado mountain towns and trails and I'm often looking for fun places to do some running or yoga. Any place with a comfy spot to do quiet reading or daydreaming is a plus.

Our favorite trips in the last year were Austin TX and Salida, CO.

name: Erika & Shawn
about: I am a pretty easy going individual and work for a software company as a project manager. I decided to rent out a room in the house because I travel quit a bit and wanted someone to have a decent place to stay and help take care of the cats.

name: Matt
about:
I am orginially from the midwest.  I've been out here almost 10 years.  I work in computer software and ride my bike downtown to work each day.  I love exploring Colorado.  I'm an avid fly fisher, skier, hiker, biker, camper.

Enjoy good food, good drinks and stories.  Love to cook and also eat out.

name: Mckenzie
about:
About: 
My name is McKenzie Strobach and I help manage this home for my sister and brother-in-law. I grew up in Denver and love this city!! It is growing so much and has so much to offer! I'm passionate about sharing my knowledge of the city and I'm here to help with any questions you may have.

Why Denver: 
This home has been lovingly restored with great attention to detail! It is a perfect location for out-of-town visitors because it is so close to anything and everything you desire! Historic Colfax Ave is about a half block away and has great restaurants, bars, shopping, music venues, book stores, nail salons, records stores, etc. There is also really easy access to nearby parks, Cherry Creek, downtown, and I-70. Ski resorts are about 2-hours away.

name: David
about:
My name is David, and I'm a freelance financial analyst/programmer/event planner/chef. I travel a fair amount, and love to go see live music. I go to Burning Man every year, and my favorite food is Dim Sum.

My place is an awesome Loft in downtown Denver, 2 blocks from the convention center on the main pedestrian mall full of shops, bars, restaurants, and a free bus service. If you're staying in the living room, or the bedroom, I'll probably be around. If you're renting the whole apartment, it's because I'm on vacation.

name: Nick
about: Fun-loving guy in Denver Colorado!

name: Christopher
about:
Love to travel - it's all about the cultures, food, languages and customs.  The more you get out there, the more you learn how much we're really the same at our core.  

I love Jesus, people, and life.  

I'm a military brat and vet.  Wouldn't trade my experiences for anything. 

Married, but no children.  NO pets either.  We'll be fostering and adopting soon though.

name: John
about: I'm from NC, I love the outdoors and rock climbing. I'm also interested in computer programming and technology. I enjoy making art, cooking vegan and partake in many hobbies. Look forward to meeting!

name: Kasia
about: My husband and I are an active couple who love Denver and on the weekends are camping, biking, skiing, or enjoying what our fun neighborhood has to offer. We love our home because of the access it provides to downtown and  the mountains and we invite you to enjoy it too.

name: Jamie
about: Northern New Mexico Native and a Colorado Resident for life. Adventures await, so everyday you can find me outside exploring. I love Colorado because I love to ski, snowboard, mountain bike, hike, camp and paddle board.

name: Levi
about:
Hey there,

My name is Levi and my wife Hillary and I are from Denver, CO. We love to travel and meet new people and we're really looking forward to meeting up with you, whether while we're out traveling our while you come to visit Colorado.

Our hobbies are food and coffee: Hillary spends as much time in her garden as possible and I like to geek out about coffee and I roast my own. We love having people in our home and hope you enjoy your time here with our family and pup.

name: Katie
about: I am a CO native, raised in the mountains and have been living in the city for the last several years. I LOVE yoga, running, reading, movies and exploring Denver's amazing restaurant and bar scene, to name a few things!

name: Haley
about:
Hi! I'm Haley. I'm currently living in Denver, Colorado. I love traveling, whether it's around other continents, or out in my own backyard. I love doing yoga, whenever and where ever. I am a huge fan of slack lining in authentic, Goodwill 80's ski suits. I also like to ride bikes :)

I'm a Colorado native, and it never gets old. This city is full of life and constantly changing. I am always running into new dive bars, local restaurants, or interesting new travelers. I love the great proximity to the mountains, breweries, parks, and bike trails. 

I share the apartment with my boyfriend. He is included in one of the main photos- if you'd like to get a glimpse into his handsome features! We are both pretty laid back, and usually have an IPA a night. He's starting a brewery, so if you're looking for a long talk about beer, he's your man.

name: Holley
about: Active, hard working, down to earth, mature woman.  Natural introvert but friendly.  Love reading, good music & sadly, junk food.  Will try to assist with questions & info but will encourage your independence in discovering our great city & surrounding areas.

name: Alexandra
about:
I'm a Denver transplant by way of Connecticut, DC, Honolulu, NYC and originally New Orleans. Working mother of two young kids born 12 months apart.  They give me a run for my money every single day and a lot of nights.  

Loves: Colorado, Airbnb (and the Sharing Economy as a whole!), road trips, interior design, historic buildings, meeting new people, travel, wine, and spending time with friends and family!  

Couldn't live without: sushi, my iPhone, Restoration Hardware, wine, and the beach.

name: Seth
about:
Hey Everyone!  I am a late 20's professional who has been living in Denver for over 6 years. I practice a healthy lifestyle, and enjoy a good conversation or game of ping-pong. I am a life-long musician, yoga teacher, and traveler.  Love to cook and garden, and mountain bike when I find time to get out to the mountains. 

A few favorites...
City - Denver
Travel Destination - Bali and surrounding islands
Music - Beck, Radiohead, Phish, The Beatles, Talking Heads, just about everything..
Movie - The Shank (Shawshank)
Book - The Alchemist
Food - Sushi

name: Meredith
about: An East Coast Transplant--loving my new life in the mountains!

name: Cindy
about:
Both of us born and raised in Chicago (a great place to be from!) my husband and I packed up our 4 small children and moved to the mountains of Colorado 15 years ago - and have never looked back!  We came for the quality of life the Denver area has to offer - we love to camp, hike, climb 14ers, watch meteor showers, snowshoe, ski and snowboard. 
We also love to travel and have seen much of the USofA, Mexico, Latin America and Europe -- and we're planning our next trip  - to Thailand!  
We hope you love staying in Denver as much as we do - enjoy the sites, the wonderful people and the chill vibe - you're gonna love it here!

name: Claire
about: I recently moved to Denver after 7 years in the Pioneer Valley (Happy Valley) of MA.  I went to college in Western Mass and after graduating with a degree in Sustainable Architecture, I stuck around the area to work on a diversified organic vegetable farm for 2 years.  I loved how immediate and present that work was and have always enjoyed working with my hands, whether it's sculpture or picking vegetables.   After leaving the farm I started to work with food in a different way as a line cook and pastry chef at an upscale american restaurant in the Valley.  I've been a passionate cook for just about as long as I can remember and doing it as a paid career hasn't killed that love yet!  At the end of July 2015 I moved to Denver with my husband, Rich, where I have been able to pursue pastry full time.  I hope to own my own dessert/cocktail bar or homestead/B&B someday.  When I'm not working, I enjoy skiing, rock climbing, hiking, cooking, home renovation and chilling with my two main men-- Rich and our adorable cat André.

name: Chris
about: Originally from New York, but decided to move to Colorado about 2yrs ago. In Colorado to experience a different life than the one I had back in Brooklyn.

name: Kathleen
about:
Hi friends,

I'm looking forward to meeting you!  I live in Denver with my husband and daughter.  I love reading, biking, and exploring new places.

name: Ethan & Kat
about: We're quiet, clean, and keep to ourselves, but enjoy the company of others and are always happy to socialize with guests. We've lived in Denver for many years and can offer some suggestions for jogging or bike riding, museums, sports teams, theatre, restaurants, and shopping. We added a guest book to our listing, so please feel free to check it out. We love the outdoorsy Colorado lifestyle, but also the amenities of a large city.

name: Emily
about:
Hi, I'm Emily from Denver!   I love to travel and explore this beautiful world.  Meeting fun and authentic people is a must for any adventure!

I'm a 30-something, who works in the travel and tourism industry. Other interests and passions of mine:  photography, foodie, running, cycling, hiking, and general exploration.  I love the AirBnB concept.  Such a cool way to genuinely experience any location.  I like a good mix of planned activities and time left for "unplanned adventures."

name: Bob
about: I enjoy traveling, reading, playing cards, skiing, and just kicking back and relaxing. When I travel, I am always on the lookout for funky accommodations right in the heart of the action.

name: Lauren (Lolo)
about: Hello! Wow, I feel like I am writing a dating profile. I am a 27 y/o social media consultant with a genuine love to share everything. One may even call me an 'over-sharer,' but I am comfortable with that title. When I am out adventuring, I want people to stay in my home and experience Denver and all its curiosities. This town RULES and I will leave you a great itinerary of fun things to do both close by and in the mountains. When I am home, my house is always open to travelers and I want to keep that vibe alive while I am away. Spin records, drink wine, eat cheese and enjoy my space!

name: Abby
about: Lover of travel, food, good company, and belly laughs. Enjoy spending time exploring the great outdoors, or simply sitting on the porch with a cup of joe. Recently wrapped up a year of service with AmeriCorps NCCC, and love calling Denver my new home-- come see what all the buzz is about! Cheers!

name: Danielle
about: Originally from San Francisco!

name: Deanna
about: Breckenridge is one of our favorite places to unwind and we try to do it as often as we can!  When we can't, we love sharing our condo with others to experience the sereneness and seclusion that our property offers!  Other places we absolutely love to visit are Costa Rica, Hawaii, the Domincan Republic and Mexico!

name: Anne
about: minnesota girl. skier. cyclist. dietitian. adventure junkie. like my quiet time, but love to socialize with friends. enjoying the moment. good human.

name: Carol
about: Professional Business Woman.  Renting available home now. Willing to trade in other states, countries.

name: Celia
about: I am a full-time dreamer and part-time therapeutic bodyworker. I am devoted to my family and work. I enjoy gardening, cycling around this beautiful city, cooking, food preservation, and sharing and exploring with people from all walks of life. Sharing my home with travelers from around the globe is an expression of my wish to provide a quality experience and space for our guests.

name: Maureen
about:
We love meeting all different kinds of people and we welcome you to come and enjoy Denver's diverse culture, friendly people and beautiful scenery.

I have lived all over the U.S. and in Japan for 4 years (in the Navy), but have been in Denver for the past 18 years. My husband Dano is a Colorado native who lived in Hawaii for about 8 years.  We have two adult children and have had terrier dogs in the past.  We love to travel, explore, and learn new things.  We especially love the tropics and water sports.  My work background includes Accounting, Internet, and Project Management.  

Dano has always been an entrepreneur and started the first windsurfing school in Denver right after high school.  His work background includes Sales, Marketing and Business Development in the industries of Sports/Recreation, Internet & Graphic Design.   

We're both currently real estate investors. (Dano is also a licensed agent.)  We own properties in Colorado and Florida and are involved in many aspects of real estate including fix-n-flips, new construction, buying notes and distressed properties, and rental management. 

Our favorite travel destinations so far are Hawaii, the Caribbean, California (Laguna beach, San Fran/Marin area), and Mexico (Cozumel, Tulum, Yucatan Peninsula).  Future plans are to visit Thailand, Japan, and Europe.

name: Garrett
about: I love to ski and I am always outdoors. I am a huge Rockies fan, and I love to show people around Denver! You will love it here!

name: Matt
about:
I'm originally from the Midwest, but lived in CA for a couple years before making my home in Denver. I've been to about 20 countries for work and for pleasure. I have a "travelers spirit" and enjoy meeting like-minded folk. 
At present, I travel a lot for work as a surveyor for aerial imagery projects.
I'm into motorcycles, art, photography, architecture, beer, whiskey, longboarding, snowboarding, biking, hiking, and camping. I love exploring all the great restaurants and bars in Denver, and love giving advice on cool spots for you to check out!

name: Lauren
about: Occupational therapist, outdoor enthusiast, world traveler, and enjoy crafting things!

name: Maggie
about:
30 year old, married, Colorado native.
I love to travel with my husband who is originally from Pennsylvania, but I also enjoy staying at home with our wonderful dogs, our bossy cat and our backyard chickens. 
IPA micro brews are my favorite types of beer and crispy french fries (with hot sauce) will always put me in a good mood!
My favorite place to travel so far is the country of Panama- hablo espanol un poco! 
At my own home I am a bit of a clean freak so I vacuum just about everyday and regularly use vinegar. 
We ferment our own kombucha, kefir and collect fresh eggs everyday. Come check out our home, we'd love to visit yours!

name: Robert
about: Former New Yorker now in Denver enjoying the relaxed Colorado lifestyle!  I love sports, live music, and am a bit of a foodie too.  Also drive for Uber & Lyft in case you need a ride! Just ask me...

name: Wes
about:
Colorado is an amazing place for recreation. From incredible restaurants and metropolitan nightlife, to a burgeoning music scene featuring world famous Red Rocks Amphitheater, and of course the crown jewel of Denver is our proximity to the Rocky Mountains.
I have spent over five years living abroad in Spain and South America, and have traveled extensively from Canada to Chile and across Europe, and there's just something about my hometown that keeps calling me back.
whether you're visiting Denver for a show, a weekend getaway, as a hub to launch into the mountains, or just to sample the local goods, I would be happy to share my experience as a local, and point you in the direction of some great restaurants, bars and breweries, all types of live music, or amazing mountain recreation.

name: George
about: World traveler.  Love traveling the world with my family.  My favorite destination thus far has been Thailand.  Second best would be Morocco and I love Costa Rica as well.  Next on the list is Australia.  My family has always wanted to visit Australia

name: Gabrielle
about: I was born and raised in Denver, Colorado but have spent most of my adult life outside of the US. I went to school in Toronto then lived in several locations in South America.  I work in the travel industry and get to travel a lot! I have rented Airbnb spaces for years when I travel and now that I own my own space in Denver it's a joy to be able to return the favor to fellow travelers!

name: Steven
about: We are both Denver natives.  Just had our first son so had to move to a larger house.  We loved this condo because we could walk everywhere.  Also across the street from a park which is great for summer time activities.

name: John
about:
We have lived in the Denver Area for over 9 years.  We originally lived in Highlands Ranch, but have recently relocated to Denver.  We have also lived in Rancho Cucamonga, CA.; Baltimore, MD; Missouri; and Kansas.  John likes the outdoors, biking, skiing, sports, and cooking.  Jennifer enjoys museums, theater, and movies.  Both like restaurants, breweries, the mountains, and exploring Denver. 

John was formally employed in the hotel industry and currently drives for Lyft and Uber.  We enjoy Airbnb, Lyft and Uber and how these sharing parts of the economy serve to make the world a little smaller.   We really enjoy sharing a part of our home with travelers and want to make you as comfortable as possible for your stay.   We are here to offer assistance or guidance if needed, but can also leave you to your own if you like.

name: Leah
about: I am a Denver native, with a love for urban and rural adventures alike. If you are coming to Denver, I will be your invisible concierge to all that the city and state has to offer.

name: Preston
about: I'm a professional in the non-profit world and am a fifth generation native Coloradan. I love Denver and it makes me happy to show people around this great city I call home.

name: Nick
about: Young Professional living in Downtown Denver. I work out of my loft when I'm not on the road, and travel frequently across the Rocky Mountains which leaves it open often! Love golf, snowboarding, hockey, and anything active.

name: Kate
about:
Oh hi. I am born and raised in the Denver area and love calling this city my home. I am a flight attendant and gone about half the month traveling. I love trying new restaurants and bars in the area so if you ever have a question about the best happy hour or parks then just ask! I know all the things. Denver is a place filled with fun, adventurous, laid back people who love beer, brunch and pizza. So if you don't like beer, brunch or pizza or sunshine or bikes then you wont like Denver. 

5 things I can't live without - ice cream, my family, my passport, guacamole, ice cream.
Favorite travel destination - southeast asia
My life motto is "live every day to it's fullest!!"  - boring, I know.

name: Scott
about: Professional couple (he: Colorado native; she: live/worked in Denver for 8 years) with teenage daughter.  Our Denver house is the perfect launching pad for visiting CO family, ski trips, hiking and camping, trail running, exploring biking downtown...

name: Matthew
about:
I have lived in Denver since 2009 and have previously lived in Houston, Los Angeles, Orange County, and Saint Louis. I am an IT project / product manager and I love gardening, nature walks, and bargain hunting. 

Through past jobs I have had the opportunity to visit numerous US cities and have driven across or visited more than half of the USA; internationally I have been to Vancouver, Moscow and Saint Petersburg. Some of my travels were through Airbnb, which is what inspired me to become a host. Colorado remains my favorite place in the world, so far.

name: Jobi
about: 26 year old female who knows what it's like to want a great place to stay when traveling. I have stayed in several AirBNBs and always love when I find the perfect place. I have lived in Colorado for 8 years now and love it. I hope that when you stay you adore it also! I'm happy to recommend restaurants, events, activities, hiking/biking/running trails, etc.

name: Alex & Katie
about:
We both recently moved to Denver from different cities. As old friends, we reconnected and are highly enjoying hosting and being hosted on Airbnb! When we're not working (which isn't that often), we both try to be outdoors. We enjoy hiking, skiing, running or just exploring our new home/city: Denver.

Both of us have had many great experiences with Airbnb, both as guests and hosts. So finally having a place that we are able to list and host guests of our own is a ton of fun! Especially in such an amazing city. We are looking forward to getting to know some great people in the Airbnb community and sharing our home in wonderful Denver.

name: Sarah
about: Originally from Portland, OR, I've made my home in Denver, CO for the last several years.  I work for a craft events company that creates festivals and other fun things in town, and I work a lot in the local food and brewery scene, connecting farms and breweries with restaurants.  I love to cook, knit, craft, see live music, and play outside.

name: Scott
about: Married couple 62 years old. Love travel

name: Krista
about: I have over 13 years of experience renting homes in the Denver area.

name: Billy
about:
Hi I'm Billy! I'm a happy-go-lucky guy who loves living in Colorado and all it has to offer.  For work I spend my days at a great Renewable Energy company here in Colorado (we develop and construct wind and solar farms) so I like to think I'm part of the solution :-)  

Here's my background: raised in Norway (with mom and sister) and then came to the New York to live with my father and go to High School.  After High School I ended up at University of Connecticut.  The plan was to head back to Norway but alas, I left for California for about a decade.  Five years ago I made the brilliant life decision of moving to Colorado.  The people, the weather, the golf, the overall beauty of this state make me eternally grateful.  Now that I finally have bought an amazing home I am so happy to share it with out-of-state visitors to give you that extra bit of comfort and convenience during your stay in Colorado. If only Airbnb was around all those years I was traveling around!  I can guarantee  you an exceptional stay at my home and urge you to contact me if you need anything at all when you are in my home.  I believe in always treating people the way I want to be treated and I walk around in a perpetual state of gratitude and feeling empathetic. 

My girlfriend Julie and I love the Mile High City and we're so happy to share it with you - feel free to reach out with any questions. 

Cheers!
Billy

name: Erin
about: I am a freelance videographer/storyteller/content creator. My assignments and passion for travel have taken me across the country and the globe. I love meeting new people, am partial to full belly laughter and believe everyone has a great story to share.

name: Thomas
about: Hello! We are a french/U.S. couple who moved to Denver from Paris about a year ago. We'll rent our house out on Airbnb for the first time this winter when we leave to travel. We strongly believe in the virtues of discovering new places around the world, hopefully our house will make you fall in love with Colorado, just like it did for us!

name: Steve & Rob
about:
Father and son welcome you to downtown Denver!!! We've lived in Colorado since 1972, and look forward to sharing our city and state with you!  Join us for all that Denver has to offer, and let us know if we can provide additional lodging in Denver's Congress Park neighborhood, or in Dillon, CO (in the heart of the Rockies)!

Our downtown condo is appointed with everything you'll need to enjoy Denver at its finest.  Let us know what we can do to help make your visit just as you hope it to be!

name: Elizabeth
about: Love to travel....Love to use AirBnb...I am originally from Georgia, so southern hospitality comes naturally.  I am an interior designer and Realtor.  Moved to Colorado in the 1990's.  I know all the places worth visiting and eating out in Denver, just ask!

name: Taylor
about: Love the Rocky Mountain region. My favorite side is outside. Colorado life is pretty wonderful. From downtown, to Red Rocks, to the mountains, each has awesome things to offer. Born and raised on our family ranch in Wyoming. Currently living in the city of Denver and making as many side trips as possible.

name: Renee And Linda
about:
Denver, CO
Hi. Thanks for inquiring! We are both professionals involved in the field of education. Primarily, supporting 1st generation college students in their endeavor to pursue a degree in higher education. 
During our down time we enjoy watching/streaming Broad City, Fargo, Shark Tank, Shameless, The Nightly Show with Larry Wilmore - to name a few. 
Together we designed this living space and have enjoyed sharing it with others. When we have guests, our objective is to create a feeling of privacy and respect as it relates to one's stay.

name: G
about:
Adopted Colorado native of 18 years - 12 years in Vail and 6 fabulous years living in Capitol Hill in Denver. I LOVE this city and this state - it has so much to offer visitors and residents. The culture, diversity, performing arts and culinary scene are just a few of the things that make me smile here every day.
I am lucky to live in a building built in 1929 and have a genuine appreciation for the scope of architectural styles in my neighborhood and across the city. Downtown and the surrounding areas, Capitol Hill, City Park, Midtown, Uptown, RiNo, LoDo and LoHi all have surprises for you to discover on your visit.
I truly enjoy helping people connect to the best of the best local gems, whether it's one of our hidden comedy venues to the newest and most innovative restaurants. Our food truck scene is out of this world, we have the most amazing bands locally and headliners that come from across the country and around the world to perform here.
I know experts who can give you private craft brewery tours, tailored to your specific tastes and wishlists. Budtenders can be booked for an informative, fun and unique dispensary tour, to discover the truth behind the cannabis lifestyle in Denver. Having lived in the Rocky Mountains for 12 years, I'm happy to make recommendations for day trips or adjunct trips to the mountains for any seasons.
With seven professional sports teams, Denver has a lot to offer. The Denver Center for the Performing Arts has incredibly well presented plays throughout the year, as well as hosting long runs of national productions, like Wicked and Book of Mormon, just to name a few.
I'm blessed to enjoy a great rapport with my guests and respect their privacy. Please communicate any special needs or concerns about your trip. It's my pleasure to be of service.
As an occasional Lyft driver, I frequently arrange to pick up and drop off guests at the airport to make their stay a little easier and a seamless transition, when possible. Feel free to contact me for this added service. I do personally check in each guest, no matter the time of day or night.
Please check out my other listings if your dates don't coincide with what you see available on the calendar. And feel free to contact me if you don't find availability when you need it, I might be able to help you find another Airbnb listing that works for your needs.

name: Jason
about:
Buenos Dias :-)

I'm from Denver, Colorado - a 3rd generation native - and like to visit new places and meet new people. 

I work for a company that develops "mHealth" iPhone and Android apps and am fortunate that this work allows me the freedom and flexibility to work remotely and travel. I've visited many countries and have lived in Boston, Hawaii and Bolivia (where I was a Peace Corps volunteer). 

I also love sports and outdoor activities. I play basketball and volleyball; and I enjoy mountain biking, snowboarding and surfing.

If you have any questions for me - or just want to chat, let me know!

Saludos :-)

name: Rachel
about: I have lived in Denver for the past ten years, but the southwest desert of Arizona will always be home.  I love living in the Denver metro area and am thrilled to share this great city with others.  Please feel free to ask me about great restaurants, yummy wine, or the closest brewery! Thanks to my two rambunctious Labradors, I also know the best parks, dog parks, and nearby hikes.  Welcome.

name: Ted & Michelle
about:
Ted landed in Denver from the east coast (Boston area / NYC) over 10 years ago and never looked back. An educator by trade, he spends his free time skiing, snowboarding, playing hockey, climbing, running, jumping, high-fiving... he is an outdoor cat. He occasionally navigates locals and tourists throughout Denver in a giant bicycle bar!

Michelle came to Denver by way of Texas and NYC to complete her PhD in clinical psychology. She enjoys reading, crossword puzzles, napping in the sun.. she is an indoor cat.

Together, we love our goofy dog, running around the mountains, and playing chess on our porch.

name: Larry
about: I am  a retired university librarian and my wife, Sue,  ran her own research business for many years.  When not in Denver, where we recently relocated to be near family, especially our grandson, Charlie,  we love traveling, especially in Italy and Mexico.

name: Spencer
Aj
about: I'm a photographer based in Denver, CO.

name: KC And Tak
about: We're young professionals who love the outdoors, food and travel. We've been in Colorado for more than 10 years and love everything that the state has to offer. We've met great hosts throughout our travels through Airbnb and would like to share our space with the fellow travelers.

name: Marilyn
about:
Hello, we are a family of 3 adults plus pets, no young children.
Very easy going, welcoming family, come and hang out with us or simply retire to the privacy of the top floor suite with a balcony!
Our house was featured on NBC news!
We are right next to Washington Park, a vibrant part of Denver, just minutes from Downtown, Cherry Creek, Tech Center and most Universities.  Hope to see you soon!

name: Nina
about: I grew up in Denver and Vail, have lived in Vail since June 2011.  I am in my early 50s, love to ski, cycle, and travel a fair amount, most recently have spent a lot of time in Stockholm and in Mexico.

name: Sam
about: I love adventure and experiencing new places. I am a firm believer that memories are far more valuable than things! I truly hope that our space allows you to create fond memories that will take with you as you continue on your own adventures :)

name: Jeremy
about:
I'm an outdoors enthusiast, country boy and easy going person.  I live with my girlfriend Rebecca and we love to meet & converse with everyone.  I spend most of my free time either outdoors skiing, hiking, rafting or at concerts.  I've traveled all over the US, NA and parts of Asia, Central America & Europe.  
As a host, during the week I expect people to not be up all night partying (in my place) as I work early hours at a nearby hospital.  I'm an excellent cook and maybe if you're lucky enough you can sample.  I normally cook 3-5 times a week and can make just about anything.  
I'm always up for a good conversation and love watching sports.

name: Justin
about:
Hi there, I'm Justin!  I was born and raised in Colorado and then completed college here as well.  After that I moved for my first time to NYC, and spent 2 great years there.  It was an amazing life experience and I am grateful I did it.  Although NYC is amazing, I realized Colorado is my true home.  So, I moved back to Denver in 2008 and have been here since.  Denver is an awesome city, and I do not see myself leaving.  I love music, sports, movies, concerts, traveling, learning new things/activities, talking with others and hearing their life experiences.  Thanks for reading, if you made it this far.  

I am a very laid back and also very respectful and clean.  I want you to feel at home, feel free to come and go as you please, feel free to use the kitchen/utensils, feel free to text me while you are here to ask for suggestions.....you're on a trip for either work or pleasure and I want you to enjoy your stay!

name: Ryan
about:
My girlfriend and I have lived in Denver for awhile now and couldn't be happier with all of the opportunities for adventure and fun the city and state have to offer. We make frequent trips to the mountains for skiing, hiking and camping. When we're staying around the city, we enjoy going to breweries, eating out, going on bike rides and seeing live music. 

When we're being adults and at work, I teach special education at a middle school and Gloria works as a home health care nurse. 

We love to travel and meet other travelers. This is what attracted us to Airbnb. Looking forward to getting to know you and sharing our home and city with you!

name: Jared
about:
My wife (Jenn) and I love to travel.  We just bought property in Nicaragua on the Pacific Ocean and will be moving down there with our baby later this year. We will be starting a Spanish School on the beach, so if learning Spanish while staying in a wonderful community is something that interests you, reach out to us!

We take great pride in making sure our guests have everything they need and experience Denver (and soon to be Nicaragua) in a happy way.

We are both teachers and work in lower-income schools but love every minute of it.  We love music, the mountains, and meeting new folks.  We look forward to hosting people from around the country and world. :)

name: Laura
about: Hi! I enjoy meeting new people and helping others enjoy my city. I am an artist (contemporary dancer) in addition to being a full-time nonprofit consultant/evaluator. I love exploring Denver's museums, breweries, restaurants, art shows, and bars. I grew up in Aurora, CO - only having left for six years for college and work in DC-  I love living in Denver but love to travel more. My most recent trip was to Rome and Barcelona with my mom, and before that was a solo adventure to Panama! Up next... maybe Lisbon? Nicaragua?

name: Jimbo
about: We live in Denver and we love Colorado for all it has to offer!  We have lots of great music venues and all kinds of activities.  Join us for a Wednesday Denver Cruiser ride  and have a great time exploring Denver.  We are here to help and make it a great stay.

name: Tracia
about: I am a Colorado Native and a great source of things to do! Easy going and eager to meet new People.  I am a very experienced traveler and appreciate the value of having some to know where you go to enhance your experience.

name: Ronald
about:
My wife, Alexandra Theriault, our two children and I live in Denver and part-time, in Vail, CO. We have both our Denver and Vail home on AirBNB. We enjoy being AirBNB hosts and AirBNB guests. Ali is a dermatologist in Denver and I'm a in the medical device industry. Our children are 8 and 10 and avid skiers, pianists and students. For family activities we enjoy skiing, hiking, cooking and traveling (Staying in airBNB listings around the world). We enjoy playing piano and guitar and keep one of each for AirBNB guests in Denver and Vail. 

Please note that when Vail shows booked we often have a 3rd bedroom for rent. We love hosting AirBNB travelers while we are using Vail. 

Favorite travel destinations at Turkey, Thailand and France. We can't live without music, books, fine food and powder days.

name: Matt
about: Professional but chill 30yr old male. Full time job mon-fri 8am-5pm. I snowboard during winter and hike and camp during the summer. I go out to bars and restaurants frequently. Work hard play hard. All business all shenanigans all the time.

name: Nancy
about: Architect with Window Restoration Company.  Into Macro and micro sustainability.

name: Kelsey
about: Avid traveler and Chef originally from Seattle.

name: Jenny
about: I love Colorado and love sharing it with new people!  I love to travel and do it often for work so I'm able to share my space while I am on the road.   I am very organized and have a great guidebook for you upon arrival.

name: Melati
about:
I'm an acupuncturist, yoga instructor, and musician, based out of Denver. I travel often and have a penchant for foreign wine and foreign places. Soft spot for travelers wanting to get to intimately know the city they are visiting.

Life is about experiences, not belongings. Let's make some memories!

name: Olivia
about: I have an awesome spot in Wash Park so happy to share it with you!

name: John
about: I work at Tack Mobile, a tech agency in RiNo, near downtown. Happy to help with some local knowledge, I've been in Denver about 10 years now.

name: Brian
about:
I graduate in December 2014 with my degree in electronic media. I'm a non smoker, and am usually very active. I'm very respectful of other peoples space. I recently sold my rental property of 10 years, so I know what it's like to have a place to take care of. 

I'm generally not a big traveler but am considering changing that. I think Airbnb is a fantastic idea, and once settled, I will look into hosting as well.

name: Marlena
about:
We are a family who loves to spend time together. Whether that be traveling to new places or just playing a board game. We have always lived in Denver, Colorado. We are all friendly, respectful, clean and quiet (minus some fun and laughter). 

We are a former foster family, we have hosted foreign exchange students, and we have rented rooms in our home for the past 2 years. Hospitality is our specialty! We look forward to hosting you! Individuals, Couples, Families and LGBTQ+ community welcome!

name: David
about: Resident of Colorado for 15 years now.  Moved from Nebraska, and this is my new home now, and I love it!!  My partner and I bought this house 3 years ago, and really enjoy it and the neighborhood!

name: L. Daniel
about: I live in Denver. I like cooking, and biking around Denver.

name: BlueOceanLori
about: I love to travel and get to know new people from different country and new cultures (& FOOD of course). I have been Colorado for 14 years. I love every moment of  this place. It's a magical place with wonderful people and it's growing and changing every second.

name: Avery
about: I love community, good food and adventures. I work for an international non-profit organization that has taken me around the world. I love opening my home to travelers, as so many gracious hosts have likewise done for me.

name: Julie
about: I am an easy-going professional - Community Development/Mediation.  I have a Masters Degree in Urban and Regional Planning.  Just finished a year long teaching fellowship with 4th grade math scholars.  I am a 4th generation Coloradoan on both sides of my family.  I am very proud to be able to say that!!  Single, no kids.  I love to laugh, cook and entertain, sing, read, camp, travel and see films.  I collect art and new friends!  I could not live without my friends, my art, my books, my down comforter, my sense of humor. I love being an Airbnb host!

name: Jenna
about: Fun professional.

name: Don
about:
HI, I HAVE LIVED IN DENVER MOST OF MY ADULT LIFE.  DURING THAT TIME I HAVE BEEN A TEACHER, REAL ESTATE INVESTOR, AND OLD HOUSE RESTORER.  IN THE LAST 3 YEARS I HAVE INVESTED OVER $125K INTO MY OLD HOUSE AND COUNTLESS HOURS.  I'M NOW HONORED TO OPEN MY OLD HOUSE TO THE AIRBNB COMMUNITY.  COME AND ENJOY.

WHEN NOT WORKING ON MY OLD HOUSE, I ENJOY TENNIS, SOFTBALL, AND GOING TO THE LAKE.  I ALSO ENJOY VISITING MEXICO AND SOUTH FLORIDA DURING THE WINTER.

name: Darrow
about: Having worked in non-profit world in management for 30 years I am passionate about arts and culture, reading and especially PBS and NPR, educational programming where I spent the last decade + of my formal working career. I am an easy host, not usually on the premises but this is my primary home so I do have a separate room  on a different level if I have to be there. Anxious to tout Colorado's special beauty and wonderful mountain towns, I can be directing you to all things out of th way and fun in the city and special destinations west of here.

name: Gary
about:
I am a well traveled, professional single father of two great children. When I don't have my children I tend to jump on a plane and enjoy what other parts of the country have to offer. I am extremely active and have found my place close to the mountains in Colorado. 
I have had the good fortune to travel to dozens of countries and enjoy the adventures of the 'traveler'. 
I look forward to building a strong network on Airbnb both as a thoughtful and respectful guest and soon to be a host.

name: Lovedy
about: I am a Denver based Interior Designer and live in a wonderful, LEED Gold certified, modern home in the lovely West Highland neighborhood, close to the downtown area. I am active in culture & arts, and know Denver quite well. I live  a healthy, active, fun lifestyle, and love what Denver has to offer. I am a friendly, accommodating woman, more than willing to help in anyway I can for my guests.

name: Angelina
about:
I love people! I am a hairstylist, I enjoy cooking and having a nice glass of wine with friends. I love to travel and learn new cultures and people.  I have two children (8&12). We have a friendly border collie named Smiley. Our home is warm and inviting. It's location makes it convenient to everywhere in the Denver metro area.
 As a host, I will respect your privacy and space. You are welcome to use the kitchen to prepare your own meals.

name: Lauren
about:
Some quick info about me - 

I have lived in Colorado my whole life but I love to travel every chance I get.  

I am a huge foodie and although I love sight-seeing and being outdoors, I build my trips around the food I will be eating!  

I currently work in higher education and have my graduate degree in Education.

name: Ana And Dion
about: Ana and Dion are natives of Colorado and have known each other since High School. Dion is a local carpenter and Ana has her own business in alternative healing and mentoring young adults with intuitive abilities. We're passionate about healthy living, conscious creating, community and sustainability. As a former  flight attendant, Ana loves to travel. Her major in college was music. I'm a classical pianist and sing a little (emphasis on a little :)). She's done some professional theatre and belly dancing. In college she worked and lived as an inn keeper on the premises of a B&B in Boulder, Co. and loved making people feel welcome in their "home away from home". We have great stories. I bet you do too! We look forward to sharing a cup of tea or coffee and conversation with you.

name: Ryan And Melanie
about: We are two Denver professionals who, when we aren't grinding away during the work week, are passionate about travel and have visited destinations all over the world. Throughout our extensive travels, we have discovered that we prefer a vacation rental over other types of accommodations—not only is this type of property unique, it provides more space and amenities for the money. Now that we are vacation rental owners, we have replicated unique aspects that we have enjoyed on our trips by incorporated these into our own property. We hope you enjoy the experience as much as we do!

name: Lucy
about:
I am an energetic, retired teacher and mother (all live in CO). I enjoy golf, the arts, music of all kinds, travel, skiing, reading, museums, cooking, and friends & family. Go to CA several times a year. Have traveled throughout Europe 8 times...Mexico 9 different trips, much of the US.
I'll give you privacy, yet have a wealth of information about  local areas and the mountains.

name: Tish
about: I am an easy going cowgirl, with good old fashion "Southern" Hospitality. I love meeting new people.  Friends say I have never met a stranger. Travel is certainly one of my shared passions, with my guests.

name: Christina
about: Christina and Ned have lived in the area for 11 years and in Colorado for many years.  We are professionals in Denver - Christina is a librarian and Ned is happily retired. We have two grown children and had our first Airbnb stay in Philadelphia in June when our daughter graduated from Drexel University in 2011.  Now we can share our neighborhood with other travelers.  Try the LoHi Steak bar at 32nd and Tejon St. or the new Occidental Bar across the street.  My Brother's Bar at 15th and Platte St. is just across the Highland Bridge and is a Denver institution.  Laughing Latte also at 32nd and Tejon makes a mean cup of Joe.  Little Man Ice Cream is just across Hershorn Park - you can see the milk can building from the front porch.  We want you to enjoy our home and neighborhood.

name: Jenni
about: I love living in Colorado and enjoying all that it has to offer.  I was born and raised in the western burbs.  I am a runner, like to mountain bike, and snowboard.  Life is good here!

name: Ida
about:
Hi! My name is Ida, I am a Denver Native, esthetician with an MBA, wife to my amazing husband Joey, and favorite auntie to 9 nieces and nephews. We have a happy dog, Esther, and curious cat, Kermie. 

We love to travel, but mostly we love to eat. We love airbnb because it gives us the chance to meet new friends and a great place to stay, so that's why we chose to host!

name: Cheryl
about: My husband and I have both lived in Colorado for over 25 years.  We now live in Denver with our 2 young boys and love to longboard on the trails during the day and enjoy the city life at night. We hope you will enjoy your stay in our home as much as we do.

name: Jessica
about: Yoga instructor, community and family mediator and life coach.Single mom of two amazing teenage daughters (and one Boston Terrier... he doesn't travel with us though!) and a small kitty named Pippa

name: Kirk, Bryce & Monica
about:
We're one Ohio native (Go Buckeyes) , one Colorado native (Go Hawkeyes - don't ask), and another Ohio native (Go Bearcats), who all found their way to the beautiful city of Denver for the last five years. 

We enjoy conversations that last too long, skiing bluebird days, wearing sun glasses an hour past dark, dancing while cooking pancakes, doing puzzles of things in the ocean, and we always have three opened bottles of Sriracha in the refrigerator. 

Whether you checkout our digs or stay elsewhere, we hope you enjoy all Denver and the Rocky Mountains have to offer!

name: Jennifer
about: I live in London England, but am originally from Florida. I have a thirst for travel and have been so blessed to see so many wonderful places in this world! I enjoy the outdoors, great food and wine and most things that make you feel joyful! I love this site because you can stay in homey places and meet new, exciting people! Jen x

name: LeAnne
about: Well, I'm a high school Spanish teacher raised in Akron, Ohio. I spent 4 years in Detroit and it captured my heart. Curiosity, mountains, and an awesome job led me to Denver but I'm as restless as they come! I love change and new experiences. Traveling might be my only real (EMAIL HIDDEN)e stay!

name: Jen
about: mountaineer, scientist, cat lover, adventurer

name: Justine
about:
Hi! My fiance, Andrew and me just moved to Denver in October! We are absolutely loving the outdoors scene and the people here. There is seriously always something to do! We have a two year old Aussie named Charlotte (called Charley most of the time). She is super sweet and loves people! We are excited to host and meet new people, we love our home so much. It is really something special. We looked for a home here for six months and finally found this little gem. It has so much character... original doorknobs, doors, windows- (don't worry - they have been refurbished) - and the style is so true to the heart of the home. 
Andrew and me like to go out and grab a drink or just hang - watch a good movie. Our favorite things to do include snowboarding, hiking with Charlotte, camping, rock climbing, boating, traveling, concerts... you know :) We also are total foodies - so if you want us to cook for you or recommend some great spots, we have been around the block a time or two even though we just moved here. 
We are excited to have some airbnb'ers in our home, we love it and hope you do too!

name: John
about: I am a Colorado resident for the past 25 years. I moved here from Connecticut in the fall of 1990. I am a big fan of live music and have managed the touring band Leftover Salmon for the past 14 years along with other bands. I've been producing events and working in the music industry for the past 22 years. I love to travel and have backpacked India, Thailand, Nepal, much of Europe, Costa Rica, and Beyond. Recently Air B&B has been a great resource for lodging when i'm traveling. I spent this past summer using Air B&B to book lodging while traveling France and Spain. I booked everything from an apartment in Paris to shared home in Madrid to a camper RV and a sailboat on Ibiza. I look forward to opening my home to travelers and adventure seekers like myself.

name: Mark
about: Semi-recent UC Berkeley grad who does marketing at a tech company. I love music, baking, video games and Harry Potter :).

name: Nevada
about:
Hello!

I was born and raised in Buffalo, New York; went to high school and college in Arkansas; and spent the last 18 years living in Denver, Colorado.

I'm currently living on the island of Roatan, which is 35 miles off the coast of Honduras. It's surrounded by coral reef and the Caribbean Sea.

I use AirBnB to manage a rental property here, located in Sandy Bay on the north side of the island. It has a large studio apartment on the first floor where I live, and the two plus bedroom rental house on the second and third floors. It's a little slice of palm-tree-fringed heaven right on the beach!

While I'm in Honduras, I'm renting out my home in Denver, CO. When I don't have long-term renters in it, I rent it out short-term on AirBnB.

I am a freelance Divemaster. I also run a kayak/SUP/GoPro rental business on the side called Sandy Bay Paddle. Guests at my properties get discounts on rental equipment.

If you're an animal lover coming to Roatan, we always need pet meds of all kinds! Flea, tick, mange, worm and heart worm medicines are most needed, but we'll take anything and in any quantity! Meds can be left at the Denver property too. We sterilize and feed feral cats in the neighborhood and can transport dog meds to the island on our return trips.

Cheers,
Nevada

name: Mick
about:
Mick:  My partner (Patrick) and I live in this Victorian home on the same property as the carriage house.  I enjoy restoring old houses and gardening.  We have Gunner (dog) and Murphy (cat).  I also coach Crossfit classes at the gym on-site every Mon-Wed-Fri.

Patrick:  I enjoy exploring new cities, eating at great restaurants, drinking good beers & spirits and sharing my love of Denver with others.

name: Alejandra
about: i can't wait to host you! we look for great, respectful and honest people to enjoy what we offer.

name: Jamie And Ryan
about: We are two Denver thirty-somethings enjoying the Mile High life with our very friendly chocolate lab/aussie shepherd named Charley.  When we're not checking out live music or on an adventure in the Rocky Mountains, we love traveling just like you!

name: Bruce
about: Writer and part time ski instructor

name: Amanda
about:
We have lived in Denver for many years and love everything about this great city! We are foodies and always have great bars and restaurants to recommend. Exploring Denver is one of our favorite activities, so no matter what it is that you are looking to do, we can definitely offer up some suggestions. We have a wonderful dog who we love very much, but if you're staying at our place you most likely will not meet her because we bring her everywhere we go! 
Our place is located in City Park and is within walking distance of tons of great bars, restaurants, and parks. The Bluebird theatre is right down the street if you are interested in catching a show, and there are many local restaurants within a few blocks radius as well. This neighborhood is filled with local favorites and tons of charm. Our place is located 2 miles from downtown Denver, and about thirty minutes from Denver International Airport. 
The two of us also love to travel and explore other parts of the country and the world. When we travel we love to get a sense for how the locals live, which is why Airbnb is one of our favorite options to find lodging wherever we go. Our next big adventure will be in Banff National Park where we will spend time camping, kayaking, and avoiding the bears. 
We are excited to share with you our love and knowledge of the city of Denver! When it comes to hosting we are happy to be as involved or as uninvolved as you prefer. We love to get to know new people and would be happy to provide you with fun things to do around the city and our neighborhood, but we are also happy to leave the keys and a note and walk out the door. Please do not hesitate to contact with any questions!

name: Holly
about: I live in fabulous downtown Denver in the RINO district which is brimming with art galleries, small batch microbreweries and boutique wineries.  I enjoy biking throughout the city and mountains.  I also love to cook and explore new restaurants in the city and beyond.  Art house movies, gardening, dancing, fishing, and backbacking are a few of my hobbies.

name: James
about:
Hi... I'm James.
I'm very friendly and like meeting new people. I have lived in California, Arizona, Toronto Canada, South America for 6 months and now Denver Colorado. I'm an Entrepreneur and will usually be working from home. I'm active and like to eat very healthy. I like basketball, snowboarding and good movies. I'm an environmentalist and like to think that I'm open minded.

name: Patrick
about:
Patrick Harrington is living a life that inspires him. A former serial entrepreneur, Patrick once started businesses he thought would earn him enough money to live a life full of meaning and difference making. He was always searching for the means to an end. It wasn't until yoga teacher training in 2001 that he found a way to combine his love of business with an end in itself.
 
14 years later, Patrick is the founder-owner of Kindness Yoga, a donation-based collection of studios that hosts scores of teachers and tens of thousands of yoga students annually.
 
Patrick is the father of two girls and a husband. His life has taken on more and more meaning through his committed explorations into his own patterns of - and addictions to - suffering. His classes reflect this intimate and vulnerable process, and allow his students and fellow teachers to relate on a level that transforms. It is though his own healing journey and movement towards living his dharma that leads his yoga teaching, parenting, relationships and business.
 
Patrick has taught before tens of thousands of students, lead teacher trainings and mentored teachers over many years as the owner of Kindness Yoga. “We - as yoga studios and teachers - are not in competition with each other," he says. “Rather, we are in competition with all the unconscious activities out there." Patrick believes that yoga will direct culture towards a more awakened strategy of life. He encourages us to wake up to what we want to contribute in this life and "quit messing around and get on with it!"

name: Natalie
about:
Things I like: cooking, coffee, green papaya (not ripe. never ripe), hanging out with my kid, doing a whole lot of thinking, bicycling, walking, looking at stars and birds, reading, growing food, reinventing, traveling. 

I've traveled to many countries and am currently working on hitting every state in the U.S. 

As a host, I understand what it means to be a good guest. And as I guest I know what I like to find in a good host. It works out well.

name: Liz
about:
I am a Kinder teacher in downtown Denver, and am 100% obsessed with Colorado. The mountains and Denver are equally fun and amazing, and every day I am so grateful that I get to live in such a high energy and beautiful place!
After 15 years of living in and around the downtown area, I've found what I believe to be the sweet-spot of location, fun, diversity, variety, events, architecture, and affordability.  If you need tips or suggestions for things to do in Denver or the mountains, just ask!

name: Dawn
about:
As a classroom teacher for the last 26 years, I love learning and thrive on trying new things.  I am so excited to share this unique space with my guests.

If I was given 3 wishes, I would ask for good health, the ability to travel, and that every new day would be better than the last.  You could say that being a happy and energetic person tops my list of must dos.  

My favorite place on earth is Santa Fe, New Mexico, with it's culture, people and variety of food.  Whenever I visit, I always feel like I have a grounded spirit.

As a host, I am available whenever needed.  Just ask.  Otherwise, enjoy your stay and please plan on coming back to visit soon.

name: Rob And Nikki
about:
Rob and Nikki have lived in the area for 15 years and love all Denver and Colorado has to offer. We welcome you to our home away from your home!  We're happy to host you and excited for you to experience an area of Denver unlike anything else.  Live music, 5-star restaurants, dive bars, sports stadiums, museums, art galleries ...all encompass this unique, eclectic and hip part of Denver...all just steps away!  Or if you prefer, grab a B-Cycle (Denver bike share) and pedal anywhere in the city within minutes.
