Top notch service includes welcome basket with detailed tour book to help you enjoy our favorite spots with ease!

name: Katie
about: I am originally from Des Moines, Iowa. I enjoy running, biking, hiking, doing yoga, and pretty much anything outside. I play a little golf and a lot of yard games. I love to travel! I try to do as much camping in the mountains as possible. Enjoying my time here on earth :)

name: Christopher
about: Hi, Im a Civil/Environmental Engineer, I have served in the Peace Corps and worked many years in Latin America (Mexico, Guate, Peru, Colombia.) I like to ski/board, bike, yoga and live music. Working in National Parks in Mexico, meant that I got the chance to be a tour guide, and host in various situations.

name: Melanie
about:
Things I love: dogs, urban gardening, yoga, horses, great food, travel, funny people, mountain biking, warm weather, down comforters, green cleaning, rovingyogi, social entrepreneurism...
(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Likes:
Wait Wait Don't Tell Me, Dumb Friends League, Denver Urban Homesteading, Blue Mountain Project, Department of State -- Office of Global Women's Issues, Sustainable Food Denver, ClearWater Initiative, Idea Aid, Heifer International, dokuz eyLuL unıversity engLish Language teaching department, REC(ession)IPES, English Language Fellow Program, Earlham College, Water For People, Nonprofit Marketing Guide, CouchSurfing, Causes

name: Thomas
about: Nice, professional guy.  Responsible home owner.  Friendly and low key.

name: Matt
about: My name is Matthew (you can call me Matt!) and I've lived in Denver since 2000 minus a three-ish year stint in New York City. In 2014 I moved back with my beautiful partner Krissy and our daughter Lucy. We live in the middle floor of a three-story Victorian right across the garden from the carriage house. I'm  always looking to meet all the great people that come our way via Airbnb. Let me know if you need any suggestions of what to do in this great city or if you just want to hang out in the yard. Looking forward to meeting you!

name: Jiah
about:
Originally from Los Angeles, now residing in Denver. I have traveled to Europe, North Africa, Asia, and Central America, as well as all over the U.S. I love meeting interesting people, and am happy to host travelers and/or newbies to Denver to share what I have discovered about Colorado in the last 5 years.

I run my own business, play cello and love to dance and try new things, amongst other things :)

name: Forrest
about:
I grew up next to beautiful Lake Champlain in Vermont, and then lived in New Orleans for 10 years before moving to Denver in 2007.  I love the city, and my neighborhood, and being close to the adventure playground of the Rockies.  I've done a decent amount of traveling and know the value of a cozy, friendly place to stay.  My parents always had exchange students staying at our house, and I've been an exchange student in Colombia. Hosting with Airbnb has been an amazing experience, and it's always fun hearing about people's travels, and their experience of Denver, as well as giving any advice I can on my area.
Some favorite cities (other than Denver!): Montreal, Burlington, VT; New York, San Francisco, Rio de Janeiro. 
I look forward to more travels as a guest with Airbnb, as I believe it really gives you so much more of a real feeling for a place, and it's a much richer experience if you can interact with a local.
One of my life mottos:  Never stop learning-or traveling!

name: Jari
about:
Hello!  My name is Jari!  I moved to Denver last August, and I simply could not be happier :)  I am a Special Ed and Deaf Ed Elementary School Teacher and love working within that community.  I love doing almost anything outdoors,  concerts, the arts and just enjoying CO life in general!  
I look forward to your visit :)

name: Billy
about: I love to travel and experience new things.

name: David
about: Friendly and hospitable southern transplants.  We love Colorado and all the things that is has to offer: hiking, skiing, kayaking, great scenery, great food, great people, and more.  We hope that you can experience these things while here and that we help provide you with a wonderful stay at our home.

name: Shannon
about:
ME: Adventurous, but careful (moms and pops taught me those good ole Midwestern traits). Craftsy. Animal and nature lover. Educated. Foodie. Athletic. And I have a loud ass laugh.
What I LOVE: Being in nature. Riding my bike. Reading. Sitting in the sun. Cooking and eating :) And obviously...traveling!
I have traveled all over the world, but now I need to start exploring my own backyard.  Get ready because here I come!

name: Matt
about: Outdoor person who loves to see the sights.

name: Keith
about: I'm a young professional the moved to Denver for the amazing lifestyle and to start my a coworking company. I love the Uptown and City Park West neighborhoods with coffee shops, neighborhood pubs, and a B-cycle station nearby. On the weekends I often do the normal Denver things and head out to the mountains for a quick camping trip or play kickball with friends on Sunday afternoon.

name: Heath
about: I'm a professional in my late 30's.  I grew up in western Massachusetts and moved to the Southwest after college. I lived in Arizona, southern California and south Florida before moving to Denver three years ago.  I love living in Colorado!  When I'm not skiing or camping in the mountains on the weekends I can usually be found seeing live music at one of the many great venues here in the city.

name: Richard
about: I grew up in Colorado and went to college at Pepperdine University. After graduating from college, I travelled the world for a year playing professional tennis. After playing tennis, I returned to Colorado for graduate school, where I met my girlfriend Carla, who is also a professional in Denver. Carla is from Colombia and was studying engineering in Boulder on a tennis scholarship when we met. We are active and busy people and live a healthy lifestyle. We like meeting new people and having fun, but prefer a quiet house after 8pm. We also prefer a smoke-free house (no smoking marijuana, either) and we don't drink much. Also, no pets and please take your shoes off when you enter the house. We are very excited to meet you and think you will love our top floor suite!

name: Mike & Estelle
about:
I love to travel with my wife. Whether it be eating fresh ceviche on a beach in Chile or making powder turns in Alaska's wilderness.  

We love to meet new people and experience what the world has to offer!

name: Becky
about:
I am a happy, people person who believes that we can do wonderful things when we set the intention to do so. I have a yoga clothing company, Beckons Yoga Clothing, and I teach the business of fashion at The Art Institute of Colorado. While I do not believe my jobs defines me, I sure love teaching and designing. 

Travel is my other favorite past time. I recently traveled to the south of France with friends and family where we stayed in a castle. After that, my awesome adult kids and I and walked a portion of the Santiago de Compostela in Spain. I travel a lot in the US and love staying at Airbnb locations. It is there that a person gets the true nature of the city/location.

5 Things I Cannot Live Without:

Travel
Water (beach, pool, river, hot tub, hot springs)
Bacon
Wine
People

I am new to hosting and am looking forward to creating a wonderful environment for my guests. We have an eclectic house full of charm and cool things. Our only pets are fish in a fish tank and Koi in a Koi pond. The energy in our home is peaceful and enriching and I am super excited to share that with others.

Because we have lived in Denver for a long time, we know all the good places to go—local coffee shops, unique boutiques, micro breweries. 

While the space is fairly private, having your own entrance and bathroom, we are happy to share the kitchen and laundry facilities, if you are interested. We looking forward to hosting you!

name: Susan And Matt
about: Our girls, Vivian and Izzi are Colorado grown with a brief 5 year stent to the Big Apple.  These girls enjoyed the opportunities afforded to them in New York and the ability to compete with East while still remaining from the West.  My husband and I are avid cyclists and continued our cycling out East, yet still longed for the foothills, though found the hills on 22 in Westchester County, which led us up to one of our favorite places, Katonah, NY.  You will find local products from Denver and Golden, Colorado and a few hand selected items from New York.  We hope you enjoy the private and serene suite and let us know if we missed anything.

name: Greg
about: Active and happy single dad of 2 beautiful fellas.  We'll be living nearby in another property I own and would love to share our beautiful pad with some responsible small parties eager to see Denver and the Rocky Mountains!

name: KevinBrenda
about: Open minded easy going low drama couple. Been at the same address for 20 years. Originally from Iowa so we are pretty candid, quiet and friendly.  Allergic to cats.  Like reasonably clean environments.

name: Kellianne
about:
Life is an adventure. I love travel, other cultures, learning from others, personal growth, books, food and great conversations.
I love a warm and welcoming home. I dream of creating a home filled with artists, poets, musicians, travelers, creators, fun, laughter and love. All generations would be welcomed. I dream of building a very large farm table where people gather, relax, unwind, drink delicious coffee, and discover secrets! My backyard will be a place of wonder and play. 

My life motto: Be the change you wish to see in the world. Ghandi

name: Valissa And Mike
about: Hi.  Mike and I are relatively new to AirBnB, but have lots of friends who are both hosts, and who stay as guests, and have only heard really great things about their experiences.  We hope to be hosts some day, but for now, we look forward to being guests.  I have two tween/teen sons, and we have three pups.  We are long time residents of Denver, and have loved watching the evolution of our City over the last several decades and continue to delight in exploring new and old in Denver.  We are avid cyclists (especially Mike, who logs over 10,000 miles/year on the roads and in the mountains, and is now getting back into cycle cross in his 60s!). I love to garden (very much in training!).  Most of our recreating is outside--hiking, camping, backpacking, skiing/riding, music festivals....and we also spend a fair bit of time exploring the art scene where ever we find ourselves, and often visit family and travel with family (upcoming family bike/packing trips to Moab and Machu Piccu).  We love to travel and are forever dreaming up our next adventure-currently dreaming of another backpack trip on Kaui's Kalalau trail to celebrate Valissa's 50th.  When on the road, we gravitate to exploring both relatively untamed wilderness and nitty gritty urban landscapes.  My boys attend an Expeditionary Learning school that takes them regularly on week-long camping adventures in the Western US, and can set a camp site like no one's business and are adventurous and undaunted travelers.  I have had a blast teaching them about how they'll likely travel some day when not with me--showing them youth hostels (they loved their first stay with me at a youth hostel in Charleston!), teaching them the common sense needed to enjoy the road.  We have made several visits to Greece and Guatemala to visit family, and closer to home had wonderful adventures in Zion, Bryce, Grand Canyon, Arches, and can't wait to see more of the National Parks. We dream of a family gap year where we can get more deeply rooted in a few locations.  Mike and I sneak away every now and then, just the two of us, and we just had an amazing several days along Big Sur. We are adventurous travelers and diners, and love to meet new people--very much casual folks, but can clean up pretty well when the occasion arises.  Life's motto--mine...Love Never Fails.  Mike--Miles and Smiles.  My younger son is a bit of a Buddha child who sees all that is good in the world, my older son is a quick-witted hipster in training, who loves soccer and fixies.  Ciao for now! Valissa, Mike and Family!

name: Nola
about:
I have travelled a lot in the past, doing shoestring budget travel around many parts of the world pre-airbnb. Hotels are nice, too, but generally more than I need, especially if I am traveling solo. I have been much more settled these days in beautiful Boulder, CO, but still enjoy the occasional trip. 

I thrive on being outdoors, cycling, mountain biking, skiing, etc. and also enjoy great culinary and cultural experiences.

I am pretty low key, low maintenance, and enjoy my quiet time when I am at home or wherever I may be staying.

name: Jeff
about:
We live here to enjoy the mountains, climate and the Colorado sunshine. We work in design and investment real estate. 
We believe in creating warm, inviting and beautiful spaces using sustainable design practices, and truly hope you will enjoy our home away from home. 
Jeff and Patty

name: Heather
about:
Visionary of a beautiful 1896 Victorian mansion for healing offices in Denver, CO. Awaken Healing Center has a fruit tree orchard and rose garden where healing and transformations become a part of community. 

My healing practice started here in 2005 and I bought the property in 2012. My dream is to provide gorgeous office space for creatives, healers and visionaries, helping them to bring their service to the world with ease. A place where community comes together to learn, heal, inspire and transform. 

I love traveling to meet friends, or to train with other extraordinary healers.

name: Christopher
about: Hi guys!  I'm a laid back 29 year old, loving the Colorado lifestyle.  Love sports - play a lot of golf, basketball, bikram yoga, softball, disc golf, etc..  Partake in as much live music as possible.  I work in Business Development for a 3rd party logistics company.

name: Greg
about: I am a Colorado native. Grew up in Denver/Vail. Love the outdoors and all it has to offer. I am very clean, neat and respectful as a host or a guest!  My house is great and I'd love to share it with conscientious house guests whether you are traveling on business or visiting the Mile "High" City;)   My location is conveniently located 20 minutes from most Metro Denver Locations.  Happy to share my favorite destinations, sports, shows, music, food, etc.

name: Brendon
about: I teach architectural studio at a university and have my own architectural practice based in London, UK.   I am originally from Colorado, United States.

name: Nate
about:
Hello, My name is Nate and I am relatively new to Colorado.  I moved here in the spring of 2015 with my wife and dog.  We originally met in Colorado after college, but had been living in Massachusetts the last few years.  We finally decided that we missed CO too much and set plans to move back.

We love living in Denver and exploring everything it has to offer.  We decided to live in the Highlands neighborhood because it is the perfect spot in Denver.  You can literally walk to everything you would need.  Grocery store (Sprouts), restaurants, bars, art studios, parks, and more.  We are 4 blocks off of Tennyson St, and a short walk to Highlands Square.

We are also only 3 miles from downtown Denver and a 15 min drive to Red Rocks and the foothills.  Live music and Rockies games are easy to enjoy without having to make big plans.  With so many options, it can be hard to fit in everything we want to do!  

We love travelling and know that sometimes it is better to stay in a place other than a hotel.  We have used Airbnb several times and have always enjoyed our stays.  And since we love to travel and are gone from time to time, we thought we would offer our place to anyone who is interested in coming to Denver.

We are also just over an hour drive to several mountains including Breckenridge, A-Basin, Keystone, Winter Park.  It is perfect to go skiing during the day, and come back and enjoy Denver at night.

name: Sheila
about: People have dubbed me a neat-nik, so you can be assured I will leave the space the way in which I find it. I love exploring and will be out probably from morning to night. I do not smoke. I am happy to have a place where I can have a good nights rest and make a cup of coffee in the morning.

name: Emily
about:
News junkie, aspiring foodie, and wannabe sartorialist. Fan of the Oxford comma. Major travel addict. 

After spending a year in Asia and then a year in France, I'm back in Denver 
(originally from KC) before heading abroad again to get a MA in diplomacy (or should I just do studio art instead?!). I've used Airbnb in countries as diverse as Indonesia and France, and I'm so excited to finally have a place of my own to offer. 

5 things I can't live without: travel, art, philosophy, exotic food, stimulating conversation (not necessarily in that order!). Life is exciting, and I love every minute of it!

name: Seth
about: Hi, I've been in Denver since fall 2012, and I love it.  have you SEEN those mountains?!?

name: Matthew
about: I've owned the house for a few years.  I have updated the kitchen, bathroom, bedrooms and common areas however left the 1920's appeal.  I love my house and own my own business which makes my life flexible and helps me accommodate to my client that stay.   The house maintains cleanliness and character  in the common rooms, bathrooms and kitchen.  I am a native to Colorado therefore I can help with recommendations on local restaurants, entertainment and local shopping.   My ideal purpose for working with Air B&B is to have others enjoy Denver as well as the vast surrounding mountain towns.  My life motto is you only live once therefore have as much fun in the moment and treat others the way you want to be treated.  Happy Travels and exploration!

name: Adam
about:
Hi!

My name is Adam. I split my time between Denver and San Francisco - two of my favorite US cities:) I'm an avid traveler, and love using Airbnb when I travel both domestically and abroad.

Feel free to message me if you have any questions about visiting Denver! If I'm traveling for work, I'm happy to open up my doors to travelers and share my space.

name: Danno & Rachel
about:
Danno, 40- yo professional from Aspen, Colorado. Ski patrol in the winter and tandem paragliding guide in the summer. Chill outlook on life... Languages: English, Dutch, German, Spanish, some Portuguese. Interests: current affairs, paragliding, skiing, meteorology, travel, technology, photo and film, culture, oceanography, geology, investigative journalism, sailing, and more.
Rachel, late thirties critical care nurse at a renowned Hospital in Denver. She likes to paraglide, spend time outdoors in the winter as well as the summer and she LOVES to travel. Speaks English and Spanish.

name: Lori
about: I am an easy going type of person.  I hate stress, drama & trauma.  I am all about the outdoors.  I have a recumbent trike that I love riding when the weather allows.

name: Kelly
about:
I am a Denver Native and love my city.  Me and my family love to host people in our home.  We enjoy visiting or just letting them have their space.  We love providing the unexpected for our guests to delight and surprise them.  We want people to feel comfortable, warm, and invited.  We welcome you to Be Our Guest.
We enjoy the Daily Show, Colbert, and Ted Talks.  We love children and welcome them into our home.  We love homemade things:  Mexican food, bread, and art.  We are a techy group and we love our various streaming indie music artists.

name: Blake
about: Hi! 26 year old guy living in the heart of capital hill. Rooted and down to earth, active yogi, travel as much as I can and love meeting new people! I work downtown in the Rino District at the Source as a server and bartender. I bike everywhere, its very easy to in Denver. Red rocks for music. Hiking and camping in the mountains during the summer, skiing and snowboarding during the winter.

name: Tyler
about: I have been living in Denver since 2001, so about 15 years.  I have lived in almost every neighborhood in the city and love sharing my passion of Denver with guests.  I work in the music industry and will always know the best concert going on on any given night.  I also am a fanatic about eating out, healthy, organic, Colorado-local etc.  Please ask me about farmer's markets, cocktails and food anytime, when in question!

name: Jennifer
about: Denver HŌM provides travelers an option for fresh, urban, Denver living. Units are located in Metro Denver near lightrail stations, bus stops or easy access to Downtown. Offering flexible rates and terms for holiday travel, short term stays and relocation options.  (URL HIDDEN)

name: Yana
about: I've traveled all over the world, favorite stops being Croatia & Slovenia, but I am now safely parked in Denver Colorado, working for an environmental group and learning how to bake the best bread from scratch. I like to surround myself with books, music, art, and lively conversation. And yes, in this photo I am judging a pie-baking contest. Believe it or not I am always happy to provide such services pro bono.

name: Cynthia
about: I have lived and worked very happily in my house for 21 years.  It is just recently that I have decided to create spaces to share with visitors.  I work as a Jungian psychotherapist in an office on the 3rd floor. So, during the week there will be a few people sharing the bathroom and waiting room that are part of the 3rd floor suite.  Otherwise, you will have private access to the entire floor. Our 2nd floor unit is a 950 sq.ft private apartment with a well-stocked kitchen, a formal dining room, large living room with deck and a bath & bedroom behind French Doors.  There is also a pull-out full size couch/bed in the living room and an Aero bed that can be moved wherever might be convenient for the 5th guest. The mattresses are Tempurpedic on both floors. I have a Samoyed named Bud who keeps all of us safe and smiling.  He has a space in the front yard and stays on the first floor with me.  When I recently traveled to Marseilles, France, I had the great good fortune to stay in a local home and learned first-hand how great it is to have a personal connection away from home. I have also been to South Africa, Botswana and Zimbabwe as well as Mexico and Costa Rica. I love meeting new people and seeing the world both first hand and through the eyes of my guests who bring their stories.  Our many Airbnb guests bring the world to us.

name: Megan
about: Originally from Columbus, Ohio, I arrived in Denver after a short stint with the EPA Office of Research and Development in Washington D.C.. I spent this past summer biking across the US from DC to Portland, Oregon. I am mid-transition from government- and academia-based watershed and climate change research to more hands-on applications of environmental science in water conservation and reuse, water and food security, and sanitation system and permaculture design. Well-educated, well-traveled, but a forever student. I live to keep learning and deeply value good conversation with other 'travelers' - whether Colorado locals or international voyagers!

name: Dusty & Sean
about:
We are very accommodating hosts.  5 things we would rather not live without:  motorcycles, our sweet newly remodeled indoor and outdoor kitchen, clash of clans, our pets, and our crazy big backyard.  

We try to be available at all times via phone calls or text message.  Respect and being quiet when others are sleeping are priorities in our house.

name: Carrie
about: Denver Rocks!  You'll love our comfy, private space as a homebase to explore the city ;)

name: Megan
about: Hi!  I am a Denver native who loves sharing my home and my city with guests.  During the day I am a high school teacher so if I don't answer right away it is probably because I'm in class.  Some of my favorite things about Denver include the beautiful view of the mountains, the great food, the wonderful people, and the Broncos!  I can have a pretty hectic schedule so I'm not always home.  You mostly have the house to yourself.  Hope to see you soon!!!

name: Jolene
about: My boyfriend and I live in beautiful Denver, CO and enjoy planning leisure trips between our frequent work trips. I stay in hotels so much that it's nice to be off the beaten path from tourists in a more homey atmosphere.

name: Tyler
about: I enjoy travel and always appreciate a great place to stay. I make a point to provide the same for my guests. I've been in Colorado since 2008. Hike and camp in the summer, ski in the winter. I'm a trauma/ICU nurse at a level one trauma hospital downtown.

name: Tatiana
about:
I was born and raised in Russia in a big and beautiful city called Nizhniy Novgorod. Move to USA (Boulder, CO) at age of 24 and calling this country my home now! I studied to be a programmer but life made me an accountant :) I work as an accounting manager full time and additionally have my own Home Staging and Redesign Company “First Impression, LLC"   firstimp(URL HIDDEN)  
I am happy making lovely places for lovely people and hosting on airbnb is just natural extension of my passion :) 
Hope to see you !

name: Sean
about: Friendly Denver native and real estate professional.  Enjoy golfing, swimming and summer evenings on a patio with friends.

name: Noa
about: After five years of teaching elementary school, I'm taking some time off to travel, tutor, substitute, and finish my Master's degree.

name: Rory
about: Entrepreneur.  Enjoys Colorado active outdoor lifestyle of biking, hiking, and snowshoeing.  Also enjoys sporting events, traveling and gathering with friends and family.  "Positive attitude brings positive results" would be my life motto.

name: Lauren
about: Adventure seeker, music enthusiast ready to travel at a moment's notice!

name: Sharon
about:
Short list of best times in my life (so far):
1) Was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Nepal
2) Obtained my Masters Degree in Counseling from Regis University in Denver 
3) Purchased my own business (2001) have been running it successfully for over 15 years 
4) Married my life partner and best friend  
5) Have an amazing daughter who brings smiles to our day and joy to our lives 

I love the outdoors, traveling, reading and writing.  I really love hanging out with friends and family.  Both my husband and I are laid back, non-smokers, enjoy watching movies, playing games, cooking and spending a quite night with a few friends.

name: Brian &  Maribeth
about:
Hi There!

We are a couple in the hospitality industry who live in between Denver and Aspen.

Love to travel and utilize airbnb so we figured that we would rent out Denver studio out when we are not there.

Always post my place in full and not for share, it is a studio after all!

Thank you!!

name: Val
about:
My partner, Judi,  and I are very interested in meeting people from all over the globe.  We've utilized air bnb ourselves, and are now excited to host in our home. We very much believe in creating community wherever we are, so we look forward to sharing our home with you and helping you explore our beautiful state.  We are quiet people who enjoy good conversation and good food.   Some of our interests include sustainability, walking, hiking in nature, meditating, and exploring the deep questions in life.  Creating peace in ourselves and in the world is one of our passions. And just to balance all of this out, we love to laugh and have fun!  
Hope to see you in Colorado one of these days!

name: Rae
about:
I love living in beautiful Denver, CO and waking up to the amazing Rocky Mountains every day. A few words to describe who I am: tech-nerd, world traveler, food enthusiast :)

As a host: I am type-a clean and hate clutter. You will always stay in a very clean environment with fresh linens. I am extremely flexible and will always meet guests more than half way. I love meeting people from all over the world and am very excited to share my city with them :)

As a guest: I am extremely clean and always leave things as I found them. My mother taught me to respect other people's homes and their things (does anyone else find this rare these days?). For the most part, I am out and about and will use your space as a place to sleep. I try to squeeze every minute out of traveling and exploring!

name: Jessica
about: I am a bubbly city girl. I love Denver and Dogs! I work at a marketing/tradeshow company and travel often for my job. I am a foodie and love exploring cities through food.

name: Tara
about: Property Manager/investor

name: Nilesh & Balin
about: We are both from smaller towns in the US, but lived in New York City for most of our adult lives.  We enjoy traveling and trying as best as possible to absorb the local environment less as a tourist,  but more as a wandering native.

name: Lauren And Mark
about: Lauren is an industrial and organizational psychologist working as an organizational effectiveness consultant. Mark, is a parts and supplies manager, wheel builder, and bike mechanic. We like to meet new people and have a lot of hobbies (biking, breweries, hiking, cooking). We just moved to Five Points Historic District and we love it.

name: Christina
about: Christina is a Colorado native, born and raised just outside of Denver and attending University in Boulder. She works in international development so travels frequently but loves coming home to Denver to enjoy the music, food and yoga. Christina also loves the outdoors so doesn't miss an opportunity to go hiking or explore Colorado's unique mountain towns.

name: Stacy
about: Dan and I are a couple in our mid-50's. Dan is a CFO for a healthcare organization, and I recently graduated with an MBA and am pursuing opportunities. We have a sweet, elderly border collie named Lainey.

name: Bobby
about: I am born in raised in Ft. Collins, CO and have recently moved downtown Denver. I am a bartender and myself and my roommate are not home too much. I get off late hours. In the meantime I like exploring the city as I am new to it. I love the outdoors and being outside.

name: Wes
about:
I'm a Southern boy turned Colorado transplant. I love enjoying everything Colorado has to offer - avid skier and snowboarder, trail runner, motorcycle enthusiast. Love going to shows at Red Rocks, doing yoga, tubing down rivers, hiking and camping. 

I live in Denver with my wife and two Bernese Mountain Dogs. My wife is an excellent cook which means I have an excellent appetite. 

We love to travel and explore new places - beaches, mountains, jungles, cities, you name it. 

I fell in love with live music when I moved to Colorado and generally love all music genres: funk, jam band, hip hop, electronic, rock, etc. but nothing beats a bluegrass show at Red Rocks during a Colorado summer. 

I'm laid back and down-to-earth, friendly and believe in the good in people.

name: Mark & Susan
about: Empty nesters (child had a charmed life in that third floor suite), happily married over 30 years.  Fun loving, responsible and enjoy meeting new people.   We work very hard in the catering business and often have wonderful leftovers to share.  Avid gardeners and travellers.  Down to earth and fun (so we think).

name: Brittany
about:
Hi! I'm Brittany. Thanks for considering my home! 

I'm an art (drawing, printmaking, photography) student at Metropolitan State University here in downtown Denver, Colorado. I'm fun and easygoing, and adore hosting, whether its parties or overnight guests. Before using airbnb, I was an avid guest/host on another collaborative consumption-style accommodations site (that it won't let me name here), and stayed in homes all over the US. I love traveling, and am sure to help in making your stay as comfortable and fun as possible.

I'm a transplant from the east coast, Charleston, SC to be exact. My home is a clean, cozy and charming combination of rustic Denver style and southern hospitality. 

There is never a lack of activity, entertainment and ways to both work and play. I'll be of great assistance in making the most of your stay here in the city and the surrounding areas. However, if you are here to work, my home is one of the most centrally located in the Denver area, you can easily get to what/where/whomever you need by foot, transit or car. There's plenty of desk space, great wi-fi, and room to get work done.

name: Josh & Amy
about:
Josh is a music journalist, butcher, and professional cook. Yes, a butcher, but an artisan, ethical one. Amy is a transportation planner who loves bikes. 

Together, we share a home that we also rent a room on Airbnb. We do so for the added income, but also because we love meeting new people.

We're easy to get along with, considerate, and a grown-up, which makes for a great temporary roommate and host. 

Feel free to ask any questions about us.

name: Ryan
about: I grew up in NC so I'm a southern transplant to Colorado and have been here for 10 years.  I'm a pharmacist by trade and a photographer by hobby.  I enjoy good people, good food, and good wine.  I love to travel, see new things, and experience new cultures.

name: Sasha
about:
I am a Naturopathic Doctor/rental property owner, and manager. Kenny does social media and marketing. We are both triathletes and endurance enthusiasts! We love our home in Boulder as well as travelling, trail running and all things active and outside! 
We love using airbnb as it offers such a unique way to explore a new city and really makes you feel at home wherever you go! We are clean, quiet and respectful when traveling to other's homes and value the same in our guests. We have been hosting for a year now and started with renting out our Boulder home while traveling but have since opened up a full time rental in Denver as well as starting and managing my sisters rental in Denver. And we love it! We look forward to sharing our homes with others who will love them as much as we do!

name: Averill
about: i am a transplant who has spent more than half my life now in the state of colorado. i am active and take full advantage of the recreational opportunities of the area. i cycle, i ski, do yoga, make art, mountain bike (or try to), hike, and enjoy the out of doors. i am also a foodie and am so enamored by the expanse and quality of the metro area's restaurant scene. please let me know if you need any recommendations as i am happy to give my insight to aid in enhancing your trip to the denver area. enjoy!

name: Janelle
about: A transplant from NY almost 20 years ago, I crossed the Colorado state line and never looked back. My free time is spent heading to the mountains to either mountain bike or ski. I spend a lot of time traveling, and am currently figuring out a new career that allows me to work on the road. I have just returned from a 6 month trip around the world. (Want to know how I managed that? Just ask me!)  There is a separate basement apartment in the house where I sometimes live, and when I am not around, Sarah lives down there and helps me manage the property.  She is super friendly, an active grandmother, teacher and long time Denver resident. You may not meet us when you are visting, but we are available via email, text or phone to help answer any questions you may have.

name: Talya
about: We are adventurers and artists who love to explore the world. We live with a gentle 5 year old border collie and a sweet 9 year old shepherd. We are looking for smart, friendly and active housemates or visitors. I work in the arts at a local university. Shane works in medicine and plays guitar. Our time at home tends to be pretty quiet unless we are listening to good music. As a Denver native, I am happy to share tips on the best spots for playing, eating and drinking! Our home is a warm and clean space occasionally filled with live music and friends and we are looking forward to meeting you.

name: Matt + Cat
about:
Engi-nerds by day with secret creative sides by night: Cat- design, sewing, and plants; Matt - music, video, and cooking.  We're pretty laid back, and like working on hobbies around the house. We enjoy being outdoors - both winter and summer activities, primarily hiking, camping, snowboarding, and a little climbing. Both of us grew up in Denver and have a fondness of the city and the beautiful surrounding areas. 

Travel is important to us, and we have big plans to see more of the world in the future. Some of our most memorable travel experiences have been meeting new people on the road. We enjoy traveling with AirBnB as it is a wonderful alternative to staying in a sterile hotel room, and we get to explore neighborhoods and cities like a local (made even better by host recommendations).

We love hosting on AirBnB because it feels like getting to travel all the time - meeting interesting people from different cities and countries.  Whether you're in town for a conference, adventure, or to see friends, we hope to facilitate a wonderful travel experience for everyone who ventures through our home.

name: Kate
about: I love to travel and have found airbnb to be the most amazing way to feel like a local in the cities I visit!  I love providing that same opportunity to those who are visiting my own city that I adore and want to show off!

name: Marie
about:
former flight attendant & stockbroker
one daughter
to be finished later

name: Matthew
about: Young professional in Denver.  Love to ski, hike, and everything else Colorado has to offer!

name: Michael
about: Greetings from Denver! In my experience traveling I've found that the best adventures come from staying with a local and getting firsthand knowledge into the culture of the city. I personally prefer to stay in someone's home with a kitchen where I can prepare my own meals as opposed to another hotel chain with cheesy elevator music. I'm very social and stay active enjoying Colorado's playground -- skiing, mountain biking, rock climbing, yoga & live music. As far as my style of traveling, I like to do things spontaneously and am always looking for my next adventure.

name: Nick
about: Actually, this lovely looking boy is one of my children. Pretty much everything I do in life is for them and my lovely partner. I love to live where I do and I think you will too if you come and use my home. I have to be out of town frequently so the house would be all yours during your stay - please look after it! I am originally from the UK and feel very European despite or maybe because of my 12 years in the US. Enjoy your stay in my house and in beautiful Denver, Colorado.

name: Alexander
about: I love skiing, hiking, snowshoeing, boating, camping, doing anything outdoors.

name: Chantal & George
about:
Chantal and I live and work in Denver. Chantal is studying to become a midwife, which she's very passionate about. We both love the outdoors, especially climbing! We love hosting and meeting new people. George is always traveling for work (and mostly stays at airbnbs instead of hotels!) 
We welcome any questions you have - just ask!

name: Leneè
about:
I'm Lenee'! (That's like Renee' with an L)
I'm from Louisiana and moved to Denver a year ago. I have fallen in LOVE with Colorado and am excited about the possibility of meeting new friends to show it off to. I love the city life-checking out local breweries, music shows, festivals, art galleries and various events; I also love getting out to the mountains every chance I get to hike, snowboard and explore. 
I stay active through yoga, weightlifting and my most recent favorite-rock climbing!
The first thing you will notice about me is my Southern twang and with that comes my hospitality and lively personality. I work in sales and love meeting new people of every background. I am thrilled to possibly meet YOU!

name: Mary
about:
Stay at home mom of 3 under 4 :) Colorado Native! 

We love traveling and doing just about anything with kiddos! 

We love our home and would to share it with you!

name: Rokha
about: I am a professional that owns this property in the heart of Lohi. I am a Denver Native and loves to travel.  I would be happy to show you around the neighborhood or Denver in general, but I'm also perfectly happy leaving you alone to explore what Denver has to offer.

name: Jeannie
about:
I am an adventurous person who loves to travel!  I have spent the last 3 years backpacking/living/traveling oversea in Central Europe, Central America, Southeast Asia, Australia, and New Zealand.

  I work for a company called Trekamerica as a tour guide and spend much of my time on the road!  If I am available I do love being a tour guide for my own town, but if i am not i have plenty of recommendations.

 I love meeting people from different cultures and backgrounds and sharing life experiences.  I enjoy running, yoga, reading, dancing, socializing, food, wine and laughing!

name: Kim
about:
I love traveling. I take every chance I get to travel to new destinations or to my all time favorite cities (Los Angeles & Naples... so far!)

I love animals. I have the cutest dog, a boston terrier named Walter. I love to take him on road trips with me when I am traveling back home to Kansas! My next destination is to take him to Florida to the dog beaches!

I' am currently working full-time as a Workforce Analyst with United HealthGroup and have the opportunity to work remotely. I decided to move to Denver after living my whole life in Kansas and it was the best decision I've made.

name: Timothy
about: We are pretty new to Colorado only been here since May 14'. My wife and I have a beautiful toddler that brightens everyone's day.

name: Mary Ann
about: I own my own design construction business. Loved the outdoors, traveling,reading

name: John And Shann
about: Hi and welcome from John and Shann. I am a retired teacher, Shann is an informatist, setting up computer technology in hospitals. We are bilingual Spanish speakers and really enjoy traveling. Our own great experiences with AIRBNB motivated us to become hosts to our great city, Denver. Shann is an avid reader and I enjoy painting. We also enjoy an active life style, staying in touch with and making new friends. Theatre, dining, shopping, pub crawling, and bargin hunting in the city,fishing, hiking, biking, snowshoeing and panorama seeking in the mountains. We raised two wonderful sons in our home. They are men now, out in the world, leaving us with room to share and opportunities to meet new people. Look forward to meeting you. John

name: Hostel Fish
about: We the People of Hostel Fish believe that a hostel of backpackers, by backpackers, and for backpackers, shall be a fun, safe, spotless, high-end joint that is Classy as F…(ish!). We are focused on the traveler and the traveler's needs and believe something being affordable should still offer exemplary service and more than expected perks. We believe that shared rooms and neo-urbanism, when combined, create an epicenter for those "seekers of life's adventures" to meet each other and foster new friendships. We're stoked to host you. We're jazzed to have you as our guest. We're here for you and always want to hear your thoughts or suggestions on how we can improve your experience.

name: Caren
about:
Colorado has been my home for over 20 years.  I moved to the mountains from Chicago for a lifestyle change and boy, did my lifestyle change!  I love everything Denver has to offer: hiking, skiing, mountain biking, eating at amazing restaurants, enjoying craft breweries, and the 300+ days of sunshine we get here.  I also love guitar, playing Ultimate Frisbee, going to music festivals, knitting funky hats, roasting my own coffee beans, wakeboarding, gardening...the list goes on.  

I work at a local independent school where one of my three boys attends.  My eldest son is at CU Boulder, and my youngest at an independent school in the foothills community, Evergreen.

Airbnb has been a perfect new hobby for me.  I love hosting people and creating a cozy "home away from home" atmosphere.  I travel a lot, so it's a perfect opportunity to invite guests into my home.  I love my neighborhood and Colorado and am excited to know that people from all around the country and world get to enjoy them as well.  As a host (I am not present during stays), I think people would say I'm flexible, calm, and welcoming.

Hmmm...Airbnb says I should mention my motto.  I've never had a motto, but if I did, it would be something like, "Wake up every morning in love with your day."

name: Coby
about: Fun, fit and fabulous female living her dream in the Mile High City!

name: Melette
about: Adventurous Entrepreneur.  Love living life to the fullest.  Enjoy the outdoors and all it has to offer.  You will usually find me hiking, biking, skiing or enjoying the mountains.    Travel is my passion!!!!

name: Deborah
about: We have been amazed at the interesting people we've met through Airbnb.  I really enjoy introducing people to all the splendor that Colorado has to offer and making sure they are comfortable during their stay in our home(s).  Having a guest at a time really means that our focus is on your needs. Business at this level is really personalized and I think that's what's been missing for so many travelers in the past.

name: Warren
about:
Hi there! My name is Warren, I've lived in the city of Denver since 2005. I currently work Downtown at a tech company as a marketing writer. In my spare time, I love taking part in outdoor activities and sports like ultimate frisbee, soccer, softball, hiking, cycling, running, and camping. 

If I'm not doing something outside, my other hobby is exploring new places to eat and drink in Denver. My girlfriend and I love trying new restaurants to see what tastes good! We also enjoy visiting the local liquor store to find new wines and craft beers to try.

Finally, I'm also an avid traveler! I love visiting new cities, whether they're in the US or in other countries. My most recent trips include New York, San Francisco, Nashville, Cancun, Rhode Island, and Puerto Rico. My next trips on the calendar (in order) are: New Orleans, San Francisco, Santa Cruz, San Diego, Paris, Rome, and Santorini.

name: Panida
about:
Hi,

My name is Panida, but you can call me May. I'm originally from Thailand and I am an interior architecture designer. I am usually busy traveling for business or pleasure, for that reason I decided to open my apartment to the Airbnb community. I love using the service whenever I am traveling, I love the experience each every time.

name: Lauren
about: Live in the city of Denver Colorado but still love the mountains.

name: Chandler And Elyse
about: We're transplants to Denver (via Boston, Vermont and SE Asia) and love the outdoor life of Colorado.  We're also avid travelers and enjoy exploring the great space of the west as well as all of the other awesome spots around the world.

name: Vincent
about: Hello, everyone my name is Vince. I am very laid back, but like to keep busy. As a Lyft and pedal cab driver, I tend to stay out until very late at night. If you are looking for things to do in Denver, let me know and I can help. Feel free to contact me if you have any other questions.

name: Alexandra
about:
Denver native, former teacher, musician, chaplain.  Spent 4 years in Bolivia and speak Spanish.  I love my home and its location so close to everything.  My neighborhood keeps growing upscale, but my home remains surprisingly quiet!  My single family home is a true oasis in the city. 

Seven wonderful grandchildren and their parents make my life a blessing. 

I have really enjoyed welcoming and getting to know my guests from all over the world and the USA, and look forward to many more!

name: Alina
about: I am a clinician at an elementary school & love swing dancing, hiking & basically everything else. I have traveled a lot & have been graciously hosted many times, and I have hosted some cross-country swing dancers and tons of friends for events or visits in the past both in Denver and in SA. My husband travels for work so he may or may not be around a lot. We have a Carolina Dingo who LOVES people and never gets in trouble--she has a dog walker & is all up-to-date on her shots & meds! When I am in Denver, I am at work most of the day, and once I am home I like to get to bed as quietly & quickly as I can. I am a light sleeper but recently learned to make almost anything work with a noise machine and/or ear plugs! I am clean, chatty, very host-like (if I am around and I cook I love to feed people) and I really just want someone to be quiet at night & respectful of belongings & space. I communicate very well & would like my guests to ask & convey anything they feel the need to. Let me know if you wanna know anything else about me! I am very easy-going!

name: Erin
about: Originally an east coaster, I made the move to the Midwest melting pot back in '99 (basically a local).  I like all things relating to art, culture, exploration, Colorado exercise (nature-y things), and the lifeblood — food & drink.  I travel as much as possible and I'm a big fan of recommendations.  Don't hesitate to share highlights from your adventures — I'm always eager to share mine.

name: Erin
about: I love traveling and hosting  I love learning how the "natives" live and finding the areas hidden gems.  And sharing the ones from my city.

name: Barbara
about: Single Professional Mom w/3 teenagers who are busy w/teenager stuff.  We have been renting rooms and hosting international students since 2008!  Our ranch home is quite comfy and centrally located near the University of Denver in the Cherry Hills Vista neighborhood...only 15mins from downtown and 5min to Cherry Creek Mall!  The #27 RTD bus stops a short walk from our front door and takes you to 2 different light rail stations.  The main floor has 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths.  Rooms are furnished w/bedding, bath towels, robe, hair dryer, 4cup coffee pot, snacks and bottled beverages.  House rules are pretty simple....respect property and privacy of others in home.  No pets.

name: Anne
about: Anne was born and raised in France but Denver is now her new home. She is an RN in a Denver hospital and loves interacting with people!

name: Aleka
about:
Urban/mountain, music and art lover. Denver is an amazing city, and I'm happy to call it home. Ask me about great local running trails, yoga studios, music venues, and vegan dining options.
I'm in grad school for architecture right now, so my schedule is kind of all over the place. If our schedules coincide, though, I would love to get to know you and offer some tips for navigating Colorado!

name: Leah
about: Hi I am a full-time PharmD student who loves to read, snowboard and go to concerts.

name: Christopher
about: As an avid international traveler and outdoorsman I love being on the road with a backpack or in the mountains skiing, biking, or otherwise just enjoying life.  Locally, I live where I do because I can walk or ride my bike anywhere I need to be.

name: Jill & Stephen
about:
We are fun, clean and considerate travelers. We love seeing and experiencing different cultures, ways of living, and food! Because of this love we have traveled and lived all over the world- in Egypt, China, Japan, Kenya, and the Middle East, with lots of time in Norway and East Africa. 

We believe the best way to experience a new place is to connect with the people who live there. When we travel we like to be flexible. It is great to have a plan and know what you want to do and see, but also be open to life happening, and doing something else entirely. The unexpected and unknown adventures that come with each trip are what make them so enjoyable and memorable.

Whether staying with a friend or renting a room from a stranger, we always treat the people and place with the same respect we hope for from those who stay in our own home listed on Airbnb.

name: Nanci
about: I am a middle aged woman with 4 semi-grown children and love most all outdoor activities.  Sushi, coffee, wine, burgers, fresh raw and tapas are some of my favorite foods. I love to travel all over the world but when I get to my destination I don't want to worry about my accommodations.  I want to make sure you enjoy your stay and you know all the great places to explore in this great piece of heaven here on earth.

name: Leila
about: We are two young professionals who enjoy travelling and are looking forward to sharing our new home! We moved in a few months ago, so are constantly updating and decorating. We love cooking and entertaining and bought a home that is perfect for both! Love to be outside, hike and spend as much time in the mountains with our dog as possible.

name: Chase
about: I'm a full time student studies real estate at the University of Denver. I like to snowboard during my weekends off and enjoy exploring the mountain trails on the front rage. I work part time with a company that manages homes rented to students near the university. I'm almost always connected and can respond to any request quickly!

name: Philip
about: I recently moved back to Denver after living in Ecuador for a few years. I am a teacher and guide. I am making my place available in short intervals as I like to travel to the mountains. If I am not around, my friendly neighbor, Andy, will gladly check you in at any time. Hope you enjoy Denver !

name: Kelly
about:
I love traveling and discovering new places, ways of living and especially food.
I studied Pastry Arts, so I love baking up sweet things or finding exotic ingredients to play around with.
For my day job I work as a Digital Marketer.
I lived abroad in France and Argentina and speak Spanish, French and English.

name: Lucas
about: My fiance and I bought this townhome in June 2015.  Due to our travels we're able to share our beautiful home with you and your family and friends.  Colorado provides the perfect blend of City and Outdoor living.

name: Jeffrey
about:
I'm a 50 something gay man who enjoys natural hot springs, hot tubs, walks in nature, naturism, beach vacations, boat rides, square dancing, massage and a beer or wine once in awhile.

I have traveled extensively throughout North America, mostly the United States and Mexico.  So, I hope to make your stay perfect in my part of the world.

name: Ling & Chris
about:
My husband, Chris and I are empty nesters.  I am an art director and he is in logistics.  I transplanted to Denver in 1979 from Bucks County PA and he is from Buffalo NY.  We have 3 wonderful grandchildren and 4 grown-up children.  

We enjoy simple evenings, a card game with good friends, blues/rock music, and slow drives through the foothills on his Honda Shadow.  We don't drink or party at all anymore; just appreciate life, laughter, the kids, each other and of course our wonderful spoiled little pooch, Gina.  

I am always busy canning, gardening, and cooking.  I love to grow, pick and home process fresh organic food; making everything from scratch.  We have simple taste and prefer to do road trips and bed-n-breakfasts to luxury hotels.  We love hot springs, skiing, white water rafting, live music, ethnic foods and belly laughs with good friends. Chris likes fixing up motorcycles and to sell online.  We watch football (I am a Broncos fan - he's a Bills sorta guy) and are addicted to tv sagas on Netflix. 

Our motto is "One day at a time."

name: Claus
about: Laid back

name: Caroline
about: I live in Denver, Colorado, where I'm a self-employed freelance writer. I love to mountain bike, ski, do yoga, draw, paint, write and hike.

name: Denise
about: I am a person that lives creatively and strives to be the best version of herself. I'm a self-employed graphic designer, an artist/builder of things, a lover, an exercise addict, a gardener, a homemaker, a yogi and a joyful girl, at heart. I have a large community of friends that I spend a good part of my time sharing love and life with. I love sharing my home with them, serving healthy meals, drinking wine, playing games, sitting by the fire and soaking in the tub. I'm so very grateful for my life!

name: Paul
about:
Young Professional.
Indiana University Graduate '14
Love cycling, running, hiking, and good beer.

name: Michael
about: Matthew and I have been together since 2006. We got married in 2014 and love being around people! We are both professional, career-oriented guys who love to travel and to be active outdoors. We are obsessed with reality TV, hiking, and food (Denver is a great city for foodies.) We look forward to welcoming you to Denver and to our home!

name: Christopher
about:
We are empty nesters, love to travel and love not staying in hotels. We are quiet, clean and respectful. We also host a place of our own in Colorado and understand how to treat someone's property. 

We love to bike whenever possible, listen to music, eat great food and fly fish.

name: Jen
about: After 15 years on the East Coast, I relocated to the Mile High City last fall with my husband, Drew. We love exploring everything Denver and the surrounding towns have to offer and you can frequently find us biking, skiing, hiking, or enjoying a beer at one of Colorado's breweries (there is one on every corner in Denver!). I run my own business in sales and nutrition and also work as an actor in the Denver metro area and Drew is a web developer. We are laid back, easy to be around and enjoy traveling, adventures and meeting new people. We have used Airbnb frequently for numerous trips we've taken including when we first scouted out Denver, when we got engaged and when we went on our honeymoon so we understand the importance of a comfortable living environment, hosts that are cool, helpful, on top of things when needed but also respect guests' privacy and, of course, LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION. We LOVE our new neighborhood and feel very lucky that we ended up in RiNo. If you like an urban environment with walkability but also easy access to everything else that makes Colorado amazing, then our home is the place for you. If you have any questions about out listing, don't hesitate to drop us a note. We look forward to meeting you!

name: Lisa
about: Artists, writers, actors. We love NYc, LA and Denver. Also love cooking and our rescue pets.

name: Jack
about: 60 and single I spend most of my time In Vail, CO skiing In the summer I live two doors down from the rental unit and bike and water ski and travel

name: Maike
about: I grew up in CO, but moved to Europe to finish high school and go to vet school, then came back to the US and landed in NYC before returning to CO. I value quality of living, which is why I chose such an awesome apartment in NY's trendy Williamsburg & then the beautiful new townhouse in Denver's up & coming Stapleton. I love strolling the neighborhood cafes and restaurants as well as the park. Stapleton is very close to DIA & downtown Denver, making it an awesome living experience!

name: Joshua
about: Hi, my name is Joshua and I pride myself on providing a great experience for guests coming to stay in any of my properties. I love sharing the beauty of my city and state with visitors and there's no better channel to do that than Airbnb.

name: Cari
about:
I love everything Denver has to offer.  We have some great restaurants, trails, shops and unique neighborhoods.  I chose Sunnyside as my home because of the proximity to downtown, lodo, lohi and I-70, the surrounding parks, restaurants and shops, and the neighbors.

I am very excited to host guests in my apartment, and appreciate any and all feedback so that my guests can have a comfortable, fun, luxurious and affordable experience.

name: Charley
about:
Hi!  I'm a 5th generation Denver native with roots and pride in my place.  I love welcoming people to the Mile High City and putting our best foot forward through this listing and service.

I worked as a Peace Corps Volunteer (Morocco 06-08), and as an English teacher in spectacular countries like Japan, Israel and Costa Rica.  I got a lil skill in Arabic, Japanese, Hebrew and Spanish.

In between, I traveled and traveled and traveled some more.  From the top bunk of a crowded passenger car on the Trans-Siberian Railway, to five-star hotels in Jerusalem and everywhere in between, I stayed everywhere there was to stay.  I learned to love the hospitality game.  Youth hostels have my heart.  One day I hope to open my own here in Denver or elsewhere awesome (any ideas?).  For now, Airbnb is the space and place where I hone my hospitality chops.   

In addition to my love for hospitality, I am a licensed Real Estate Broker in the state of Colorado.  For any guests thinking of making a move to Colorado, or who could use broker's services, please let me know.  I'd love to be of help in any way I can.

name: Emily
about:
I'm Emily and I own this house with my best friend Terrance. 
I manage the rental when we are out of town or in town renting a room. When I'm in town and renting a room, I'm usually busy with school and work. I am studying biology and work as a bartender and screen printer. I am super laid back and the only thing I need from guests are 1. no smoking anything in the house and 2. put the seat down(guys) :). 

Our home is dog and kid friendly! We may not have the appropriate accommodations for your kids so just ask first if you need something special.

name: Anthony
about: I am an Architect who lives in Denver, Colorado, USA.

name: Abbey
about: I love the outdoors, traveling (ofcourse) and sports.  Photography is my latest hobby

name: Tara
about: Colorado Native I love where I live and hosting people!!

name: Lynnette
about: I'm  a fun, upbeat, 38 year old learning her way around Denver. I love reading, cooking, and exploring nature. A good hike or good company are always at the top of my list of things I love to do. As a guest I love people who interact with me and as a host  I do the same. My motto is life is short have fun with it.

name: Kimberly
about: Originally from New Albany, Indiana, but transitioned to the Colorado life in 2015. All I want to do is be outside with my dogs and my favorite people!  I am in LOVE with everything Colorado has to offer and my boyfriend, Stuart, and I are excited to share it with anyone who will let us!

name: Michele
about:
Hola, 

I'm a mother of 2 awesome, principled, adjusted young men. We make a great team. They help me host and are hosts themselves. For a living, I'm a real estate professional that helps owners with fix and flips and building rental portfolios.  

I have an artistic side as well. I love making useful/funky items out of junk and building with up-cycled materials. I work in my community garden and am a mean cook. I love to dance, see a great concert and entertain at home. I am buying a travel camper and remodeling it for travel and minimalist living. 

I would like to travel more this year and plan on attending a perma-culture program in Costa Rica in March and learn to surf. Pura Vida! 

I currently divide time between Florida and Denver where I am remodeling a house that I hope to share soon on this site. My dream is to have a homes in several places and to share them with others while I travel the world and share wonderful times with my family and friends. 

I want to learn new things, meet new people and enjoy new experiences. 

This life is short... 

Cheers!

name: Julian
about: I am an outdoor enthusiast. I have lived in Denver for 5 years and enjoy every day. My fiance and I live in this 109 year old home and truly love it. We love to travel and see the world, as well as spend time in lovely Denver Co.

name: Kimberly
about: We are a progressive couple hailing from Denver by way of Seattle by way of Houston by way of Wisconsin by way of... :) He is a traveling RN and she writes appeals. We are outdoorsy and travel-y. We enjoy well-executed art and cuisine. We love traveling the world and meeting new people.

name: Lonna
about: Fun-loving person who loves to travel, do photography, practice yoga and Spends most time catching up with five grandchildren. The best job I ever loved the US Peace Corps and providing health care in school-based clinics.  I am a retired physician assistant, with many years as a health care provider in family practice, specializing in kids and teens.  I am currently volunteering internationally, teaching Helping Babies Breathe, a program to reduce infant mortality/morbidity.  And a clinical faculty in pediatrics at the University of Colorado.

name: Jonathan
about: Growing up in Colorado has been great, but now I want to see the world. I am 33, male and a Dog lover, non-smoker, and enjoys a good baseball game. I like seeing new places and trying local favorites.

name: Amanda
about: I'm originally from Richmond, VA and have been living in Colorado for over 10 years. I freelance in advertising and interior design. I can't live without my black pug, Mabel.

name: McKenna
about: I'm an energetic person, always looking for new and exciting things to do.  I love people and want to learn about and experience more of the world by traveling and listening to others' stories.  I'm an occupational therapist and I am passionate about working with children and cute older adults.  Other hobbies include participating in anything musical, doing yoga, frolicking in the mountains, laying underneath large trees, spending time with friends and family, and cuddling up to my fuzzy golden doodle (Wenceslaus). I also like to get lost in a good novel.

name: Nina
about:
I'm from the NYC area but have lived in Denver for 3 years. I love to travel, play outdoors, and go on adventures. My apartment reflects my love of other cultures and new experiences, and I hope you'll get the chance to enjoy it! 

I'm a pretty hands-on host. I'll suggest things for you to do and leave you a long list of the quirks of my apartment and neighborhood. We'll likely never meet as I only rent the place if I'm out of town, but you'll definitely get to meet one of my amazing friends and neighbors who will meet you with keys! :) 

Best Airbnb experience: having a guest leave me a case of beer!
Worst Airbnb experience: not knowing there would be a cat at the apartment I rented

name: James
about: Hi folks, I am an early adopter of "airbnb".  I have not used it for travel as much as I would like but have been hosting and enjoying it since summer, 2011.  My active life style includes being a ski instructor in Vail, tennis, sailing when I make the time, motorcycle travel (having done of lot of solo stuff in Mexico), etc.  Intellectually curious and I like keeping up with global happenings.  Travel style? Casual, low maintenance and self sufficient, enjoy the local color, been half way around the planet.  Have owned my own company for over three decades being involved in urban redevelopment and historic restoration.  Cheers!

name: Erik
about: I'm an audio engineer, traveler, competition retro video gamer, and all around geek/nerd.  I play at least 4 instruments poorly.  I like to run, ski, bike, and generally try to stay healthy.  Love my tattoos and piercings and when I get around to it, I'll probably color my hair again.  I love to eat ALL.THE.TIME. and craft beer + karaoke is a way of life.

name: Kate
about: I'm a Park Hill native. Moved back to the area 7 years ago. I love this neighborhood.. I have a pet/house sitting business that I've kept locally. It's been a great way to meet peaple close by. I enjoy gardening in the summer. I volunteer to take care of the grounds around a church. I have been a skier most of my life. I lived in Aspen for 3 years. The mountains are my second home. I hike there in the summer, and now snow shoe in the winter. I still visit Aspen and other favorite long weekend destinations in the high country. I travel to New Mexico at least once a year. I'm a art lover and I'm very fond of southwest art and pottery.I enjoy a healthy lifestyle, eating good yet healthy meals, doing yoga and bicycling . Tattered Cover Book Store is my favorite relaxing neighborhood hangout, as well as a great record/c.d. store called Twist & Shout that is right next door. I'm not big on most mainstream movies. I like artsy & foreign films or a great epic that's tastefully done. My mother was in the restaurant business.She's a natural at hosting for family and friends. As they say, the apple does not fall far from the tree.

name: Scott, Nancy, And Vanilla Bean
about:
Welcome to our beautiful Colorado home on the golf course with awesome views! 

We have created a quiet, comfortable space where guests from all over can become part of an extended "family", even if just temporarily. 

Our home is your home while you are here, and we thank you very much for the opportunity to be your hosts! 

Scott, Nancy, and Vanilla Bean

name: Simone
about: Hi, I am a single mom to an amazing one year old son that loves to host and meet people from all over the world. I am originally from Bavaria, Germany and work as a holistic doctor specializing in the treatment of women and children. I am an avid traveler and love the outdoors (rock climbing, hiking, snowshoeing, backpacking, etc)!

name: Kristen & Eric
about:
Oy-

We're a quirky, Hoosier-fed roommate duo who finally found a comfortable place in the Rockies! We scored an excellent spot in Denver which is more than spacious for just the two of us, so we decided to turn our loft into a temporary rooming space... Please do join us!

Kristen's favorite places to have traveled: Melbourne, Varanasi, Utrecht, Maui, Vietnam
On my travel list: Berlin, Central/South America tour

Eric's favorite city in the world: Budapest, Hungary 
Previously lived in: Indiana, Portland & D.C.

We're not a couple. Unless you want us to be, then we'll humor you and pretend.

Luv, Us

name: Scott
about: Director of a small non-profit.

name: Sean
about:
CU Denver Business graduate 
Snowboarder
Dog lover

name: Scott
about:
Scott travels extensively for work as a software engineer in the semiconductor manufacturing industry. Enjoys gardening, winemaking, brewing, electronic music.

Jude Stanton will be your primary contact for this listing. He lives nearby, and will help you get settled in, answer any questions, and assist with any issues you may have.

We are low maintenance hosts, you may not even see us. We're always happy to share tips or answer questions over email or phone.

name: Erin
about: I am a working professional in my early thirties.  I am active, outdoorsy and love meeting new people!  I've got a Siberian Husky who I adore.  If you have any questions, please ask.

name: Joseph
about: I was born and raised right here in beautiful Denver, Colorado and am proud to call myself a Denverite. I'm Studying to get my B.A. at Metropolitan State College of Denver and have about a year left! I am new to the Airbnb community and I am interested to see what kind of future experiences I will have.

name: Sasha
about: Colorado Master Gardener, Mother, Urban Homesteader, Enjoy cooking with local ingredients. Staying at my homestead will give you a taste of all of the wonderful things that Colorado has to offer.

name: Lauren
about: I am a young contemporary art curator based in Denver, Colorado. I travel frequently for work and for fun, or both at once! I recently moved back to Denver after nearly 9 years in the UK. I speak rusty French and improving Hebrew.

name: Joel
about:
Hello! My name is Joel (friends call me "Poppy"). I am a passionate entrepreneur in the renewable energy industry, going on 8 years now. I love the spontaneity, challenge, and excitement of my career, and I am very passionate about making a difference and a living by investing in something that makes the world a little bit better! 

I love the outdoors, and actually prefer to be in a tent than in my Condo most of the time. I spend a lot of my time camping, hiking, skiing, rafting and climbing. That doesn't mean I don't love Denver, it is a fantastic City, and when I am here I enjoy exploring all the fun downtown has to offer, such as live shows, great food, breweries, city parks, and all the great outdoor patios! There are also so many awesome, friendly people living in this City that are always willing to share their stories over a fine brew with any stranger that may come by!

As a host, I just want you to enjoy my awesome Condo as if it were your own for your stay. I have lived in this great city for 10 years now, and am always willing to make suggestions on great things to do, like live shows, breweries, or just a great park to take a run. If I am not out of cell service, I am more than happy to be contacted. You will enjoy all the comfort, the sweet deck overlooking the mountains, and the amenities the condo building has to offer. "Me Casa Su Casa"

name: Alexander
about:
Hello there and welcome, or welcome back, to Denver!

I'm a private ski and snowboard instructor, run Denver Mountain Tours, and own the vacation rentals you see here; it all keeps me plenty busy, but  I love it and feel fortunate to have seasonal changes.

As a pre-teen my family moved from Mpls, MN to Copenhagen, Denmark.  We learned the language, went to Danish public schools, and learned to love the culture, people, and geography of Scandinavia.  Early on I learned a love of travel, foreign cultures and photography.

I'm happy to help guests find discounts on anything Denver and Colorado has to offer.  I've been travel, camping, skiing, and photo freak since I moved here in 1994.  Please ask!

Thanks,
Alex

name: Jason
about: Live well, Laugh often and Travel like it's your last day on earth!

name: Matt
about: My biggest passion is traveling and I love the idea of sharing my home with people while I am on trips. I have utilized air bnb twice once while in Melbourne and once in Tokyo, then I recently started listing my space. I also couchsurf, which I feel, is another community of people who respect one another and their spaces, while sharing the richness of travel.

name: Michael
about: Father. Husband.  Entrepreneur.  Learner. Follower.  Leader.

name: Mark
about: I'm an educator who moved to Colorado to be closer to the many outdoor activities in the area. I live 30 minutes west of the airport on the way to the mountains. My house is a ten minute drive from downtown and within an hour of the nearest ski slopes (loveland or eldora). I'm about 20 minutes from Red Rocks Ampitheatre or the Coors Brewery in Golden. Although one should have a car while visiting Denver, I'm two blocks from the #1 bus line that goes directly downtown. I enjoy travel. I've visited 46/50 states and 20 plus countries.

name: Matthew
about:
I moved to Denver via Washington, DC and Pittsburgh, PA.  I left a career in DC to enjoy everything that Colorado has to offer.  World traveler.  Avid outdoor enthusiast - hiking, skiing/snowboarding, trail running, mountain biking, and white water rafting.

As an Airbnb host, I will provide insight to local travel tips, bars, breweries, sporting/music events, restaurants, and activity recommendations.  I also take pride in providing a clean and accommodating home to guests.

name: Geeta
about: I am an academic who lives and works in Denver, Colorado. I love the idea of peer-peer economy and have used couchsurfing and other services. I love to make new friends, explore new places and try out new restaurants. I love traveling and have traveled to different parts of the word (e.g. Germany, Finland, Norway, Greece, Turkey, France, S.Korea, India, Nepal, Thailand, Sweden). Bali, Indonesia is next on my list !!

name: Nadim
about:
Hi there,

Welcome to my profile. 
I am a well-traveled 28 year old male. I recently moved to Denver from London. I love hosting and meeting new people. I travel a lot for work, so most of the time I'm not even around! 

thanks,

Nadim

name: Christiane
about:
We are a German/American family with a warm welcome awaiting you. We are friendly and easy going with one daughter and two four legged children - Riesling the labradoodle and Coco the standard poodle. We are all about travel and have loved experiencing the Airbnb community as guest all over the world. Now we are excited to return the favor as hosts and put to use our own experience in what we've loved as travelers and guests. 
We love our life in Denver! Life just looks sunnier when it's.... well, sunny outside! With over 300 days of sunshine a year there's no complaining. It's easy to be outside and active. We go running, horseback riding, biking, skiing, hiking,...
We are urban dwellers and love the feel of an old neighborhood with lots of little shops, restaurants and coffee shops. That's how we like to live and that's how we like to travel. 
We are all about going the extra mile to make our friends, clients and guests feel not only welcomed but also seen, heard and appreciated. In friendship, work and hosting.

name: Cynthia
about:
(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Likes:
Yoga, Travel, Film, Literature, Illustrated Journals, Bjork, Madeleine Peyroux, Modest Mouse, Radiohead, Get Real! Wise Women Speak, Important Things with Demetri Martin, Denver, Colorado, Original Impulse Blog, Bite Sized, davistudio, The Writing Coach, Holy Body Day - May 22nd, Around the Word, WOW! Women On Writing, (URL HIDDEN) (URL HIDDEN) SCRABBLE, Authentic Body Project, Studio Como, Pinching the Ostrich, Beverly Gurganus Studio of Fine Art, Peggy Markel's Culinary Adventures, Words with Friends, The Way of the Happy Woman, Women on the Move, (URL HIDDEN) Gina Micek, Victory Circles, The Re-Wilding, Elizabeth Gilbert, Writer, Ink Stain Inc., Original Impulse, Mars Dorian, Fanning Partnership, The Fine Art Department, Donna Druchunas, Create with Kim, Leapfrog Connections, LILY LILY IMAGES, Cooking with Michele, Muralicious, Marie Kazalia, Sand Fibers, Book Lover's Gift Box, Mary Richmond Design, Leslie Rinchen-Wongmo, Marcus McAllister, Slow Food USA, eWomenNetwork, Slow Money, The Art of Nonconformity (AONC), David Lebovitz, Two Trees, The Love Response®, Carrie Cahill Mulligan, (URL HIDDEN) (URL HIDDEN) SocialMouths, 5.12 Solutions, Lisa Call - Textile Paintings, Pia Jane Bijkerk, Dora Ficher Art, Jaime Lyerly - Artist, Sculptor, Painter and Writer, Empowered Women International, Robin Maria Pedrero, Lisa Peters ART, Enrique Díaz, Altered Arts magazine, Urban Sketchers, Elizabeth Briel, Newspaper Blackout Poems, Blogging with Beth, Becoming Learners Together, Where Women Create, The Paris Blog, Best snarfable sandwich?, Creativity and Self Development - Illuminating The Creative Way, Charlie Gilkey, Jennifer Libby Fay, textile artist

name: Bryan
about:
28 year old couple recently moved from Hawaii to our recently renovated historic home in Denver, CO.  Huge animal lovers, have 2 older bulldogs and a year old golden doodle.  I own a raw dog food company and run a swim school, she is an Emergency Medicine Doctor.  We love getting outside and hiking, biking, skiing/snowboarding, and paddling.  I've lived all over the world and firmly believe that, no matter where you go, the best way to experience a place is to stay with the locals. 

P.S. Do you ever wish you could breathe underwater?

name: Robert
about: I am a young business professional working in Wealth Management.
