I love the outdoors to include camping, hiking, rock climbing, kayaking, mountain biking, etc. I enjoy good conversation and learning new things from visitors. I'm extremely easy going and flexible. Typically, I'm away from home 8:00 until 6:00 and do not have roommates. Although, if needed I can be reached all hours of the day. You would have full access to my home except for my bedroom, obviously. As for interaction, you may have as much or as little contact with me as you like. I love animals but do not currently have one, dogs are more than welcome but I'm unfortunately allergic to cats.

name: Laura
about: I'm a young professional living in Denver. Born and raised in the NYC Metro area, I have come to love the mountains mixed with culture that Denver has to offer. I love to travel-  I have been to 5 continents and enjoy everything from the beach to a historic town. I don't really specialize in one particular activity, but rather enjoy going with the flow and doing whatever I want in the moment. I can't live without chocolate or the sun, and the 300 days of sun Denver has to offer is pretty awesome!

name: Brett And Ashley
about:
Quick bio of Brett and Ashley. 
Brett is a top producing realtor/investor in Denver, Colorado since 2007. College graduate from UNC. Ashley is a jewelry designer/owner at Mildred and Bernice and often we are traveling to sell Ashley's jewelry in trade shows or are meeting with retail stores. Ashley is a college graduate from the University of Nebraska,Lincoln. We are calm couple and will leave your home as clean or cleaner than when we arrived. My father owns a hotel in Estes, Park Colorado so we really take to heart being a respectful traveler and visitor. If you are ever interested in a trade for stay in the beautiful mountain town of Estes Park, Colorado (Murphy's River Lodge) please let me know. We are not partiers but do enjoy drinking wine, fine cocktails and good local food. When we travel we like to check out the local spots and tend to steer clear of the touristy areas.

name: Stacy And Ian
about:
From Denver, CO. We love music, beer, travel, and having fun. We also enjoy meeting new people and creating a comfortable, affordable environment for all to explore. 
Love is all you need! :o)

name: Esti
about: I live in the place i rent out, but i travel a lot for work.  I'm excited to have people stay in the area i love to call home for the last 14 years.  Feel free to ask me any questions!

name: Sade
about:
Hi! I'm Sade and love living in Denver! I'm originally from Wisconsin and have been living out here for the last 5 years. I am 25 and work as a territory manager for a Verizon company so I work during the days and am home at night and on the weekends. 

I have a small short haired cat named Skylar. She stays in my room most of the time but comes out occasionally.  In my free time I keep busy by traveling, working out, going out for beers with friends, trying new restaurants,  seeing movies, exploring the city, and watching the Green Bay Packers. 

I love meeting new people and am willing to host people of all kinds! I've found airbnb to be a great experience and hope that you will too!

name: Patrick
about: I'm one of the many transplants to this beautiful city having moved here from New England almost 8 years ago. For the past 6 years I've worked in education as a teacher, nonprofit program director and startup entrepreneur. Next year I'll begin my Master's program to become a licensed social worker. I love all things Colorado - mountain biking, snowboarding, hiking, hockey, golf, park days, just being outside and moving around in general.

name: Michael
about: I am a world traveler, having visited over 50 countries in the past 10 years. I know what makes travelers feel at home and what its like to be in a city other than your own. I both use AirBnb while I'm traveling and to rent my place in Denver while i'm out of town.

name: Dia
about:
I am a former lawyer now dedicating my life to bringing yoga, mindfulness and leadership programs onsite for workplaces.  This balance is fully represented in my home-- the comfort and luxury of my lawyer-life and the zen and meditative environment of my yoga-life.

I'm a huge traveller and love to flow through countries with very few plans, an open mind, and an adventurous spirit.  As a guest I am mindful and respectful, and I offer the same as a host.  I would love to share my home and the wonderful experience of being here!

name: Christa
about:
I was born and raised in northern New Mexico. I am a Waldorf teacher and student of Anthroposophy. I love to garden, listen to music, sew, knit, crochet, paint, run, people watch, African Dance, breathe fresh air, watch the clouds roll by, and laugh.

Favorite Quote: Blessed are those who laugh at themselves for they never cease to be amused.

name: Brendon
about: I am a food and wine connoisseur, organized and tidy, love to hike and be outdoors, and LOVE the city of Denver. I am a Regional Sales Manager covering 10 states around the Midwest so gone most Mondays through Thursdays or Fridays and some weekends. I am very optimistic and fun-loving and my passions are building relationships and rapport with people from all walks of life.

name: Mary Grace
about:
I co-own an event video production company based in sunny Denver, Colorado but spend as much time as possible with my husband at our homestead in southern West Virginia.

Iceland, Budapest, Portugal, Greece, Thailand, Japan, and Southern France are on my growing list of places I would like to write home about before I bite zee dust.

name: Rachel
about: I am an explorer. I love creative and open minded people and all of the adventures possible in the world. My favorite food is noodles so when I travel I always seek out the local noodle dishes. From every place I visit, I also like to buy something that I can wear or use at home that reminds me of my trip. My favorite places to visit have warm climates and the perfect combination of urban chaos and serenity. Riding bicycles is my preferred mode of transportation.

name: Nan
about: Hi~I'm a Denver native who thinks Denver's the bomb! It really is full of nice, friendly people, activities and fun. I'm a long time Denver Realtor and I also am crazy about architecture, renovations (like this property I've just finished) and art.  I live two lives.  The City where I work and have close friends, and whenever possible, the country or mountains to ski, swim or soak in any number of my favorite hot springs--or, I am getting away to a fun vacation spot.   Get me on a horse, floating down a river, hiking a beautiful mountain or skiing with my kids..and, you will see one happy individual.  I work to have my rentals nice and clean with a friendly comfortable feeling--without any of my personal items..these are specifically for vacation rentals and made nice for YOU~!

name: Anna
about: Hi! I'm Anna. I'm an editor at an academic publishing company that's based in New York, and so every once in a while I need to come out for meetings. I'll be at work during the day, and the rest of the time I'm super clean, quiet, and easygoing!

name: Josh
about:
Hi, I'm a Colorado guy (by way of California) that enjoys getting out in nature - skiing, hiking, backpacking.  I'm a craft beer fanatic and love checking out new breweries when I travel.  So far the most exotic was a microbrewery in the Arenal volcano district of Costa Rica.  

The next big trip I'm looking forward to is a 2-week honeymoon to New Zealand - can't wait!  Any suggestions...?

name: Dan & Jenn
about: We live local in Denver and love all that Colorado has to offer! We hope you'll enjoy your time here as much as we do.

name: Hai
about: I've lived in Denver since 1999 and I work for myself. I own several fitness and kickboxing gym here in denver and the front range. My business website is (URL HIDDEN)

name: Nathen
about: Enjoy traveling, reading, writing, music, hiking, delicious food

name: Kayleigh
about: My boyfriend and I love to travel, meet new people, and cook healthy food!  We're looking forward to helping complete your unique Denver experience!

name: Gina
about:
This is my first foray (May 2012) into Airbnb travel so, sorry that there's not more info on me.

We're from Colorado, where we love outdoor activities and beauty in the mountains, music, nightlife and funky people watching.  We're both attorneys, though I am not currently practicing. Instead, I spend much of my time on environmental activism. Our children have all flown the coup. I spend most of my time in Glenwood Springs these days.

We love to travel locally and abroad. We do a lot of nature-focussed travel and backpacking but love to mix it up with a little luxury. I also love to experience different cultures - both US and foreign. Some of our favorite travels have been Dominica (the "nature island"), Viet Nam and Cambodia, rafting in Dinosaur National Monument, backpacking in Colorado and Montana.  I lived in Ecuador for 7 years so speak Spanish.

I am now (August 2013) putting our condo in Glenwood Springs up for rent. We will happily rent you anything from a bedroom with private bath to the 2 BR/2 1/2 BA main floors to a basement/ BA suite, to the whole deal.

Hope this helps you get to know us.

I am not connecting this to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) as I do not like the idea of businesses being able to develop in depth profiles on me.

name: Kathy
about: Hi!  My husband, Roland, and I have lived in beautiful Colorado for six years.  We have two little girls and we love exploring this great state.  Roland works in IT and I am a historical researcher.  We are from the Midwest originally--I grew up on a farm and Roland was raised on the mean streets of Omaha.  We bought this camper about 3 years ago and have taken it to various parts of Colorado and Nebraska with our kiddos--the camper is a great, affordable way to see the state without spending a ton of money.  When we're not enjoying outdoors in Colorado, we are catching up on the latest Disney films (and old classics, too!), or working on our home in the DTC area that we purchased just one year ago.  We have two dogs--one giant Great Pyrenees named Aspen and a tiny little rescue pup named Bella.  Our cranky cat, Beyonce, is the boss of all of us.

name: Jill
about:
My husband, Michael, and I live in Denver, Colorado. We lived and worked in Washington, DC for several decades and although loved it, we are delighted to be here in Denver.  We love the outdoors and  like to hike, bike, xc ski, snowshoe. 
We love to travel and have done a fair amount.
Michael and I spent the past year (2012) living in Singapore which was a wonderful experience especially traveling to Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, Australia, Bali, Gili Islands, and Malaysia.

We have a son who lives in LA and they had their firstborn in January 2013. Our daughter lives in Carbondale, CO with her husband and 9 year old daughter.

We are inveterate travelers ourselves and enjoy meeting people, thus my interest in having guests through Airbnb.

name: Rebecca
about:
Love to travel with the husband. I wish our cat could come with us because she is just the best!

We are now getting into hosting our own space and can't wait to meet new people! We hosts dinners with our friends and they enjoy it- so why not try this out too? We can't wait to meet you! 

Hosts names: JP and Rebecca with our kitty!

name: Jackie
about: I'm originally from MI but have lived in Denver for the past 2 years and have really been enjoying it.  I'm happy to give you suggestions about where to go/what to do in the area if you need/want it.

name: Russell
about: I was born and raised in Austin, North west area by Lake Travis. Dad is a small business owner in Austin and I studied marketing at Baylor. Currently I work for Favor Delivery, been doing it for 7 months, Love it! I love animals, food, concerts, music, drinking, smoking. Just looking for a place to live July-December. I'm a sweet guy, dedicated to work, respects boundaries and always cleans up after myself!

name: Theresa
about: We've lived in and loved this neighborhood for years.  It's old and it's young, and best experienced on bikes that we've provided.  We're new to airbnb and are excited to serve as ambasadors to the city we're proud to call home. I've worked since 2002 at a beautiful historic Victorian hotel downtown and embrace the role of innkeeper.

name: Jason And Andrea
about:
We were born and raised here in Colorado and absolutely love it here. I (Jason) lived in Colorado Springs for 3 years in this home before moving to Denver to take on a job that is there. During my time in the Springs, I fell in love with the surrounding area and all the things there are to do (Pikes Peak, the Incline, Garden of the Gods, Red Rocks Canyon to name a few). we certainly miss our home but are excited that other's can enjoy bringing their families and enjoy building memories together. Please let us know if you have any questions whatsoever! :)

Jason and Andrea

name: Emily
about: Hello! I'm a marketing professional by day and and outdoor adventurer whenever possible. I love being outside, love the mountains, love exploring and love new adventures. Hiking, skiing, mountain biking, rock climbing, yoga, archery, cooking, music and more. Adventures are my thing.

name: Bonnie
about: Hello!!  I am from New Jersey and chose to live here in Colorado after going to college here in Boulder.  I have 2 little ones and really enjoy managing our vacation rentals and taking care of my babies.

name: Aaron
about: Hi! I am from Iowa, and now I am happy to call Denver home. I am creative, active, and outgoing. I like to keep things casual unless a black tie is called for. Think dance floor!

name: Karen
about:
We are both musicians in the Colorado Symphony, and travel in the summer for work.  You can learn more about us in the musician section of the Colorado Symphony's website c(URL HIDDEN)  We are happy to share our home with visiting guests, but sad that we won't meet you in person. There is so much to see and do in Denver that we know you will have a terrific time here!  Please enjoy our home and treat it as your own.

Karen and John

name: Darren
about:
I freelance as a web developer/designer and also work during the summer as a tandem paraglide instructor for (URL HIDDEN)   I work remotely and am always outdoors/going on trips and enjoy mountain biking, paragliding, skiing, speedflying, kiteboarding, speedflying and mountaineering.  I enjoy healthy living as well as going to the less healthy but amazing music scene in Denver.    

I'm new to hosting but have enjoyed staying at Airbnb places all over.

name: Randall
about:
We live in Denver, have been tirelessly renovating our home for the past 4 years and are excited to be done with that so we can get back to doing fun things, like skiing!

We have a little boy, born in Oct 2014, so he now takes up our free time...skiing is on hold for yet another season.

name: Melissa
about: I live with my husband, our two sons & our two dogs in Denver, CO.  We've lived in a few different cities including Phoenix, Seattle & Brooklyn and have enjoyed every minute of it before settling back into our home state of beautiful Colorado.  We absolutely love to cook, travel, experience new things and meet new people!

name: Debrah
about:
Hi! I'm Debrah! I'm an Education Mentor Coach at a preschool, and have worked in Early Childhood Education for the past 4 years. Outside of work, I am always looking for good times and adventures. I love to travel (anywhere and everywhere), rock climb, practice yoga, bike, hike, ski, go see live music, and spend time with my friends. 

When I travel I'm typically on the move, trying to make the most of the time I have in a new place. I'm a respectful and outgoing person to host. :)

name: Andy And Tessa
about: Andy and I are a fun couple living in Downtown Denver. We both work at software companies in the downtown area and like to hike, bike and of course SKI.

name: Yurico
about: Originally from California, I moved to Denver to pursue a Doctorate program in Public Health and fell in love with Denver's unique blend of urban living and outdoor adventure. When I'm not studying or traveling myself, I'm constantly exploring everything the city has to offer from hiking trails to local bars/restaurants and would happily make recommendations for your stay. I want you to leave loving Denver as much as I do!

name: Justice K
about:
Justice Kwesi Kwarteng is an accomplished Chief Strategy Officer, Fashion Editor, Event Producer, Branding and Business Consultant committed to changing the quality of life of his clients via his cross list professional services.  

He is the Founder and Executive Creative Director of Colorado Fashion Week (COFW), the only officially State recognized professional fashion trade and public trade marketing event in Colorado.

One of the most respected and admired Event Producers in the industry, from 2009-2013, Justice served as the founding casting director, professional model coach, runway choreographer, fashion show creative director of the award winning Red Ball Denver Fashion Show: an annual ultra chic and high energy fashion fundraiser event organized by Denver Colorado AIDS Project. (Red Ball Denver was voted as the most fashionable event in Colorado by OutFront Colorado in 2013.)  

He's also served as a judge for popular events like the Paper Fashion Show and Pret-A-Porter by IIDA, respectively. 

Life Motto |
:: "Love is Medicine."

name: Joan
about:
I'm an active boomer who enjoys travelling and meeting other people.  I enjoy a diversity of activities from reading a book in the gentle breezes of a sandy beach to body surfing in the waves.    I also love to kayak on a tranquil lake to white water rafting on a great running river.  Love to play cards, too!
I am a large breed older dog rescuer (not me, ha!, the dogs I rescue)!  Puppies will always find a home but the older large dogs who have lost their homes need a gentle and loyal friend to give them the best quality  of life while they finish aging.
I love my profession, too!  As a professional Realtor and Broker, I've had the joy of helping hundreds of people  find their "perfect" home!  Also, it is a career that allows me to take some time to travel and get to know other wonderful places to live.  
I was raised in New Jersey but moved to Newport Beach, CA when I was 24.
Then I moved to Bellevue, WA., for 10 years!  After that, I wanted lots of sunshine and moved to Tucson, AZ.  All are  very different lifestyles and weather and I enjoyed each of them during the years I lived there. I have lived in Denver, CO., for the last 23 years and have watched it grow!!
Five things I can't live without are lazy beach days, whimsical days in the mountains and lakes, my grandchildren's "I love you, Gramma"'s, dogs and chocolate!
As a guest in your home, my friends I have traveled with or spent time in their homes with them always tell me....."you're so easy!  and "it's so nice to have a friend visit who doesn't need constant entertaining"!  My style of travelling is casual and as stress free as possible.  My plan is to be planless and my goal is to be goalless!  This is the very definition of Vacation!

To me, Life without God, Family and Friends is like an unsharpened pencil; it has no point!

Love to get to know you!

name: Kim
about:
I'm a freelance digital marketer, journalist/writer, and technology researcher who strives to work a bit less and travel a bit more. I run a culture website Kaffeine Buzz, which is fueled by a deep love for music, film, art, festivals, and as a photographer, capturing life as it flashes before my eyes. I grew up in the Bay Area, greatly enjoy living in Denver for over 14 years and in London (UK) for a bit, and am now a bit of a nomad with Los Angeles as a home base. 

I love the adventure in learning how small the world really is and experiencing the joy of how we're all connected in some way.

name: Troy
about: Hi!  Jennifer & I would love to help you enjoy your stay in Denver.  Please feel free to ask us any questions about the area.  We will do our best to point you in the right direction.

name: Silas
about: Originally from Kansas, I'm a Creative Consultant based in Denver. I'm highly involved in music and the arts. I love connecting with people intellectually and inspiring one another to live a better life.

name: Cheryl
about: I am originally from Springfield, Missouri, but have lived in Denver for nearly 20 years with my husband, Chris Adams, who is a Denver native!  We have 3 teenage children and one "adopted" teenage daughter from a Somali refugee family.  Also living in our home is my elderly father-in-law, two dogs and a pet bunny. We love to make good use of our lovely home which includes the carriage house! And we love to share Denver with newcomers and make new friends. Hope to meet you soon!

name: Maren
about: I am a 29 year old young professional that loves to travel and is very active. Originally from Southern California, I jetted off to the University of Alabama for college to get my fix of Southern BBQ and football. After a great 4 years of studying marketing I moved to Jackson Hole, WY for another 4 years to be a real life ski-bum and enjoy one of the most beautiful places on earth. I love to ski, travel, hike, mtn bike, see live music and try amazing restaurants. I'm usually on the go and love to meet new people. I moved to Colorado 3 years ago (Boulder and then Denver) and love it here! I'm currently in sales for a software company and love living in the Highlands. I have a sweet 13 yr old Jack Russell Terrier named Tex who is quite the character. He is friendly, house trained and does a lot of sleeping, but he loves people and other dogs. I'm excited to open my home to some others that like to travel and explore.

name: Nora
about:
Professional speaker and business consultant.  Love my work, dogs (home is shared with an insanely cute labradoodle), travel and chai. 

Grew up in Wisconsin and have lived in North Carolina and Illinois on my path to Colorado which is now, unquestionably, my forever home.  While my one and only language is English (*sigh*) I have picked up a few words and phrases through travels and have learned from adventures in Hungary, China, Macedonia, etc. that I, while not being an artist, I am a pictionary/charades combo rock star!  Travelers from across the globe are welcome here!   

I have a great appreciation for the Rocky Mountains and remain in awe of the fact that I get to live in such a beautiful state. 

As I am an avid reader, you'll find a large collection of books from which to chose during your stay including an exchange shelf - leave the book you just finished and choose one of the shared books left there by myself or a fellow traveler.

name: Jennifer
about:
My spirit dog was a Siberian Husky and my Native American animal guide is the Otter. That explains a lot! 

Five Indispensables: 
-- Family (four generations that include my three talented children who continue to amaze me and four beautiful grandchildren)
-- Community (culture friends, book club companions, skiing and hiking pals, work colleagues, Zumbuddies)
-- Learning (languages, history, technology)
-- Play (music, dance, tennis, travel)
-- Work (writing, teaching, demazing business conundrums)

Favorite Travel Destinations 
-- Rocky places (preferably vertical and/or volcanic): Iceland, Colorado, Ecuador, Peru, Sicily)
-- Architectural and art meccas: Florence, Monreale, Paris, Barcelona, Quito, Washington DC, San Francisco, Erice, Agrigento, Machu Picchu, Budapest, Prague, Riga
-- National Parks: RMNP, Bryce, Zion, Muir Woods, Point Reyes, Yosemite, Yellowstone, Tsitsikana, Mesa Verde, Lake Quinault

Life Mantra: "Just keep swimmin(URL HIDDEN)(Thanks, Dory!)

Life Philosophy: (Thanks, William Blake)
"To see a World in a Grain of Sand,
And a Heaven in a Wildflower,
Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand,
And Eternity in an hour."

name: Jeffrey
about: Denver Native Enjoying All This City Has To Offer.  Spend Much Time In The Outdoors and Compete In Triathlons On A Regular Basis.

name: Ashley
about: I am a young marketing professional working and living in Denver. I have been in Denver since May of 2009 and love the city. I also love to travel so I understand and enjoy making my space comfortable, and enjoyable for other travelers. I have a small etsy shop in my spare time and also love live music so spend a lot of time going to concerts and finding new music.

name: Ross
about: Young Professional Engineer from the Midwest.  Outgoing and always willing to enjoy the moments when they occur!

name: Robin
about: We enjoy travelers and traveling.  Denver has been our home for 40 years so we know our city well.  Walking in our neighborhood is our favorite activity as well as socializing on our front porch.

name: Rasa
about: Rasa from Lithuania, currently living in Denver

name: Margo
about:
Hi! My name is Margo. I like to read, bake and drink whiskey (all at the same time). I love to travel, hike and dance (preferably hiking to where I can bike). Recently relocated back to Denver after bouncing around the Midwest for the last 4 years. Living abroad in my younger years really hit me with the travel bug and introduced to me to the wonderful world of making strangers your friends. Feel free to ask me anything about myself, my space or my travels if you are curious. 

Activities I am currently enjoying: 
- Meeting new people.
- Loving my family.
- Laughing with friends.
- Growing my book collection.

name: Jamie & Monica
about:
Living in Denver, CO where Jamie is work in Education and Monica works in healthcare. Avid rugby players, traveling the world, and trying to make a positive impact is our passion!

We love talking about education, music, sports, and good beer... and participating in all of those things as well!

name: Tina
about:
I am a life-long Colorado girl who loves where she lives.  A few of my inspirations & appreciations in life:

Growing up in my mother's bookstore 
Sailing
Guatemala
Gardening
Museums

My husband and I are the parents of two spirited boys.  I have my own real estate business and a passion for renovating old homes and I treasure sharing this home with travelers.

name: Courtney
about: I'm a software developer during the week, but my fiancé and I like to spend our free time traveling and exploring new cities. I've been to 18 countries and 20+ US states... And counting!

name: Briana
about: We enjoy traveling, football, & the mountains.  We are hoping to meet some new & great people by offering our house and helping those people love Denver as much as we do!

name: Vivi
about: I am a top real estate agent in Denver.  I live in Denver, I run in Denver, and I sell DENVER!  I wanted to get involved with vacation rentals to help people experience ALL this great city has to offer!

name: Isaac
about:
I am the most incredible B&B host in the world. 

My life motto is: PARTY HARD

name: Logan
about: Hello I am a Texas native who currently lives in Colorado and have this beautiful home I grew up in available for your experience in TX and this great Lodo Studio to enjoy CO!  I work in Corporate Sales & MKT and love every bit of it!  I can't live without family, love, dogs, snowboarding, and smiles!

name: Reed
about: I'm a Computer Science grad student studying in Boulder, but living in Denver because it's more fun :)  I previously lived in Beijing for four years and love hosting travelers!

name: Beth
about: My boyfriend and I live in Denver, and love food, travel, art, books, sports (him not as much me) and craft beer and wine. We would love for you to come and stay with us.

name: Aminox
about: I am a fun loving guy . no hates whatsoever . i read books and travel alot . my favorite spot for a vacation is dubai .

name: Kyle
about: Mid 20's, active, small business owner

name: Jill
about: I'm originally from WI, my husband is from NZ.  We absolutely love traveling... next stop, SE Asia, and stopping to see family in NZ and Australia.  I'm a registered dietitian and my husband owns his own business, ProSpec Home Solutions.

name: John
about:
I enjoy being outside. I'm a landscaper, love to plant and garden. I think the music scene here is one of the best in the u.s. of a!  Cooking rocks and it shows in the dishes we serve to our guests. My dad was Italian and loved to "teach you things". Because of him, I make the best damn  "gravy" this side of the Hudson River.  Fagetttaboutit! 
I like to have a great time and discover the "hidden gems" in each new city I am lucky enough to visit.  Traveling is the purest form of education.  My dog rimes rocks!  Just keep chasing your dreams!  I love the folks that have stayed here since we opened up. Each crew a little different, each person having their own story. It's been a gift, back to me, for all the hard work I put into getting Johnny Lo's up and running.  Here's to a great 2015 people!!

name: Thomas
about: I am a 28 year old MBA student who enjoys spending time with my friends, reading, camping/backpacking, skiing, travel, music, food, pretty much anything outdoors, and especially anything that will challenge my current world view....learning is my ultimate goal.

name: Jeff
about: I am a middle school math teacher at a local school.  I have been teaching at the school for the last 7 years.  Before this I taught for 7 years on the island of Maui.  My wife, Beth and I have two boys.  One is 10 and the other is 8.  I love going on the bike ride downtown on the weekends.  We are visiting my parents in Pa. and celebrating their 50th wedding anniversary.  We love our house and its location to everything.  When we are not sitting on either the back patio grilling, or the front porch hanging out, we are running to the kids' sporting events.  We just hope this will help a family out with their stay rather than staying in a hotel.

name: Lindsey
about:
Hey there! I recently moved from PHX to Denver and LOVE IT! Love camping, snow shoeing, rafting, paddle boarding and basically anything you can do outdoors. I'm also a food and wine lover so will have plenty of nightlife recommendations while you're here. Especially places with gluten free options.

Work during the week as a nerd (digital marketing agency) and also serve as Founder & CEO of a health related nonprofit called Bent But Not Broken. 
I moved to Denver to pursue my dream of creating a tech based outdoor company....and so far it's going great! Launching in all Four Corner states this fall (2016). Check out Outdoo(URL HIDDEN) if your an adventure lover like I am! 

Life throws lots of curveballs at us all and I'm on a mission to get out and do amazing things and meet equally amazing friends along the way.

name: Kevin
about: I enjoy traveling myself, lately it has mostly been for weddings, but they are tapering off and I hope to get to Italy soon. I like to eat well, cook, exercise, and play sports.

name: Sonny & Leah
about:
**..Lonely Planet guidebooks make up a large portion of our bookshelf.
--+=---> We love to create things: from soap and beer to welding creations. 
*(&) We like old things that have character and a story attached.
^^^>^^ Meeting new people is the best.

name: Natalie
about: I am 26 and love to travel. I enjoy snowboarding, wakeboarding, rock climbing, hiking and exploring new places. I am open to whatever the world has in store for me next.

name: Becca
about: I've lived in Denver for the past 12 years and I have put my heart into this home. I love the quaintness of this space and the splashes of color. The location is superb, only a block from the Sloan's  Lake and minutes from downtown or Highlands Square. I hope you enjoy this home as much as I have. I work in marketing, a writer by trade but I also enjoy working in design and fashion. I keep active by running the lake or I'm on the deck firing up the grille. See you soon!

name: Miguel
about:
Hello! My name is Miguel.  I am originally from Lima Peru but now call Colorado and Ohio my homes!  I love the outdoors and travelling the world.  I own my own company that focuses on translation, and am very proud to serve my community in that regard.  I travel a lot and can work anywhere so feel very privileged that I can share my awesome condo with the world!

Since I am gone so much, my neighbor Amanda manages my space for me.  She is a 5 star Airbnb host who lists her own space when she travels, and has been doing this for 3+ years so please rest assured you will get the absolute best service!  

Thank you!

name: Jeff
about: Chicago transplant that moved to Colorado 9 years ago and absolutely love it.  Great outdoor adventures (hiking, skiing, camping, biking, etc.), but what I like most is the neighborhood we live in - historic Park Hill.  We have 2 young boys and a dog.

name: Brian
about: Traveling poet, rambling, motivationally challenged to remain stoic at times, trustworthy, a touch universal, erupting positivity from the ends of the earth to the moon, stupendously virtuous, if you have a room I'd love one, if you need a room I have one, if you want some space let's make it, if you want a place to crash and simply land your head this bed is plenty close to the rest of the world as long as you wake up each day ready to face it.

name: Helen
about: We are a retired couple who travel extensively. We will be traveling in Mexico for the month of January and would like to rent our beautiful Park Hill home for the month. This is our first experience with Airbnb.  In the future would like to be a guest with  Airbnb and continue renting our home.

name: Tony Aaron
about: Laid back professional guy always up for an adventure.  I am a big believer in its all about who you are with and not where you are at.  I like traveling, movies, visiting old friends, musical jam sessions, early afternoon naps, late night heart to heart convos, hugs, hi fives and Kelly Clarkson...

name: Gloren
about:
DC // Wake Forest // Denver
writing x traveling x movies x sports

name: Allison
about: I have been back in Denver for 5 years and have loved seeing the city become a vibrant, urban center. After growing up here, I studied in Europe,  moved to Montana and then to Seattle.

name: Borys
about: Hi, my name is Borys and I live in Denver CO. I enjoy outdoor activities, especially sand volleyball and swimming. Current Goals in life: get really good at rock climbing, surfing, and snowboarding. I work in the software industry, mainly dealing with web and mobile development.

name: Brad
about:
Denverite / Young Professional / Explorer

My motto: more good times.

name: Kirk
about:
Although not a Colorado native, I take advantage of all Colorado has to offer: snowboarding, mountain biking, and camping are what you will find me doing after work and on the weekends.

Some of my favorite places I've visited are France, Turkey, and hot springs all over the western United States.  As a host, I am pretty laid back.  I will provide you with what you need (clean linens, a professionally cleaned house, and a few notes about the sites nearby), and then I let you get creative.

name: Samuel
about: I live in Denver, CO with my wife.  We love to travel and see new parts of the world and love meeting people who like to do the same.  We are always looking for our next trip or adventure whether thats somewhere here in Colorado or across the globe.  We found that Airbnb is a great way to experience new cities and cultures during our travels and hope others can use it in a similar way.

name: Charlene
about: My husband and I love living in Colorado, and we enjoy everything about it. We are proud to offer a completely renovated, warm, inviting home to our guests.  We live in the Denver area, and manage and maintain this home, offering you immediate assistance with anything you need.  We are confident you will love it here!

name: Landon
about: I'm a Texan living in Denver and loving it!

name: Lena
about: I am a single professional and live with my dog, Aurora, who is a sweet Shepard mix.  I am an avid CrossFitter, and love to get outdoors and enjoy all that Denver has to offer!  I am originally from small town Alaska, but have lived most of my adult life in the "lower 48," in several states before landing here in Denver.  I am new to airbnb hosting, but am looking forward to meeting new people, and perhaps catching the travel bug to get away myself!

name: Shelley
about: Fun loving, free spirited person, hard working professional

name: Elizabeth
about: My boyfriend and I are huge Denver fans! We love our city apartment and the neighborhood we live in. My cat's name is Chandler and he loves everyone and keeps his space. Jeff is an attorney in Cherry Creek and I work as a professional performance artist and teach part-time. We both love to travel and Airbnb has been such a great tool for us to meet people through!

name: Tessa
about: Originally from Wisconsin, I moved to Denver 5 years ago for a new adventure and have never stopped having one in this lovely location.   My husband, Matt, and I (along with our quirky black lab mix- Calvin) enjoy hiking, skiing, camping, fishing, traveling, and good beer.

name: Jen
about: Born in the South.  College in the North.  Living my wonderful life in the West.  40 years old.  Love teaching and learning.  Enjoy making something out of nothing.  Married to best friend for 20 years.  Mother of 4 boys.

name: Kathryn
about: Lives in denver

name: Daina
about: My name is Daina, I share a two bedroom apartment with two other girls, Mckinley and Rosalba. We are all in our 20's and 30's. I enjoy cooking and finding some of Denver's little food "gems". I'm a Colorado native and moved to Downtown Denver 7 years ago. I can't imagine living anywhere else. I attend school full-time and volunteer as a carpenter a few hours a month. I'm excited to meet you and share laughs, drinks and amazing stories.

name: Anastasia
about:
From Denver, CO. 
We love to travel and have lived in several countries in Asia and Europe. We are glad to host guests in Denver and help them to know the city as well as we do. 
Our dog, Isis, lives here as well and is most often found on the couch sleeping. 
Let us know if there is anything you'd like to make your stay more comfortable!

name: Chirag Ahir
about: I travel in search of good food.

name: Brent
about:
I am a teacher. I love to travel. Sometimes these two things don't work well together budgetwise. I am always looking for cool interesting people to share time with.

Love to snorkel and ski - so most of my travel takes me to those locations.

Love to travel with my dog, but realize this doesn't always work for everyone!

name: Daniele
about: Colorado Native, business woman and family is everything. I enjoy being outdoors, going on hikes and trying new restaurants.

name: Erin
about:
Hey everyone!
My name is Erin and I live with my boyfriend, Dominick. We both are active climbers and outdoor enthusiasts. I am currently going to graduate school for counseling and have a part-time job as a mental health counselor. Dominick owned a business, but sold it to go back to school for real estate.

name: Susan
about:
I'm a business owner, wife and mom of two sweet kids. I love living in northwest Denver – a beautiful corner in one of the world's most amazing cities. We enjoy an incredible balance of life/work here. 

My husband, two small kids and I have been taking trips to visit family around the country for a couple years now. While any travel is a fun adventure for kids, I've found it's not always a fun adventure for parents. I worry about my kids rolling out of a bed too high off the ground, or running into the corners of eye-level sharp tables. While I love eating out while I travel, it doesn't always work with kids, and I crave having access to a kitchen and fridge. 

I hope we will always find a place stay that's kid-friendly and a great home away from home while we travel. We offer our house here on Airbnb with the hope that our house will feel like a kid-friendly oasis – a truly fun vacation with kids.

name: Danielle
about: We are a friendly family who loves to garden, bicycle, dance, enjoy the Colorado mountains, and entertain friends. David is a public elementary school teacher and Danielle is a Spanish interpreter who also works for a non-profit supporting families of children with disabilities. We love to camp and relax in hot springs in Colorado and New Mexico.

name: Jacqueline
about: Hi! I'm Jacqueline and I love to travel. I think Airbnb is a great way to meet generous people and also travel a little less expensively. I love good vegetarian food, wine, reading classic literature and philosophy, running, yoga, and every kind of music. My favorite thing to do while traveling is simply exploring new areas. I don't spend much time in a hotel; but I love a clean & nice space.

name: Kai
about: I'm a teacher who loves to travel and see the world. I've spent time living in India and France and live in Brooklyn, NY. I'm originally from Colorado.

name: Amy
about: Hello! I am new to AirBNB and am living in Denver, Colorado.  I love to travel and am looking forward to visiting new places and sharing my home with others!

name: Eric
about: We like music :)

name: Luis
about:
I am a young professional who loves to travel. Born in Ecuador and raised in Minnesota. I work in operations for a non profit. 

I am new with AirBNB but I think my style will be something of a free range. Lack of rules is to say that I trust that adults will act like adults. Have fun and I hope you enjoy my apartment as much as I do.

name: Sarah
about: I am an anthropology professor and rent my home while I am traveling. I take great pride in the unique and beautiful details of my house, which  belonged to an artist before me.  So I love it when others enjoy it as well. As a host, I like to pay attention to details and leave guests all the information they want about Denver!

name: Josefina
about: I retired after a long career in public television. My lifelong avocation is music.  I played violin for a community orchestra for 10 years, conducted a plucked string orchestra, played mandolin in a 5-piece band, and currently teach beginning classical guitar and mandolin.  I am mainly responsible for my elderly Mom, who lives in the house with me with her own full time caretaker.  My babies are my 2 little poodles, Itzi and Andre.  My motto in life is, "Don't ask what's wrong with this picture, look for what's good in it."

name: Levi
about: Take a look> (URL HIDDEN)

name: Keating & Shiva
about: We love Colorado and have lived here 25 years—in Aspen, Boulder, and now Denver. We're both professionals who love skiing and hiking in the mountains, and also enjoy all the food and culture of the city. And we love to travel, now especially in Europe.

name: Tria
about: Looking for great vacation rentals!

name: Brittany
about:
I'm a wanderlust and travel constantly. I love exploring Airbnbs near and afar. I grew up in North Texas, but made my way to Denver 6 years ago. I am a big advocate for the Sharing Economy.

I have a 2.5 year old dog named Summit who was the hostest with the mostest when I was an Airbnb host for a year. Now I rent out my entire home when Summit & I travel so you will have the full space to yourself.

I love waterfalls, hikes, mountain drives and trying new food.

name: Alison
about: Photographer from Washington, DC.

name: Amanda
about:
Just like most of us, I love to travel! I'm excited to use airbnb as both a host and guest, though as my dreams are to one day own a hostel, I'm most excited to host. I hope to make my guests comfortable, and look forward to getting feedback on what guests are looking for.

I'm very outdoorsy, from rafting, hiking, and surfing, to plenty of snowboarding in the winter. That said I love checking out the different restaurants and bars Denver has to offer. Who doesn't love a good meal paired with delicious drinks? 

My favorite trips so far have been to Jackson Hole, Costa Rica, Seattle, and San Francisco. That's a lot of favorites but they're all so different and awesome in their own ways. I'm looking forward to seeing Europe next summer!

name: Shawn
about: I am a 39 year old Colorado native.  I am an elementary school teacher and father of two boys.

name: Agnes
about: from Chicago, now live in Denver . really enjoy the vibe of a big city;)

name: Junaid & Jordan
about:
Hi! We are Junaid and Jordan and we would love to have you come enjoy Denver with us. We are a young couple who love traveling, spending time outdoors, delicious food, and meeting new people. Jordan works in renewable energy. and Junaid is a tech entrepreneur. 

We have been Airbnb hosts (and guests) for over 2 years so you are in good hands!

name: Haelee And Matt
about: I am a Licensed Professional Counselor in Monument, specializing in adolescent trauma.  My husband, Matt, is a licensed Realtor in Colorado and owns offices in both Colorado Springs and Denver.  We love living and playing on the Front Range and would love to offer suggestions of places to see and things to do.  We both love to travel and visit new and diverse areas of the world.  We love meeting new people and introducing people to where we live.  We welcome world travelers, and have family members that speak English, Spanish, and Farsi.

name: Cindy
about: A Real Estate Broker from Denver

name: Heather
about: Hi everyone! I'm Heather and I live in Colorado. I work in psychiatry while attending graduate school. When I'm not doing either of those, I usually off traveling. I love skiing in the winter, camping/backing in the summer,  and planning a beach vacation whenever I can. So excited to meet people along the way!

name: Kitty
about: Karl and I met in Antarctica working for the U.S. Antarctic program.  After crewing on sail boats in the South Pacific, we decided it was time for the "real world."  We moved to Denver, got married, had 2 kids and started a new kind of adventure raising a family.  We still love to travel, but some of our adventures involve taking a toy boat on a string to a city lake.

name: Kate
about: Denver

name: Heidi
about: We live in Denver, Colorado. We like exploring new neighborhoods and don't stay in much, but do need a comfy place to let our two young kids rest. I'm an advertising writer, my husband is a large-scale real estate advisor and we'll take care of your place like it's our own.

name: Glenda
about: I am an instructor in Sociology at the University of Colorado in Boulder.  The topics I teach include Self and Consciousness, Self and Society, Social Psychology, and Sexuality.  I enjoy travel, the outdoors, good food, good conversation, and my work. I have traveled around South Africa, Brazil, Peru, Mexico, Cambodia, Vietnam, Thailand, and the United States.  I have hiked a few 14eers and enjoy getting into the mountains here in Colorado, camping in Vermont with my friend and godson, and laying on the beach in Puerto Vallarta with my housemates.   I can be fairly quiet and solitary and yet in conversation quite provocative and even irreverent at times.  I enjoy talking with people who have different experiences and perspectives than my own.

name: Jay
about: My name is Jay, I live in Brooklyn and love city life, but also get out to nature almost every weekend. I love climbing, camping, and riding my motorcycle, and ideally combine all three in a weekend.

name: Brian & Ali
about:
My partner Ali and I have both lived in Denver for over 6 years.  We love the city, and enjoy biking to dinner or walking to one of our favorite parks.  Also, heading up to Golden or Boulder for a quick hike or some mt. biking is at the top of our list.  In the winter we trek up the "hill" to ride or ski at Copper, Vail, Breck, or one of the other mt. town resorts.  

Us as hosts: The accommodation has a separate entrance, and is closed off from the rest of the house by two double doors in the dining room, so you probably won't see us too much.  We are happy to chat though and you can just message us or knock on the front door if you have any questions.  

Happy Travels, 
Ali & Brian

name: Dustin
about:
I am a young professional living in beautiful Denver, Colorado. I work for an international travel and community service company based in San Francisco, California.

I have had the opportunity to visit over 50 countries and I try and check one new destination off of my list each year. I enjoy the outdoors, love music, trying new restaurants, and making new friends.

name: Samantha
about:
Hi there!

I'm Vice President of Global Acquisition for a digital marketing company. I'm very friendly and super clean! 

I love hiking and traveling, which I do a lot for work! I'm new to Air B&B, but will treat your home with the TLC with which I treat my own. 

Would love any recommendations on great places to see in your city!

name: Charlene
about:
I previously worked internationally for about 6 years in Thailand and Mongolia doing public health work. I'm now based in Denver, working remotely for UW-Seattle in information sciences.

My partner, who I live with in our listed townhouse, works in refugee resettlement here in Denver.

I have a lot of places to go on my to-visit list - I'd love to get to Iceland, Turkey, Peru, and revisit the places I've worked before. I'm getting more into the whole camping and hiking thing due to living in Colorado, and I'm just starting to play rugby with a local team here. It's...fun, yet terrifying :)

I love bookstores and libraries, and enjoy non-blockbuster movies and just about any show that has spaceships, singing, or quirky comedy in them.

As a guest:
I travel light and prefer bicycles - and tend to do a lot of work travel. 

I'm a non-smoker, quiet, and mostly use rooms as a place for sleeping or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)ing with my office in between meetings and all. 

As a host:
We're new to this! We'll update more as we figure it out, but generally we're pretty laid-back. We love eating and going to coffee shops, so if you're looking for some sort of specific food here in Denver, ask!

name: Alyse
about:
I love exploring the outdoors in this beautiful state!  You can find me in the mountains any chance I get whether it's rafting and hiking in the summer, skiing and snowshoeing in the winter and enjoying Colorado's numerous hot springs any time in between!  

When I'm in the city, I love cooking with friends and attending local events like concerts and art exhibits.  I've also enjoy furthering my quest to find Denver's best taco cart!

name: Melissa
about: I am a fine art photographer and live in Denver, CO with my husband and daughter. I have a strong interest in different world cultures and enjoy traveling throughout the US and abroad.

name: Troy
about: Ive lived in CO for the past 17 years and I love to travel to new places.  I grew up in northern MN but I love being in a warmer more adventurous place like Colorado.

name: Jayme
about:
I was able to build my home in 2014, which was such a dream come true! I had always wanted to create light-filled, beautiful space that felt inspiring and welcoming. Now that it's here and I'm all settled in I would love to have you come stay! 

I'm mindful, quiet, happy and chill. I love spending time focusing on health and wellness, thinking about the power of positive thought, listening to great music and cooking lovely meals. Nature is my jam. Skiing lights me up. I'm a sucker for pretty clothes and natural skin care products. 

I've traveled extensively at various points in my life and the adventure of meeting new people in new places around the country and the world has always been the richest part of the journey to me. 

In my home, while you're visiting Denver, I want you to feel comfortable, at ease, well-rested and happy! Come on over and check it out!

name: Ezra
about: I am a happy, artistic, and loving person. I like to produce music, play guitar, draw, and spend time in nature. I also love to snowboard, dirt bike, and skateboard. Traveling is also something I am really into.

name: Michelle
about: Love my husband and kids, Clarksdale Mississippi, big dogs, travel, golf, biking, Galicia, indie films, and language.

name: Edwin
about: My wife and I are two adult professionals who have lived in this building since 1997. It was completely renovated in 2007.  We enjoy movies and reading.  We are quiet and mature folks.  We make frequent trips to NYC to visit our grown children and grandchildren.

name: Farah
about: i love to travel, see new things and meet new people!

name: Chevonne
about:
Single fun female who works hard to be able to enjoy life with ease. I like to make quick weekend trips to visit family and friends around the county. In my free time you will find me in the gym, cooking in the kitchen, or out enjoying a casual glass of wine. 
One of my favorite things to do is host dinner parties for my close friends, enjoying good food and good conversations is my idea of a good time.
My expectations for a gust would be someone similar to me. Low key, low maintenance, responsible, and CLEAN!

name: Julian
about: 3rd Grade teacher in Denver. Love to explore the neighborhood, especially the food. Enjoy traveling in the summer and embarking on never ending house projects.

name: Julie
about:
Julie and David Dani
We love living in Denver and restored and updated this home 5 years ago.  We enjoy the outdoors and going out to eat and drink good beer-like everyone in Colorado and would love to give you recommendations of places to go-kid friendly and not.  We look forward to meeting you and hope you enjoy your stay!

name: DaShaud
about: I am a very humble, conservative, loving, caring, respectful, mature man. I live a very clean and safe life. I do not smoke or drink. I am a Libra so that means i'm very compassionate understanding and a little OCD lol. I am a school teacher and I enjoy traveling, adventure, and positive energy. I like great food, good music, amazing movies, and amazing people. My life's motto is "Be kinder than necessary for everyone you meet is fighting some kind of battle"

name: Joshua
about: Denver local.

name: Scott
about: Tampa native living in Denver.  I spend most weekends up in Breckenridge and love everything this city has to offer!

name: Mica
about:
I'm from Boulder Colorado. I'm a curious traveler/adventurer and I travel often to the west coast for work projects. I usually explore cities I visit on foot so that I can stumble upon the great finds you just don't see zipping by in a car. I'm a clean, courteous/quiet guest and am usually up and out exploring early.  

I enjoy art, music, culinary adventures, museums, outdoors activities, meeting people and exploring the world!

name: Mignon
about:
I am an urban dweller,  mountain lover, deep sea diver, art admirer, life explorer.  
When I am not walking pooches or shopping for a yoga studio you might find me passing the keys to guests who are staying in Denver at an Airbnb rental.  
I am a concierge for good people, amazing places and fine things.

Originally from southern California, I grew up traveling with my family and got the bug.  I've sailed all over the Caribbean, camped my way through the Pacific northwest, crossed the pond, but there is so much more to explore.

I have been in Denver for many years now.   Professionally,  I wear many hats under an umbrella of concierge services I offer including house sitting/property management, personal organizer and I am so excited to be the buyer and merchandiser for a fantastic yoga studio in North Denver.  I use to work with production for local music events.  I am extremely passionate about bees and have 2 hives sitting in a clover field in south Denver.   Living in one of the countries most beautiful states, I take advantage of my back yard by hiking, camping and snow shoeing.    In town, I venture out to galleries, museums, concerts and  supporting independent shops and restaurants.   The people in Denver are notoriously friendly, I have met such amazing folks here that it makes it difficult to leave.  

The apartment is a sanctuary in the city with an easy charm.  A lovely place to regroup and rejuvenate.   I am delighted to offer savvy travelers accommodations at a reasonable price-and I hope it lends for more room to explore what the city may have in store. 

Happy Travels! Namaste.

Mignon

name: Jarrod
about: I am from the United States. I grew up in upstate New York but lived in Denver, CO for most of my adult life. I've been traveling the world in one form or another for the past 3 years and would love to continue this lifestyle for a few more. I love traveling, photography, adventure sports, and movies. I'm very open minded and love to try new things.

name: Kevin
about: Engineer, landlord, redeveloper

name: Michael
about: Fun loving guy who loves to show off Denver for what it is. I love to travel myself and use Airbnb throughout the world. The favorite places are back in Europe and other spots with a beach.

name: Elizabeth
about:
Location! Location! Location! My place really is the perfect location! With the mountains just 30 minutes off I70 going west, the inner city with museums and night life, just a 5 minute drive or bike ride, and the airport just 15 minutes away going east on I70, you will find it useful to be so close to everything Colorado has to offer! Plus you are walking distance to lakes, parks, outdoor pool and night tennis.
 
2611 is a 4/20 friendly home. I do grow marijuana although I do not smoke it. I have been a medical marijuana caretaker for many years. Smoking it or cigarettes out on your porch and not in the house is perfectly fine.

As your host, I will most likely not be around very much but when, I spend my time gardening or online teaching in my study.

I hope you enjoy your visit here. Please feel free to call or talk to me in person with any questions about the area or about any special needs that are not covered on this site.
I think you will love this little oasis in Denver! 

Enjoy your Colorado visit!

name: Jessica
about:
I have lived in Colorado for the better part of the past 10 years, and love how the city of Denver has continued to grow, to offer even more of what I love about it here! Between the sunny days, and the laid-back, healthy, lifestyle of Colorado, I encourage everyone to swing through for a visit! 

I have enjoyed using airbnb throughout the country, and hope to provide a clean, safe, and enjoyable retreat at my home for you! Additionally, I'm looking forward to seeing more of our country in an authentic way thanks to airbnb.

name: Kevin
about: Frequent traveler to domestic and international destinations, a foodie that chose this area for all the great dining and nightlife choices at the doorstep.

name: Susan
about: Professional women living in Denver.  Homeowner and landlord (separate property that where I live) for many years and understand the need for responsible tenants.  I'm very clean, most friends would consider me in the 90% percentile.  I'm in late 40's, hate to admit, and past my crazy days but do enjoy a glass (or two) of wine in the evening.  Looking to find a regular place in Boston to stay in city neighborhood, will be there 2 weeks each month for work.   -Susan

name: Adrienne
about: I'm kind, fun, active, adventurous...I tend to be very outgoing when I'm out socializing and a quiet introvert when I'm home relaxing.  I enjoy seeing new places and meeting new people.

name: Sania
about: I live with my husband, Gideon and two kids. We love living in the heart of Denver with our great neighbors.

name: Megan
about:
I am a fun loving gal who travels as much as possible.  I understand the desire to "stay where the locals stay" and hope you'll treat my home with as much respect as I would treat yours.  
I live with my boyfriend and amazing 5 lb Pomeranian Poodle (Xiao Bear) and they love adventure as much as I do.
I love yoga, and running, and eating, and family, and fun!!

name: Michael
about:
We have met the nicest people through Airbnb. We have been renting a room in our home for a few months and it's been great  We met a woman from Russia and a gentleman from the Middle East. 
I am excited about travelling and meeting new friends.  I am married to Molly, and we travel together and separately depending on our respective schedules and interests.  I am employed as a local government administrator - having worked in various positions in the field since 1977. With retirement coming in the next year, I hope to travel extensively.

name: Matthew
about: Denver native, traveled to over 20 countries around the world.  Previous career as an outdoor professional.  After two graduate degrees, I now work for the state University.  Love to meet new people and share stories.  Patrick and I look forward to meeting you soon.

name: Kendra
about:
My husband and I are Colorado natives and enjoy all that Colorado has to offer outdoors during all seasons.  We love camping, rock climbing, sailing, and skiing.  We also love exploring new restaurants and breweries and Denver happens to cater well to our tastebuds.  When we can get away, we usually make it a sailing trip and our favorite vacation is sailing around the Caribbean islands.   

I am a clinical and sport psychologist and my husband is an architectural engineer.

name: Tori
about: Hi! My name is Tori, I am a physician and my husband is a small business owner. We have a passion for traveling and exploring other cultures. We recently decided to quit our jobs and move to Africa where Tori will be taking a new position at a hospital in Botswana. To save up some money for our move we have been renting out our home to other travelers. We hope you find it a cozy home base to explore everything Denver has to offer!

name: Wendy
about: I am thirty-something professional female.  I am very active and enjoy yoga, skiing and anything outdoors.  I also adore live music and sports events.  I am an honest, hard-working single professional who believes in work hard, play hard.

name: Aaron
about: I work in the outdoor industry in Denver, CO and my wife is a teacher. We enjoy all kinds of outdoor activities such as snowboarding, hiking, camping, climbing, and paddle boarding.  We have a two year old daughter who is amazing and we spend as much time together as possible as a family.  We love to travel too, enjoy checking out new places and having new adventures.

name: Brody
about: Very lucky to call Denver, Colorado my home.  I have enjoyed living here for five years now, and love everything the city has to offer.  Being in real estate, it has been a very exciting few years with all of the changes happening in Denver and new people moving here.  I am very social and love to meet new people from around the world.  I traveled abroad for several years and loved being welcomed into people's homes and treated like one of the family.  I want all of my guests to feel at home when they stay with me.  I look forward to making new friends and helping my guests experience the best the city has to offer. I know my way around the city and will be happy to point you in the right direction.

name: Nick
about:
Foodie, entrepreneur, wine lover, world traveler, investor.
  
"Life is about the people you surround yourself with and the things you create with them." (life motto)

I love to travel and explore new places.  I was brought up to always be extremely respectful of other peoples homes (thanks mom!).  I consider myself to be a fun, easy going, entertaining guy with a passion for life. If I could be anywhere in the world, it would be either in the mountains of Colorado, in midtown Manhattan, or in the heart of Paris.

name: Kelly
about: I am 30 years old and my husband is 33. We like good food, coffee, mountains and the countryside.

name: Amanda & Casey
about: We are East Coast natives who are so lucky to now call Denver home. We love hiking, skiing and traveling. We have traveled all over the world and there is nothing better at the end of the day than coming to a cozy, clean, comfy home.

name: Twalla
about:
Happy! I have a son that is even happier! 

I, also, have a (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) Group called "AirBnb Denver Guests!" You can join there! I post daily things to do and daily happenings in Downtown Denver or Denver in general! Open to the public! And free to join!

name: Stacey
about:
I am a young, active mid 40's professional female and yoga instructor. I have travelled to nearly 40 countries using Couchsurfing so I am very versed in sharing my home with fellow travellers.
I love outdoor concerts, running, hiking, cycling, great restaurants....

name: Victoria
about: I am an east-coast transplant who has lived in Denver for almost 10 years. I love it here! The mountains offer endless entertainment and Denver's music/food/beer scene just keeps getting better! I am an architect/urban planner that is trying to find a way to see the planet.

name: Mark
about:
Hi,
I'm and easy going a realtor, volunteer firefighter,  husband, and dad. Some of my favorite travel destinations include Costa Rica and Australia. I enjoy books by Bill Bryson and the TV show "Game of Thrones". My life motto is "treat others how you want to be treated." I hope you enjoy your stay. Thanks!

name: Jenny
about: Hello! I persionally I believe you can get a feel for someone better by speaking in person that reading a profile, so if you have any questions or just want to get a feel for the type of person I am, feel free to message me.

name: Brian
about: I love to travel, try new things, and meet new people. I love skiing, mountain biking and just being in the mountains.  I like sushi and spicy foods.  I am friendly and can get along with almost anyone.  I like to explore and am willing to try just about anything.

name: Matt & Courtney
about: We are a married couple with a family and a little dog

name: Aeric
about: I am a 67 yrs young black American, who loves international travel. I enjoy all kinds of music, live theater, and cinema.  I enjoy people of all ages and cultures. GOTTA LOVE DOGS!

name: Verne
about: Retired health care business owner. Pet owner....

name: Charlene
about:
I am originally from London, England and my husband from Mississippi but now live in Denver with our 7 year old. 
We love where we live. Close to museums, the zoo, City Park, Downtown and countless bars and resturants.
Our family love to travel. Cuba, Mexico City, Barbados, St Vincent, Egypt, Scotland, Spain......we sometimes forget where we live! 
We frequently lend our home to family and friends whilst we are away and they love the location and weather here so why not give it a try.

name: Ashlee
about: My husband, Tim, and I grew up in Iowa (go hawks!), but have lived in Denver for the past 9 years. We are avid sports fans, love to travel, hike, camp, ski and gorge on amazing food.

name: Natalie
about: I live in Denver, Colorado and enjoy the outdoors lifestyle. When I'm not working in the technology field, I snowboard, mountain bike, hike and garden.

name: Rhea
about: I am doing AmeriCorps VISTA at an youth leadership and development program and urban farming here in Denver! Love CO and all it has to offer. Went to school in Boulder and moved to Denver a few months ago. I am going back to NY (upstate) for my grandmother's birthday on Christmas day and my mother's birthday on new year day and figured I'd put my place up. My roommates won't be home but one also airbnbs the extra upstairs room so you may have the entire place to yourself or another airbnber!

name: Jezika
about:
I love traveling so it makes sense that I chose a career that requires quite a lot of it. Though I stay in hotels when it's necessary, I always prefer the comforts of a home much more, especially for trips of multiple weeks. I've used AirBnB for trips to CA, MA, GA, Italy...dozens of places all over the country and the world. I am so happy to finally be able to share a space with like-minded travelers.
I'm a sales director for a window coverings company and train people from coast to coast. At home, I have an amazing husband and two awesome dogs. I love traveling, live music, camping, hiking, paddle boarding, skiing, yoga, good food, good wine, good friends and dark chocolate.

name: Lucas
about: I am a social young professional who loves to be outdoors and living life to the fullest. In my spare time you can usually find me skiing, hiking or having a microbrew with some good friends. If it is Sunday during football season you can find me screaming at a television someplace.

name: Catie
about:
Hi, I'm Catie: craver and pursuer of adventure, challenge, and the perfectly put-together sandwich. 
 
When I'm not in the classroom or the workplace, I like Sunday afternoons, live music, morning runs, chasing light, traveling, dreaming of traveling, and creating in the kitchen. 

My hope is that my home will feel like  a home away from home for you!

name: Dorothy
about: Born, raised, and educated in the Boston area.  BA in English Literature from Tufts University (Medford MA) and MA in Latin American Studies from Univ. of Texas-Austin.  Currently an academic editor, part-time ESL Instructor, dog lover, literature and film aficionado, music buff, dog lover, grandmother, and soon to be world traveler.  I enjoy meeting new people, exploring new places, savoring new experiences.  Have traveled a lot (Cuba, Mexico, Chile, Argentina, Guatemala, Costa Rica, France, Spain, Greece, Austria), but never to England.  Am hoping to spend a month or two there - two weeks on a guided tour and the rest on my own.
